comment: We enjoyed working with Michelle enormously.  She was very professional and responsive to our needs.  Her suggestions and follow thru were spot on. We would, and do, recommend her highly.

Rachel provides the best service in representing you. She started with a solid marketing plan and implemented it clearly! 

She got the best price for our home in a competitive market! I highly recommend her!

Rachel was an amazing realtor. She was very responsive to all our needs and always acted quickly. She was able to get us into our home under the exact conditions and price that we wanted. Couldn't ask for anything more!
Jessica was there for any questions I had.  100% class through the whole process!

My wife and I, knew we wanted to buy a home and we had very hard standards on what loan we wanted to use, the area we wanted to be in, and type of house we were looking for. Jessica went out of her way to understand the parameters of the 100% financing loan we wanted to use. She spent countless hours showing us homes that would fit these guidelines. We were so happy that Jessica was able to find us our starter dream house. She even went above and beyond with the lender when she thought we were not being treated right. We later found out that she called an executive of the national financing company to make sure her clients were treated correctly. I can not explain how much our transaction with Jessica meant to us. She is now not only Our Realtor For Life, but is a dear friend for life as well. Jessica goes above and beyond for all of her clients. I would recommend her to anyone!

Max was an amazing real estate agent for us and we highly recommend him. If we ever need a real estate agent again in Homer he will definitely be the one we reach out to. 

He was recommended to us from a previous real estate agent we worked with, after he moved out of the area, and could no longer be our agent. I think that says a lot. He could have easily referred us to another agent. 

Max was very kind and incredibly responsive to us in our 2 year plus search looking for our perfect piece of property. There is nothing about Max, or about the process working with him, we’d change.

Christina was an amazing help, got to Anchorage on a Friday morning, Friday afternoon, she meet us to look at a couple of places for my adopted mom. We found one and the process began. Being in Washington state, Christina was in contact with me to help with the process of buying a home. She is 1000% involved with the whole transaction and the sale was completed,  thanks again for being a rockstar.

Christina had worked diligently and efficiently on the purchase of our home.  She tirelessly supported our efforts to ensure that we were able to get the best possible outcome of the purchase of our home.  We truly appreciate the opportunity to work with her and will definitely use her services again when need arises.  Thank you Christina.

Working with Christina Edenshaw as my realtor was an absolute pleasure. Her professionalism expertise, and dedication were evident throughout the entire process. Christina went above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of my home selling experience was smooth and stress-free.  She provided invaluable guidance, promptly addressed any concerns,  and always had my best interest at heart. Her knowledge of the market and negotiation skills were impressive, resulting in a fantastic outcome.  I whole heartedly recommend Christina Edenshaw to anyone in need of a top-notch realtor. 
Thank you, Christina, for your exceptional service!

Christina was WONDERFUL to work with!  We viewed a property online with specific needs and anticipations in mind related to our retirement years.  Soon after, we met Christina.  In a very understated way, she went all out to ensure that the home went beyond meeting our expectations.  She enthusiastically shared ideas to help us envision what we could create to customize and beautify our home and property and, as we work to fulfill many of those ideas, it continually gives us a sense of satisfaction and pride that will last, well into the future.  Her expertise was invaluable!  Christina worked diligently and encompassed her resources to work out potential and usual hurdles to make the experience a very smooth and pleasant process!  We've been in the property for just over a year now and as we continue towards that vision of having our perfect home and enjoying our retirement, we know that Christina was literally the one to "bring it all home!" for us!  Thank you Christina!  You are truly the "best of the best!"  -Mic and Janice Silva

I needed to sell my house.  Katie was recommended to me by a friend, and that recommendation proved phenomenal.  Katie was great, in that she worked directly and closely with me -- realizing my work schedule and some family commitments complicated things for me.  She even negotiated phenomenally well on my behalf with the sellers' agents.  Stated simply, Katie was awesome and I cannot come up with enough superlatives for her and the job she did here.
N/A
Katie rocks!!!

Katie was very attentive to my needs. She negotiated hard and got the house with multiple offers on the table. Her communication is excellent and always in a timely fashion. She's energetic and is exactly what I wanted in a Realtor!!! She has the "I got you" attitude and drive! I can't recommend Katie enough!!

Katie Hotchkiss was really easy to communicate with and I felt like she understood my needs and wants in a property. She was very accomidating with her schedule when it came to showing properties and was always on the lookout for places that she thought I would be interested in seeing. Im probably not the easiest client that she has worked with but she was always very patient and professional.

Katie's positive attitude and enthusiastic approach was refreshing. Just from the rental interaction with her (coming from WA state) we knew she would be the right person to find us the Alaska home of our dreams.
N/A
N/A
N/A
Katie goes above and beyond for her clients. Working with her as a power team not only helps me with my deals but also with my clients as well. Highly recommended!

I cannot express my appreciation enough for the superb service that I received from Katie Hotchkiss during my purchase. Her help and guidance allowed me to purchase property in Alaska without needing to leave Ohio. She was there every step of the process, always answering questions and returning detailed information for me about each property I had interest in. She gained my full trust from the first communication, and maintained that throughout the negotiation and sale. Buying property in a different state can be a daunting task, especially considering the possibility of being scammed. Katie's help and expertise made it a comfortable, easy process and I definitely plan to purchase through her again in the future.
Katie was amazing during our home buying process. She was always on the ball and made things easy for us!
Quick responses, honest, trustworthy,  and super communication

We were searching for a home in Alaska to make a move from California. After spending time combing through online resources, we found a few properties we wanted to take a look at. After contacting Katie Hotchkiss, we were able to see multiple properties quickly. She helped us get in contact with a mortgage broker and we were able to get a home we were happy with. Katie was always available when we had questions and kept us up to date on the purchase of our home.

Katie is amazing. Responsive to text, email and phone calls no matter the time of day. She was completely transparent with communication and gave exceptional advice and made sure I was fully aware of all options. Definitely look forward to working with her again in the future.

Katie Hotchkiss was great to work with! She was an excellent communicator, and very responsive. She showed us houses according to our wants, needs and budget and she was patient until we found the right home! If she ever wasn’t sure about something she would double check and get us the answer we needed, which we really appreciated.
N/A

Katie is customer friendly, quick to respond to any questions or concerns . She completes her tasks in a timely and professional manor .
I will use her in the future and recommend her to my friends.
I tried several different  agents trying to get info on property with no luck- Katie was most importantly communicative and helped ease the process

Smart, driven and focused are just some of the words that describe the abilities of Ms. Hotchkiss.  I was going thru a very turbulent time in my life (major transition).  Katie helped me find the home I needed in order to put my life back on track.  

She also was present when ever we met.  Despite her youth she displayed incredible maturity and knowledge that I would expect of a much more experienced broker.  

It was a pleasure to work with her.  She is my go to for any future home purchases or sales. 

Respectfully,

Jason Gentile
Lieutenant Colonel, Infantry
US Army (retired)
We enjoyed working with Katie Hotchkiss on the purchase of our home, she was professional, efficient and organized! Highly recommend, thank you Katie!

She is knowledgeable, friendly, professional, and will walk a client through the process.  I was expecting that it would take longer than it did, and my stress level throughout the process was very low due to her great Communication skills about the progress of the purchase.  I can’t sing her praises enough!!!
N/A

Gina is the best agent I’ve ever experienced. I’ve worked with many other agents that were good also, but Gina is number one out of all. She’s very responsive. She’s able to communicate in a way that is very clear and effective for people who don’t quite understand the intimidating language of agents. She also has great connections with people in her area that are helpful for all other areas of homeownership. Every single one of her referrals for other services related to homeownership, we used and were very satisfied with their craftsmanship. I’d give Gina ten stars if this review would allow it. I wish I could use Gina in the rest of the 49 states.
Gina and her team went above and beyond to get our property sold   Gina's expertise and zeal got the job done and supported the process at every step.  Thank you for everything!

I highly recommend Gina if you are looking to sell or buy unique properties in Alaska. Her professionalism, communication and clarity made my transaction seamless and quick. I will definitely be calling on her for my next Alaskan property search!

Gina really went above and beyond in helping my Mom sell her house. We literally couldn’t have asked for a better realtor. She is a long time local, trustworthy, catered to our needs, responsive, fast acting, knowledgeable and had great advice; all of which helped us get a great price for the house. Our house sold quickly.

This lady went above and beyond the call of duty  both times for me. Not only as a  realtor but she became a very dear friend in the process.
She kept me informed every step of the way and never made me feel unsure about anything. 
She is a real go getter. The only one you want on your team. 😎

Gina has been my go to problem solver for years.   My property has unique issues and considerations that gina handled quickly and efficiently.   I recommend Gina to any one selling a home or searching for one
Gina is fabulous! She was extremely friendly, knowledgeable, and responsive through the entire process. We couldn't have asked for more!
Gina was very professional and attending. She did a great job.
Gina was a great help in selling my property. Very professional  and attentive.
She always gets back to us right away. Gina is very knowledgeable on everything related to real estate and people that can help.

Gina is by and far the best real estate agent I have ever worked with, and we've been through many real estate transactions! She really listens and works to understands what we ultimately are looking for, even if we might not really know. She's patient, communicative, and spends the time to thoroughly research and prepare for each property we visited. She also seems to know every single person in the area, which has been very helpful as we moved-in and established ourselves in the area. Our. Forever. Agent.

Gina Pelaia was so incredible to work with! She was so helpful every step of the way. I'm very particular and had lots of questions about the properties we looked at. She got every answer I asked in lightning speed. She made the entire buying process very painless. I've had other great realtors in the past in MO, none of them worked as hard as Gina. When others asked who my realtor was, they replied with, she's the best in the business. If you are needing a realtor in the Homer, AK area, Gina is the one you want!

I have worked with Gina for the past 11 years.  She has managed my house in Homer as a rental property and just recently assisted in the purchase of a different house.  She has always been very professional and thorough in all of our dealings and transactions.  Would highly recommend her services to anyone needing to rent, buy or sell a property.

This is the second home Gina has sold for us. This was a particularly difficult sale and Gina handled it professionally and expertly. She has a tremendous understanding of the market in Homer, AK and the entire process of buying and selling. Her presentation of the home was amazing-honest but showed the home to every advantage. She got back to us quickly even on the most trivial questions.  Can't say enough good about Gina or our experience working with her.

This is the 4th time I have worked with Gina, buying and selling two homes over the past 8 years.  For me, there is just no one else I would ever work with.  Gina treats everyone like they are her only client, giving them her full attention.  We had plenty of roadblocks during the sale of my home, but she kept telling me that "we're going to get through this", and we did.  I highly recommend Gina Pelaia to anyone interested in buying or selling a home on the Kenai Peninsula.  She knows her stuff and will get the job done!  Thank you Gina!

I'm writing this review to express our gratitude to Gina. We recently decided on a move to be closer to our Kids and Grandkids. We interviewed several realtors in Homer and found Gina to be the most aggressive in pricing and market strategy. After listing with Gina our home was sold within two weeks. We received first class service and were constantly updated on the process from start to finish. Thank You Gina for a smooth transaction.

Gina Pelaia is THE agent to work with when selling a property. That’s what I’d been told and she proved it to be true. Challenges that came up were resolved thanks to her expertise and resourcefulness. As she was recommended to me, i’d unreservedly recommend her to others.

Gina was very helpful in the process of selling property in Homer AK for me 
I would totally recommend her for selling or buying 
She “held my hand “ when I needed it most.  It was a very stressful time for me.  Thanks Gina
When working with the state of Alaskas top realtor I could not have a better experience.

After buying property through Gina six years ago we decided to contact her for a sale of our house in Soldotna. She and Josh got us a good price for our property and it closed within two months of listing it. They did the work to make sure minor repairs the buyer requested were done and despite a problem with the well inspection, they were able to get the repairs completed in order to get everything up to code. They were very pleasant to work with and always got back to us promptly. They were also good at answering questions we had about escrow paperwork. Thanks, Gina and Josh!

Gina is thorough, energetic, and responsive. She did what it took to get the property sold both in terms of sweat equity and her own funds. Have purchased/sold properties in NYC, Chicago, and California. Frankly she is one of the best realtors that I have worked with.

Nick was absolutely amazing to work with! From day one, he was incredibly responsive, accessible, and knowledgeable about the market. He listened to what we were looking for, provided honest guidance, and made sure we felt confident every step of the way. He even showed us a property we hadn’t considered that became our new home! His professionalism, thoroughness, and genuine care made the entire experience smooth and enjoyable. We’re so grateful for Nick, and we highly recommend him!

Nick Bruckner came highly recommended by our friend and mortgage broker and served our family incredibly well in buying a wonderful home. We were buying from out of state which meant that Nick helped us view properties via FaceTime when we couldn’t be there in person. He showed great attention to detail, pointing things out that he knew mattered to us and made what could have been a difficult process fun. He was always quick to respond to our questions as well as getting us in to view many different homes. We weren’t sure exactly what area would be best for us to relocate to and Nick helped us tremendously in narrowing it down. We relayed on his knowledge of the area and negotiating skills to find a great property at a fair price, perfectly suited to our family. He is honest and insightful, hard working, very knowledgeable about real estate and the area, and also very personable. We have bought and sold many properties and can honestly say that Nick is the best we’ve worked with. We highly recommend him for all your real estate needs!

Nick was great to work with. Very knowledgeable, patient, timely, and professional. He always acted with my  family’s best interest in mind. I look forward to working with him again and have already recommended him to my family. Thanks for everything Nick!
Highly recommend Nick! He was helpful through my entire home buying process! He is very attention, responsive, and knowledgeable. Nick made my experience simple, easy, and enjoyable

Nick did an amazing job helping me buy my first house! I went into the process not knowing what all to expect but Nick was patient with me and made sure to explain anything I was unsure of. He never pushed me into buying anything that I didn’t love, was great about scheduling showings as soon as possible, and made sure to negotiate for all the right things. All in all I had a great experience working with Nick and I would highly recommend him for your home buying experience!

As first time homebuyers we had a lot of questions through this process. Nick was patient, knowledgeable, thorough,  and encouraging of our desire to understand each step of the journey. We viewed over a dozen properties and never once felt rushed to make a decision. Nick genuinely seeks to give his clients the best experience and ensure they end up making the deal that is right for them. He’s easy to work with, quick to respond, provides an honest take on properties, and knows the ins and outs of the business of buying and selling real estate. 10/10 would work with him again and hope to do so on future real estate endeavors!

Nick is an excellent Real Estate Professional. He is hardworking working and attentive. Nick will make sure you find the house that you want and need. Nick was diligent in working with us and was able to overcome all obstacles. Nick will be the best decision you make, don’t hesitate, just reach out to him!

It was a pleasure working with Nick on purchasing our townhome.  He was meticulous, professional and pleasant to work and communicate with.  He has construction experience and the "eyes" to look for any deficiencies before final walk-through.  I felt comfortable, stress-free and didn't have any issues in relaying any concerns I have with him.  I recommend Nick as a realtor when you are ready to buy a home.

I would highly recommend Nick Bruckner of nick@vestedalaska.com for anyone in need of a real estate agent to help sell or buy a home. Nick is a very good communicator and responsive to the many questions that arise in a sales experience. Details are key to a smooth transaction and Nick tracked them all. He has great ideas on how to list a home from displaying professional photos to determining a competitive price point. He is very efficient with timing and strategy which we really appreciated. I would not hesitate to call Nick again if the need arises! We listed our home with Nick and 5.5 weeks later, we closed!

Nick helped me purchase my first home and it was an extremely smooth process! He answered all my questions and was quick and easy to contact and always responded within the day. He let me know exactly what I needed to do which was very helpful since I have never done this process before. I would highly recommend working with Nick! Fantastic experience!

We were in good hands with Nick Bruckner as our real estate agent! We had a one-month window of time in which to find a home. Nick calmly and competently took on that challenge.

Nick made finding a house for us as quickly as possible his top priority. Even though he had a 45-minute drive to the area we were moving into, he was immediately responsive to our requests for home tours and promptly answered all questions.

We were impressed with his level of knowledge about construction, building codes, cost and work involved with repairs, etc. My husband has vision issues, so Nick was sure to thoroughly inspect the property as if he were buying the home and then he candidly and matter-of-factly reported the facts of his findings relevant to our decision making, even when that meant we would not want to buy the house because of what was discovered.

After spending one afternoon together looking at houses, Nick had a good handle on what we wanted and what we would not want, and he focused all future efforts toward what he knew we might want.

There was far more demand for housing than there was supply, so many houses were being sold the same day they were listed. When we found a house that we loved, there were already two offers coming in on it. Nick and their associate agent helped convince the Sellers to wait until the next afternoon to make a decision so we could submit our offer. Nick was equipped with an arsenal of tools to use to sweeten the deal and make our offer preferable to the Sellers while protecting the Buyers from bidding too high! His strategies worked in landing the house only $2K above the next highest offer in a bidding war! We purchased a house that we love within 10 days of first meeting with Nick!

He is skilled in respectful negotiations and was attentive to every detail throughout the entire transaction, including providing contact information for utility hookups, even while he and his family were sick.

His standards are the highest and he truly practices customer service, making the process go as smoothly as possible start to finish! We felt like we were working with a trusted friend rather than an agent. My husband and I highly recommend Nick Bruckner as real estate agent to everyone seeking the standard of excellence with integrity! We are thrilled with our new home and would rate him higher than 5 stars, if that were possible!

Working with Nick Bruckner from Vested Alaska was a game-changer for my wife and I as remote buyers. His expertise and willingness to go the extra mile made the daunting task of buying property from a distance feel effortless. From conducting virtual tours to promptly answering our many questions, Nick ensured we felt confident and informed throughout the entire process. His attention to detail and commitment to finding the perfect property truly exceeded our expectations. We highly recommend Nick to anyone considering purchasing locally or remotely!

Nick was very patient and helpful when it came to buying my first home. He built a great relationship of honesty and trust and did not rush the process! I can't remember how many crawl spaces we investigated but Nick exceeded any previous expectations I had, a phenomenal agent.

Honestly if it wasn't for Nick I would have never met my abbreviated timeline to sell my house. Nick was able to quickly formulate a path to getting the home ready, listing the property, finalizing the details and to finish the sale of the home.

Can't tell you how much it matters to get the proper guidance for this complex process. Nick made the hard look easy and we had a great outcome in a short amount of time.

I highly recommend Nick if you wish to purchase or sell property in Alaska. I am not a realtor and let him know up front he would have to do all the work, thankfully he accepted the full responsibility to explain and guide me through this experience for which I am extremely grateful.

Our first home buying experience with Nick Bruckner of Vested Alaska was top-notch! Nick walked alongside us throughout the entire process with planning, thoughtfulness and care. He exceed our expectations of the first time home-buying experience with great resources, frequent and honest communication. Nick was dedicated to helping us find the right fit for our family. He is honest, pays close attention to detail, and is a great problem solver. I would recommend him highly if you are seeking someone who is passionately looking to find you just the right fit, demonstrating honesty and high integrity.

Nick and Jamie were incredibly helpful throughout entire selling process. They were full of insight and suggestions. The sale went fast, smooth, and I always felt my best interests were being represented.

Nick was great to work with. He did an exceptional job in helping us find our home by being our eyes and ears in our virtual walkthroughs. His thoroughness in the walkthroughs led to no surprises on us arriving on site. We would definitely recommend him to anyone looking for a realtor.

I had the privilege of working with Nick from the opposite side of the table as a self-represented seller, while his clients were the buyers. I must say that my experience with Nick was nothing short of exceptional. Throughout the entire process, he displayed a high level of professionalism and demonstrated outstanding negotiating skills.

Despite receiving other higher offers, we ultimately decided to accept Nick's clients' offer. This decision was largely influenced by Nick's ability to find a win-win solution for all parties involved. His expertise in navigating negotiations ensured that both the buyers and sellers were satisfied with the outcome.

Even though I chose to represent myself, I can confidently say that if I were to seek representation in the future, Nick would be my top choice. Working with him has been an absolute pleasure, and we are genuinely excited for his clients as they embark on their journey in their new home.

I had the privilege of working with Nick from the opposite side of the table as a self-represented seller, while his clients were the buyers. I must say that my experience with Nick was nothing short of exceptional. Throughout the entire process, he displayed a high level of professionalism and demonstrated outstanding negotiating skills.

Despite receiving other higher offers, we ultimately decided to accept Nick's clients' offer. This decision was largely influenced by Nick's ability to find a win-win solution for all parties involved. His expertise in navigating negotiations ensured that both the buyers and sellers were satisfied with the outcome.

Even though I chose to represent myself, I can confidently say that if I were to seek representation in the future, Nick would be my top choice. Working with him has been an absolute pleasure, and we are genuinely excited for his clients as they embark on their journey in their new home.

There aren’t adequate words to detail what an amazing experience we had with Richelle and her team in the sale of our home. 
Immediately after signing contracts, she hit the ground running and secured multiple showings DAILY and brought in offers in under a week. 
Even beyond the sale of the home, she was quick to offer knowledge and expertise when we had questions and concerns. 
We were never left hanging waiting for updates or responses and she held our hands through every step!

A member of her team (Nicole Isler) was also just as diligent and helpful as she is. Nicole was able to provide detailed instruction, and ensure all estimated timelines were not only met, but oftentimes beat. 

Overall, we could not recommend this team enough. If you’re in the market for a realtor, Richelle can’t be beat.

We have done four transactions with Richelle over the last 5 or so years. Her expertise and connections landed us a deal on our last house that was better than I ever imagined we'd get. Richelle knows her stuff and has expertly guided us through all of our transactions with ZERO delays or hiccups. Working with Richelle has truly been the best choice for our family - I wouldn't trust anyone else to guide us through the home buying or selling process.

I have been so lucky to have Richelle for multiple sales of houses and buying. She has always been great, putting my husband and I first. She knows the real estate industry, and I have always trusted her advice in it. I can’t recommend Richelle enough.

I have been so lucky to have Richelle for multiple sales of houses and buying. She has always been great, putting my husband and I first. She knows the real estate industry, and I have always trusted her advice in it. I can’t recommend Richelle enough.

Working with Richelle was great!! I was a first time home buyer and she made my home buying experience simple and easy. It was not as stressful as I had been told it would be. She truly cares about her clients happiness. She goes a above and beyond for her clients. She is simply the best!
Richelle is knowledgeable and quick to respond. She aways made me feel like a priority and put my mind at ease too many times to count!

Would definitely recommend Richelle! She was so great, getting in to see homes we wanted and made the whole process incredibly easy. She definitely works hard behind the scenes. I bought a home and sold a home on the  tax exchange program. Even with a buyer backing out at last minute she staid in contact and was able to hold the new home I picked out to buy but couldn’t till the other sold.

It’d be easier to list the negatives:

1. 

I cannot recommend her enough. She is insanely attentive, knowledgeable, friendly, and a go getter. There truly is no better realtor.

How can anyone not give Richelle a 5-star rating?  She's hard working, she's always available when you need her.  She worked hard on our property dealing with a difficult selling agent.  Yet for our part, the transaction was very smooth.  I would recommend her to anyone looking to buy or sell.  If she worked this hard buying a home, I can only imagine exceptional service for a seller.

Richelle represented us through a sale situation that had some very challenging obstacles. I have no doubt that if not for Richelle and her commitment to us as clients, the process could not have been completed. Instead, it was a great success! She was professional and helpful and knowledgable. I have referred her to friends and family.

Communication is key and Richelle never failed to return calls and texts in a timely manner. She had an amazing amount of patience with us in our search for the perfect home... and when we did find that home she went above and beyond by writing a personal letter about us to the seller to help them see that we were the perfect family to buy the home. In a competitive market where homes can have more than one offer she was quick to the table with our offer to make sure we didn’t miss out on the chance to raise our family in the house of our dreams. This is not my first home purchase and I have regretted choosing some of the past realtors I have worked with but I would without hesitation 100% recommend Richelle if you are buying or selling a home.

My husband and I were more than happy having Richelle as our realtor. She went above and beyond her duties as a realtor making sure we understood and were comfortable in the buying and selling process. She was patient and understanding with me we well (which isn’t always the easiest lol). She helped us find our amazing new home, and helped us sell our old home way faster than we could have expected! If we ever move again we definitely will be calling her.

Richelle made our home buyer experience awesome!! She really listened to what my husband and I wanted in our home, asked great questions, and showed us great homes. She's a top notch negotiator and we could not be happier with our experience.

Richelle did an AMAZING job selling our former home and helping us find our new home. From getting our house ready for listing and getting the best possible photos, to helping us figure out the right balance between a move-in ready and a fixer-upper. She was so patient with all of our questions (and there were LOTS of them!), and really went above and beyond to make sure the process of selling and buying was as smooth as possible. And she had us under contract after just a couple days on the market! We highly recommend her!

My partner and i used Richelle to buy our current home she is a wonderful relator and a great person. She is at the top of her game and knows what she is doing. We had a great purchasing experience with her, she goes above and beyond what she needs to to do to get things done. Even after buying our house i know if i have any questions i can still contact her and she will help me a anyway possible. I highly recommend her for any buying selling needs you have.

My husband and I used Richelle when we listed our house and purchased our 2nd home and really can’t say enough great things about her. She is knowledgeable, approachable, personable, endlessly patient, and incredibly generous with her time. She answered every question and explained every part of the process clearly and thoroughly. Buying a home can be challenging, but working with Richelle made it as painless and straightforward as possible. We highly recommend her, she is a true gem in her field.

Kathleen is a very good person to work with.  She always let me know what was going on and if I didn't understand something she made sure I did.  I loved working with her.  She is the one that helped me buy the house and now she the one that sold it.

Working with Kathleen was a pleasure! She took such a load off my shoulders by giving me contacts for inspections to repairs etc.  She is very experienced in the field, and answered all my questions, even the silly ones!  Kathleen is an excellent Realtor, especially for a first time seller; there is so much to do, but she kept me informed each step of the way, set up appointments that worked for my schedule,  and just made my life so much easier! I really appreciated her clear communication & input when discussing repairs, offers, and timelines.  I highly recommend Kathleen Kowalczuk for any of your real estate needs!

We worked long distance with Melissa. She was great. she hung in with us even though it took a year and a half. It was not her falt, our house in Colorado took a year to sell. But she hung in there with us. Found us the perfect piece of property. It took a few months to close. We had a few problems that came up with the property but in the end it was just perfect. I would recomend Melissa to all of my friends and fasmily. Pluse we found a life long friend in the process.
N/A

This is our second transaction w Melissa and both were flawless. She is smart, compassionate and honest. We recommend using her and her mom Grace in any of your real estate needs. Highest marks all around!!
display_name: Russell and Mary Melius, Kenai, AK

comment: Knowledgeable of the community with prior recent success in the neighborhood. Excellent communication even though I was remote in Florida. Would highly recommend to others.
Melissa is a great person to work with! She is super knowledgeable and straightforward and very easy to talk to; she does her job well and in a timely manner.
Melissa Daugherty was a great person to work with.  Very helpful with the sale of the house.
Melissa took over the listing from a previous agent, jumped right in and provided excellent service, feedback, and got the ball rolling, sold the property and provided excellent service.

comment: Melissa Daugherty was very responsive and always arranged showings very quickly, even on short notice. She found the perfect home for our family and the process was very smooth and stress free. I would not hesitate to recommend her to friends or family.
She responded promptly & thoroughly to our questions. Presented our offer convincingly. Secured the price point we were aiming for. Professional, Courteous

Melissa was a consummate professional when helping us purchase our first home.  Her excellent and honest communication style was a good fit for us, and we are grateful she helped us land the house of our dreams!

Melissa was not only a pleasure to work with,she went above and beyond to help us. Answering calls and questions promptly any day or time. Arranging showings and reaching out for additional help when necessary. We are sincerely grateful and happy that Melissa was our realtor and now live happily in our new home!

comment: Melissa was incredible to work with! We had such a hard time finding our perfect house, but she was with us every step of the way. She had so much patience as we viewed house after house all summer long. The market was moving fast, so when a listing came up, we wanted to see it right away. Melissa was so quick to respond and set up showings for us so we never felt like we might miss out on putting in an offer. We finally found a house that was absolutely perfect for our family and Melissa made the whole purchasing process a breeze! She was very clear with what to expect, and fought for us when it came to negotiating. We ended up with a great deal on our perfect home and couldn't be happier. A big thank you to Melissa and her team for making that happen!
Melissa did a great job. Always available and helpfull.
Malissa was very knowledgeable and always communicated with me in a timely manner.I could have not asked for a better agent.I highly recommend her for any of your real estate needs.
N/A

We have utilized Melissa Daugherty in buying and selling property in Alaska with excellent results every time. Melissa is a good listener and has a calm professional demenior, she is prompt on responses and is very knowledgeable of real estate procedures.
She was great to work with and knew the area well , she did a great job.

Melissa was very much on top of the process from pricing the property all the way to the close. She provided much assistance including physical assistance to ensure the property was viewed in the best way and that contractors provided the services required, asI the buyer was 3,500 miles away. If I get a chance to purchase property again I will most certainly use Melissa. Such a great experience with her and her Mother's company!

Melissa is absolutely a great realtor, Quick and efficient results. Property was on the market for a very short time and we are very happy with the results! I would recommend Melissa in a heartbeat for realty transactions. She goes above and beyond what we expected from a realtor. A score card from 1 to 10 for satisfaction came out as a 12.

Melissa has far exceeded my expectations on the handling of the sale of this property. The property was in an Estate and Melissa was task with communicating with many entities as a result of the death of the property owner. Melissa handled our account with grace and professionalism. She made it seamless to complete and I will not hesitate to hire her in the future.
Melissa is amazing! She got me through so much headache and made buying my home super simple. She had all the questions I had answered within 15 minutes or less no matter what day or what time

When we chose Melissa Daughterty and Grace Merkes to list our home in Sterling, we were fairly sure that we had chosen well. Allison helped us 4 years ago in the sale of our home and purchase of another. The process was seamless. We did not anticipate needing her help again so soon, but here we are, looking to her for her guidance and expertise yet again. She just helped us purchase our new home, and might I add she ingeniously helped us secure the home in the final bid phase when both my spouse and I thought we had lost it. 
From contract acceptance to closing, and beyond, we truly are fully relying on her yet again every step of the way. And again, seamless. 
She will also help us in the sale of our current home soon, and we are resting easy knowing that we have her on our team. 
Recommend without hesitation!

Allison Burleson is absolutely amazing in every way. She truly was an answer to our prayers. My wife and I were nervous moving to Birmingham, but all of that changed once we got into contact with Allison. Not only was she extremely compassionate and helpful, but she went way beyond what was required of her to help our family. She was able to find us the perfect house that checked all of our boxes. Our family doesn't see Allison as our realtor, we see her as part of our family now. We would highly recommend her to anyone and everyone!

I highly recommend choosing Sara to be your realtor! I moved here from out of state, and she made sure I was aware of everything to do with purchasing a home in Alabama. She is very knowledgeable and responsive and answered all my questions throughout the process. She really knows the area and was able to provide insights in the commutes for different areas and recommended unique places in different communities. She will go above and beyond to make sure to find you a house you love.

Sara did a phenomenal job helping us secure our dream home! She was very friendly and attentive. She listened to what we were looking for in a home and found us a great one! She was able to get us in to see houses very quickly and efficiently. Our dream home showed up on the market very unexpectedly, and Sara was able to quickly communicate between us and the seller's agent throughout that process. We would definitely recommend you choose Sara for your homebuying needs!

Sara... is an off the scale professional realtor! This is a complicated world and she knows her stuff! One of her strong points is her ability to pay attention to details! I found myself not thinking that was important until she found several things that I would have let slip through the cracks. What a great attitude, what a great personality, what a great honorable and trustworthy person she is and it was definitely indeed God shining down on me bringing her expertise to the table! I don't know if she will be too booked to help you, but if you can get on her Client List you would be doing yourself a favor! I basically went through what should have been a very stressful situation, but it wasn't thanks to Sara's help!

Sara exceeded our expectations in every way. She was both professional and kind at all times. She helped stage our home for showing, even bringing decorative items of her own, and helped prepare for open houses and showings. At our request, she helped us deal with contractors and installations to make the house more appealing to buyers. She did all the hard work of the associated logistics. She worked with us until closing with patience and understanding, taking time to make sure we were comfortable every step of the way. She did the research to make sure our home was priced right and had great marketing strategies that helped our home sell quickly.

I don't know what I would have done without the help of Jenise Brocks. She went above and beyond my customer service expectation. She returned calls immediately and she followed up with the lenders and the title company to make this process for me and my wife a smooth transaction. She's an A+++Realtor.
Our experience with Jenise Brocks was Excellent!

As first time home buyers, we had many questions and concerns.   Jenise was always very prompt with a return phone call or email to provide answers to those questions.  While she was professional and diligent in her job to get the best for her client, she was also kind and sincere. We would definitely recommend Jenise to anyone that is searching for a home.
Jenise is very professional and cares about you. She takes pride in her career and helps you thru every step of your home purchase . .My wife and myself adore Jenise .

As first time home buyers, we had so many questions regarding the buying process. Jenise was always very patient and informative when it came to providing answers to those many questions.  She is such a hardworking  person to have looking out for you, she is always striving to do what is in the best interest for her client.  It was a great pleasure to work with someone as sincere and kind as Jenise.

As first time home buyers, Jenise was a great help in finding our home.  She was always very quick to return calls and emails to answer our many questions.  We would recommend Jenise to anyone that is searching for a home as she will definitely go out of her way to assist you with the home buying process.

Of all the Realtors with whom I've worked to buy and sell numerous homes throughout my military career, I can truly say Carol Bowman is the best! 

I had the privilege of working with Carol to sell my home and she is absolutely outstanding.  From our initial phone call and first meeting, I knew Carol was precisely the Realtor I hoped to find.  She is a meticulous thinker with a very high level of integrity who genuinely respects and cares about her clients.  Added to Carol's impeccable expertise and experience in real estate and market fluctuations was her keen focus on fairness for both me as the seller and prospective buyers.  It was a privilege to watch her in action.  Her insight was spot-on at every turn. 

Additionally, Carol went above and beyond to help me.  I live out of state and am unable to travel as I used to, so Carol took care of everything that I couldn't do remotely.  She arranged cleaning, painting, minor repairs, and even junk removal.  She coordinated with contractors and connected me with service teams for major repairs, lawn care and appliance replacements.  I could not have gotten the house ready without Carol's selfless assistance. 

Throughout the entire process, Carol kept me apprised of all activities at the house and provided updates on every potential offer.  Her communication skills are exemplary and I always felt well-informed and involved. 

I am immensely grateful to Carol.  She has my highest recommendation to everyone searching for a superlative Realtor with a good heart!
It was a great experience working with Mrs. Milner and I look forward to working with her in the future. She was very knowledgeable and concerns throughout the house buying process.
Scott dida fantastic job selling my mother's house.
Ms Streeter u knew about the appraisal at 980 Thornton. The house only appraised at 17500 and u still trying to sale it for 229000 that’s wrong and u know it

comment: Highly recommend. Very good experience couldn't be happier, TJ is very knowledgeable and made the process extremely easy. Will definitely use her again with any future purchases or sales.

Kevin Burt was our amazing realtor. He was with us all along the way with selling.  He knows Fort Payne and the surrounding area's very well.  He's the best realtor to have whether selling or buying.  He works for you 24/7. Thank you Kevin for all your help.

Our experience with Kevin can only be equated to white glove service.  His knowledge of Fort Payne and the surrounding area was amazing.  He was always available and really helped deliver a remarkable buyer experience with no surprises and top notch service.  Extremely well prepared for all contingencies.  Officially, he is now part of our extended family and trustworthy.

Just turning 21, i found a small farm with a nice home next door to my parents.  i immediately became interested in it. I sat down and discussed it with my Mom, because it's always been my dream to own a small farm, and with her guidance i contacted Kevin and we both met him  at the house.   My Mom has known him most of her entire life, and she told me i was in the absolute best hands she'd ever trust me to be in on such a huge decision at a young age.  Kevin Burt is a professional, yet personal gentleman who made the process so much easier for me.  I work 12 hour days and i asked if he could communicate with my Mom so she could help me during busy hours at work and Kevin always communicated with both me and my Mom and it took so much stress off of me.  He would answer any questions i had rather it be on the weekend, or later in the evening. He always accomadated me and mom was right, i was in the best hands for such a monumental decision in my life.  He really took care of my every concern, question, and guided me through the process just as well as i know my family would.  Kevin made the transition, the huge purchase, and my dream since i was 3 years old come true and i'll forever be grateful for mom telling me to only deal with Kevin. i will always refer Kevin to absolutely anyone i know who is in the market for a new home or land purchase. he didn't make me feel like it was a paycheck for him, he really showed he cared, he wanted my best interest taken care of, and he absolutely went out of his way to accommodate my available hours. Kevin Burt has been in realty i think his entire life, and he is absolutely the only person i would trust with referring anyone if my co workers, friends and acquaintes to. Kevin doesn't make you feel like a job, he makes the process smooth knowing it's a huge life decision and responsibility and actually cares about his clients. Kevin Burt is not only a realtor, he is a genuine great guy, and now a good friend. Thank you Kevin for helping me achieve my dreams at such a young age. When i have my first garden, ill invite you to come have a good home cooked meal. Thanks again Kevin for all of your help, and mostly for making me feel like my decision and choice mattered.

I can't say enough good things about Kevin. There isn't space enough to do so here, so this won't do him justice - but I will do my best. Warm, friendly, professional, knowledgeable, experienced, and amazing. That's Kevin. My husband and I were looking for our retirement spot (yippee!) and stumbled across a Fort Payne home listed on the internet. We knew nothing about this area or even the state (we were looking in MO and TN). The agent was on vacation, but he told me he would have a colleague contact me - which Kevin did, within about 10 minutes of me hanging up with Greg. We were at Ruby Falls enjoying some site seeing to try and cheer us up after stiking out in the Chattanooga area and had very little time left for our house hunt. Kevin arranged a time convenient for us, we met at his office, and after meeting with him for a few minutes he drove us to what is now our new home. He gave us an extensive tour of Fort Payne and the surrounding area on the way to - and after looking at - the home. He's a Fort Payne native, and I'm pretty sure he knows everything about the town, it's history, and everyone who lives there. We had no realtor representing us and as a broker, Kevin could legally do only so much. We had never bought a home in AL, so we had to rely solely on the assistance Kevin provided. It was more than enough. Kevin walked us through the entire process, drafted  all the paperwork, and brokered the deal. Within about two weeks, we were the proud owners of our new home. Kevin even walked us through getting the utilities switched over and the process for property taxes (very important stuff) AND offered to help if we needed it since we would be trying to do this from Northern VA and some things need to be done in person. He spent an enormous amount of time with us, explaining everything and helping us to set up what needed to be done for the sale. I am former military and  moved A LOT over my career and dragged my native-Minnesotan husband with me. We have bought and sold several homes over those years. Of all of those transactions, this one was BY FAR the easiest and most pleasant, and Kevin is responsible for that. This was also the most critical home-buying experience for us since we plan to live in this home until health or other circumstances make it too difficult to do so (we're praying for at least 15 years!). We have never lived in one place for over five years. Finding our retirement spot was daunting, to say the least, as I'm sure it is for everyone. We are so blessed to have found this home and to be able to count Kevin as our new, true friend.

Hello, 
My family and I are from out of state, and we recently relocated to the Northeastern area of the great state of Alabama. 
I worked with Mr. Kevin Burt about 6 years ago, thus the decision on a realtor was an easy one this time around as well.
While some may feel that the process of finding a good realtor, a new home, selling a home, is tough and maybe stressful, I beg to differ. This was in large part, for my family, thanks to Kevin.
He is the kind of person that is genuinely welcoming and right away you instinctively know that you’re in good hands.
He is very professional, clearly enjoys his craft, is great for a laugh and a conversation, and has a firm grasp of how important it is to understand not only the housing market and local interests, but also the ‘people’ side of things.
Kevin collected our ‘wish list’ and went right to work. He was incredibly patient and supportive with our out of state situation as well, keeping in regular contact with my wife and I until our Ohio Home was sold.
Kevin helped us to narrow the search down to two homes, and he made the deal happen with our number one pick ! Kevin helped negotiate a lower price, and even managed to get us into our new home in an incredibly expedited amount of time.
I will always recommend Mr. Kevin Burt to anyone with any real estate needs. 
We have not only found ourselves a great realtor, but most importantly, a great new friend. 
Please consider giving Kevin a shot at your own real estate adventure.

P.S. Be sure to ask him about the story of ‘Wasps - RUN !!’ ... lol

Brady is absolutely phenomenal! He has a positive can-do attitude and ever-present smile. It was awesome that he’s licensed in both AR and MO, because we were looking on both sides of the state line. In fact he stuck with us when a house failed an inspection to the point we were not interested in moving forward. Just a few weeks later, we found the one for us. He was super communicative through the entire process and helped smooth over a few bumps. I would have zero hesitation in recommending Brady.
She is Excellent! Use her as your realtor. You won’t regret it.

She is the best Realtor in this area! Hands down the most knowledgeable and considerate realtor I have ever worked with. We have used her many times for buying and selling not to mention the times she just helps us out!

Mark worked with the seller's realtor and my loan officer to coordinate the process of getting all the forms filled out and the information I needed.  He put me in touch with a home inspector who found some defects that the sellers were trying to hide. This forced the sellers to pay for the repairs.

I have had several dealings with Mark, he is a go getter and hard core salesman. Very careful for both parties. I'll always will call him first. He doesn't just put a sign up and let it do the work. He finds out potential people moving to the area and goes after them. He sticks with the customer no matter how long it takes and does not hesitate one bit. I have had experience with other real estate agents in the area , Some are good but he is better.

I highly recommend Mark He helped me find the right house during a very difficult time. He was always there to answer my questions, made me feel like I was his only client. Mark impressed me with his knowledge and negotiating skills. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND ANY ONE OTHER THAN MARK JARRETT.

Mark Jarrett was knowledgeable of the local AND surrounding areas; he was patient as we looked at more homes than most do; he assisted in getting lender info. We got the home for a fair price and got through financing with no issues. As we neared the closing period we needed some additional assistance and he was quick to help which was above and beyond his requirement as a realtor. He acted more like a friend and his assistance was appreciated. He was instrumental in making our move with kids and animals as easy as it could be.

The most easy and amazing home buying experience ever! Would recommend him to anyone. Very helpful on everything we needed to bring and with going back and forth with the buyer. Anytime we wanted to look at the house he was available.
Mark helped me buy a foreclose property and a decent price ,I will definitely use him again on my future purchases.Mark is an outstanding agent answer my questions in regard of properties.

The most easy and amazing home buying experience ever! Would recommend him to anyone. Very helpful on everything we needed to bring and with going back and forth with the buyer. Anytime we wanted to look at the house he was available.
Todd is amazing. Efficient, friendly, and professional. Start to finish, he was great. Highly recommend!!

We had a great experience with Todd, when purchasing our new home. His knowledge of the market and experience in real estate was very helpful. He communicated throughout the process and helped us find a home that fit our needs. Todd was able to negotiate the price of the home to a price that we were more comfortable with. Through out the process he made himself available and worked with our erratic schedule. Todd is one of a kind and we had a great pleasure working with him.

The only thing we did wrong was not hiring Todd in the first place!  He’s easy to talk to and easy to communicate with.  He is easy to contact and answers your questions straight up.  We felt like he always had our best interests at heart.  He sold our  house in just 3  three months.  He stays committed throughout the whole process. If you’re unsure who to hire, don’t hesitate to hire Todd.  We listed with another agent before Todd and feel like we never got the service we got from Todd, and we wasted a valuable 9 months.  If you’re trying to choose between different realtors, go with Todd, he’ll get the job done.

Todd was amazing! Super knowledgeable and efficient! We saw the house we liked, made an offer and Todd got us quickly accepted. We moved to Bullhead to enjoy outdoor living and closed on an beautiful property! Jenna, his partner is super nice and his assistant Allie is so sweet, knowledgeable, super responsive and very helpful. This is an A+ team! Thanks so much guys!
Very helpful.  Sold my property quick and easy. Highly recommended
Todd was absolutely amazing at answering all questions and explaining everything to us, always kept us informed with honesty and understanding! Would highly recommend them to anyone!!
Todd is a wonderful realtor, he knows his stuff and proved it by selling my home so quickly and efficiently! I would recommend him 100% Great Job Todd Thank you for all you have done for me!

I would HIGHLY recommend Todd and his Team.  He worked with my wife and I on a very tough escrow in which almost nothing went as planned.  He was always reachable, gave great feedback/advice, and kept the process moving forward.  Without his patience, guidance, and expertise, I believe the deal would've fallen through.  Thankfully it didn't, because we love our new home.  I especially appreciated that it never felt like he was trying to push/sell us in a direction that didn't make sense for us.  It was very clear that he had our best interest in mind.  Thank you, Todd!!
Could have cost me 2250 if I would have gone with his suggestion. Who knows what would have happened if I would have counter with 310000

Todd is the best.  I have known him since he first began to sell homes.  I would stop and see him at his open houses.   I always knew that when it was time to sell, he would be my man.  He did not disappoint. Once a price was agreed upon he set up the inspection and appraisals quickly.  He was very responsive to my requests to open the home for workers etc.  I have nothing but high praise for Todd.

I was an out of state owner of a rental property in Bullhead City when I decided to sell my property. I contacted several realtors. Of those I contacted Todd was the most enthusiastic and seemed very confident his team could sell the property quickly and at a fair price. I decided to hire Todd and the house was put on the market within 2 weeks and I received 2 offers for the asking price. 
Escrow closed yesterday and the waiting for escrow was the hardest part. 
Communication with Todd and his team, especially Miranda, was excellent and I felt they were responsive when ever I had question. And I was able to do everything without traveling to Bullhead. I would recommend hiring Todd Levitt.

Todd and his team did an outstanding job for us, he negotiated 5% off the asking price, and even got some gym equipment and a table saw thrown in to boot.
His staff personally set up 3-way calling when I had trouble with the utility companies and made the buying process very easy. I can heartily endorse and recommend Todd Levitt at BMV Realty.
Todd was great to work with. SOLD our house  within 2 days of listing it. The  pictures of the home showed the house at it's best. Thanks Todd appreciate all you did to get it all done.

Todd found us the perfect home for us meeting all our needs & wants. It was refreshing to be shown homes in our price range….. instead being being shown something out of our budget range. 
He answered all our questions during the closing process plus has continued to answer questions that came up after our home closed. He also has a great team working on items that needed to be done to buy a home.
Very pleased with the service I was provided with while purchasing my first home. Jenna made it a very easy process for me from start to finish. I highly recommend her and her company.
Great communication from start to finish. Very patient and professional. Being from out of state he and his assistant Teshel made my transition so much easier.

This team is awesome to work with. We sold in CA and bought in Arizona at the same time. This team was there for us every step of the way.. Todd was able to do what needed to be done (walking through walls) to get us the house we wanted. And their assistant is really like calling a good friend for help.. I have appreciated the service immensely
Worked with Jenna for a 2nd time buying a home. The whole thing came along smoothly and with no stress. Will keep them in mind for future home buying!
Todd, Jenna and staff were very professional. Quick to answer any questions and concerns in a very timely manner. The transaction of selling our home was very smooth.

Iisting and selling our house with Todd was absolutely hassle free. They responded to our original call quickly. The house was listed and signs and flyers were up immediately. The house sold quickly and closed in just over a month. it was great.

I started out communicating with Todd about buying a home. After deciding that was not our ideal place for retirement we decided to sell a piece of land we’d bought awhile back. Todd was the ideal agent to handle this process for us. The property sold in one day. Thanks to Todd’s assistance we were able to close within a couple of weeks and can now move forward with our home search in California. I couldn’t have asked for a better agent   Thank you Todd

Todd Leavitt has to be one of the easiest realtors we have ever worked with. He was quick to answer our phone calls and when he was busy, his partner Jenna Terry took over and helped us with some concerns we had. Jenna has a couple of handymen that did some easy repairs we needed done and they were so fantastic that we wished we had known about them while we lived in Bullhead. The only real problem we had was with a delay from our movers but even that worked out as Todd was able to meet them and help facilitate      
a swift move which enabled us to return to Montana and meet the moving company. 

Thank you Todd and Jenna for such a wonderful selling experience. You two make a great team.
Thank you Todd and team for your expertise and all your hard work.

I can’t say enough positive things about Todd Levitt.  He is an outstanding real estate agent and
An overall fantastic young man.  He was in constant contact with us and helped us every step of the way.  We told him what we were looking for and he nailed it first day and now we have our dream retirement home.  Thank you again Todd.
Todd and Jenna were quick easy
Todd and his partner Jenna were great. They were readily available to show us the house multiple times throughout the buying process and the process simple and easy.

Todd and his team were instrumental in selling my mother's home, in ONE DAY!  Very professional and their marketing tactics are outstanding.  Todd met with us several times to help us with staging and was always available when we had questions.  Thank you Todd!

Todd and Jenna helped us through every step in the process of buying and selling. It was our first time doing it and they answered any and all questions we had quickly and were very informative. They made it a positive experience for our family and we are very happy! Thank you Jenna and Todd!!

Thanks Todd &Jenna
Look forward to upcoming assistants

Todd was outstanding in the process of helping me purchase my home.  He was responsive to every question I had during the process and went above and beyond to ensure my wife and I received the best possible outcome in our purchase.  I would absolutely use Todd's services in the future.
Todd was very approachable and responsive to any requests we had for specific floor plan and size we wanted in our home. We are very happy with our experience.

Todd and Jenna are the BEST! They helped us buy our new home and we could not be happier with them! They are kind and caring people that are willing to go the extra mile! We thank them for all they did for us and we would recommend them to anyone looking To buy or sell!
Todd’s level of professionalism and service is top notch. You will not find any realtor who will take better care of you.
Todd was great to work with and has great knowledge of the area.

Todd is an excellent Realtor.  We reached out to Todd to handle the sale of our Grandmother's place and we couldn't have been more pleased with him.  Todd is professional, responsive and he knows his market.  He had the property marketed and sold very quickly and he handled small bumps in the road in a rapid manner.  You will not regret selecting Todd as your Realtor.

Todd is a top seller, he knows his stuff, we were very comfortable, his professionalism is top notch, his bright shirts match his personality, you won't be sorry if you work with Todd and his team.  If the opportunity presents itself I would work with him again.  First choice

Excellent service very helpful with every step of our process buying our home
He and his team went over above 
Thank you so much

Jenna was great.  She was very prompt on returning calls and texts.  Very pleasant to work with. 
Would definitely recommend to anyone who is interested in selling ir buying a home. 
Thank you again. 

Thank you for your time

Jenna and Todd we're the best team ever. I never had to wonder what was going on with my transaction because Jenna was in constant contact with me. Personable, professional, and knowledgeable.  The best!!
Todd was great! He communicated well and answered all of our questions. He sold out house quick and found us one to fit our family’s needs even better! Highly recommended Todd!!!
Todd was very professional and easy to work with.  He was always available to answer questions and very helpful with decision making.  Thank you for a great job!

Once we got my house on the market it sold in just 3 days they had professional photos taken and it looked beautiful and wrote a good discussions of my home I would recommend Todd to sell any ones home,  He is. Very professional

Todd did a wonderful job in marketing and selling our home. We had multiple offers and sold our home after only 1 day on the MLS.
If you are looking for an agent who is; knowledgeable, driven, charismatic and professional Todd is the guy!

Todd works very hard to negotiate in your favor; is knowledgeable about the process and local community; maintains patience; and goes above and beyond to make the process feel individualized and personal.  I would certainly recommend him as he made the whole process fun and enjoyable.

Excellent transaction from listing to closing! Photos, videos and flyers were so well-done, the buyers made their offer without actually seeing the inside, and no one was disappointed.   Smooth sailing from listing to closing because of dedication and professionalism!

Todd was exceptional as a salesman he found just what we wanted at a great price. He also sold our property for a good price. He is always available and very helpful. We will use him again. We recommend him to everyone.

We listed our home with Todd. He recommended a fair price with room to negotiate.We got an offer 2 days later.we accepted  and it closed in 8 days.Todd was very helpful in navigating the internet to help us close the deal, as we live out of the area.His phone calls were always pleasant and helpful.He is a dedicated person who loves his job.He still keeps in touch to see how we are doing.If you want a great agent to sell your home Todd is the one.Thanks again Todd you made our sale pleasant and profitable

Todd is great!  He is always in touch; gives 100%. Much appreciated his help and when we called on the spur of the moment and he was busy, the help of Jenna Terry!  Both, such great help!  What an easy way to buy a house!  Thank you Todd for making it so!

Dave is great to work with. He’s very knowledgeable about the Prescott area market. He’s also very patient and will take the time to research and answer questions. I enjoy his easy going personality. It was a pleasure working with him as he walked me through selling my home.

When we first decided to sell, Dave was our first choice since he had helped us purchase the house.   His professionalism showed in that he had occasionally kept in touch over the years so re-contact was easy.  As a native of Prescott, Dave is well-connected with the market and local contacts so we trusted his perspective and advice.  His communication was efficient and accurate.  I will work with Dave again (3rd time) if the occasion arises.  Thank you Dave!!

Dave was fantastic at helping us find our new dream home in order to move to Prescott.  He knows the markets and properties. He gets to know you and your family so that he understands what will work best for you. 
He goes above and beyond to help you understand the entire process so that you can achieve the home of your dreams. 
Dave is knowledgeable and smart about how to get the best deal. He truly wants the best for everyone.  
We couldn’t have done our move without him. 
He even helped us find a great realtor to sell our home in CA.

Dave has extensive knowledge about Prescott, and its market.  He had a professional photographer come and take pictures of our home which really showcased its assets.  He is a excellent agent, and an all around great guy.

Dave helped us sell our Condo in Prescott with his knowledge of the local market, and amazing photographer; all the while being ridiculously accommodating scheduling Showings with our rather unique work schedules; and the fact that we have two dogs with no backyard to put them in during The Showings.

Dave was professional, and very prompt and timely answering any and all the questions we had regarding The Sale of our home, and guided us down the path of selling our home flawlessly! Additionally, the photos the Professional Photographer Dave and his Team sent to our place turned out magnificently!
Being married for thirty-years; this was our sixth home sale, and Dave and his Team were hands down The BEST Realtor we've worked with!
If you're fortunate enough to have the experience of working with them, do yourself a favor and jump at the chance; you too will be forever grateful!
Brian & Eileen Roberts
Because we moved out of the house, didn't like the fact we weren't made aware of if and when showings were happening.

Dave explained our options while catering to our unique needs. He kept us informed and offered advice at every new development. We would recommend Dave and his team to anyone looking to buy or sell a home in the Prescott area.

Dave Sewell is the best agent in Prescott. 
He sold our home for more than we thought we would get for it in only 5 days!!!
Not only that, but he went above and beyond to tell us what minor things our home would need in order to sell quickly. He also helped in a myriad of ways after the sale and continues to be a close and trusted friend. 
He has helped our family purchase 4 homes in Prescott over the last 5 years and has helped us sell this last one in record time when the market was slow. Thanks Dave!

If you're looking for a knowledgeable, hard working agent who has 30+ years in the Prescott (Quad Cities) area, this is your guy.  Absolutely dedicated to using his knowledge to the client's best interest.  He never forgets that he works for the client. Dave knows the local market well, is honest, and tries to make the transaction fair and open for all the parties.  Unlike some brokers, he isn't shy about pointing out flaws in a property.  He's helped us with two purchases and we'd work with him again in any new real estate transactions.

Asia was recommended to me by a friend and I couldn't be happier with her abilities. She was always candid about my expectations and willingly and cheerfully addressed all my concerns and questions promptly.

I'm still astonished by her, and how she work for and with me. she keep me posted every milestone of what was going on with the house and the financial aspect.

Asia is fantastic agent to work with. We are returning customers and love her down to earth demeanor, expertise, and professionalism. She has made all of our transactions flawlessly easy. Asia is the best. From the first time we met, I knew she would sell our house. And she did. We signed with her on a  Wednesday and Friday we had 4 offers and a contract for over the asking price.

Asia did a terrific job! She is diligent, knowledgeable and driven to do a great job for her clients. Would absolutely recommend if you are looking to buy or sell.

Asia and her team are very professional, understood our needs and was able to find the perfect home for us in short time frame. Always willing to show us homes whenever we requested. Great communication all around. Understands Tucson and the surrounding areas.  Highly recommend Asia and her team.

I can highly recommend Asia Deck with no reservations. I had started to work with another realtor and was disappointed, and when I met Asia I switched immediately. Doug and Asia Deck provided excellent guidance during the offer and purchase process, with a helpful list of next steps and dates. Asia is a professional.  She was always prompt, courteous, knowledgeable, and (most importantly) she got the job done !! Asia was very knowledgeable and always did her best to be at every appointment and answer any questions that I had. Doug and Asia are uh-ma-zing to work with. True professionals in their craft! The process was so smooth and they let me know each step of the way what to expect. very communicative, very responsive no matter the time she always replies, expertise and knowledgeable, when I was having the inspection she helped me to see things that are easily overlooked but that she can spot and look for the best outcome. it was thanks to her expertise that I was able to prevent a possible leak from the second floor.

Asia is an amazing realtor.  She helped us sell our house and buy another one.  It was a very stressful process but she listened to our needs and helped make it as less stressful as possible.  She helped us make our dream home a reality!
