Kimberly worked diligently to find a buyer for our home. She is excellent at communicating both with potential buyers and ourselves. We would not hesitate to recommend Kimberly to work with others.

Connected with Kimberly immediately!   She knows her business and answers questions and has your best interest throughout the process.I would definitely recommend her! Besides ...... she's a pet person too!

Kimberly was with me every step of the way. Kept me informed of every detail and always gave me her honest and sometimes brutal opinion. Always helped me with decisions to maximize the value of my home to realize the best fiscal outcome.

This is the second home Kimberly has listed and sold for us and she once again provided invaluable help throughout the entire journey.  Prior to listing our home, she helped us find cleaners, painters, and movers, to get the home in "show" condition.  She lead us through the process of staging the home to emphasize all the wonderful qualities the home and the location had to offer.  She efficiently orchestrated our showings and promptly reached out to us with feedback from potential buyers.  She handled the offer and contract process very professionally, providing solid guidance relative to topics such as the acceptance of contingencies, negotiations following inspection results, and the timing of closing.  Through the entire process, Kimberly took time to understand our needs, and make sure those needs were met.  She has a deep market knowledge and was able to guide us towards the timing of the listing as well as the appropriate listing price for the home.  Her guidance allowed us to maximize our financial return while also selling the home quickly.   We would recommend Kimberly to anyone looking for a real estate professional with unparalleled professionalism, expertise, and dedication, to make the home buying or selling experience not only smooth but also enjoyable.

I have worked with Kimberly on both sides of transactions she has been our listing agent our selling agent on our personal transactions and over the 20+ years I have worked with her she is top notch the best in the business !!!! You will not find a better agent that has knowledge in the White Mountains and the Phoenix Metro Area

Christine is simply the best. I worked with her to sell my mother's house. We were under some time pressure to get the house sold and I was 1500 miles away for most of the process. I depended on Christine's guidance and help every step of the way and was never sorry I did. Her enthusiasm and hands-on approach made a complex, nearly overwhelming task seem manageable.

The current issue of AARP magazine says that, whether buying or selling, what you need to look for in an agent is "a great track record, intimate knowledge of your market and an ability to listen carefully" plus "an experienced agent [who] can handle surprises that might crop up". Christine checks every one of those boxes. In addition, her compassion for my family and the sense of humor she was able to apply to those inevitable surprises were huge plusses for us.

i interviewed 3 real estate agents of which the third one was Christine. Of the 3 Christine immediately appealed to me with her knowledge and pleasant manner. She took all the weight of my shoulders handling all the details very efficiently. Christine has many connections and was able to get the necessary repairs done quickly making the sale go through smoothly. I highly recommend The Schaefer Team for any  Real Estate transactions.

The Schaefer Team was tremendous. I worked closely with Christine who was nothing but professional, courteous, and extremely helpful from start to finish. She assisted me on selling my mothers house who had already moved to another state. The home needed to sell quickly and it sold quicker then even expected.  The circumstances surrounding the listing and sale were complicated due to a number of reasons but she got it done. On a number of occasions she went above and beyond the "normal" realtor responsibilities. She treated me and my mother as family and took real good care of us during the entire process. I would recommend her and Schaefer team for any home sale.

We were very pleased with Christine.  She is so knowledgeable about the real estate process and did an awesome job of guiding us through the sale of our home.  We were confident in her expertise, enjoyed her sense of humor and Christine made this process as stress free as possible.  Any questions that came up were answered promptly.  We would certainly recommend her team if you are looking for a top notch real estate team.  Thank you so much.  We deeply appreciate all you did.

I can't say enough positive things about our selling experience with Christine.  We agreed early on in the listing process that we would upgrade the home before listing, and Christine managed that whole entire process.  I was dreading having to go back and clean up, fix up, and who knows what else for my 96 year-old father's house.  Christine did all the onsite arranging for contractors, purchasing updated materials, and in general saved me a lot of work and grief as I didn't have to make one visit to the property from my own home 900 miles away.  And we came out ahead financially, big time.  I can't say enough about Christine's ability to update, stage, and sell houses.  Highly recommended.

When your “dream” apartment out-of-state suddenly becomes available, you have to move quickly in many directions. Downsizing your possessions, packing as much as possible, making arrangements with a moving company & notifying all your business related contacts becomes overwhelming. I had just two months to do everything & to do it by myself.

I needed a realtor who was knowledgeable & totally trustworthy because I didn’t have the time to concern myself with any of the “ins and outs” of selling my home. After talking to several realtors, I decided to work with Christine Schaefer & The Schaefer Team. She handled everything exactly as she had promised she would with no exceptions! And she did this for me, a severely hearing person, while I was now already living in my new apartment in Liberty Lake, WA. 

Less than 2 months after my home was on the market it was sold for my asking price & recorded. Looking back over the emails I saved from The Schaefer Team, it gives me a better appreciation of the amount of work & paperwork that selling a house involves. I’m very glad I decided to follow my instincts & work with Christine!

My worked with Christine.  She was curious to our likes, needs, and wants.  She was always timely in her responses to our questions and comments. Awesome realtor!!

Jean is a superb realtor who extremely knowledgeable and goes above and beyond for her clients!  Don't miss the opportunity to work with her whether you're selling or buying.

Great job! - 21 May 2018Jean Miller did an outstanding job with the sale of my home. She kept me updated throughout the process and made it as easy as possible for me! She knows her market and is very professional!

Jean was always accessible to her client and always up-to-date on market activity!

I can enthusiastically recommend Jean Miller as a real estate agent.  My home was located in a remote location that made it a difficult sale.  Ms. Miller was very persistent, and finally located a good buyer.  Throughout the process she was fully communicative and honest with me.

Jean Miller sold our house and property for us. In both cases the circumstances were highly unusual. . Jean worked through every problem that I thought might sink us. Thank you Jean, you were awesome.  - Frank

Jean was friendly, personable, and readily available by phone, email, or to meet in person when I was in town. This was especially important to me as I had moved out of state and was selling the property from a distance. She was most helpful throughout the process.
She knows the area well and we were well represented by her.  Prompt response to any request we had.  Would definitely use Jean again!
Jean was detail oriented and dilligent in getting our deal closed. I highly recommend her services to anyone looking for real-estate in S. Arizona.

I have had real estate dealings in both the purchase and sale of a private home and I can state, without equivocation, that Ms. Miller was the most knowledgeable and helpful Realtor I have had the pleasure of working with. I can recommend her service to anyone considering the sale or purchase of land or private home in the Patagonia area. Ms. Miller has lived in the area for many years and is well acquainted with the infrastructure of Patagonia and surrounding area.

Jean Miller is a true professional in her real estate practice.  She did a great job for us with regard to market assessment, promoting the property, and taking care of the many technical requirements associated with brokering the sale.  We sold the property quickly at full price and did not experience any problems with the process.  Thanks Jean!

Jean is a total pro and her local knowledge and connections proved invaluable with the sale of my property in Patagonia. She was thorough, provided excellent advice all along the way, and helped connect me with the perfect buyer who immediately made a full-price, cash offer. It was a win-win for both parties and the most smooth and worry-free real estate transaction I’ve ever had. Jean also worked with me to find a virtual notary when I needed to be out of town for the closing. Highly recommend!

After struggling to get a local broker to list our vacant land for sale for many months, Jean was recommended to us. In short order she got the property listed and sold. We're very happy with our experience with Jean.

When we moved to Sonoita a decade ago , Jean helped our agent find us temporary lodging, while we looked for a house to buy.
 We remembered that kindness and knew who to turn to help us  sell our house.  Extremely knowledgeable of the area,  realtor  Jean Miller found a buyer quickly and negotiated all the details .  On moving day she even mopped the great room floor, talk about full service!  Thanks Jean, your the best!

Jeannie Miller of Long Realty in Patagonia is an outstanding agent,
The land sale she handled for us took years of effort and time in what has been a slow period in that market at Patagonia Lakes area.We thank Jeannie big time for her patience and energy efforts.

Jean Miller worked wonders for us! She was great to work with from out of state, and sold our land in no time! We bought some ranch land in Patagonia about 20 years ago, and decided to sell it when we moved away from the area about 15 years ago. It sat on the market for probably 10 years (with a different agent). We took it off at some point, and had pretty-much accepted we were going to own this land til we die. We happened to be in AZ earlier this year and thought why not try selling it again? We contacted Jean and she suggested a list price that seemed more than fair to us. We were terrible sellers--we had no idea where our property lines were, or even how exactly to get to it (it was open land surrounded by other land so wasn't as easy as putting it in a GPS). We didn't even know the address lol (had to find it on tax records). We could tell her absolutely nothing about the land (we hadn't even been to it in over 10 years).  We figured it wouldn't sell but there was nothing to lose. A week later, she had an all-cash buyer! She was easy to work with, very helpful and responsive, and our land was closed within a month of initial listing (and it only took that long b/c we misplaced the title from a bank which no longer existed and had achieved our info-- she and the title company figured that one out for us all totally calmly throughout! ).  Highly recommend!!

Jean did a great job for me.  If you are doing any real estate acquisition or selling in Patagonia, she is the local expert.  Our transaction was very detailed and required some creative deal-making.  Jean was adept in coming up with solutions to issues and communicated very effectively.  Great experience!

We are so glad we listed our house with Jean.  She handled every step of the sales process promptly and professionally, from recommending a listing price, writing the property description, bringing in a talented photographer for the listing pictures, posting the listing on the Web and in the local newspaper,  handling our first and only showing, being present for the inspections, negotiating with our buyers and their agent, and finally seeing everything through to a successful closing.  She promptly returned all our phone calls and was always there for us when we needed her advice.  Jean really knows the Patagonia/Sonoita area and the ends and out of the local real estate market.  We highly recommend her to anyone looking to anyone looking to buy to buy or sell in Santa Cruz County.

We've bought and/or sold houses three times with Jennifer.  We went through several agents prior to meeting her.  We were left frustrated by their wanting just quick sales.  It seemed to be all about them rather than us as a client.  Jennifer is different.  

What's great about her?  We work so the standard 9-5 agent availability doesn't work for us.  Jen was flexible with her schedule.  She even showed us houses at 7am!  She is knowledgeable about the market and detail oriented.  She made some great suggestions on how to go about the offer/sales process.  She did her research and went with logic rather than going for a quick commission.  She also coordinated the inspections and other activities that we needed.  

We highly recommend her.  She is one in a million.

Jen was referred to us by a former agent who had moved from the area and we couldn’t have been happier with her attentiveness and knowledge. She got the job done and never let her guard down when it came to protecting us and making sure we got what we needed from the buyers when we needed it.  We were extremely happy with Jen!
very responsive and easy to work with

If grades were given I would give Gwen Brindley a A+ in every category: Knowledge,Informative,Reliable,Honest,highest Integrity,has Patience(walks you through all the steps) and  Goes the extra Mile,

Gwen Brindley is a phenominal realtor and just an overall great person. We could not have been more satisfied working with her. Gwen was a Godsend to work with. We were most pleased to use Gwen as our Agent. She is honest, trustworthy and looks out for your interest. Gwen is also both professional and personable. This is our third real estate transaction with her and we will definitely use her again in the future.

Jennifer was wonderful to work with. She’s insightful, resourceful, and very easygoing! She helped me every step of the way and was my greatest advocate. I HIGHLY recommend Jennifer

Jennifer represented both us as buyers and the sellers and she did a great job for both sides. She was always available, helped manage any issues quickly and effectively, and remains a friend. I would recommend her to any buyer or seller.
Truly the BEST!!! Great service, great experience!

Knowledgeable, persistent in sales, fast closer, dedicated, straight forward. Connected to face time when we were out of state to show us houses..was always there the minute the house was open to view. Looked at everything with a close eye and gave honest opinions.  So thankful we had Jennifer and her connections.

Jennifer Conklin  made sure that the whole process was very smooth for us. Buying and selling a house  involves so many components.  Jennifer made sure that we were taking care of.  If you are looking to purchase or sell a home, look no further, call her today, she will take care of you. She is excellent.

When we met Jennifer we believe she’s the only one can get the job done , we were dealing with a very unusual property ,she was very patient very persistent even though it took three months to close the deal because of the very unusual circumstance of this property , she Found us the best lender in LA  ,  she negotiate the best deal for us , we were  able to get  a closing cost credit from the seller ,she  negotiate and reduce the purchase price from the original agreement price and finally closed  it .

It’s always great working with Julie. She makes sure things go smoothly even if the market is not in our favor. Julie is great. She knew what neighborhoods to show me. She has a great eye for the pros and cons of floor plans and has a critical eye for potential problems or issues with a property. She is willing to do the legwork, is very responsive, and is a good negotiator. Julie knows her stuff. I would use her again.

Julie is amazing.  She helped us through a very stressful process of buying and selling at the same time. She's very knowledgeable and always responsive in a timely manner and available when asked.  We have worked with July for 19 years and would definitely hire her should we move again.

I’ve had a wonderful experience with Julie McCoy! She is a very knowledgeable professional who genuinely cares about her clients. I immediately felt comfortable with her and have appreciated her consistent and timely guidance every step of the way. She’s the BEST!

Julie is the type of realtor you want on your team. Purchasing and selling a home, no matter the price, is an intense and stressful process. This can only feel more stressful when your realtor is not on the same page as you, which is not the experience you're going to receive with Julie by your side. We have purchased 2 homes with Julie and sold 1, and in each instance, Julie has been patient, understanding and always on our team. 

What sets Julie apart from other realtors is that she understands the delicate nature and decision-making process that goes on when considering a move; she realizes that when working with a couple, each person plays their own role in the relationship. For example, I prefer to be more hands on and in the weeds, and care more for certain aspects of the process while my husband would prefer to be kept in the loop at a high level and be brought in for the larger components. Julie understood this and really navigated through our individual comfort levels especially for the purchase of our most recent home (which took us over a year to find). 

While no process is perfect, working with Julie makes things a lot easier and more comfortable. In fact, we respect her opinion so much, we prefer her to be in every step of the process because she can offer unique points of views. Its rare that she's not available and will look to go above and beyond when she can.

I loved working with Julie when I was looking to purchase a home. She was always quick to respond to emails and willing to show me any property that I wanted to take a look at. As a first time homebuyer, I felt so much more comfortable working with a real estate agent that was able to guide me through the process.

Can't recommend Julie highly enough.  She has incredible experience and great knowledge of the area.  She sweats the details and makes sure that you know everything about the property you're evaluating so that you can make intelligent choices. She keeps on top of the escrow process and finishes the transaction.  For her, it's not only about finding you the right place, but also about making sure the deal is done efficiently and that you know what you're buying.
My wife and I feel fortunate to have had Julie in our corner. You would be wise to choose her, too.
Outstanding realtor. Detail oriented and helped us negotiate a great price. Showed us everything in our price range and warned us if a place was overpriced, etc.
Julie is excellent! She is highly efficient . It was my first time buying a home amd she made the process seamless and fast. She prepared me for the steps ahead and followed up on everything.

Julie stepped in to help me transition from my home to an interstate move.  She handled everything upon my departure: carpet installation, cleaning, staging and the sale.  I couldn't have done this without her help.

Julie helped us buy our new home in Walnut Creek as well as sell our previous home in Concord. Buying and selling a home is always stressful and emotional...but Julie helped us through the entire process and helped us keep emotions out of the decision making process. Julie took the time to meet with us whenever we asked and she was very responsive, regardless of the time of day we called her.

She is a great agent and a huge asset to have on your team. I would recommend her to anyone that is looking to buy or sell a home.
she was thorough and represented me fairly and gave great advice. I would highly recommend her. She had the place staged, recommended repairs thank you....................

We only have only have good things to say about Julie and would recommend her if you’re looking to buy or sell! As first-time homebuyers in Contra Costa County, Julie got us up to speed on the home buying process and went through every offer and disclosure with us in detail. From understanding the type of property we were searching for, coordinating walkthroughs around our busy work schedules, writing multiple offers in a competitive Bay Area market, and working closely with our lender to close earlier than anticipated; Julie has been there for us every step of the way. And, it hasn’t ended now that we’re in our new home. Julie has checked in on us to see how we’re doing, and we really appreciate that. During our search, Julie was responsive on email, text message if needed, and always made time to hop on a virtual meeting to share documents. Not only was the client to realtor relationship a positive experience, but the relationships she holds within the industry is recognizable and well respected. We couldn’t be more grateful for our experience with Julie and consider her more than just our realtor, but a friend. Thank you, Julie for everything!

If you don't have experience in the Bay Area real estate market, let me tell you it's nuts! It's a crazy game that you need to understand timing, other bidders, other sellers, and so on. Julie is a master at the real estate game! Her advice was spot on! She saved us $10,000 on the home we purchased and, following her advice, we were blown away at the offers we received for the home we sold. 
Julie is very patient (we saw A LOT of homes at our request) and easily picks up on the things you love about a home to help steer you in the right direction. She is extremely knowledgeable and she goes WAY above and beyond to help you with all the steps. We even had help hauling away the last bit of junk from the house we sold.
Truly, having Julie as your real estate agent is the best decision you can make. Give her a call!

Julie was a pleasure to work with. As a first time buyer I found her expertise and knowledge of the Concord area invaluable. She was able to provide a constant feed of high quality homes that matched both my budget and tastes. 

I would recommend Julie to any friends and family that are looking to buy in the area!

Julie was AMAZING in helping me find the best house possible. As a first time home buyer, I was feeling overwhelmed about the entire process. But after the first time speaking with her, I knew right away I was in good hands. From start to finish, she did a fantastic job of keeping me pointed in the right direction until we found the perfect home, even as circumstances continued to evolve. She came from a recommendation from a close friend, and I am happy to say every, single positive thing he had to say about her was completely true.

Julie was able to get us top dollar when we sold, and helped us negotiate a great deal with our current home. She has a team that kept us in the loop every step of the way. It was a great experience. I highly recommend Julie whether you are buying or selling.

Julie was instrumental in helping us purchase our latest home. It was not our intention to purchase a short-sale home but we fell in love with what turned out to be just that. <br/><br/>Julie was careful, knowledgeable and always looking out for our best interests. <br/><br/>I honestly believe we would not have had our offer accepted and eventually closed our deal if Julie was not our agent.

My wife and I contacted Julie McCoy on the advice of our daughter-in-law when we decided to move to California from Wisconsin in the Fall of 2010. I have 30 years experience in the land acquisiton profession, and my wife and I have personally gone through five different property closings. I know the completities of real estate transactions as well as the many nuances of realtors in the business.

Julie immediately gained our confidence with her thorough knowledge of the market in our area of interest in the East Bay. Her pleasant demeanor coupled with a candor that is essential for good decision-making was the combination of pragmatism we needed to find the right property. She was very careful to allow us to screen each property without offering her biased opinion, but insured we had all the detailed information we needed. Her follow-ups on pending questions were exemplary.

We viewed numerous potential sales over several days with Julie, eventually losing out on an aggressive bid over one of our liking. Returning to Wisconsin discouraged, Julie continued screening properties and forwarding those that met our specifications.
We eventually purchased a house, sight unseen, made possible because our complete confidence in Julie.

But Julie's commitment wasn't over! She assisted us with locating financing, house inspections, construction history, carpet cleaning, insurance, utility contracts, trash pickup service, and confidence building during closing delays. In our view, Julie McCoy's professionalism is rated at the highest level. Our home purchase was a dream fulfilled because of her.

Julie helped us buy a home in Pittsburg back in 2006 after negotiating a difficult sale of my husband's Concord condo.  When we had to go through a short sale earlier this year, she was terrific in getting us as sweet a deal as possible, given the difficult circumstances.  Her professionalism, experience, and support make her an excellent resource for anyone purchasing a home or going through a short sale or foreclosure!
"Julie was great and very patient.  She showed us quite a few homes before we found the perfect home for us. Julie also helped refer us to a contractor and a cleaning lady after we moved in."

Julie helped my wife and I sell our home during a tough time. We had recently purchased another home with a contingency that we sell our current home. The process of selling our house was very fast and we would've been lost without Julie. She was quickly able to help us stage our home, show it through an open house and negotiate seamlessly with the buyer. 

Needless to say it was a very stressful time for our family and we turned to Julie a lot for guidance and support. She was able to calm our nerves throughout the process and speak with experience and confidence. I know that without Julie by our side we most likely would not have been able to sell our home in such a short time frame. She saved us.

Julie was masterful in her ability adapt to the changing situations. She is naturally kind and generous...but when the time called for it, she was able to stand strong and negotiate tactfully and aggressively for us. I will recommend Julie to anyone I know that will be trying to buy or sell a home.

She is great!!!

We began to work with Julie through a glowing recommendation from a friend who bought a house with Julie. As first time home buyers we were extremely nervous but welcomed the recommendation because we had worked with several agents before Julie but never felt like our best interests were coming first.
When working with Julie, we immediately felt at ease. She was knowledgeable, informative and really knew how to work with each of us. She made sure that we were comfortable throughout the entire process and always made sure that we were aware of the pro’s and con’s of each house. We never felt pressured to buying and she never tried to sway us one way or another. Julie always made sure that she gave us the tools that we needed, provided guidance and allowed us to make each decision.
Even once we closed, she has been in communication with us and help us for one-off requests when needed. We feel completely comfortable with Julie and would not only highly suggest her to anyone, we will absolutely work with Julie in the future.

I worked with Julie 14 years ago when she helped me buy my first home. I had the pleasure of working with her again recently on another home purchase. Just like the first time Julie made the experience not so scary. With her easy to work with manner and expert negotiation skills, I felt she was really working for me and had my best interest in mind. If you want an agent who is professional, knowledgeable, personable and above all RESPONSIVE and TRUSTWORTHY, I highly recommend you reach out to Julie because she is all that! I will definitely use Julie again for any future real estate needs and would not hesitate to recommend her to family and friends.

I met Julie at an open house I attended. I immediately felt as if she was experienced and knowledgeable. After our initial conversation I decided to jump in and start my own search.

Julie was the most amazing agent I have ever used, I don't think I can use enough adjectives to describe her. She was thorough, focused on me as her client, personable, flexible, diligent and extremely hard working!

She walked me through the entire process and even after closing has continued to stay in touch answering questions and providing ongoing support. 

I have purchased a number of homes, and used several Bay Area agents but going forward JULIE MCCOY will be only my choice from here on!

Julie and her husband Sean helped show us homes during the coronavirus pandemic.  They had to bring us to every home because there were no open houses and they seemed very happy to do so.  They were also very helpful during the buying process as we are first time home owners.  Their experience and expertise in the contra costa county real estate market was invaluable to us.

She was always on top of things and guided us through the process.  Her explanations were always thorough.  We will definitely recommend her and go back to her if we were to sell or buy another home in the area.
Julie is an extremely knowledgeable realtor.  She helped us prep our 2 properties which went on the market and were sold within one week.  I highly recommend her!

Julie is very knowledgable and takes care of her business in a prompt fashion. She never tried to sell me on anything but instead gave me facts about what I needed to know. I enjoyed working with her and plan on using her again.

Julie is the best, most professional realtor I have ever had the pleasure of working with. She told me how to get my home ready to sell, and, by following her advice, my home sold in two days for above listing price. She communicates with you appropriately and you never have to question the status of the transaction.Julie is a realtor you can count on!

Julie was absolutely amazing! She is very knowledgeable, honest, and prompt with communication. Recommended by a family member and I would recommended her to friends AND family. I definitely see myself working with Julie in the near future again.

I found Julie through the Pleasant Hill Chamber of Commerce. When my husband and I interviewed her my impression was that she was sharp and knowledgeable about the local market, but most importantly for me I felt like I could openly communicate to her without pressure. Julie was patient with us in searching for a home for almost a year. She responded quickly to our questions, had a flexible schedule to show us homes and provided us honest advice backed by her market analyses. Julie's expertise, professionalism and negotiating skills were especially demonstrated on the home that we bought. I am so happy that we worked with Julie and I would highly recommend her to help you find your home!

I honestly can't say enough good things about Julie. From the moment we met her, I could tell she was going to be great and she did not disappoint. She is personable, caring, professional, very responsive and an amazing negotiator. Our buyer was playing hardball and Julie was strong, tough negotiator and she did everything with in her power to help us have a smooth transaction. I was stressed at times and she always answered my panic emails even when it was super late at night. Once our sale went through and move day appreciated, she even offered to help watch our kids. Wow, talk about going above and beyond. I would highly recommend and use her again.

I have a very low stress threshold, and I needed to sell my house. I struggled to get all my stuff moved out, but I knew Julie was taking care of all the other work that needed to be done. 

She managed all of the vendors/contractors and the appointments for me, which is exactly what I needed. She also managed a difficult buyer, who had wanted to change the terms halfway through the contract.  If I needed to buy or sell another house in that area, I would definitely go with Julie again.

We have used Julie to sell two homes and buy another one.  She is knowledgeable, professional, and trustworthy.  She constantly went above and beyond  what other realtors provided.  Her expertise helped us through some tough negotiations!

Julie was a very helpful, knowledgable, friendly person to work with. She made the selling process so easy. She took care of all the details and explained everything to me along the way. I would recommend Julie 100% to buy or sell a home.

I recently moved in to my new “Home Sweet Home” and many Thanks to Julie Mccoy and her partner Sean Orman.  They were both very dedicated, understanding and extremely patient in helping me find a home that fits my needs.  Julie was very quick and responsive on multiple bids that I had offered. It was discouraging  to be over bid time and time again but Julie and Sean was very supportive and encouraging. They didn't give up on me.  Finally, we found the perfect house that I am enjoying.  However, the experience was not pleasant due to the seller’s interest. Beginning with getting my offer excepted, to inspections, repair negotiations, signing and closing to even getting the keys was challenging. The whole process was long, frustrating and stressful but Julie and Sean represented me in a very professional manner and guided me every step of the way.  I know they worked extensively for me and I am so grateful. They are both extremely knowledgeable in the Real Estate business and I highly recommend them to anyone.  "Thank you so much!!!"

Julie is an awesome realtor. From beginning to post-sale, she was easy to work with, knowledgeable, patient, and well balanced. In the midst of difficult decisions, financing issues, and emotional upheaval, Julie was the clear, calm, rational and intelligent voice that carried us forward into our new, beautiful home. We couldn't be happier.

Julie McCoy is a great realtor and a pleasure to be around. Purchasing real estate in Contra Costa County can be a bit challenging. Her knowledge of the area and the trending values was a huge help to my wife and I and also my son who just purchased for the first time.
Julie provided an excellent home selling experience. She is very knowledgeable, quick to respond, and made this a very smooth transaction. I would recommend her to anyone!

Julie is very capable and worth a five star rating.  Her attention to detail and her quick response to my questions were very appreciated. If I was going to buy or sell a home in Concord or surrounding area I would call Julie.

My wife and I worked with Julie (& Sean) for nearly 18 months to find the perfect house for us. We made offer after offer and Julie was there with a great attitude each time that we did. She was always eager to show us More places and make offer after offer when ours was not accepted. I never once felt pressured and knew that Julie had our happiness and best interest in mind throughout the process.

Julie is very knowledgeable, she showed me houses and condos through various cities and guided me through the process with patience and kindness.
Julie was a great support and since finalizing on my home I am confident that it is the right house for me.  I would highly recommend Julie McCoy to help you find your home

Our experience with Julie McCoy was wonderful. I highly recommend her to anyone! She went above and beyond to support us as we sold our home. She is knowledgeable, professional, experienced and personable. We live out of state and her communication was stellar throughout the process of selling our home. We had multiple offers on our home. Julie, you are amazing and dedicated, thank you for all your support!

Julie is very knowledgeable and resourceful in the real estate business! She is also very personable and returns phone calls and emails quickly. If there’s something you have a question about,  she most likely has the answer. If not, she will find out for you. I was very happy that I hired Julie as she is so pleasant to work with! Buying a home can be a stressful thing and Julie really has a great way in making people feel at ease. I wouldn’t use anyone else after my experience with her.

I was referred to Julie by a friend.  Julie is a wonderful person and fabulous agent.  She is warm, intelligent, and has a great sense of humor.  Julie is highly organized and very responsive.  I was a first time seller and had not been through the process previously.  She walked me step by step through the process and answered all of my questions thoroughly.

She has a great marketing plan, including very professional photographs and advertisement media. 

Julie goes above and beyond, even playing with my 2 year old son so he wouldn't be in the home photos.  She was very responsive to my concerns about an open house, and found a second agent/lender to host the open houses for security purposes.

She has a wonderful personality, and that was reflected in the interactions with the buyer.  

 I would definitely recommend Julie to other home buyers/sellers.

Julie really impressed us with her detailed plan to market our home, and followed through on this plan. Her team was responsive and professional throughout the process. We received amazing feedback on the home photos for the flyer and website. This was a truly fabulous experience. Julie should be your first choice.
Julie is the ultimate professional: punctual, perceptive and supportive. Our selling experience went smoothly because she kept us informed at every step.

Our experience with Julie McCoy was great.  She set a high standard of service for her clients. She was patient, responsive and thorough from start to finish with the sale of our house.  We put our trust and confidence in her and we're very pleased that we did.  Every transaction is different and so are the people involved.  Julie and her team were very thoughtful through the whole process considering that we had lived in the house for thirty plus years.  Her keen negotiation skills and positive attitude was superb. We felt she represented our interests very well. Thank you Julie and Team!

I met Becky through a referral from my father. Becky helped guide me through my first property sale. Becky is very experienced in the industry and has a great grasp of the lay of the land. Becky helped to set everything up throughout the entire process including the cleaning, staging, repairs, etc. She ended up selling my property at a new record high price in my community and did a great job. 10/10 would recommend Becky to everyone and I will definitely go to her again for future business.

Professional knowledge in real estate & excellence point of view on the market trend & timely assistance with all documentations.  Will definitely recommend Beck Cheng to someone who plans to sell or buy homes in the future.
Kathy did everything we reasonably asked for and made the sale possible to sell the house before it even made it to the MLS listing, she trusted my instincts and believed in my wants and needs.

Kathy Hughes handled the 2018 sale of my parent's home in the San Roque area of Santa Barbara.  I could not have done this without her expertise and her caring assistance.  Kathy walked me through every step of a very difficult process.  She knows the market; she knows what will sell and what won't.  She scheduled all of the necessary appointments with service people.  She spent hours at the city land records offices researching the history and zoning of the house.  If you want a realtor who will truly work for you, call Kathy Hughes.

Kathy was incredible. She was very open and honest about what we needed to do to sell the house, but at the same time very respectful of what we wanted (and our budget). Also...she did all the work! She coordinated everything from the handyman making repairs, painting, cleaning, and yard work. All we did was hand her the keys and she did the rest. We also got more than we expected for the house. We bought the house with her in 2012 and then sold it with her in 2017. I'd recommender her to anyone.
She is extremely helpful throughout the purchase. Always respond to text, phone calls, emails in a timely manner. Very knowledgeable and friendly. Highly recommend!

We were so lucky to have Pamela Francis representing us as sellers. She is extremely knowledgeable, personable and patient. Pamela is a straight-shooter -- her communication skills are fantastic.  We did not get to meet her in person, unfortunately, as we live too far away; therefore, all of our communication was via phone, email and text.  She explained all issues plainly and clearly, and made certain we understood.  We were  never left wondering what was going on; she was in constant contact. We trusted her so much that we asked her to pick out new exterior paint colors as well as new kitchen counters, and we were not disappointed.  Our house was beautiful when it went on the market. Thank you, Pamela.

Pamela was the best!  She was always responsive and informative.  We would highly recommend her.  Very easy to work with.  The selling process was extremely smooth and relatively stress-free.  Buying and selling is never easy but can't imagine a better realtor...
N/A
Not exaggerating - Pamela was amazing.  I would highly recommend her.  She was always responsive to our questions and kept the process moving smoothly!  That is a major accomplishment...
N/A
N/A

We used Pamela when we sold our small vacation home in South Lake Tahoe.  She was recommended by friends who had been leasing our home but chose to purchase a larger home,  more suited to their needs.  Since we now live in another state, all our transactions and communications were done from afar, but she was most responsive and provided expert guidance in helping us to get top dollar for our home.  As it turned out, she represented both the buyer of our home and us, but never once did we feel that this made a difference in her professionalism on either side.  We highly recommend Pamela to anyone either buying or selling a home in the South Lake Tahoe area.

Could not have been happier with her professionalism. She put together a great marketing plan and kept us informed every step of the way. He follow thru was fantastic.

Pamela was always available to answer our questions or address any concerns. Very accessible and easy to reach.
display_name: Gary & Mary Ann Hankoff, South Lake

comment:
After meeting Pamela, she was able to quickly determine what we we were looking for during our vacation home search.  She went out of her way to make things easy for us since we did not live in the Lake Tahoe area.

One of our questions was how much additional land coverage would be available for our lot.  Pamela went to the county agency to determine this for us, when others may have made us do it ourselves.

Pamela did a great job for us.  We already recommended to some friends that have listed their property with her.

Pamela is a joy to work with!  Her outstanding professionalism coupled with her diligent work ethic and uncommon willingness to go the extra mile, were the keys to our successful purchase!  Thank you Pamela!!

our experience with Pam and CENTURY 21 At Tahoe Paradise was excellent we were well informed throughout the entire process. Everything happened on time as it was supposed to making the entire process smooth.

Several months have gone by since our home has closed escrow and we have been remiss in not writing to you sooner to let you know how ecstatic we are to be the new owners of this house!  The layout of our new home is working out even better than expected with our family!   To say that you were instrumental in helping us find our home away from home is an understatement.  You worked with us for many months in our ever-changing qualifications of what we were looking for and you never wavered in your enthusiasm to help us find just the right property.  From your daily updates, to your videoing homes for us since we lived so far away, to fitting us in to your tight schedule at the last moment --- we appreciated it all!

We hope Century 21 knows what a treasure they have in you.  (We're sure they must.)  You were always professional, kind, helpful, and made this the best real estate experience we have ever had.

Again, we can't thank-you enough for all your assistance. We can't recommend you highly enough!

Pamela Francis did a great job securing a property for us in South Lake Tahoe.  

She's knowledgeable, friendly and professional.  She made our buying experience easy and followed through promptly with inspections and any questions we had.

My wife and I needed to locate a property in South Lake Tahoe with in a few days due to 1031 exchange time limits.  Unfortunately it was Friday before Labor Day weekend.  We thought their would be a very small chance of such a short notice to look at properties over the busy holiday weekend. My local agent called Pamela Francis on recommendation of a friend.  Amazingly she responded that afternoon, listened to our desires and by that evening had a list of a possible 10 properties matching our criteria.  We met on Saturday morning and she showed us our favorite five.  One of them we fell in love with, made an offer Sunday morning and ended up purchasing.  

Pamela made this process a joy!   She is very calm, kind, courteous, trustworthy, knowledgeable and professional.  She has many years experience in the local area and is extremely knowledgeable in all aspects of the transaction, including referrals for us non locals. I would definitely use her again and would highly recommend her.

Pamela was professional, had extensive knowledge of the business and locale, and she just made us feel safe in her hands.  She truly went above and beyond.  We will definitely work with her again should we sell/buy again in the future.  I couldn’t recommend her more. If you work with Pamela Francis, you’ll be happy you did!

Pamela Francis made the sale of my South Lake Tahoe home easy and seamless.  This process can be stressful, as it has been in the past.  Choosing Pamela as the agent to sell our home was the best choice we could have made.  I highly recommend her for your selling and buying needs and will use her again in the future.  Thank you Pamela!
A pleasure to work with. Wonderful agent.

Referral from a Nevada broker

Our 1031 Exchange works smoothly with a less than 30 day close-even though we had to change escrow company midway.

Pamela Francis kept us informed throughout  the transaction and worked out solution before contacting us with disappointing news.

It was a pleasure working with Pamela on our recent 1031 Exchange.  Pamela represented us on the replacement property which required several offers on different properties - all within the time constraint of the 1031.   We highly recommend her!

Pamela was with us every step of the way.  She guided us through the process in a very professional manner and was always available for any questions we had.

We had a difficult closing of escrow and Pamela guided us through some difficulties (on the seller's end) with professionalism.
Pamela definitely has your back throughout the whole process of buying a home.  She is always available for any questions you may have and will negotiate anything you ask for.

I had the good fortune to meet Pamela through a recommendation, over five years ago, and I'm glad that I had her in my corner.  I work overseas, but grew up near SLT, a place where I've wanted to own a home for years.  From our initial conversations and meetings Pamela understood what I was looking   for in a property, and, she helped me identify only homes that met my needs.  She was patient in answering my questions about properties that I saw online and, more often than not, was already familiar with and had omitted them because she knew they were not a good match for me, which avoided my having to spend time needlessly; that's the kind of understanding that I needed in a realtor and that's what Pamela offered.  

Her patience and prompt communication to work with me from abroad recently paid off when she helped me close on a house in a neighborhood that I'm excited to start calling home. Since the sale she's been willing to share useful recommendations on contractors, etc. and, again, I'm grateful I was able to rely on her throughout this process.
Pamela Francis helped us with a difficult escrow. Without her we would not have made the deal!
Very professional and seamless transaction.  This is the 2nd time we used Pamela's services.  Won't be the last.

Pamela Francis was our agent representing us in the sale of our property and the purchase of our new home. She was very professional and knowledgeable through out the whole process. We were very happy with her services and will continue to use her as we sell other property

Genuinely concerned about us and really worked hard for us. Very knowledgeable about the area which was very helpful to us because we were from out of the area.  Extremely nice and GREAT to work with. So patient.....just the nicest person!!!  What a gem she is for Century21. 

Will definitely recommend her to family and friends!!!
See previous comments

Anabella was such a pleasure to have as my agent. Made sure I was always up to date with what's going on, where we were at in the process, and best of all, communication was always there. Quick and fast responses, never left wondering for hours, which can be the worst. Any questions I had were answered and if she did not have the answer, she would make sure to get it. Above and beyond service. Top notch Stuff!

She sold both houses in a lot less time then what we expected and at a much greater price then we expected.  Her skills and knowledge of the business are excellent.  Her attitude is fantastic.  I recommend her 100%

Anabella is awesome, she never stops working literally working even on her days off. Punctual at showings, explained the process well enough to gain our trust and had our back 100%. Definitely someone I’ll recommend to a family or friend, thank you 🙏🏼 for everything Anabella!

My husband and I were going on 8 months of trying to fin a home. We had sold our condo in October and were expecting to find our new home before the new year. The months kept rolling by and we were no where closer to being in a home. We put countless offers on homes with no luck. After about 7 months with our previous agent, we decided it was time to look for another agent. My best friend who was also house hunting recommended Anabella. We connected and were ready to start working on finding a house again. Within one week of working Anabella we put in two offers on homes and both offers were accepted. After 8 months of being turned down, it seemed like a miracle to have 2 offers accepted within days of each other. Anabella does not mess around. She knows what it takes to have an offer accepted. She will not waste time playing guessing games. She is the best. She turned a long 8 months into finally seeing the light at the end of the tunnel.

We decided to go with Anabella Jimenez as she truly cares for her clients and is always looking for their best interest. She was phenomenal to work with and will definitely be going back to her in the future. She is extremely knowledgeable in what she does and explains everything in detail. She was able to find us our dream home and had us settled in within less than a month. She pays attention to detail, and is extremely passionate about what she does. She was a pleasure to work with.

My wife and I purchased our first home a year ago and we did not know the first thing about the process but Anabella walked us through the processes step by step so we would understand everything perfectly, she was very patient and responded to all our questions quickly. we never felt rushed or pressured she wanted to make sure we where happy and we got exactly what we wanted. Anabella found us a great place in a great neighborhood and we couldn't be happier.

Meeting Anabella truly changed our lives.  We were renters and had no clue that we could become home owners. She truly helped and guided us from start to finish and we were able to purchase our first home. Three years later when we were ready to purchase a rental property. Of course we would call Anabella and again she went above and beyond to provide us with our best options and we were able to purchase our second property. 
God willing we ever in the position to purchase or sell we wouldn't call anybody else but Anabella Jimenez. Thank you so much Anabella.
Anabella did an amazing job helping me and my family find the right home. She answered all our questions and was very transparent throughout the whole process.

Anabella was great to work with. I feel she was always looking out for what was best for my family and not feeling like another sale. She was patient, professional and very knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend her if you are in the market to purchase. Thank you Anabella for everything, because of you we have a place to call Home.

Anabella made this first time buying experience a delight. She knew exactly what we were looking for and was able to help us find the perfect home. We went in not knowing what to expect so as you can imagine I had a lot of questions. She responded promptly to all my calls and messages. When we found our home she helped us through each step and in hand. She made it so comfortable and the process seemed right. I am so grateful for all the support and guidance.

She’s doing very perfect.very helpful,and approachable.shes very concerned and understand what buyers desired.for me without her I can not get my dream house.she never stop and losses hope until we succeed.so for I’m a very satisfied and happy working with Mam Anabella Jemenes.

Anabella Jimenez was a dream to work with!!! Got to know us so she could understand what we were looking for and was extremely patient with our pickiness and our expectations for our budget.  She was easy to contact and very responsive no matter what time we would text her or call her!  She found us our home within 1 month!!! Highly recommend her to anyone that is looking to buy a house!!

Our experience with Anabella Jimenez was exceptional!! Anabella was very professional, very attentive, explained in detail every step of the way. She responded to questions in a very timely manner. We will highly recommend her with family and friends. It was a pleasure doing business with her and her staff.

We worked with Anabella to purchase a home this year. It was a house that was very difficult to get due to the many, many issues with the home. 
Despite the blocks that kept being thrown our way, Anabella hung in there with us and helped us push it through. 
We are now in our home and love it.  One of Anabella's best traits was that I could ask her the most novice questions (even after we were well into the process) and she didn't make me feel embarrassed for asking. She was also always very responsive as well.
Miss Jimenez listened to our needs and made sure that she she showed properties that were going to meet our needs. We are very happy with the house we purchased.

I feel that she is very informative, detail oriented and lovely business women. I would definitely use her as my agent again. She made me feel like she had the time to show as many houses I may need to find exactly what I wanted.

She is on top of her game. What ever we asked of her, she did it with no hesitation and exceeded our expectations.  She hustled daily to show us properties. She wasn't satisfied unless we were happy and in to a home.

Anabella and her team made the prosses of purchasing my home smooth and would definitely recommend her/ and use her Services again in the future. Her and her staff are really knowledgeable and could answer any question u might have!

I just have to say one thing. Anabella is family now. Never had we ever had someone help us like she did. From beginning to end she stood by us and answered countless questions. We’ve gone back to her with our home purchases because she always makes us feel like we’re her only priority. I will continue to refer people to her and use her on all future purchases.

My wife and I were looking to purchase a home and Anabella was great from the moment we were introduced to her. She took the time to understand our financial needs and was able to cater to them. She showed us houses that were within our budget even on rainy sundays.   She was always available and promptly replied to our text and or phone calls. She worked with a very difficult mortgage lender but she was always professional and made a very stressful situation bearable. We looo forward to working with her in the future.

I highly recommend Anabella ! She is great, and is very knowledgable. She walks you through the whole process not leaving any information out. She has been wonderful to us. It's not about another sale to her, she genuinely cares about you and your family .

Thanks to Anabel we are proud homeowners we couldn't of done this without her. The knowledge she has with home buying is extensive she will fight for you. The process and experience of home-buying with Anabel Jimenez by your side is amazing. When the Banker was asking my family and I tough questions that we had no knowledge of she stepped right in and helped us making us feel comfortable and cared for she will fend for you and your family she will help you make the best decision for your family needs.

From the moment we met Anabella we felt so comfortable with her. We knew it was a good match for us. She is very professional but super friendly and extremly knowledgeable, which all came in handy when it came time for her to try and get us the House we wanted. She guided us and explained everything in detail. She was always available for any questions or concerns, which really put us at ease. We can trully say that because of all her years of experience and knowledge she was able to get us the house we fell in love with! We will forever be greatfull for all her hard work. We have  HIGHLY recommended her to all our friends. A million  "Thank you's " Anabella!

I really enjoyed the experience with Anabella. She really listened to what we were looking for in a home. Also, she was not pushy and was willing to put in the time to find the right house. I would use her again.

Was literally a 12th hour decision and wow did Anabella come through. We did have a time constraint to move and Anabella was the expert in the local market that we needed and she priced our home perfectly and we had a quick sale and GOT ABOVE ASKING, thats a win. Anabella and her staff kept the lines of communication open, easily accessible, professional and good customer service skills.

Best realtor ever she will make sure you are satisfied with your purchase, she also makes you feel comfortable when looking at house she puts no pressure and makes sure you are happy with your purchase. I’m a first time buyer and she made sure I understood the process before me signing anything!! Thanks you so much anabella for your hospitality!! A pleasure doing business!

Anabella was a pleasure to work with. She handled all the negotiations and got us our dream home. Everyone in her team is friendly and knowledgeable. her team is very hardworking and very responsive, she did everything she could to get us our home.

Annabella recently represented me on the sale of my house and she did an absolutely flawless job.  I could not be more pleased! Her attitude was always positive and her energy level is off the charts. She has been a realtor for decades and understands all the complexities that might unfold during a complicated sale.  She was always there to do whatever task was required with her professional know-how and optimistic attitude.  Without a doubt she is the best realtor I have ever had the pleasure to work with!.

Annabella helped us purchase our first home any questions we have had she was able to answer she has a great team working with her she has become a part of our family and definitely come back to work with her for any real estate investments will making the future

We were a first time buyer and we hoped to get a realtor who would be professional with a personal touch. And guess what we found an amazing agent in Anabella, who helped us understand and explained each and every step..she was very cooperative , very patient and a wonderful human being , professional to the core , yet with a personal touch.We have made a friend for life with her and will always go with her anytime we need a realtor...consider yourself very very lucky if you have Anabella as your realtor.Thanks again Anabella.

After speaking to two other agents we then spoke to Anabella as she came recommended from a previous client. She immediately stood out and we were not dissappointed. Anabella has an excellent work ethic and she wil definitely work hard for you, answer any and all questions she can in a timely fashion and demonstrates that she does care for her clients. I would recommend her in a heartbeat. :) Thanks Anabella!

I manage to stumble upon Anabella myself as I moved down to the Orange County area for work and was looking to buy my first place. I inquired on one of the places she was actually selling, but the listing had ended. Magdalena is a genuine person who cares for her clients — we felt this from the start.  We had originally met and discussed the possibility of owning a home a few years back, but we weren’t ready as my husband’s and my careers were shifting.  Towards the end of summer 2022, we spoke again asking for some advice on planning to buy our first ideal home.  We had no idea that this advice turned into a conversation of owning our first home. 

We were clear with what we wanted, then she showed us a few options that we thought were out of our range… but we were wrong.  She then introduced us to her mortgage broker who walked us through everything and answered all our questions.  They both made an outstanding team and showed us it was very possible to buy our first ideal home.

It was a journey viewing different homes, but alas we made the decision to put an offer on our first option that was given to us.  As time had passed, Magdalena and her team went above and beyond, answering all of our questions and addressing our concerns in a timely manner.  Magdalena was also able to negotiate a price for us that made it easier for us to close escrow.  There were times we would call on the spot and she was very quick to respond with a concrete answer.

This personal attention put our mind at ease as we knew we had might the right choice going with Magdalena Aguilar, Realtor. Even after our purchase, she’s still making sure that we’re taken care of with house services and special home requests/upgrades.  Without a doubt, Magdalena Aguilar is professional, honest and caring and I recommend her without any reservations.
