David has been with us every step of the way during our hunt for our perfect home. He was able to get us in to see our house before anyone else was able to see it which allowed us to beat out all other potential buyers.  He also sold our current home before it was officially listed!  Amazing!

If you're looking for your perfect home or wanting to sell your current home, David is a must to have on your side!  He and his staff are on the ball and extremely professional. 

Thank you David for making our dream home become a reality!
The process was quick and simple. I was kept up to date on what was going on. And every small question I asked was answered very clearly. I felt like things were done in my best interest.
"DAVID AND HIS TEAM ARE AMAZING! I WOULD NOT BE IN MY 1ST NEW HOME IF IT WASNT FOR ALL THE HARD WORK THE TEAM PUT IN! I AM TRUELY THANKFUL! DAVID IS THE BEST IN THE BUSINESS!"

I was referred to David from a dear friend who had a wonderful experience in the buy/sell of her home in Montebello. When I met David he was professional, experienced and honest. He handled things quickly and was “on point” with with his office and the selling transaction. David was sincere and had my best interest at heart. I would recommend David to everyone who is interested in purchasing or selling a home. He made the sale seem effortless.

"David and his Team were very knowledgeable and attentive to our needs as Buyers. Because we were new to the area, David spent an entire day showing us different areas to broaden our knowledge before making a final decision. He even referred us to a Preferred Lender who was just as amazing! David and his Team made the entire process very easy, and they were always available any time we had questions. Our offer was immediately taken, and I believe this was due to his experience as a knowledgeable realtor. We cannot thank him enough for getting us in our dream home! I highly recommend David and his Team!"

We selected David Limon for the sale of our home because upon meeting him he gave us confidence that he could sell our home. And if he didn't sell it, he had made the professional connections to get the job done, some how, some way. Our home was listed on the market of for 6 days before we received 1 full price offer! On day 7 we received an additional offer that was above asking price! His advertising worked so well we far surpassed other homes in our area for "views" by the hundreds! He was able to negotiate on our behalf and we ended up selling our home for 10K above asking! Our goal all along was to get the sale done as fast as possible. The extra cash was icing on the cake. Throughout the process he was always accessible, accountable, and stood up for us when necessary. We relied on his experience multiple times during the process. Especially during this Covid 19 crisis of 2020. He navigated uncharted waters with an uncertain economy and market; and still managed to do what needed to be done. He also brings along with him great support staff, specifically Bernarda (thanks for everything)! They are both available via phone, text, or email at all hours. We would recommend him and his team, 100%.
David was an AWESOME agent!! He always answered his phone and replied to emails quickly. He showed an impressive understanding of the local market. He sold my house in 24 hours. Highly recommended!

Let me begin this review by saying Parisa is hands down the best Realtor I have ever met.  If you walk away with only one fact from this review, let that be the one.  The sale of my house is probably the hardest sale Parisa has ever made.  My house needed many repairs and had been badly neglected.   It was also a victim of the Covid virus meaning I was way behind in the payments and VERY close to losing my house and its equity to the Bank.   Parisa was able to get the lender to work with me.  She helped me obtain contractors to do the many repairs that were needed and kept me in check when the process became overwhelming to me.  Regardless of the obstacles that continuously popped up, she always remained calm, professional and positive.  Trust me when I say there were many obstacles.  Parisa was referred to me by my nephew who is her neighbor.  When she showed up at our listing appointment I new nothing more about her than that.  She came to my house, looked it over and gave me a few  options.  I could sell it as-is, sell it to an investor (house flipper) or repair it and sell it.  I chose the later.  She didn't blink an eye and began the process of getting the various contractors, cleaning services. gardeners etc. in contact with me.  She helped negotiate prices when needed and overall kept everything moving forward.  When it was all said and done Parisa kept my house from being foreclosed, helped me get a very fair price and even though it took months to repair, when we did actually list the house with MLS she got me the perfect buyer within a couple weeks.  Parisa expertly handled the negotiating process and held my hand through the entire escrow, explaining everything as we went. Not just the good but she also, when needed, made me understand some harsh realities that most agents would have either ignored or glossed over just to avoid the hard conversations.  Through this whole process Parisa actually became a good and trusted friend, she  treated me the way she would treat a family member.  Parisa has continued to check on me from time to time just to make sure I'm doing ok in my new home. Parisa has my contact information and I give her permission to share with you if have any question as to her character, real estate knowledge or questions about this review.  As I said hands-down the best Realtor I have ever met. !!!

Parisa is the absolute "BEST" realtor I have ever worked with. She is patient, efficient, calm, super friendly, diligent and professional. She is very knowledgeable about the properties she was showing us and helped us to buy a property virtually while we were in Texas and the property was in OC! The whole process and transaction went very smooth and most importantly non eventful.
As a first time home buyer in California, I had no idea what was going on, but Parisa walked me through everything and made me feel so comfortable about the whole process. She made everything so easy and not overwhelming, and anything I needed she got done right away. If you’re looking for a realtor who can do the above things, Parisa is the perfect choice!

Parisa was a pleasure to work with. She made our move very smooth and went above and beyond her call of duty. Even though we have never met Parisa before, she treated us like family. She understood our needs very well and found us the perfect home for our golden years.

This review is a year late :/ but wanted to make sure we shared our experience working with Parisa.

We started our home search at the end of 2019 and little did we know what was waiting for us around the corner in 2020. We knew this was not going to be easy. Searching for a home during COVID and in one of the hottest markets in the country meant we had an uphill battle. But we felt confident that we had Parisa at the helm charging ahead on our behalf. After finding what we thought was our dream home at the start of 2020 only to learn we were not selected, we were disheartened. Just us though. Not Parisa. She pushed forward and kept the momentum up for us. Seeing this brought new life into our search and the feeling of defeat quickly subsided.

My wife and I are both entrepreneurs running our own business and Parisa worked with our odd schedules. Time is money and Parisa was sure we only saw homes that would fit what we were looking for. Parisa listened to our needs and would screen new listings for us via her personal housing app so we knew anything that came through was already vetted. When we did schedule a showing, she was extremely safe, handled all the paperwork and ensured all the safety protocols were followed. She was very knowledgeable of the various homes tracks we were looking at and was always there to answer any questions we had. Her experience in the industry was also evident when it appeared that she knew all the listing agents personally. We even got word of a few off-market listings from other agents Parisa had worked with. Fast forward 9 months and some 20+ home showings later and we had found the perfect place.

Parisa helped us craft our offer, and even worked directly with the other agent to ensure all our questions and concerns were met. When we finally got the keys, Parisa’s service didn’t stop there. She helped us with amazing referrals for home services and was always there if we needed her with our random questions that would come up.

If you go with Parisa for your next home search, you’ll definitely see why she will become your realtor for life. There simply isn’t anyone better.

I spent nearly a year looking for the right realtor to help me find my dream home. Then I met Parisa. Parisa was resourceful, knowledgeable and provided updates for the different houses we were considering. She truly went out of her way to accommodate my wife and I at every step of the home buying process. During the wonderful time my wife and I spent with Parisa, she was able to show us nearly a dozen homes that fit our criteria and helped secure our dream home. We HIGHLY recommend Parisa to anyone who is looking to move into their new house  like we did. Thank you very much Parisa for everything!

Parisa is truly something special, and definitely one of, if not *the* best agent in the area. We worked with her as sellers, and she gave us amazing advice at each step. She really knows her field and is an experts in it. She is strategic, thoughtful, patient, and supportive. We could not be happier with our experience and couldn't recommend her more highly.

Mrs. Parisa has been a great agent. She helped us get the house which even the seller agent couldn’t show us because the schedule was full. They were 9 strong offers at the table the first day of the house going to the market. She helped us get the house even in the area which was further from OC. 
Our experience showed us that she is a great expert, she was great even in tight schedules and competitive market even with COVID19. If you want your house sold or buy a great house she is the agent you want to choose.

Working with Thomas Nguyen was a truly outstanding experience. From the very beginning, he made the entire home-buying process smooth, professional, and stress-free. Thomas was incredibly responsive and clear in his communication, always making sure we understood each step and felt confident in our decisions. He took the time to listen to our needs and preferences, and tailored his approach to help us find the perfect property.

His deep knowledge of the Pomona market and real estate trends was evident throughout the process. He provided valuable insights that helped us make informed choices, and his attention to detail ensured that nothing was overlooked. Thomas stayed in constant contact, keeping us updated and answering all our questions with patience and care.

When it came time to make an offer, Thomas guided us through the negotiation with professionalism and skill. Thanks to his expertise, we were able to secure our new home with terms that worked well for us. Even after closing, he continued to check in and offer support, which speaks volumes about his dedication.

We are thrilled with the outcome and grateful for Thomas’s hard work. I would absolutely recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell a home—his integrity, knowledge, and personal touch truly set him apart.

Our experience working with Thomas could not have been better! His guidance made the home buying process smooth and stress-free. Every step of the way he was honest and encouraging to make sure we never lost sight of our goal. We couldn’t be happier with our experience and highly recommend him to anyone looking for a dedicated and professional agent!

Tom was absolutely amazing to work with. Even though we were living in Los Angeles and he was based in Orange County, he made weekly drives down to San Diego to personally show us homes. His commitment and dedication went far beyond what we expected.

Tom’s knowledge of the San Diego area is unmatched—having grown up there, he gave us detailed insight into each neighborhood, from schools and traffic patterns to hidden local gems. He constantly scouted homes, sent us tailored recommendations, and made sure we never missed a good opportunity.

As our mortgage broker, he was equally outstanding. Tom stayed on top of the market every single day and would proactively update us on trends, rates, and shifts without us even having to ask. His ability to guide us on both the real estate and mortgage side made the entire process smooth and stress-free.

What truly stood out was his professionalism, honesty, and patience. He never pressured us, always explained every step clearly, and genuinely had our best interest at heart. We always felt like we were his top priority, no matter how busy he was.

I fully plan to use Tom again for future purchases and would recommend him without hesitation to anyone looking to buy or finance a home. If you want someone who is hardworking, knowledgeable, trustworthy, and who truly goes above and beyond for his clients, Tom is the one.

We worked with Thomas to sell our home in Huntington Beach, CA where we lived for 34 years.  Thomas was very professional and guided us through the entire process.  We received a full listing price offer and Thomas used his lending expertise to ensure the buyer was financially qualified and able to purchase our property without contingency issues.  Throughout the sales process, Thomas represented us to the utmost of his ability and we were never left wondering about anything.  With his guidance, we were also able to enter into a purchase agreement on our new home and Thomas ensured that all of the dates lined up exactly so that we can move out of our old home and into the new home without any issues.  Thomas even spent personal time to help us with non real estate related events.  We have expressed to Thomas that he is a real hero and he really help our family in so many ways.  He is a genuinely honest and caring person.  Most importantly pertaining to real estate, he showed us that he is an agent who does not put commissions above his clients' interests.

It has been a pleasure working with Thomas! My wife and I were first time home buyers and did not know what to expect. Thomas made the process SO SMOOTH! He handled everything from start to finish. He would notify us when new properties that met our criteria were available. The majority of these listings were not on the market yet but we got a sneak peak! We were able to secure our first home with Thomas's help. He was super professional and negotiated in our favor with the seller. I cannot recommend Thomas enough. We also went through him for our loan. We shopped around prior, but his rates were still the best. Lastly, he saved us SO MUCH money throughout the whole process. We recently recommended a friend to go with Thomas but they ultimately chose another realtor and they INSTANTLY regretted it now that they are in escrow with that other realtor. Anyways, trust us and go with Thomas, you will not be disappointed!

I own four properties. When I bought my third one is when Thomas Nguyen helped me. He was professional and amazing to work with. He created an atmosphere of being part of the family and as a friend. He provided a lot of information and advice and after looking at several properties he represented me to the best of my interest to purchase my third property. Years later when I was ready to buy my home with my wife again I went with Tommy. We kept in touch and he is by far a great person to have as a friend. Again, Tommy went out of his way to assist us and help us find our dream home. House shopping is never easy and Tommy was there for every house we wanted to see. Eventually we found one and again he met my expectations and represented us well and was able to purchase the home. I have recommended him to my friends and family but I am also honored to recommend it to anyone that wants to buy real estate. Thomas Nguyen is the person who will look out for you and your interests and needs and when ready to buy he will be there next to you guiding you the entire way.

Thomas has worked with us on several investment properties.  His knowledge and expertise on income producing properties has really helped us grow our portfolio.  Thomas also helped us with the financing and that made our investments much less stressful.  He was very detailed and kept us abreast with every step of the purchase and loan.  We have worked with multiple agents over the years but our experience with Thomas has definitely impressed us.  Thomas has been a blessing to have as our agent and we would have no problem recommending him to our family and friends.

Donna did a fantastic job selling my home! She had a great strategy in place to get me a higher-than-expected sales price. Donna has a great eye for presentation/staging, is a strong negotiator and made the whole process really easy for me as an out-of-state seller. I definitely recommend her and I'm super happy I had her on my side.

Donna was excellent throughout the process during an aggressive seller's market wherein my offers kept getting outbid. Always responsive and professional; Donna was great to have on my side throughout every step of purchasing a new construction home.
A good experience.  Donna was responsive and provided good advice throughout the process
He was very knowledgeable about the homes, market, and everything it took to help us buy our first home. Highly recommend!

The whole process of selling/buying a new home can be incredibly intimidating. Elliot made the entire process as stress-free as possible while treating us like family from the get-go. As with any home sale/purchase, when issues arose he was able to help us through them and bring us to close on both the sale of our old house and the purchase of our new. We could NOT be happier with the services we received and would recommend him to ANYONE looking for a top-tier agent that knows his stuff and will get the job done right!

Jen was recommended to us by friends in the area, who also bought a home with Jen as their realtor. We cannot say enough good things about Jen! She is very knowledgeable about the market and the area. She guided us through negotiations and made us feel comfortable while making a very large purchase. We must have contacted Jen dozens of times with questions, and she was always more than happy to help...even when she was on vacation! We felt that Jen truly had our best interest at heart. She is not pushy, and works hard for her clients. On top of that, she has a great personality, and we had a lot of fun looking at properties! Jen is everything you could want in a real estate agent.

We are happy to recommend Mark Salas as a real estate agent for any family searching for a new home.  We began our search by interviewing several agents.  It had been 24 years since we last purchased a new home and wanted a home closer to our aging parents.  We were not too excited about leaving a home where we raised our family, but felt it was time to do so.  
In interviewing prospective agents to handle such an important and emotional sale of our home, it was clear to us that Mark was the best choice for us.  Although we received offers at a lower percentage rate from other agents, we felt Mark understood our situation, understood our neighborhood and did not make extravagant promises to us.  He was honest and straight forward and explained what needed to be done to sell our property.  He explained every step of what to expect with showings and offers.  
We agreed that we should find a home prior to listing our home.  After finding a new home with Mark, we did place our home on the market and after following Marks advice on what to do to prepare the home to be shown and for inspections. We received six offers in the first two days of showing, and since he did such a great job of marketing our home, we actually had to start to decline showings.  Mark summarized all of the offers for us, and helped us to make the best decision without pushing us toward any one offer.  We ultimately accepted an offer well above our asking price.  
Mark did not stop his assistance at the acceptance of the contract.  Mark walked us through every step of the process from the signing of the contract, to buyer requests after the inspection, which were very few because we followed Marks advice on prepping for the inspection.  He took the extra time to appear at the inspection, the appraisals for our old home and for our new home on our behalf and walked us through every step of the process right down to the closings on both homes.  
Mark made us feel as though we were his only customers. He always returned phone calls and texts and emails the same day. We never felt neglected or unimportant.  We accidently left an item at our old home and did not notice for two weeks after closing.  When we asked Mark if it was possible to ask the new owner if we could retrieve the item, Mark made the request on our behalf.    
We are pleased to recommend Mark Salas to anyone looking to buy or sell a home. In our opinion, he is a great agent that genuinely cares about his clients.  We will be using him again to help us find a home for our parents closer to our new home.

Mark helped us to find and buy a house. He was very professional during and after the whole process. He gave us exactly what we were looking for, working withing the parameters we gave. We could reach him any time of the day, no matter in was late Tuesday night or early Sunday morning, and we really appreciate that. 
He was more than just a real estate agent for us, he treated us like a family, we knew we could rely on him. 
It has been a pleasure working with Mark. We highly recommend him.

Morgan is a life long friend and a great friend at that which also matches how great of a realtor he is and how passionate he is with helping his clients out. Our realtor/agent TAMMI STUART was absolutely amazing! She went above and beyond to sell our home in Colorado. From the very start, TAMMI beautifully staged our home for buyer showings. Tammi was phenomenal! Tammi helped us in every way possible to sell our home. She started by giving us a list on what to work on for best value. She also was there with us staging and making sure it was all perfect before we went live on the market. She helped us every step of the way. I would recommend her to anybody.

Tammi was absolutely amazing when it came to buying our new home. She was very patient and insightful throughout the whole process. She first helped me and my  fiancé find a lender who has been a breeze to work with and who provided us a loan that was fair. She then explained the buying process with such detail that we were able to begin looking for homes with confidence. In less than a month we found a home we loved and we were under contract. I think Kathi' Spencer's knowledge of the Denver area, her abilty to listen to her clients wishes, and her easy going attitude contributed to a very successful home purchase. We are so grateful and lucky to have met such an easy going, knowledgable and super awesome realtor!

Kathi was fantastic to work with! I'm a first-time home buyer, and she made the process so easy to navigate. She was very responsive and communicative, flexible with my scheduling needs, and was a strong advocate for me in the negotiation process. She took the time to understand my needs as a home buyer. The entire experience couldn't have gone better!

Kathi Spencer with Live Urban went the extra mile to help us sell and buy a house. Our home listing was beautiful and surely contributed to the fast sale of our home. Kathi provided a home staging service and professional photographer to ensure our house would get the attention it deserved. 
We have purchased two houses with Kathi as our agent and in both instances she was able to negotiate contracts we were very happy with. We always recommend her to all of our friends (many of whom have used her with great success).
Kathi is very identifiable and down to earth. It was very clear throughout the whole process that she is very knowledgeable about real estate. We never felt like we were trying to be over sold. Plus she has a great sense of humor and is just easy to be around.
N/A
Aimee is great to work with. She is very knowledgeable and works hard for you.
We are first time home buyers and Melissa and Aimee have made the whole process so enjoyable. Melissa always welcomes questions and has walked us through this whole process.
Aimee and The Fletcher Team did a fantastic job helping my husband and I find our home. Fantastic experience and a very good team to work with

Aimee is a premium realtor that makes you feel like a high end client every step of the way. Her professionalism and expertise developed a trusting and openness that she would accomplish what she says she will. We have never been more pleased with a realtor than we have with Aimee. Her whole sales team, especially her listing agent, Staci, made sure we were aware of all steps along the way. From staging the home, excellent photography, and the final closing, we would only recommend Aimee Fletcher to anyone that asks.

Kathy had previously sold our home in West haven, CT when 3 other realtors failed to do so. She even got us a higher selling price than what the other agents had listed our property for.  This time around Kathy helped us purchase a home. In the crazy coronavirus times, she was quick on the draw to alert us to properties meeting our criteria so we could view them on the first possible day to beat the heavy buying competition.  She was patient and never flinched when we asked to see literally dozens of homes before finding the right one. She is a great negotiator and guided us through the process seamlessly.  She is honest and professional.  This is the realtor you want to work with- Call kathy. You won't be sorry!

Brian Burke from Coldwell Banker  in South Windsor CT, told my realtor to submit last and final offer. We did submit a generous offer and my agent and Brian were discussing the sellers terms. 
After all set and done. My offer was accepted. My wife and I signed the contract and we worked with the sellers regarding their terms. 
The next day,  I get a call from my agent stating that the buyers received a better offer  with no inspections.  In other words the agent wants me to buy a  half a million dollar house and not do an inspection. 
What he did is not fair,  not only for me but every person looking for a home. If a contract was signed and all final offers were in, why did he continue to  receive offers. He gave us the contract and also his word. I guess we can’t trust anything he says.  
A contract and most importantly your word should mean something, but I guess not everyone follows the same rules.  My advice is to not do business with Brian Burke.  When they accepted the offer my wife and I got really excited because after two years we found our house, to then get the call stating that they gave it to someone else. Imagine the disappointment. He instead of taking other offers, he should have discussed with us if we wanted to match or do something different to accommodate us since we had a signed contract.
reply:
{'reviewer_email': 'figueroaalbert1@gmail.com', 'reply_date': '2024-03-04T19:01:54.793Z', 'message': "Dear Mr. Figueroa,

Thank you for sharing your feedback. I understand how disappointing it can be not to have your offer accepted, especially in such a competitive real estate market. I empathize with the emotions and challenges buyers face during this process.

Please allow me to clarify that in this instance, my obligation was to represent the seller, adhering strictly to their instructions and acting in their best interest. In a market where multiple offers are more the rule than the exception, each decision is critical and guided by the seller's preferences and the strength of the offers received.

It's essential to acknowledge that the dynamics of real estate transactions require quick action and the best possible terms right from the outset. While your offer was certainly considered, the delay in revising it allowed for the consideration of other offers, which ultimately led to one that was more aligned with my client's expectations being accepted.

I regret any confusion or premature optimism conveyed to you by your agent. The nature of real estate transactions emphasizes the importance of timely and competitive offers.

I sincerely hope your future endeavors in the housing market are successful and that this experience provides valuable insights for future submissions. Wishing you all the best in your search for a home.
"}

comment:

First of all, a big Thank You to Angela Costello!  Bringing her knowledge of the area, current market prices and what sells homes, Angela came up with a fair and realistic valuation.  From her first visit to the property, through the fix up, the home inspection and the conversations with contractors, buyers and agents Angela was on top of everything.  She made the extra effort to meet with the various contractors as we prepared the home for market. When issues came up at inspection Angela was there presenting options and mitigation plans.
