I was quite comfortable knowing if I called with a question or for an update, Angela would be available with the answers or the latest news. Angela's efforts and patience really took the stress out of selling a property which could have been very tough to move.  Truly dedicated and professional, Angela was a pleasure to work with.Thanks again Angela.  Great job.  Don't be surprised if one day you answer your phone and hear "Dan told me to call you.".

Working with Angela was an excellent experience.  She is friendly, knowledgeable, and thorough in all she does.  She understood the market and our needs as clients.  She took the time to carefully walk through the house, ask questions, and complete a comprehensive market analysis.  Angela worked closely with us to make some small changes in our home that had a big impact on the presentation.  In less than a week, we had multiple offers and sold our home for over asking.  We appreciated Angela's professionalism, expertise, and guidance throughout the process and would recommend her services to friends and family.
N/A

We have had the pleasure of working with Angela over the past year. She is very knowledgeable professional, and personable. She was able to help us sell our rental property in a very short period of time.  Our son recently moved back to Massachusetts and Angela was able to help him find the perfect home for his growing family. We are now in the process of downsizing and will be moving in to a smaller home.  With Angela's knowledge base and sound advice, we expect our home will not be on the market for very long. Without hesitation, we would recommend Angela to anyone looking to buy or sell a home. She's the best!   Joanne & Jim Spence

Stacey is a dream to work with.  She is super professional, responsive and knowledgeable about the area.   She helped us find a wonderful summer rental  that met all of our needs and requirements.  I highly recommend Stacey for a seamless experience.

Kristen was pleasant, non-pressing, and professional.  A very positive real estate transaction.
I was selling my condo ‘by owner’; and Kristen was very helpful providing leadership on documentation generation and signing - particularly helpful was the electronic signing as a co-owner wasn’t local.
She was the Buyer Agent; however, I never felt a sense of us and them.  Kristen came across (as I hopefully did also) that we can have a mutually beneficial transaction that is fair to both.

Kristen!!! An excellent person and real estate agent. I will recommend her to anyone at anytime. She researches for you, helps you throughout the entire process, and at the end of closing she helps you with any trade person for doing what you’d like to your new home.
5

Kristen's knowledge of the market was spot on! She communicated quickly and answered every question I had (and I had a lot of them!) making sure I understood all the terminology and the house buying process. She connected me with all the services I needed to complete the process - mortgage brokers, inspectors, etc. 

I dragged Kristen to so many houses and she showed up armed with every detail of the property and smile! She helped my find my dream home!

Kristen is very professional. She helped me to buy a house and later sell the same. While buying she never hesitated to show me any house irrespective of price and location. She always arrived at the house before I arrived and spent as long as I needed to see it all. She disclosed all attributes of a house and never hid anything so I do not get a surprise later. While selling she priced the house appropriately and got a very good offer in short time. All through the buying and selling process Kristen was very friendly. She connected me with excellent people (lawyer, handymen, inspector) who were very helpful and affordable.

Our experience with Kristen for my wife and I, was a pleasure. She was so assertive that She took an abundance of stress off of us buying our home. She is so knowledgeable and good at what she does, everything went smoothly. She also works with a great team of people. Besides all that we really feel as though we have gained a great new life long friend.

Three traits that a realtor agent need and Kristen Heinrich and her team has them 3 plus open communication line toward everything that is being processed and communicated between the buyer and bank. Kristen Heinrich and her team are definitely top tier and highly recommend for others use them to buy or sell with Kristen Heinrich

Kristen is very professional and very AVAILABLE. She always makes time for her clients and is always “on the clock.” She has helped us in many ways and goes the extra mile. She is invested in your needs and pays close attention to them. Kristen is a great agent and I am happy to have her in my corner.

Kristen is definitely one of the best realtor in the game. She helped me with everything in the buying process of this property and a year later when I needed to rent this house due to a job relocation, she also took care of the listing and rental process which helped me get the place rented in less than 2 months. I definitely recommend her for any of your real estate needs as she is upfront and honest about the process while being there every step of the way.  THANK YOU KRISTEN.

Kristen was great. She was always able to answer questions and gave good feedback. I would highly recommend her for anyone that is looking for a house. She would let us know immediately if something came available on the market.

Kristen helped us sell my father’s home and was so hardworking and relentless in making this process happen. After a problem with a buyer who backed out just before the closing, she had the house re-listed, sold and closed within a month! She is so highly motivated and ready to go to get your house sold! I would definitely recommend her and will call upon her again if and when I need to sell or purchase a property.

Kristen is a straight shooter. She followed up with the buyers agent a few times to try to keep them on track. She had to inform them of things they needed to do when it seemed like their agent had no idea what was going on. She was 110% my advocate and went above and beyond. I recommend her to everyone that wants straight answers, no nonsense and honesty.
Detailed, organized, punctual and on target

Kristen was extremely helpful and knowledgeable about the market and it’s rapidly changing conditions. She was always available whenever I needed her. I would highly recommend her to anyone considering buying or selling a house.

A true leader in the industry. Kristen completed an accurate market analysis that resulted in a quick sale of our home with top dollar. She is thorough, prompt and return calls timely. She is creative in addressing possible concerns and operates as a true ethical professional. We use her regularly for investment transactions and wouldn’t consider anyone else for the job!

Kristen and us clicked right off the bat. If we ever had questions about the home buying process or how to optimize our buying strategy / negotiation tactics, Kristen was there to give us the best advice. She is very knowledgeable, trustworthy, and approachable with any questions or concerns throughout the home buying process. No matter what day of the week or time it was, she was very responsive and prompt in getting back to us. Not only was she available up until our closing, but she enthusiastically and timely helped answer some of our questions after we bought the home as well. We highly recommend contacting Kristen if you are interested in buying a new home, especially if you are a first time home buyer (like us). We are very thankful for choosing her and thanks to her we have the home we love.

My wife and I decided to move from New Jersey to Connecticut as part of a corporate relocation. After scouting several towns on our own in search of our next home, we decided to seek the services of a corporate approved real estate firm, and reached out to Andrea Viscuso with Compass. We are so glad to have made that first call to Andrea. We quickly found Andrea and her team to be very resourceful. From getting us pre approvals, to showing properties that fit our specifications, to giving good advise during the bidding process, to connecting us with lenders and legal council, to guiding us through the closing process, Andrea and her team were spot on! We are very happy with our home in Madison CT, and so glad we met Andrea. We highly recommend Andrea & Compass if you are in need of a professional, very resourceful real estate firm. Thank you Andrea!

Andrea was an absolute pleasure to work with! She was knowledgeable, patient, and attentive to all (of our many) needs and questions. As first time home buyers, Andrea truly helped navigate our entire experience and ultimately, help us win the home of our dreams! We cannot recommend working with Andrea enough- she is truly an incredible person and an even lovelier agent. Wonderful experience!

Andrea was amazing to work with. She was incredibly knowledgeable, demonstrating a deep understanding of the market and the nuances of selling a home. Her sense of responsibility was evident in every interaction, ensuring that all aspects of the sale were handled efficiently and effectively. Andrea provided exceptional marketing services, showcasing the home in the best possible light, and took care of every detail needed to facilitate a smooth and successful sale. Her dedication and expertise made the entire process seamless and stress-free.

Andrea went above and beyond at every step of the process and we can’t say enough good things about her. She is everything you want in a realtor - communicative, smart, proactive, savvy, accommodating and simply fun to talk to! With Andrea’s guidance we beat out 10+ other offers with cash buyers to land our home and we couldn’t be more pleased.

Putting all that to the side, what truly sets Andrea apart is not just how hardworking she is but also her deep connections to the people and businesses in the area. She’s connected us to several of her friends and previous clients who live in the areas we were considering, she’s put us in touch with reliable contractors, helped us find a lawyer, scheduled visits with radon companies and more. Even after our sale she is still following up to see if her need anything. She is simply the best!

Andrea is the hardest working Realtor I have ever met. She truly puts her clients first and genuinely cares about them. She wants you to find a home you absolutely love and will not stop until you find it. She also has a large network and can refer you to whoever it is you are in need of whether it be construction, plumbing, etc. We used Andrea to buy our home in 2019 and she will be our Realtor for life.

My husband and I were looking for a home in a certain neighborhood to be close to family. She was able to find us an updated home that we love on the same street as our family members, so it could not have worked out better! We are currently working with her to prep and list an investment condo. Her creative ideas on home improvements with a good return are not always costly and they do make a home look more appealing for a potential buyer. She’s truthful and smart in her craft. Highly recommend!

Andrea is an amazing realtor. She took the time to truly understand our needs and what we were hoping to get in a new house. She knows the market better than anyone and had an infinite number of connections. We did a long-distance search, and she was so helpful with virtual walkthroughs, videos, and so much more. She's incredibly responsive and there for her clients 100% of the time. We trusted her every step of the way and it landed us with a house we are so excited about. Highly recommend working with her!!!

Andrea is the best! She was thorough, very patient, professional and great to work with. She kept us apprised about homes that fit our criteria and always let us know as soon as a new one came on the market. She was very persistent with our search, worked with us in a very difficult market, made sure we got the best deal and worked with the seller/realtor, and got us our dream home. I would HIGHLY recommend Andrea to anybody who is looking for a property.
Very attentive, always available to answer questions, and very communicative during every step of the process. Look forward to working with Andrea in the future!

I worked with Andrea to sell my home and buy a new home. My experience with her was one that I feel is pretty rare. She brings a wealth of knowledge that supported me in getting the most for my home. Just the simple adjustments she was able to make in my home, made it show very well in the market. It actually made me reconsider selling it, it looked that good! She helped me move to a new town and pointed me toward a location that she knew would be perfect for my lifestyle (no kids yet, worked in the city at the time, and was rarely ever home). So we went for a newer construction with a manageable yard, close to downtown for entertainment and the train for work! Andrea knows all the ins and outs of the process and literally held my hand throughout it all. She helped make the timeline feel comfortable vs. stressful. She's extremely creative and if you have a wishlist that might not be in your budget (don't we all, ha) she actually has an eye for potential and could give you ideas on how to make your dream come true within the houses she is showing. I'm very happy in my new home and will use Andrea again if I decide to move.

Andrea is the hardest working Realtor I have ever met. She truly puts her clients first and genuinely cares about them. She wants you to find a home you absolutely love and will not stop until you find it. She also has a large network and can refer you to whoever it is you are in need of whether it be construction, plumbing, etc. We used Andrea to buy our home in 2019 and she will be our Realtor for life.
Very professional and attentive

Michelle helped me find a rent in Cheshire, CT. She was very professional, easy to work with, and extremely responsive to my e-mails and text messages. She is definitely knowledgeable about real estate and understands the market very well. I would recommend Michelle to my friends and/or relatives who are looking to buy or sell a property in the future.

Gary went above and beyond to get our property sold. He knows the market, building dept. and local contractors intimately. We were not local and he handled every issue that came up and was very hands on to get things done. I would recommend Gary to anyone buying or selling.

This will be my third transaction with Gary.  I sold a condo and purchased a house through him in 2000. Now it's time to sell that house and there was no question of who I would use to list it.  Gary is very knowledgeable of the housing market, especially but not limited to Newtown / Sandy Hook CT.  He's willing to go the extra mile and he's never about the money.  He truly wants to do a good job and make it successful for everyone.
We’ve bought and sold through Brian 5 times. In this market, houses sell themselves. Brian has saved us a lot of money. He is professional and knows the market.

Brian sold my house at asking price and saved me just over $10K dollars in realtor fees, but the positives end there.  If you just need a realtor to list your house on MLS with good pictures, then Brian is your man.  After the first offer, I realized I was going to have to do the work to determine counteroffers, receiving only email affirmation and never advice from Brian.  When we finally got a contract on the house 19-days after listing, his 'contract coordinator' began to work with us; good luck communicating with her over something other than e-mail because the only number they have is Brian's cell phone number, and he rarely answered it.  Communication over the entire process was lacking and almost solely took place over e-mail.  I don't know how many times I had to reiterate the same things in those e-mails such as closing date, moving dates, HOA POCs, and driving the deal on communication with the closing attorney.  About three weeks before closing I asked Brian about the appraisal, knowing that was the only contingency I had left on the contract.  After several e-mail exchanges (never over the phone), he assured me the appraisal was complete, only to find out a week and a half later the appraisal was not done; picking up the phone and talking to the buyer's agent would have fixed confusion that was not unclear to me in the original buyer's agent e-mail.  Getting the appraisal done was also frustrating, and would have set us back on the closing date if the buyer's agent had not stepped in to help.  Once the closing attorney and buyer's agent found my phone number, they stopped trying to contact Brian and just worked through me in the final week of the deal; frankly, we all gave up trying to contact Brian.  If I had not had direct contact with the closing attorney and the buyer's agent I would have never seen my closing documents before settlement, the final walk-through would not have occurred on time, and closing would have been delayed.

I am a renter, not a buyer. But, moving across the country is a terrifying (and exciting) experience. I reached out to Rukiyat through a website, attracted to her expertise and her claim of working with diverse clients. She reached out to me promptly, excited to help! And working with Rukiyat on finding the perfect rental for me put me at so much ease. On two separate occasions, she took me in her personal car across Baltimore to show me several homes for rent, as well as spent time walking in the neighborhoods to show me the area. Rukiyat took the time to point out where stores and restaurants were, taught me what the environments were like, and kept me on top of how long commutes would be. She knows Baltimore so well, and it was easy to trust her experience and follow her lead. 
I ended up picking the home I am in currently with her suggestion, and it lives up to the expectations she provided. The neighborhood is safe, beautiful, and quiet while still having a thriving community and easy walking access to things I need, which all were things in our first consultation I said I desired.
Not only is she great at her job, she is also kind. She approached me with open arms and no judgement and was excited to get to know me. On one of our viewing days, my friend who had driven me to Baltimore had her shoe sole split from her boot, making walking around difficult. Rukiyat drove us to her home, where she got my friend glue for her shoe, when proceeded to check in with her that it was working to repair the shoe properly and went above and beyond to make sure she was comfortable. She brought us water, snacks, and was ready to stop if we needed anything. After I moved in, she dedicated time to check in with me to make sure any needed repairs happened, as well as answered questions I had about the area. This is all for a RENTAL! I cant even imagine the service provided to someone buying a house. I know for sure, when I'm ready to buy, if its in her area, I will be asking for Rukiyat's help. What a great experience!

This was my second time using Rukiyat. She helped me purchase the first house I brought in 2018 and as a first time home buyer she guided me through what I needed to do to find the perfect home for my Son I I. I was so pleased with the purchase and the process that I knew it was only right to have Rukiyat support me through the selling process of my home. Rukiyat is patient, provides emotional
Support when I was stressed out, responds in the timely manner as well as provides great feedback that is needed.  She provided me with all the guidance I needed to ensure my house will sell for the right price and very quickly. I highly recommend Rukiyat for purchasing and selling. You will not be disappointed with her expertise and professionalism that she has to offer. I am extremely pleased to continue to work with Rukiyat as I am also working with her to purchase my second home.

Melisa was the best agent we could've asked for for our first time buying a home. She truly looked out for us and our best interests. She was patient, organized, very communicative and responsive, and overall went so above and beyond to do research for each property. We recommend her to everyone we know!

She was great from the first to last day she helped with any and all questions I had I would recommend anybody in the Fairfax county area who needs an agent to sell her house I believe she would be very helpful

Melisa made selling my condo a breeze.  She guided me through staging and listing my property and she answered my thousand and one questions quickly and professionally.  She worked late into the night to make sure my contract was ratified and ready to go.  Thank you Melisa!

Melisa is the best! She is a fabulous real estate agent with selling & buying.  She was thorough and professional and great to work with.  She kept us apprised about all showings & was honest and forthright- no games.

My wife and I worked with Kcrystal with the Dana Rice Group and she was unbelievable! It was our first home buying experience, and we must have asked a million questions - some dumb ones probably - but she returned texts/emails/phone calls at all hours of the day and into the night. She always kept us informed, clearly laid out our options, was highly highly responsive, and was just THE BEST! 

She had recommendations for people to use from lenders to home inspectors and every she recommended was excellent as well! Not only does the Dana Rice group have an awesome team, they also have an incredible network of contacts and industry professionals that partner closely with them. 

Other reviews say that they discovered the perfect agent for them after speaking with a few dozen of them, however my wife and I met with Kcrystal and didn't have to talk to anyone else, she is the BEST!

We had an amazing experience with the Dana Rice Group. Kcrystal Boschma worked with us on every detail along the way, even late into the night answering all of our questions and putting our minds at ease. We were able to get a home we love in the neighborhood we want our kids to grow up in, at a price point that worked for us! They didn't just meet, they exceeded our expectations.

Dana did an amazing job for us, we couldn't be more pleased - far surpassing our expectations! She knows the business and the market really well and really exudes competence and professionalism. She provided us with great service; she has a great all around team to call on, and produced fabulous marketing materials. We highly recommend her!

She is truly the best realtor around! Extremely knowledgeable about different neighborhoods in MoCo, educate you and "look fors" when purchasing a home, and overall clear communication on everything and more. She gives you all her attention and attends to your home buying needs. She remembers the style/preferences in your dream home and finds matches accordingly. Absolutely loved my experience!

D'Ann was awesome!  She helped me prepare my house for sale and was very transparent with me about what needed to be prepped to get the right price.  She communicated well and was very involved throughout the whole process. And we got multiple offers above asking!

We originally worked with another realtor but switched to D'Ann as she came highly recommended by someone we trusted. From start to finish, we were super impressed by her comprehensive understanding of real estate and her unwavering commitment to her clients. Despite encountering significant challenges in selling our condo, D'Ann worked tirelessly to resolve the issues and successfully closed the sale! We are extremely grateful for her dedication and expertise and can't recommend her enough.

We couldn’t have asked for a better realtor to help us sell our home in Clifton, Virginia. From start to finish, D’Ann was an absolute professional—knowledgeable, kind, and incredibly courteous every step of the way.

She guided us through the entire process with confidence and care, always making sure we felt informed and supported. One standout moment that truly showed her thoughtfulness was how she helped us navigate the unique challenge of relocating with our backyard chickens. D’Ann understood that this wasn’t just a sale,it was a big lifestyle change and she approached it with sensitivity and creativity, helping us make a smooth transition without stress.

Her deep understanding of the local market, along with her spot-on advice about pricing, staging, and marketing, helped us secure a strong offer and a seamless closing.

If you’re looking for a realtor who brings not only expertise but also heart, we highly recommend D’Ann.

We were moving out of Maryland and needed to sell our house as soon as possible, so as not to have two mortgages. D'Ann was super helpful and setting up our expectations,  negotiating, and keeping us informed so we did not have to worry that a sale would go through. She had a plan that successfully saw the sale of our home, which helped us focus on our out-of-state move. Thanks for everything,  D'Ann!

We appreciate her rapid responses;
Also, her input and acumen thru out the
Entire process, insuring a terrific outcome!

Deann is irreplaceable

I closed in 2025! D’Ann worked with me at my own pace. She fought for things I wanted through negotiations. During the looking process, she helped me find the right location, in the right value market, with the right safety features. She went above and beyond showing me the good and bad of homes to ensure I made an informed decision. So grateful to have worked with her and I will continue to work with her!
D’Ann exceeded all of our expectations. She knew the market, provided high-level expertise and proved to be a trusted advisor throughout the entire process.  We will never use another agent again.

Working with City Chic (for the second time!) we found again this is a company with realtors who value professionalism over profit, genuinely care for their clients welfare, and put in the the extra mile to achieve success.

Our realtor D’Ann was more than an agent- she was our counselor, our confidant, and our trusted ally. She saw us through challenging times and things out of left field that couldn’t be controlled or planned for. Even at our most nervous and stressed points (working a three-property transaction isn’t simple!) we felt taken care of and that we were in good hands. D’Ann has been a calming presence and gave us confidence from start to finish. She is responsive, organized, straight forward, clarified the complexities of real estate, and navigated VA bureaucracy brilliantly! We HIGHLY recommend City Chic without reservation.

My husband and I had a wonderful experience selling our home with D’Ann of City Chic Real Estate. She was very prompt in meeting with us and extremely thorough in presenting a concise plan for the sell of our home grounded in her track record of sales in the area. She was great at communicating with us throughout the showing and open house process and showed extra care as we handled the sale during the midst of a nation health pandemic. We were pleased when her efforts resulted in multiple offers over asking price on the initial open house. We will definitely use and recommend her in the future.

Never in my life have I worked with someone who is so client-centric.  D'Ann responds immediately to texts, emails, and phone calls, and she goes out of her way to do the things that need to be done to make her client's travails in the real estate market disappear.  She did not hesitate to ask the questions that needed to be asked but that I hadn't even given a thought to, and she was always a step ahead for my family's benefit.  I can't believe how fortunate we were to have had the opportunity to have her working for us.  She is truly amazing.

D’Ann was knowledgeable, responsive, and advocated for all of needs and wishes. As a first time home buyer, she answered all of my questions with ease and patience. I enjoyed working with her from looking for homes, to putting in an offer, and to closing on the home. She stayed on top of all hiccups and explained every step easily. Highly would recommend!

D’Ann exceeded all of my expectations. She was very knowledgeable of the area and knew every detail of the buying process. She was incredibly responsive and professional. She was there every step of the way and made it a seamless process. I could not recommend her more!
D'Ann Faught of City Chic Real Estate is a superb agent: meticulous, dedicated, smart, knowledgeable, persistent, congenial.  She got us the house of our dreams.  Can't recommend her highly enough.

D'Ann was just so great to work with on buying my condo.  As a first time home buyer, I had very limited knowledge about the process and D'Ann was always able to clearly answer any questions I had and provide any recommendations.  I originally discussed with her that I was looking in a specific area in Montgomery County, MD, but when I did a sudden flip to Fairfax County, VA, D'Ann was easily able to roll with it and give me just as much advice and knowledge about this new area.  Throughout the whole process she was super communicative and overall just a great person to work with.  I felt she always gave me her honest opinion based on her experience and the current market, which I really appreciated.

I think I just had the world’s BEST house selling experience.  When my mother went into an independent living facility I had to empty, clean and sell the house that she had lived in for 40+ years.  I spent several weeks moving the items she/we wanted to keep, and then was faced with needing to find a realtor.   I was lucky enough to get linked with D’Ann Melnick.	

	Boy, was I lucky!  She was fantastic!  Incredibly professional, unbelievably prepared at all times and an immediate answer for all of those little speed bumps that come with selling an older house.  Communication-great.  All calls/emails/texts returned promptly.  Knowledge of local market—solid.  Organization-thorough.  She worked with me making a timeline of how to get the house ready, when to put the Coming on the Market Soon listing, when to get the outstanding professional photographer there to take the pictures…she had it all.  Solutions to the many speedbumps of old houses—immediate.  We had a slightly-over-radon-reading; she called someone and had a radon mitigation estimate the same day.  Her list of resources was amazing—cleaners, contracters, estate-cleaner-outers—she had it all.  D’Ann took the 8 offers and presented them to me with comparisons and recommendations.  All of her advice was spot on.  Closing was smooth and painless.
	I just cannot recommend this professional enough.  If you need to sell/buy a house in the area, she is the person for you.

D'Ann did a fantastic job of helping my wife and I find exactly the right home for our family. We were moving from out of state and were unable to tour homes in person, so D'Ann traveled around Montgomery County and did virtual tours for us, even narrating by text when she'd lost her voice! She helped us put in an offer on our first choice with a very tight time requirement, and because of her responsiveness and thoroughness our offer was accepted. She never missed a beat during the purchasing process, and even after closing she has remained extremely responsive to anything we need help with. I wholeheartedly recommend her if you're looking for a real estate agent in or near Montgomery County.

D'Ann proved to be incredibly helpful in the journey of buying our first home. She provided us with a great deal of guidance and professional know how that we needed a first time home buyers. D'An went above and beyond to ensure that we ended up in an excellent home that we are thrilled with.

D’Ann was a terrific person to work with.  She was quick to respond to any and all questions.  Worked very collaboratively to set a competitive price for my home, and quickly scheduled an open house.  The house sold in 3 days, and closing was a breeze!  I highly recommend her as a realtor!

My wife and I found a new home to buy off market. When we got ratified, we new we had to list our current home right away, since we were looking to sell prior to closing on the new home. Three days later, we had our initial meeting with D’Ann to discuss initial steps and when to hit the market.  She provided a very helpful list to get our home “show ready” and recommended a competitive list price. Our home hit the market the following Friday, and due to D’Ann’s amazing home pictures, virtual online tour and premarket advertising, we had immediate interest.  We had 7 private showings the first day and a half, which included 5 competitive offers, 4 of which had escalation clauses.  D’Ann walked us through each offer very throughly, and answered every call and question we had. Our home was under contract in less than two days and sold well above list with all of the additional terms we requested!  Our sale successfully closed two weeks prior to our purchase, which meant we had more funds to bring to settlement, leading to a lower mortgage rate.  We could not have been more happy with D’Ann and City Chic, and 100% recommend them to anybody looking to buy or sell a home.

In the last few years, we have worked with D'Ann to purchase 2 homes and sell 1 home.  She is absolutely the best.  D'Ann goes above and beyond with everything she does.  She is extremely knowledgeable, organized, communicative, and transparent.  Our timing wasn't great with what was going on in the housing market during our recent purchase and sale, but D'Ann stayed ahead of market trends so we were well positioned to sell even when the market was down and competitive to buy when the market was hot.  We ended up with our dream home and even made a profit on our sale when other homes in our neighborhood sat on the market for months.  She gives honest feedback throughout the process and I had no doubt that D'Ann worked for our best interest in all of the transactions. I can't recommend her enough.
Our property did not sell while she was our listing agent. We are in the process of evicting a rental tenant she screened.
reply: {'reviewer_email': 'btsmith1184@icloud.com', 'reply_date': '2022-07-01T21:47:38.892Z', 'message': 'Brian is correct. We listed his property in Oxon Hill (National Harbor) in the Fall of 2020. It was only on the market for about 3 weeks before they decided to also list the property for rent. We received two applications for the property. Both tenants were screened for credit scores, criminal and eviction checks. Both applications were presented to the property owners and they selected a tenant. I do not handle property management, so unfortunately cannot speak to why the tenant is being evicted but the property owner did select this tenant from the applications received. I am sorry to hear that they are now dealing with an eviction a year and a half later. '}

comment:
D'Ann earned my trust the very first time we met and helped me make all the right decisions.

Worked with her to buy my first home in the brutal market of 2021. She was very knowledgeable and super responsive and helped me navigate all of the overwhelming papers and processes.

Plus she is an absolute pleasure to work with! Can't recommend enough!

D'Ann was an absolute dream to work with. She helped my husband and me purchase our first home in an incredibly stressful market. She was so helpful, thoughtful, and thorough throughout the entire process. She helped educate us and gave us the confidence to find the perfect home for us. D'Ann went above and beyond for us consistently, and was available 24/7 helping us write competitive offers, stay updated on our bids, and finding new listings that fit our needs so we could tour them immediately. D'Ann is the best of the best, we couldn't ask for a better realtor and we will only be working with her from now on!!

I love the way JdAnn puts customer first and anticipates the information we need , providing her views on properties taking into account our plans .
Goes out of her way to accomodate us , very polite and helpful
She went above and beyond in helping myself and my elderly parents in the selling of their home. Extremely pleased with the experience.

We loved working with Brenda Mejia, Compass Realty.   We hired Brenda to sell our Washington DC  investor condo at a time when federal government workers and contractors were being laid off, companies were losing government contracts and laying off employees and there was, and still is,  uncertainty with the economy. 

We were up against a lot of similar properties for sale, however, that didn’t deter Brenda.  She held open houses, helped our property get nationwide exposure, and was responsible for our property being showcased in a prestigious Realtor newsletter.

Brenda regularly communicated on her efforts and was quick to answer our many questions.    She even offered suggestions on innovative ways to market our property that kept the buyer interest high.

We received a very competitive offer from a well qualified buyer and Brenda worked closely with us through the end of settlement.

We highly recommend Brenda Mejia,  as your next realtor.

Rod and Denise Harpe

Brenda is an all-around great realtor -- experienced, friendly, detail-oriented, and patient. She is very responsive and willing to go above and beyond to make things happen. She is unfazed by the inevitable challenges that come up and handles them calmly and professionally. We hired her to buy and sell a condo as well as buy a semi-detached house and were happy with all transactions.

We were selling our house -- lived in for 20+ years -- in a market that started to suffer from the crazy employment and economic fluctuations resulting from wild policy swings. The location is also a bit unusual -- with both expensive and more affordable neighborhoods surrounding it. So, pricing was a complicated decision. Brenda helped us think through all these issues. The house itself is also unique - with eclectic attributes. Brenda gave us pointers, suggestions, and counterpoints from her wide experience. Ultimately we made all the right choices and sold our house at the best price. We believe the seller was also happy with the transaction. Brenda also worked hard to help iron out all the sticky points in the negotiation. We highly recommend her. In fact, this is our third project with her because we also bought and sold an investment property with her help during the past 3 years.

My first experience in selling our home after the death of my husband and daughter I  could not found anyone more helpful and compassionate than Brenda Mejia.  I never hesitated to call Brenda when I needed a response to a problem as she would be there for me.  Brenda showed her wisdom and experience in her dealings in the sale of our home. I would recommend Brenda for her skills as a real estate agent.

Nobody knows the DC area better than Teresa! She was incredibly patient and thorough. She helped us navigate a complicated purchase arrangement and gave us great insight at every decision point. You will not find a better agent!
Teresa is the most thorough real estate agent I have worked with.  Her tracking and follow through are 5 stars.

Teresa did a simply fantastic job of meeting and then exceeding our expectations. She anticipated our questions and acted proactively to save us time and effort. I highly recommend Teresa as advisor/agent for sale or purchase of any residential property.

We cannot say enough how much we appreciated Teresa's support as our buyer's agent! We were very nervous to enter a tough market and work through such a big decision, but Teresa was patient and easy to communicate with throughout the process. Even though we were being picky in a challenging market, Teresa took the time to really understand what we were looking for in a home and make suggestions accordingly. She also patiently explained all of the new twists in the process for our first time home-buying experience. We constantly felt like she had our back!

Mike did a excellent job selling my house. From the start, he helped me see the house from the buyer's perspective. I was able to make just a few very minor updates that were excellent bang for my buck prior to listing the house. Mike connected with me on a more personal level than other agents I interviewed for the role. He was knowledgeable about the current market, proper pricing of my house and how many offers it would likely receive. He set up a timeline from listing through Open House to an offer deadline that all but ensured a multiple offer scenario that lead to above asking price offers. Mike took care of the minor issues without needing to involve me. He's experienced, a great communicator and was helpful through the entire process. Thanks, Mike!

"I could not have sold my property without Mike.  His expertise and compassion were crucial in my situation. I live in a different state than the property I had to sell for a critically sick friend.  His guidance and encouragement through all my selling issues was far more than I could have asked for.  Mike followed through with all my needs and had made my experience much less stressful than it could have been and kept me informed every step of the way. He truly went above and beyond, and I am very grateful he was my realtor."

"I could not have sold my property without Mike.  His expertise and compassion were crucial in my situation. I live in a different state than the property I had to sell for a critically sick friend.  His guidance and encouragement through all my selling issues was far more than I could have asked for.  Mike followed through with all my needs and had made my experience much less stressful than it could have been and kept me informed every step of the way. He truly went above and beyond, and I am very grateful he was my realtor." Mary H

I loved working with Elisabeth.  She was very personable and did a good job of advising me of my options at each step.  She worked with me diligently to ensure I would get the most out of my property sale and advocated in my best interests.

Elisabeth worked very hard and diligently to sell my house in an uncertain market. Her knowledge of the local market is excellent and she stays current. My questions were answered promptly and thoughtfully. She also worked closely with the buyer and his agent to ensure that closing went off with incident. She also works with area contractors who provide excellent service.

In short, I highly recommend Elisabeth whether you're buying or selling.

Elisabeth was phenomenal! She made the sale in record time and was for all the way through negotiations to closing. If you want to have a professional and very responsive realtor she is the one.  Took a very stressful event in selling a house and made it almost effortless.

Elisabeth did a great job helping us find our new home and list our current home. She is very prepared and is very responsive - which is critical in such a fast-moving market!  She walked through the contracts with us so that we understood all the clauses. 

She also helped us get our house market-ready. Thanks to her assistance, we received multiple competitive bids.

From the very beginning it was a pleasure working with Kathy. She was knowledgeable, informative, and patient with our requests ( which kind of kept changing). She worked with us for 3 years looking for what we wanted through a tough market and then did an outstanding job in selling our home in 4 months. She informed us that 1 out of 10 showing brings an offer. We had 11  showing but number 10 did offer on our home and we sold. I know agents have a way things stage well but she was very understanding if I wouldn’t go along with it. Overall we worked very well together.

Kathy did a great job in helping me sell my house both in providing recommendations for how to best prepare the property and pricing. She also recommended some reputable contractors to provide services. She was a great partner walking me through all phases of the sale and has a super positive attitude.
Provided guidance to prepare our home for sale and was engaged at every step.
Wonderful experience, walked us through every step!

Kathleen was great to work with. She made the experience of selling my home an easy and stress free process. She kept me informed throughout and couldn’t have made it any easier. I highly reccomend her.

I reached out to Kathy online and she was immediately responsive and willing to schedule and show us homes as soon as we expressed interest.  She is very knowledgeable about the area and knew exactly the house that we ultimately wanted and successfully bought!  She was diligent throughout closing to ensure everything went smoothly for us.  Contacted her on a whim and so glad I did!!!
Kathleen is a very knowledgeable and kind hearted person.

Couldn’t be happier in terms of my recent experience with Kathy Thompson.  Kathy was very knowledgeable and professional.  I had not bought or sold a property in a number of years and Kathy took the lead which was critical as I am located out of state .  She was always responsive to questions and quick to communicate  what to expect.  I would highly recommend Kathy!

John and I are so fortunate to have met Kathleen.  Although we weren’t ready to make an immediate move, we wanted to begin our search for places to consider after retirement.  Southern Chester County was on the top on the list.  We contacted several realtors in the area and explained that we lived out-of-state and it would be a while before we could purchase but we’d like to learn about the area and build a relationship with a realtor there.  As soon as they heard it wouldn’t be an immediate sale, they had no interest in helping us. Then we found Kathleen.  She listened carefully to our needs, answered questions, emailed us listings, and when we were able to travel to PA, generously devoted all the time we needed to showing us properties.   Together, we found the perfect home.  Kathleen has always gone above and beyond and is a true professional who knows how to help her clients from start to finish.  If you’re in need of a realtor, we highly recommend you contact Kathleen.  Like us, you’ll be glad you did!

I first met Kathleen about 5 years ago, she was the mediator between the landlord and me at the beginning of a rental agreement of a property in PA. I always remember her words "save some money now and I will help you find an affordable house in the near future", Now she is licensed both PA and DE, and helped me finding this property. She has guided me and advise me during the entire process. Her knowledge, market expertise and professionalism are 5 stars and more. I definitely recommend working with her to find your dream home.

Kathy made my experience so pleasant and enjoyable, she is professional but also adds her personal touch!
It was a crazy market but Kathy made my experience seamless and rewarding!
She is a very caring and professional realtor.
I would highly recommend Kathy to anyone looking to buy or sell their house!
Great experience all around!

Kathy was a step ahead the whole process. There were never any surprises, except the offer coming so quickly. We've known her for years and she values people first. She is motivated to do the right thing for everyone involved.

Kathy has helped me with all of my real estate needs over the last 5 years. She has handled everything from helping me locate and negotiate a lease on a location for my expanding business, selling my farm in Southern Chester county and helping me purchase my new home in Glen Mills, PA. Through all of these processes, she has always been a great help in making sure everything was done quickly, efficiently and professionally. There were times when I didn't know who to call to get something done as part of the sale of my property and Kathy not only volunteered to help, she made the phone calls and offered to be at my home to oversee the job. She took in my house plants that had nowhere to go for a couple of weeks while I was moving - she just made everything happen with a smile! I highly recommend Kathy for all of your real estate needs.
She is wonderful.

I told Kathy we could not afford her services, and would list the home for sale by owner. After 5-6 weeks of poor to no response I relented. We signed the sales agreement within 4 weeks and were offered more than the asking price. Kathy took us through all hoops and hurdles that we could not have done by ourselves. Very nice person to deal with and very professional.

We loved working with Kathy as she truly worked as a consultant who was always making sure that every step that she took was in our best interest. She was very responsive and showed us as many houses until we found the right house. She never pushed us to make an offer and she also provided the right feedback and raised the right concerns to us if we wanted to make an offer to an house.  This enabled us to make the right decision. n nAll in all it was a great experience working with her as she is technologically savvy and showed great sense of urgency when she helped us buying the house.

I cannot say enough good about Brandon. We worked with him this past spring 2022. Because of our unique situation, we had specific requirements for a home, and Brandon worked until we found just the right one. He made himself available almost constantly to us, as the market was so volatile at the time that we needed to be able to get in to see a home as soon as it hit the market. He excels in communication and professionalism. Do yourself a favor, whether you are buying or selling, have Brandon by your side. Best realtor experience I have had by far. Thank you good sir for your excellence.
I WOULDN’T RECOMMEND THIS GUY TO MY WORST ENEMY!!! Highly unprofessional, rude, arrogant and brings unqualified buyers. VERY poor communication and highly UNETHICAL!!!
Very professional, great communication, knew a lot about the industry. Super responsive as well. Very great and easy to work with.

In selling my properties, (2 of which, were vacant land parcels, which can be very hard to sell), Hats off to my real estate agents at Coldwell Banker, Eric Brinker and
Dan Shainsky!  I had had our properties listed for sale before with different realtors, with no luck at all.  Eric & Dan have sold my 3 properties in less than 6 months (& they were very accurate when it came to predicting how much a property would sell for).  They are a pleasure to work with!!  Their professionalism, market knowledge and communication skills are A+++++!!!!   Eric & Dan always go "above & beyond", always available, helpful, and I wouldn't hesitate to work with them again or give them anything but the highest recommendation.  If you need a realtor, look no further!!

It was great working with Dan and Eric, both are very knowledgeable about the home buying process, the area in which we were looking and were super responsive. Throughout a somewhat stressful time, they made the process fun and showed us as many houses as we wished before we finally settled on the perfect one! Highly recommend :)

Dan and Eric are a phenomenal team!  I listed multiple properties with Dan and Eric and they are an absolute pleasure to work with.  They are knowledgeable, keep you continuously posted with pertinent information, client oriented and personable!  I wouldn't think about working with another agent.....ever!

Eric and Dan were awesome! 
They both helped us buy and sell a home and were incredible both sides of the process. We got our home sold in under a month! They handled all the coordination with the photographer, inspectors, etc. and even helped us find a great contractor for some work we needed done on our new home. I can't recommend these guys enough.

We were very satisfied with the services provided by Daniel Shainsky. He was very professional, easy to work with, and responsive during the entire period that we interacted with him. We highly recommend Daniel Shainsky for the real estate services he provides.
Dan and Eric did an awesome job helping us sell our house. We sold in 9 days and were so professional and guided us through the process. I would recommend them to anyone looking to sell a house.

Penny is AMAZING! She’s personable, fun and made the home buying process super easy and smooth. She was patient with us while we took our time trying to find a home we would love, and answered all our questions no matter when we asked! She was wonderful to work with, and Ill recommend her to everyone looking for a new home!!

Working with Penny on the purchase of our new home was the best home buying experience ever! She was always available to answer any and all our questions we had throughout the process. Not only was she extremely professional but also truly cared about helping us to make sure we got a fair deal. We spent so much time working together she now feels like family! I would recommend her to all my friends and family.

I contacted Penny upon recommendation from some friends and other family members that had used her services in the past. I was very pleased with her services!
From start to finish, she was a pleasure to work with. She always returned texts or emails in a timely manner, answering any questions that I may have had in the process. She made documentation signing seamless, and it never felt like there was any "work" to be done on my end, because she kept everything so orderly and streamlined due to her experience. Her photography skill speaks for itself-proper lighting in every shot and conveyed an accurate representation of the property both inside and out so that prospective buyers knew what they were looking at well before they arrived.  She worked with my pricing goals and knowledge of the surrounding area to list the home at a price that I was happy with, and she exuded a sense of confidence throughout the process that both put me at ease and reaffirm that I had picked the correct agent to work with. 
I would recommend anyone serious about getting the results they want (both buyer or seller) to work with Penny, as she really does put the wants and needs of her clients first and foremost to ensure that they get everything they want from their experience!

Penny was wonderful to work with in selling a cherished family home! She is extremely knowledgeable, professional and genuine. Penny was available when ever I had questions and she made the process flow seamlessly.. Penny's love for what she does shines, thank you for feeling the love that we had for the house as well!

I had the pleasure of working with Penny Hollis to sell my mothers home recently & I cant say enough good things about her. She provided excellent service from the beginning of the process all the way to the end. She is very personable & friendly, knowledgeable, extremely patient & tireless. The house was a hot mess but Penny jumped right in without hesitation & unbelievably, we sold the property after our 1st open house. I live out of state so Penny's help was extremely crucial in getting the estate sold. She had my back, answered any & all calls & trust me, she went above & beyond. I cant say enough good things about her & I recommend her without reservation to anyone looking to buy or sell their home.

LOVED WORKING WITH PENNY.  SHE HAS NOW BECOME A FRIEND.  LIKED HER FROM THE FIRST MOMENT.

I entered into a contract with Derek Doernbach in January 2025, and from the start, I had concerns. Shortly after signing, I expressed to Derek that I was uncomfortable and wanted to exit the agreement. I even told him before signing that I had a friend willing to buy my property for more, but he subtly steered me away from that opportunity.

Despite trying multiple times to exit the agreement gracefully, including reaching out directly and through the title agency, Derek refused to release me. He began using pressure and intimidation tactics, creating a dynamic that made me feel trapped and manipulated. Because of his continued refusal, I had no choice but to hire a lawyer and pay a $550 retainer simply to try and cancel the contract.

Even with legal involvement, Derek still refused to cooperate. Later, a second buyer, represented by a licensed real estate agent, offered more money and was ready to close, but Derek once again blocked the deal. The only time he agreed to cancel was under self-serving conditions: he demanded I take down my factual online review, withdraw my formal complaint to the Real Estate Commission, and sign a broad non-disparagement agreement, despite the original contract being expired and no legal standing to justify these demands.

I have documentation of all of this: emails, texts, the original contract, cancellation attempts, legal correspondence, and witness testimony from others involved. Derek’s behavior has caused me financial and emotional stress, interfered with multiple legitimate offers, and delayed the sale of my home for months.

This isn’t just a negative experience; it’s a warning. Proceed with extreme caution before doing business with Derek or TCB Properties LLC. The level of manipulation, pressure, and retaliation I’ve experienced is something no seller should have to endure.


This review is protected under the Consumer Review Fairness Act (CRFA), which ensures my right to share honest experiences with businesses. Everything stated is based on documented, firsthand interactions.

I had an extremely disappointing experience with Derek Doernbach. I signed what I believed was a cash purchase agreement, with no mortgage contingency, expecting a smooth and direct sale. Derek assured me this deal would close without issue. Later, I discovered the buyer was seeking financing—directly violating the terms of our agreement. When I relisted the home, Derek responded with intimidation tactics and legal threats, despite there being no listing agreement or formal agency relationship between us. Additionally, Derek presented himself as spiritually aligned with me, using language and values that mirrored my own to gain trust. I later realized this was a manipulation tactic, as his actions were not consistent with integrity or transparency. I would not recommend working with someone who puts personal gain ahead of ethics, honesty, and professional standards.

Derek did an outstanding job helping me sell my parents' home. He developed a great strategy for selling the house from day one and provided status updates regularly. Since I needed to sell the property remotely, Derek took it upon himself to help with tasks I would not have considered, from returning my parents' router, to shoveling snow, to helping with furniture sales. I would never have expected a realtor to have gone 'above and beyond' the way he did! Derek was always helpful, professional and kind. We managed to find great buyers and sold the house quickly and for a fair price. I would happily recommend Derek to anyone looking to sell or buy a home.

Derek is a true professional in every sense of the word! He’s easy to work with and he stayed with us throughout the entire process. He continued support well after closing to make sure we were happy. Would highly recommend him!
We couldn’t have asked for a better realtor.  He was always working to ensure we found our family home. Our family is forever grateful for Derek’s hard work and dedication...

Derek and I were tied to the hip for almost a year. It's been a long road to walk but he held my hand all the way. Derek was patient,caring,honest  and kindhearted he kept me abreast of all that was happening whether it was a time frame, papers to sign,upcoming house on market or a rejection of a offer I made. He looked out for my best interest always. Hes been patiently there through many of the houses hes shown me as I would say "Derek this isn't it I'm not feeling what I need in my spirit" We made it  to the finished line finally in July the house I was meant to have. Derek has been wonderful throughout it all. He will be the one to help me buy or sell my other houses for sure. I give him thumbs up all across the board.

Derek is amazing! In a challenging market he helped us find the right buyer with creative marketing strategies. Derek went above and beyond helping us sell our latest home by highlighting the new addition with a virtual tour and staging.  He navigated us through a tricking closing answering all our questions and putting our minds at ease. I look forward to working with Derek again Soon!

Derek is amazing! He went above and beyond to help us sell our latest home by highlighting the new addition with a virtual tour and staging. He was available throughout the process and answered every one of our questions putting our minds at ease . I look forward to working with Derek again Soon!

Derek went out his way to make our first home buying experience easy and smooth. Working outside of a normal 9 to 5. He was available at all times and doing things above and beyond to make everything smooth.
Excellent person to deal with
Derek was very thoughtful and helpful with the experience of selling the property.  He went above and beyond at the end,  when the numbers didn't match up,  to help with closing the deal.

Derek is fantastic!  He made buying our home a wonderful experience. He was awesome negotiating the price and keeping us informed throughout the entire process. We will definitely use him if we ever need a realtor in the future.

Derek is an amazing realtor and will always go the extra mile. He works day and night for you and can always be reached.He has taught me a lot during this process and he got me an amazing home. The most important part is that he CARES! I would highly recommend him for anyone who is looking to buy or sell. You will not regret doing business with him.
My house sold quickly and closing went smoothly because Derek was professional, patient, and attentive to all the little details involved in homes sales.

Derek was professional with both the sale of my old and purchase of my new home. Highly recommend. With out Derek the purchase of my new home would not have been impossible. Five stars all the way. Derek is more then a realtor. He treats you like family.
Great to work with, very helpful and informative. Had my best interests in hand.  Thank you for your support in selling my first home.
Very helpful explaining the entire process. Prompt from the beginning to the end. Patient showing us homes in our price range.
It was a pleasure working with Derek! He helped us find our perfect home!

Derek went above and beyond in everything he did. He was relentless in helping me search for a home. He steered me away from ones because he didn’t think it would be right for me. I learned so much from him during this process and it was all because he cared. It’s not all about the profit with him. He truly does care. I highly suggest going with Derek, he will not steer you wrong.
Amazing. Made the process seamless and so glad we were able to work together!

Derek struck a perfect balance between professionalism and adding a personal touch.

He went the extra mile. We met at his home, we met at local establishments...in one instance, he was so accommodating, we went over a document on the hood of his car at 10:30 at night with a flashlight because that was when I could see him!

Derek did an amazing job from start to finish even though we hit a few bumps along the way.  I would highly recommend him to all our family and friends.  He even went above and beyond for our autistic 3-year old to make sure she felt that our home is also her home, which included a personalized teddy bear that she loves.

Derek went above and beyond. This was our first time going through this whole process and he really helped us so much. He did things that we weren't even understanding of. Late nights weekends he was there not even normal work hours. We appreciate everything that he has done for us.

Derek doernbach was always willing to stop what every he had going on. He would take the time to show us house after house. It was a long way coming but over all I appreciate everything he did and I can't thay him enough.
Erik was an absolute pleasure to work with.  He really helped me and my wife understand exactly what needed to be done to sell our house.
Erik sold our house very quickly for more money than excepted.

We faced a unique situation, with my family in Florida and me in New Jersey. The process took longer due to the need for constant communication between my wife and me, as well as her frequent travel. This was by far the smoothest home-buying experience I’ve had compared to my previous purchases. I highly recommend Christy and would definitely work with her again.

Christy is awesome. She is unbelievably knowledgeable of the many factors involved in real estate transactions. I constantly rely on her direction. Christy is as amazing  a realtor as she is person.  From the get go she approached the sale of my mom’s family home with complete honesty while being kind and compassionate. I really enjoyed working with Christy Myers. She is very professional and knowledgable and efficient at her job. If you are looking for a realtor who is personable, professional, knowledgeable and a great communicator, Christy Myers will not disappoint!!!

Christy is extremely knowledgeable, always willing to answer questions, professional, trustworthy and goes above and beyond to market your property.   She does everything she can to make the process as smooth as possible.  I am beyond thrilled to have had the opportunity to work with her and will definitely be calling her in the future for all my real estate needs!

It was a pleasure having Chirsty throughout the home buying process. She is incredably knowledgable of the market, things to look for when viewing homes and knowing all the little details. Which made the process of buying my first home easy and comfortable. Christy's is always there to answer questions about the process, schedule showings along with endless encouragement. My favorite thing about working with Christy is she really listened to what I was looking for in a home along with the fincial aspect of purching a home. I cannot thank Christy enough for all she has done for me in the home buying process and love that even after I purchased the home she still keeps in touch and wants to follow along with the renovations. From working with Christy she is invested personally to each client and really wants the best for each client. I highly recommend working with Christy and her team!

We can’t give enough praise to Christy Myers for the way she handled the sale of our home.  She was knowledgeable, professional, helpful, and most of all kind. Christy is the consummate professional. She is a friendly and kind person who is very knowledgeable about the real estate market. She was always providing updates and responded to every question in a timely manner. I had the misfortune of purchasing a Lewes, DE home where Leanne Wilkinson was representing both sides. It was clear that she was only worried about her own interest. She misled and deceived to complete the transaction. She withheld information, breached confidentiality and crossed boundaries. She claimed a licensed plumber completed work when in fact it be was found to be completed by an unlicensed acquaintance, and she deliberately went out of her way to cover this up amongst other things. She constantly blamed both of the agents involved in the transaction every chance she could behind their backs when in reality, her own actions caused the issue. When my desire was expressed to wait for the work to be done before closing she had a fit & took it upon herself to communicate with my movers under false pretenses. She also blamed the seller for various items which have since been confirmed were not the case, in one instance it was from her lack of client confidentiality and limited ability to control her emotions during a business transaction. It’s unfortunate because my agent did a nice job but his work was overshadowed by her aggressive shady practices. I also noticed another post on here where it looks like she did the same in a very similar situation. We will never buy another home from her And wouldn’t recommend to anyone who is looking to deal with any sort of ethics and class in their transaction.

We just had one of the smoothest real estate purchase experiences ever working with Lee Ann Wilkinson Group, and want to give a special shout-out to Will Makowski. We recently bought a townhouse in Lewes, DE, and couldn't be happier with how our buying experience went. We first met Will in December '20 when he took us on an exploratory journey around Lewes, showing us around different neighborhoods, and what our money could buy in each place. Straight off the bat, he came across as knowledgeable, honest, approachable, and someone we could immediately trust. After a month of starting to work with him, he made us aware of a pocket listing for this beautiful townhome. Given that we fell in love with this house, he gave us the right guidance that helped us secure the house in a highly competitive market. Through the whole process from contract to closing, he was always available and responsible to our concerns and queries. The Lee Ann Wilkinson Group also works with an excellent extended team of attorneys, mortgage lenders, inspectors, etc, which helps make the process smooth and efficient. Hands down, one of the best real estate transactions we have ever been a part of! We highly recommend the Lee Ann Wilkinson Group for anyone looking to buy real estate in the Delaware Beaches area.

Lee Ann and her team have sold us two houses and sold our first purchased home.  They are by far the best realtors I have ever dealt with.  The transactions were smooth and professional. Lee Ann even called us Sunday evening to discuss some of the details and show her support. 

Once we had the agreement with the buyers he walked us through the rest of the closing process effortlessly. He was on top of it! If I had a question or concern, his phone was on and he had the answer. He goes above and beyond, along with the rest of the Lee Ann Wilkinson Group. I wouldn't change a thing!
Lee Ann is the best.  Extremely knowledgeable about the Delaware shores real estate market.  Very responsive and provided great advice.

We sold two homes in the last 8 months (one a rental and our primary) with Lee Ann's group.  The first one was sold before it went onto the market at full price and the process to close was amazingly easy.  When we decided to sell our primary residence, Lee Ann gave us a to do list to prepare it for sale.  It was extensive and somewhat expensive.  We did everything on the list and we were rewarded for our efforts.  We received 3 full price offers the first day it hit the market.  In the end, a 'bidding war' brought the price up which covered all of the expenses of prepping the house for sale.  Lee Ann's team went above and beyond to help with all of the details before and during the sale process.  Lee Ann expertly guided us in deciding who's offer we would accept.  Thomas B., one of Lee Ann's team, was exceptionally helpful in the sale of both houses.   Most issues/questions we had were handled quickly and efficiently by Thomas.  We are so grateful we decided to work with Lee Ann again.

Lee Ann Wilkinson Team OUTSTANDING

Just a note on our experience selling our home.  My wife and I had two previous realtors that after many months never produced so much as an offer for our home.  We then retained Lee Ann Wilkinson and her team.
Lee Ann and her team were spectacular, we sold our home in 4 days coming in higher than we had the home listed previously!!!  Right from the start things were different, Lee Ann set us up with a Katie a decorator/stager who helped us out with many ideas and suggestions.  In the office Thomas from Lee Ann’s team walked us through all the paperwork and throughout the process was there if we had questions or issues.  Thomas even connected us to a person who was able to help us with loading and preparing our move.  Taylor provided fantastic pictures and a great writeup on our home that certainly helped us get the many showings in just a couple days culminating with an offer.  We never realized the importance of things like the photos and listing details.
Once we had an offer Elaine from the Lee Ann team was there at each step getting things ready for closing and helping us with anything we needed.  By the way even the showing scheduling was done very well and kept us informed with as much notice as possible while still getting as many showings as possible. 
Reading this you may get the idea that Lee Ann didn’t do much, that couldn’t be further from the truth.  We received an offer late in the day and that evening Lee Ann, with multiple phone calls negotiated a raise in the offer by $10K.  This negotiation went into the evening and Lee Ann had her team finalize the offer and we had contracts signed and completed that very night.  
The Lee Ann Wilkinson team is simply the best and they are a great bunch of people too!  If you ever have real estate dealings in the beaches of Southern Delaware do yourself a favor and get the Lee Ann Wilkinson team, they do an outstanding job!!!

Mike & Sandy Lombardo

We recently purchased a home in Lewes, Delaware and had the best experience.   Will Makowski knew what we were looking for and found us the perfect house.  In fact, we purchased the first house we saw.   Will and the Lee Ann Wilkinson Group are professional, responsive, customer service oriented and made sure every detail was taken care of.  If you want the best team...look no further than Will Makowski and the Lee Ann Wilkinson Group.

Mark Robinson of the Lee Ann Wilkinson Group was fantastic in assisting us in finding the perfect home in Lewes, DE when we were relocating from Virginia. In our initial contact with Mark by phone, he quickly determined what our needs and desires were in a home. Mark Robinson has proven to be everything my wife and I had hoped to find in an agent: an in-depth knowledge of the market, mastery of all the processes involved in the listing of a property, and a laser focus on the myriad of responsibilities that are involved in the selling of a house. He is a patient and attentive listener, and he has the gift of being able to convey something a buyer may not want to hear (but must hear) in a direct and compassionate way. Our time working with Mark has truly been the most pleasant and productive professional experience imaginable. My wife and I recommend him highly and will not hesitate to work with him again if/when the need arises.

My wife and I started working with Will Makowski in June of 2020 in Lewes, DE.  Due to an extremely strong seller's market, finding a suitable second home was challenging. Due to his efforts, we found a beautiful home by late summer.  I am a real estate agent in a different market, and as a result, I'm extremely selective with whom to hire for a property acquisition. After having a long term relationship with Abe Lee, I knew if I ever needed to purchase or sell any real estate in Hawaii, he would handle all of my real estate affairs.  For me, having this type of loyalty to someone comes from years of trusting a person.  The transactions over the years have always gone smoothly.  It was nice to get a property sold and under contract very quickly.  Abe and I worked together to agree on an appropriate listing price.  I felt that my input was a meaningful part of decisions.  He also went beyond what is expected of a listing agent to take care of everything to get the property sold!  I was limited in what I could do since I had already moved to the mainland.  He handled everything and really all I had to do was agree and sign documents.  If anything came up in the transaction, he explained things to me to help me understand.  I'm very grateful for having worked with Abe and for having such a genuine friendship as well as how professional he is in business.  Although I've moved from Hawaii, I still have many contacts there and will always recommend they contact Abe and consult with him before making any real estate decisions.  Having a positive, possibility thinking type of attitude is really important to me and that's an automatic with Abe, a good cheerful attitude!

We had showings and offers as soon as the property was listed and it went really quickly.  

Abe has a very solid character, professional, caring, kind and understanding.  Years ago while working on another transaction, my son suddenly passed from the swine flu.  We were under contract at the time and I had left to the mainland.  It was a difficult time and I'll never forget how helpful and understanding Abe had been and it helped me through my process.  Attitude is everything and Abe's positive attitude and smile is infectious.  I remember taking my licensing classes and some of the students were difficult, interruptive and inappropriate.  Many students would be downright annoyed  but Abe always handled it with grace and respect.

Abe Lee, Shanae and associates are top notch. Very knowledgeable and extremely helpful. They went above and beyond to assist with matters that came up unexpectedly and made the connections to make sure it got resolved quickly. They always stayed on top of communication and made sure my needs were met when buying and selling our properties. Highly recommended!

Abe is a true professional. We valued his expertise and how he was personally involved in every step of the process. Most importantly Abe is trustworthy and one of the nicest most humble man I have been so fortunate to meet. I would recommend Abe to all my family and friends.

His genuine personal touch and complete understanding is not something that is routinely seen in this marketplace. There are too many things to list where he went above and beyond what most would consider the regular "call of duty". I cannot recommend Scott and his team highly enough.

Scott Adams and his team of professionals were absolutely amazing! From the first meeting to the closing celebration, I felt I was in the best hands! Being a first time home buyer is stressful, however Scott made sure I knew every little detail of the process and went out of his way to make me feel comfortable! I highly recommend Scott Adams!
