Scott has been and continues to be the best broker Iʻve ever used.  Have bought and sold several properties in Hawaiʻi and heʻs been 110% perfect.

Youʻd be crazy not to use him.
Hands down, Scott is the best.

Scott Adams and his team were always available by phone or email. They prepared us for each step of our purchase by providing us with a schedule and keeping us informed of every inspection and report. We felt confident that this house met all of our criteria. 
Communication was important to us because this was a major investment for our family. 
Scott has a vast knowledge of investments, the local community,  and the real estate  market. 
We will use his services in the future.

I am 77 years old and have sold five homes and none of the brokers could compare to Scott and his team.  I never dreamed a broker could wear so many hats and offer so many services.  If you need it done they can take care of it. We met with Scott on April 2 with the idea we maybe should move back to the mainland because of my husband health needs and to be near family; by April 15 we were on the plane to the mainland. Scott and his team took care of cleaning, discarding, donating and selling the contents. Scott gave excellent recommendations on presale improvements that would increase our profits.  Then hired and coordinated quality discounted professionals to do the work needed.  They advertised for a quick sale and attended all showings. His experience and knowledge was apparent as he negotiated offers on our behalf and comunicated with us frequently as the process progressed.  He walked us through the long distance signing of all documents on line and called or texted regularly to get our opinions and feelings, informing us of every change.  They managed escrow and attended all inspections making sure the sale proceeded smoothly and on time. As a matter of fact, we closed two days early, receiving the wired money, which was more than we expected, the same day.  Everything went perfectly from our point. I cannot think of anyway they could have improved. I would definitly recommend Scott Adams and his team to anyone.

Scott Adams recently sold a townhouse for my parents. Every rave review you read about Scott Adams is true. He goes above and beyond what you would ever expect from a realtor. Not only did he get the highest price ever recorded for my parents' townhouse he helped them prepare their property to sell by handling all repairs, updates, and maintenance that was needed. In addition to this, he helped my parents, who are seniors, move and sell their belongings. He was extremely patient and positive throughout the entire process. My only regret is that he lives in Hawaii and not on the mainland where I currently reside. I would 100% hire him again!!!!

I've dealt with Scott for all three of my real estate transactions and he continues to impress me every time. He is well connected and has a good reputation, which is crucial in this market. He is respected by other agents and his excellent communication skills help him to gain important background information. Scott also has extensive knowledge on the construction side of things, and has assisted me with my renovation after the purchase closed. His knowledge of homes is important because he can see beyond the cosmetics and will inspect the functioning of the home as well. He goes above and beyond the basics for every house he is involved with. For the sale of my home, he even did some manual labor to prep the house and save me money. On top of being knowledgeable and reputable, Scott is also very patient, kind, and understanding. He is encouraging in this tough market, and can problem solve ways to stay within budget. Scott has an excellent team and I enjoyed working with Sheryl as well. She is very responsive, organized, and easy to work with! She's been so helpful and is always available when I need an immediate response. I never thought I'd be able to own a house in Kailua, but Scott and his team made it happen for me! I would use Scott and his team again in a heartbeat.

comment: To everyone who wants to get their house sold, do yourself a favor and hire Scott Adams! Here’s why. Scott and his assistant Sheryl worked wonders on our home. Scott knew exactly what our house needed to sell. Using vendors that Scott chose, we painted inside and out and put wall-to-wall carpet. He knows the latest trends and what colors sell, so we took his advice. The result? Absolutely stunning! Our house went from drab to fab!! We had offers the first week and it sold for much higher than listed within seven days! Sheryl wasted no time in lining up vendors and stayed on top of everything. She got the house fixed and ready to go on time. She was always there and always kept us updated. Melyssa was extremely helpful and informative during the escrow process. Her communication was excellent. Thanks to the superb service of Scott Adams, what should have been a stressful situation was stress-free from beginning to end. It was a pleasure to sell our home with the fantastic Scott Adams and his team!

Scott Adams and his team are the best! They took care of every detail from start to finish. From the initial contract signing, to marketing and sales, to home description of mailers/flyers, to their personal and "aloha spirit" during open house, to the inspection process and final closing detail, they kept me updated every step of the way. They are a trust worthy team who care for their clients like their own family. I consider them my forever friends!

I would highly recommend Scott Adams, Tracy Bean, Melyssa Shimamoto and the rest of their Better Homes and Garden team.  They always work for you and will work hard to find the best property for your money.  I wanted to find a property specifically on the windward side, leaning more towards Kaneohe and could only afford a certain amount in this area.  This made it hard to find  the "right" property.  After looking for many months, they found the perfect property.  With some strong negotiations done on their end, we were able to come to an agreement and start the purchase process.  They made sure everything was done in a timely manner and they always worked hard to stay on top of everything and to make sure that your interests were always at the forefront.  I really appreciate all that they did for me and my first home purchase.
Congratulations to you and your team on a job well done, Scott!

My top choice over the many brokers I have dealt with in the past. Scott and his team are the best.
I will gladly recommend any time !

My last home purchase and home sales have both been conducted with the
expert knowledge of Scott Adams . I will continue to recommend him to my
friends and family.

This experience was the best and the worst of times. We felt heartbreak and jubilation. What sets Scott, Tracy and Melyssa apart are that they were fully vested in our successes. They helped us sell our first property in order to help us realize our dream home. When we had small defeats (at the time it felt like the end of the world), they sympathized and hurt with us, but more importantly, they were able to lift us up and give us the motivation and strength to continue towards our dream. We are now proud new owners of the home we never believed we could find. Scott Adams and his team really are the best. If you are looking for a team that goes above and beyond, then look no further. Don't put off your dreams another day. Call them now.

Scott was simply excellent. I still don’t know how we got our new property, but we did! I’m still in shock. Scott communicated very clearly all along th way, and we really felt that he looked out for our best interests at all times. It was a great experience working with him.

I have been active in real estate  for many years and Scott Adams

is among the most knowledgeable and helpful agent I have ever

 worked with.   John  Heidtke
Scott is very knowledgeable in home repair requirements and thus is able to negotiate a fair price.
Scott Adams and his team definitely helped to make this transition from selling our condo to buying a house a memorable one! They were extremely helpful and supportive.
Scott's an excellent agent with great attention to detail.  He also really went above and beyond to make sure my wife and I found the right place and that our transaction went smoothly.

When we first spoke with Scott Adams, Ra over the phone, his knowledge of the real estate market in Kaneohe is what impressed us the most. We feel Scott had our best interest in the negotiations process at all times, and he was in constant communications with us every step of the sale. Scott was very friendly to work with and addressed any and all questions without hesitation, Scott Adams is a professional and the guy who will give you his best through the entire process of selling or finding you a home.

As soon as we met Scott, it was clear that his local knowledge and his deep commitment to understanding his clients' needs are what make him one of the best realtors in Hawaii. Scott was incredibly helpful with everything from the big picture to the smallest details. He looked out for our interests and helped us every step of the way: from house hunting through key swap and renovations. For anyone looking to buy a home on Oahu (especially the Windward side), I cannot recommend Scott Adams enough.

Scott Adams and his team (Melissa & Tracy) were the BEST and most AWESOME people to be blessed with in our search for our dream home and selling of old home. Scott knew exactly the kind of house we wanted and matched us "perfectly" with the right property. He walked with us thru the financing, assuring we received the best rates. He was our eyes during the inspection because his knowledge went far beyond just buying/selling a home. Within days of closing, Scott was ready to put our "old" property on the market and our home sold after the 1st open house weekend! He and his team took care of upgrades we needed to complete before closing which lifted the burden from us doing the work. They followed the work projects, kept us updated and assured we were able to close without any delays.  

We highly recommend Scott Adam and his team.  They go far beyond just selling/buying a home. They have become "forever friends"!

What I loved the most about Scott and Melyssa was their patience in finding our dream home. Since we were not in a rush, they never pressured us in making a decision after viewing a home. We had a few medical set backs which prevented us from moving forward after making offers. They were understanding/compassionate and allowed us time to recover before moving on. We believe because Scott knew us well after a year of searching, he was able to match us perfectly with our dream home. We are forever grateful and blessed!!!

Scott really listens to your needs about the sales and purchases of your real estate transactions and what you expect.   He's so intelligent, stays up on the market, the stats, the rentals and what to expect.  He goes WAY beyond a "real estate agent".  It amazes us how he remembers everything we talk about and what we need!  He takes the "small stuff" off your plate and handles it on his own.  We love that about him.  He doesn't burden you with it.

Mel, Scott's assistant, would ALWAYS  answer her phone and texts!  If she didn't  know the answer, she would find out and ALWAYS get back to us.  

If you're a person that wants a successful, timely and professional team, Scott Adams is the way to go!

I was especially impressed by Scott's extensive knowledge of the local market, network of contacts and analytical approach, which meshed nicely with my own approach to purchasing a home. Our home purchase was fraught with difficulties and at a high risk of falling through, but Scott put in the work and carried us through the process, for which we are immensely grateful.

Scott Adams is the best realtor I've dealt with in four states.  His knowledge and commitment to providing superior customer service is unmatched.  I highly recommend Scott Adams to any prospective buyer.

Scott and his team showed outstanding knowledge of the sales potential of our property, not only with presentation of similar in our immediate area but nearby areas explaining rationale for any differences in average prices.  His eye for detail in repairs and touchups to prepare for showing was outstanding and obtained 4 offers at or above asking price at the first open house.  His team's work with us and the buyer  through escrow and closing  was easy and stress free.  We would highly recommend him for handling property sales particularly for non residents'

I cannot imagine going through a move from the mainland to Hawaii without Scott Adams in my corner. He is the consummate professional and extremely personable, He knows the local real estate market like the back of his hand, and he goes above and beyond the call of duty to serve his customers. He worked extremely hard for us to make all the pieces come together.  I not only have a fantastic realtor, I feel like I have made my first friend on Oahu.
Scott took the time to drive us around different areas to personalize our home search criteria, this saved us a lot of time we would have otherwise wasted looking at different houses.

This is my second time working with Scott, and it will not be my last.  He is everything you want in a realtor.  He will floor you with how much he knows about this island and the real estate market.  He will find you the perfect home, and he will do everything in his power to get you happily moved in ASAP.  He is endlessly patient, and always there to answer your questions and ease your worries.  You will start to wonder when he has time to sleep because he JUST. DOESN'T. STOP. EVER.  It is truly a beautiful thing to say you have the best realtor, and I know without a doubt that I do.  Scott could not disappoint if he tried.  Whenever I work with him, I know I am in good hands.

Scott was able to gain the confidence and trust from all of my family members immediately.  He is extremely thorough and took the time to communicate to multiple family members to ensure a smooth operation.  He is knowledgable and will help you come up with solutions to issues.  Trust is key when selecting a realtor and he was open and honest about all aspects along the way with no surprises.  He made this entire process worry free by coming up with potential contingency plans if initial plans did not work out.

I will be recommending Scott Adams' services to everyone I know.

Scott is absolutely the best realtor ever.  Most realtors are knowledge of the area and process but scott takes it to the next level.  He follows up on every step and has multiple contacts to simplify an otherwise very complicated process.  

Scott builds lasting relationships because he enjoys finding the perfect fit and making people happy.  I'm very glad we had scott on our team.  He made it happen.

We chose Scott Adams because we felt he would follow through on the preparation, marketing, and sale of our home. He came with an excellent presentation and credentials and understood our needs, reassuring us that he and his team would support us 100% from the  beginning to the end of the  sale  and he did not disappoint.

We would not hesitate to recommend Scott to anyone interested in a realtor who is professional, knowledgeable, understanding and honest.  His service was 5 stars in every way and he totally exceeded our expectations, going the extra mile when necessary. 

He gave us excellent advice and support  in all negotiations. 

All of Scott's staff members kept us up to speed and were very timely and clear in their communications.  Such great service!

This sale has been exceptionally smooth and stress-free for us thanks to Scott and his staff.  We would recommend Scott without any reservation for all your real estate needs.
Excellent knowledge about structure and details of what makes a good house purchase!

When I first met Scott Adams he was polite, kind, respectful, and honest. He let me know right away exactly what I needed to do to get my house up to par to sell. This is what I was looking for and this is what he gave me. I believe that many years of experience  and a great customer service attitude  is really what sold me on this man. I can't explain how well he knows and does his job.  The experience was amazing for me and my entire family with Scott Adams. I just want to thank you for keeping such a wonderful Realtor on your team and letting me have him for such a short period. He was and is the greatest Realtor I've ever known. I would gladly buy or sell another house from him when I have a chance. Scott Adams is awesome!

A big MAHALO to you Scott. Your team were really on the ball in communicating the needs of purchasing our condo. Your leadership should be commended because it shows how everyone communicated and made sure we are informed of what we need to do to make this transaction as easy and efficient as possible.

I wish I have more money so I could buy more properties with your help.

From the onset Scott Adams took away all of my anxiety of selling a home.  From that moment on, I knew that I was in excellent hands.  I had no idea that selling a home could be such a pleasant experience, from beginning to end.  Scott Adams and his team members are all very organized, helpful and nice.  They truly are a joy to work with.  I thank my "lucky stars" that I found such a great team.  I can confidently recommend their services to other people.
Excellent

Bill worked with me as Britta Rivera’s managing broker for a specific issue. There was an issue with eviction; Bill and Britta withheld tenant related information and refused to interact directly. They harassed me by withholding basic information which is against best practices for a brokerage. 

I would recommend anyone wanting to work with this Ghighi person or with Britta Rivera, to exercise deep caution and please stay away from them. 

There are a lot of substandard brokers in RE. Ghighi is a poster-person for them. 

There are lots of honest, ethical people in RE. Seek them. Bad apples like Bill Ghighi give the good ones a bad rep!

Bill handled the sale with ultimate care and professionalism. He had deep knowledge of the current market and advised us how to price the home, taking into account all the necessary factors (location, timing, previous sales). He took care of all the little nuances (pictures, staging, paperwork, etc) and made the experience quite easy for us. When buyer obstacles occurred, he reassured us everything would be fine and it was! Bill communicated with us every step of the way. Top of the line realtor, thanks Bill!

Lucy not only got top dollar for my townhome I was selling but she also went above and beyond meeting with contractors and handling things that come up so that I didn’t have to take a day off from work and drive all the way in from the city. She is very organized and on top of everything and gets back to you right away. I am so grateful I had her to represent me and her expertise in navigating the process of selling. I highly recommend her to anyone looking to buy or Sell. Thanks for everything Lucy!

I really can not say enough good things about Lucy! She is professional, thorough, kind and goes out of her way to get things done and make it happen! We went through her to sell our home (which sold in 2 weeks!) and to purchase our new home. Had an excellent experience with both! Highly recommend!

Lucy is absolutely amazing! I lived 2,000 miles away and only had one day to house hunt in my desired area and Lucy made it happen. She’s very organized and was able to get a full day of houses aligned to look at. She took my requirements and nice-to-haves to find the perfect house.

She made the process so smooth and easy. Lucy’s experience, attention to detail, responsiveness and honesty make her the perfect choice in a realtor. I’d recommend Lucy to anyone looking to buy or sell a property.

I highly recommend Lucy! She is so friendly, caring, and kept all of our wants and needs a top priority during our home buying process. Not only is she extremely knowledgeable, but she worked well beyond what was expected of her to get our house. She works with such professionalism and kindness, and did everything to ensure our happiness. Lucy is truly the best realtor!

Lucy was amazing! She not only sold our house but she helped us find the perfect new home as well.  She was helpful every step of the way and worked hard to sell our home quickly and for top dollar. She knew the market perfectly. I would recommend anyone who is thinking of either buying or selling should give Lucy a call!

Trust and speed are the most important qualities when dealing with a real estate transaction.  In working with Lucy, we experienced both.  For starters, like most, I don't buy and sell enough homes to understand all of the nuances of the transaction process- and as the laws are constantly changing this landscape, you need someone that knows how to navigate through the motions.  Lucy has this experience, and at the core of this experience shes been able to hone her ability to move through the regulatory, paperwork, and procedural milestones with great ease.  Because shes handled a consist flow of activity, with a very reputable firm, she is extremely talented in understanding her world and being able to explain the motions in great detail.  Its very easy to build trust with someone who can see blind spots before they present problems and who can move quickly through the process.  I'd recommend Lucy to anyone interested in having an advocate on their side that knows the industry, understands the strategies (both buyer and seller side), and isn't afraid to be bold on her clients behalf! 

Also- shes a very nice person, personable, and works to create an experience through every showing.

My family and I needed to find a lot of house with a less than ideal budget, a seemingly impossible task, but Lucy pulled out all the stops for us and made it happen. We stayed within our price range and the house is perfect for our needs. Thanks to Lucy we couldn't be happier about our new home!

Lucy helped me buy my first home. She is very knowledgeable and experienced and was quick to assess my needs. She was very efficient through the house hunting period and never wasted my time. She was very informative. She answered every question I had even if it was late night. She is truly a hard working person. n nConsidering that this was my first time buying a home she was very patient and helpful in making me understand the process and connecting me to the right people. Lucy connected me to my lender as well as the attorney for the contract negotiation and closing. Lucy was involved in every step of the process and took care of everything from the get go. n nLucy's biggest asset is her immense experience in the real estate market and her connections. She stands by you through the entire process - from house hunting till the point you move. I would highly recommend her  to anyone.

Lucy was so great to work with! She quickly gets a sense of what you are looking for and tries her hardest to find your match. Plus she has a great personality which makes the stressful process of looking for a house easy going and a fun time. I ended up getting a great house for a great price and   Lucy is the one to thank for the find!

As a first time home buyer I was very nervous about purchasing a home. I had heard about Steve Rollins from a friend and read some statements of high praise regarding his services. Steve replied quickly to set up a time to chat about the process and to ask about my wants and needs. Steve explained the process quite simply to me and helped me to understand what I needed to know. He quickly put my mind at ease and before I knew it I was on my way to purchasing my first home. I was very impressed with how available Steve made him self at all hours of the day. Steve always remained a step ahead of me preparing me for whatever tasks I needed to accomplish along the way. Steve was also wonderful about setting me up with trustworthy and well established contacts he had for a lender, insurance and home inspections. I cannot express how wonderful it was with my busy schedule to know that Steve was taking on all of the leg work and setting up appointments on my behalf. I was impressed with everyone Steve set me up with. Truly a wonderful experience when it could have been a nightmare. If you want a knowledgeable, patient, professional broker, Steve Rollins is your guy! I will be a client of Steve Rollins for all of my home buying needs in the future!

Steve Rollins is truly the best of the best at what he does! This was our first home buying experience so we didn't know what to expect. We were moving from out of state, so we also didn't know what area we wanted to live. We gave Steve all of this information along with our budget and he quickly went above and beyond to really get to know us. From that he gave us his recommendations on what he thought would be the best areas for us. We quickly realized, Steve has great recommendations! After we finally chose an area, Steve again quickly dove in to try and find us the right home. We received emails from him daily with homes just listed on the market. My husband and I are both busy people, so these daily emails were GREAT for us. At the end of the day we could both sit down and decide which ones we liked and didn't like, and go from there. We probably made at least four trips to Chicago to finally find the perfect home, but Steve was always so patient with us. Being first time home buyers we were indecisive about some things and homes were selling very quickly, but Steve was always there to answer any questions we had. If I can say anything about Steve it is that he is the most personable and outgoing person to be around. He's there to find you the perfect home, but he also becomes your friend! You can tell he's very passionate about what he does, and there's a reason he's one of the best! We can't thank him enough for helping us find our dream home. Will recommend Steve Rollins to any family and friends looking for a place in the area!

comment: I had a very positive experience with Steve while looking for a home. After seeing what a wonderful job he did representing my mom when she sold her house, I knew that we would also work well together. Steve listened carefully to all of my wants and needs and came back with many choices. If there was something I did not like about one property, he would take that new information to search for new property. Steve looked out for my wants, needs, safety, and financial needs while looking for a property. Steve made a potentially stressful a very fun one. I worked during the day, so Steve gladly set up all of our appointments in the evening. I would definitely recommend Steve to a friend because of his knowledgeable and professional yet friendly and fun demeanor.

Steve Rollins was our realtor in the sale of our home.  Steve was recommended to us by some friends who shared the fantastic experience they had with Steve.   We also found Steve to be the perfect choice for our sale. Steve was especially kind, honest, and patient with our many questions.  He was always available for any concerns that we had throughout, which is such a valuable quality to find in a realtor we discovered.  His guidance, knowledge, and professionalism helped us sell our home in a short time for very close to our asking price.  We were so completely satisfied with Steve's work with us that we sought him out to help our daughter in her search to buy a new home.  Steve was equally  knowledgable and helpful  in her search, and she is very pleased with her purchase.

Steve Rollins was highly recommended to us by a relative and we were not disappointed at all! He always went above and beyond our expectations, and handled everything perfectly from beginning to end. 

Steve was ALWAYS available to answer any of my questions and handle any of my concerns. He always had our best interest in mind and acted accordingly. There was great communication through texts, emails, and phone calls, and I always knew what was going on. 

I am very happy with the overall service we received from Steve. Since we live out-of-state and were not able to participate in any of the sales process, I felt very confident in Steve's ability to handle the listing of my condo on my behalf. I never had to worry about a thing! Thank you again!!

As a first time home-buyer, the process of finding a home can be daunting - trying to find a good area, a good price, and the right house. We worked with Grant Collicott of the Forney Group and couldn't have been happier. Although it was our first time buying a home, I have been through the home-buying process with my parents and knew what to expect from a realtor. Grant went above and beyond and blew those expectations out of the water! n nGrant discussed with us what we were looking for in a home and made sure that we saw homes that   were within our budget and checked as many boxes as possible. He was also very open to whether or not the homes we looked at were a good price for the work that had been done to them. Since we weren't sure what a fair price was for some houses, Grant helped guide us so that we were confident in our asking prices and our negotiations. n nHis responsiveness was almost immediate. I think the longest we ever had to wait was 15 minutes. Even if he didn't have an immediate answer, he would respond to let us know that he had received our inquiry and was working on it. n nI think the best thing for us, though, was that he was very   real   about everything. His positive attitude and laid-back, but business-like demeanor helped make the home buying process less stressful. I would certainly recommend Grant for any home buyer - first time, or fifth time!

Eric and his team helped us selling our home for more money than we ever thought possible. His patience and ability to meet challenges were outstanding. We look forward to working with him again!

When we were ready to downsize our house, we were fortunate enough to have had a former client of Jennil’s recommend that we talk to her.  She ended up both selling our house, and finding us a new home immediately once it sold. We couldn’t be happier with our experience. She is very detail oriented and did a wonderful job staging and marketing our home to sell. When it sold, she was very hands on with all of the details necessary to get the sale to closing. She truly made an extremely difficult process as easy as she possibly could. She has done an equally good job helping us with our new home. After looking for three days, She ended up showing us a house that was not yet on the market. It completely met all of our needs and we love it.  We highly recommend Jennil!!

Jennil worked with us to sell our home. We are residing out of state and she took care of everything. She is insightful, effectively marketed the home,  gave us advice and guided us through the process. She made the whole process less stressful.

Jennil worked very hard marketing not only by advertising but through her contacts and what paid off was the open houses.

I would highly recommend Jennil for the West Clay Area.

I must tell: Jennil just sold our home in the Village of West Clay in Carmel In., and did an incredible job from A-Z. In a market where luxury homes do not sell quickly, Jennil was able to sell our home quickly and did an incredible job during the entire process. I would recommend her to anyone.

Having known Jennil for several years she was an obvious choice for us as we began looking in earnest for a home The Village of West Clay.  Jennil listened to us when it came to what we wanted -- price, size, location, etc.  -- unfortunately that had not been the case with many other agents we had met as we looked for a new home.  Jennil knows the whole Carmel area very well and especially The Village.  She knew we would like the house we just purchased and she knew, while it was listed above what we wanted to spend, that she would be able to negotiate the price down to where we wanted it. nWe met some very nice other agents along the way and some did do an OK job at trying to help us.  We'd rate them in the 7 - 8 range on a 10 point scale.  Jennil is a 13 on that 10 point scale -- no one else was close.   nAnyone looking for a home in Carmel and especially The Village, should contact Jennil -- she is fabulous !

Jennil made buying our first home stress free and easy! We first met Jennil over a year before she helped us with our purchase. We weren't considering ourselves   in the market   yet, but were enjoying our neighborhood and wanted to get a feel for the real estate. Unlike some other realtors we came across while we were visiting open houses, Jennil understood our situation immediately, and never pressured us to think harder about buying a home; instead, having a home pick us. When we did fall in love with a home, Jennil showed us other comps in the area so we could ground ourselves with the idea of making an offer on the one we felt was a good fit. Throughout the buying process, she was there for us 24/7 answering the plethora of questions and concerns we had. In the end, as we sit in this new home, I am sure we made a wonderful decision and we thank Jennil so much for all of her assistance in making that happen. If you're considering buying in The Village of Westclay, Jennil truly is an expert in the area, and makes a great neighbor!

My husband and I are young professionals and this was our second home purchase within the Village of West Clay.  We cannot say enough great things about Jennil.  She was such a pleasure to work with for a multitude of reasons but the best qualities are her responsiveness (via text, email, phone, and even in person), dedication to her clients, vast network of previous clients, rolodex of trusted and cost competitive home service providers, negotiation skills, and expert knowledge of the market. She worked extremely hard to find the perfect home for us and has stayed in touch bi-weekly at the very least to ensure our transition is smooth and we're happy.  Jennil will be listing our previous home this spring.  We highly recommend her!!!

Jennil was fabulous.  She went far beyond our expectations to sell our home. I would highly recommend Jennil to anyone looking for a hard working , networking,  knowledgeable and proven real estate professional.

Once we were under contract on our new home, Dinesh stayed engaged in the process and went above and beyond for us throughout the whole process. Dinesh was FANTASTIC. Just amazing. There are so many things my wife and I loved about him. Here are a few of many:

His knowledge of the area.
His expertise in houses and what would need fixing.

Dinesh is an incredible Realtor, and I won't hesitate to recommend him to anyone I know who needs to find one.

He helped me in every steps of home buying. I fill confidence in what i am getting into , as he was not only trying to sell me a house , he was helping me to get my dream home. I highly recommend everyone to with Dinesh if you want to buy and sale your home. I am 100% satisfied working with Dinesh when I bought my current home.

i highly recommend Dinesh Gurung for house buy/sell projects especially for the first time home buyer. He gave me all the information i need and explained everything i asked for in very simple way. it was easy, fast and helpful.

Apart from the available review options, we would like to add below experience regarding our realtor "Dinesh Gurung"  . We hope this would be helpful for future home buyers (or sellers)

Phase 1: Helped us in "process of elimination" resulting narrowed down search criteria

Thanks,
Dhakal Family

Dinesh helped me buy a home at Stonebrook Meadows in Olathe, Kansas. I contacted him around a month and half ago for buying a home in Overland Park or Olathe. He worked with my budget and we were able to narrow down the list to suit my specific needs. He was always punctual and responded to all my text messages and phone calls in a timely way. He arranged for home-tours at the site and I was able to choose a house within 15 days of meeting Dinesh. The whole buying process took 50 days and Dinesh made sure that I was always comfortable during each and every stage. I strongly recommend his name to others.

Helpful and clear with words he helped us understand and describe what the areas were and the house condition and a fast responder too. He was very quick and assuring and a good negotiator so our house was sold quickly too and helped us find a new house even quicker.

As first time home buyers, Shayla was a wonderful realtor to work with. She was available at any time to answer questions or join us for a viewing, as well as give us her own educated opinion on properties we were looking at. When it came time to make an offer she was quick and responsive and when our offer was accepted she walked us through the entire process, making sure we got what we needed along the way. Her ability to act as a middleman between us and the seller helped us get the deal done quickly. I would strongly recommend her to anyone else in need of a real estate agent.

Shayla could not have been more helpful the search for my first home. She was so friendly and helped me through the process like a pro. Her attention to detail was off the charts and she was willing to show me many homes at any minute’s notice. Also, her knowledge of the housing market was superb. Will definitely use her as my realtor in the future and would recommend her if you are looking to buy or sell!

Shayla was excellent to work with in our search for a a new home. Very professional with a fun and personal flair. She shared her knowledge of the various locations we were interested in.  Very willing to advocate for us in negotiations, keeping our best interest in mind. Responded quickly to our communications. Patient and kind when we needed answers to questions.  Will definitely be calling her if we ever need another agent in the future.

We are so happy Shayla was our realtor. She was so hands on and so helpful for my husband and I being a first time home buyer. She’s so nice and and easy to talk to when we had so many questions. She helped us every step of the way with understanding the buying process and many other things. Thank you Shayla! :)
Wendy is excellent to work with.  She is kind, friendly, and a delight to be around!  I would recommend Wendy to any friend who was looking for a real estate agent.

Wendy is fantastic and did a great job of getting us the house we wanted! There aren't enough adjectives to adequately state how great Wendy is and how excellent she does her job! The entire team at Select Homes KC was great to work with and made the entire purchase very smooth.
Wendy diskin was very friendly and great to work with. Very honest and good at her job. She accommodated our every need we would highly recommend her to anyone.

Wendy Diskin is very knowledgeable, friendly and efficient. She was great to work with, especially in navigating around potential issues before they happened, so as to ease the overall process. I'd recommend Wendy to anyone!

Wendy is wonderful!!! She is very easy to work with and very knowledgeable. My husband and I were first time home buyers and she was so patient with us and helped us through the process and made sure that we understood everything. I would definitely work with Wendy again!!
Wendy was amazing. We would definitely use her again!
Thank you Wendy for the patience, and all the great help I got. I will recommend you with people I know to buy a house.

Wendy Diskin exceeded our expectations when purchasing our first home. She was truly wonderful and very professional! We couldn't thank her enough for her patience and hardwork. Definitely a breath of fresh air to meet someone who enjoys their work and shows it through kindness and enthusiasm! She's awesome!

Wendy was extremely helpful from the beginning to end!  I would refer her to everyone! Very pleased and happy and we Love our New Home! Thanks Wendy Diskin for helping me achieve my lifelong goals of owning my first home now to mention it's a brand new one!
Wendy is so knowledgeable and made the process feel easy! In our experience in moving several times, Wendy was by far the best realtor we've worked with.
Wendy Diskin was great!  She is fun and good at her job.  Wendy helped ease the stress of buying a home!

Bill Foos helped us sell our property.. He had it under contract in a few days.. Had a massive open house, which is where we landed our buyer.. He also staged the home and ultimately helped with the repairs to meet our closing deadline.. Above and beyond agent.. Can’t thank him enough.. Thank you Billy.

Top Agent in Wichita.. Classy, knowledgeable and aggressive negotiator… Billy Foos will be our go to agent in the future. If you’re looking for the best, he is it. Thanks Bill for all you’ve done from selling our property to getting us into this beautiful home..

Billy was excellent from the beginning and got my family and I into a home we never believed that was possible. He helped me every step of the way and answered every single question that came up whether it was myself or one of my infinite family members asking questions. He showed us 8 homes in one day after adding and removing homes to that list and he also added the home we ended up getting to that list. Billy had an eye what we were looking for and got us in there and hooked us up with inspectors, and a loan provider. Honestly he put my wife in a home beyond her dreams and my family which is the most important thing to me personally and Billy recognized that and got us in our home and now we are making it ours and creating memories. Billy gave us a new perspective and there’s no price tag on that.

Billy, without your help we never would have found a house.
You were there whenever we had a question or with our long lists of houses to see.  
We are thankful we had you for our agent.

My mom and I decided to sell and buy a house pretty quickly. We had no idea where we wanted to move to.  Luckily I found Billy. He was very knowledgeable about the areas we were thinking about.  Billy cared about finding us the perfect house.   He knew so much about what is good and what to steer away from.. I couldn’t have asked for a better friend to help us through the journey to our new home.

William was knowledgeable, professional, and one heck of a negotiator. We were able to get the home of our dreams with an unbelievable deal. Every step of the way William was there answering questions and made the entire process so easy

Relocation for work can be stressful, especially with only a couple months to relocate.  William lined up several homes in the area for my wife and I to look at and all of them could have worked for what we were looking for.  We ended up finding the perfect home in a great location and William was able to negotiate an offer for less than the asking price.  He worked closely with his contacts at the Mortgage and title companies to offer and close within a month.  William was always available with a prompt response to any question or concern I had on any given day throughout the process.  He made it a simple and stress free experience.  If you’re looking for a home, I’d recommend William to find it for you!

I sold my property with Billy and bought a new property. When it came to selling my property, he came in valued the property and did a walk-through and suggested all the repairs that we should make. He then listed the property and we sold it in a a few days. The appraisal required some repairs and Bill himself came out and installed railing around our front porch and painted our garage so that we could close on time, as all the contractors were scheduled weeks out. 

On the buyer side, Bill knew exactly what we wanted as we only looked at about four houses total. The home we loved had multiple offers and due to his negotiation skills, we were still able to get it under asking price, even though another offer was over asking. 

From there, he handled everything from inspections to repair request. In fact, the seller made claim that the home had a new air-conditioning unit, Bill found that error and successfully negotiated a credit for the HVAC system. HUGE WIN!!!

All in all the process was very smooth and stress-free. We were blessed with the best when we found Bill Foos.

If you’re looking for a realtor who will go above and beyond, look no further than Billy Foos. Selling a commercial/residential rental property isn’t just about putting up a listing—it takes strategy, effort, and an unmatched level of dedication. And that’s exactly what Billy brought to the table. From the very beginning, he treated this sale like it was his own. He designed custom signs to grab attention, rolled up his sleeves to help clean out the basement, and even used his drone to capture stunning aerial shots that made the property shine. On top of that, he drove an hour—multiple times—just to ensure showings happened without a hitch. His work ethic is second to none, and his attention to detail is what sets him apart. Billy isn’t just a great friend; he’s the best at his job. If you want someone who’s committed, hardworking, and willing to do whatever it takes to get the job done, Billy Foos is the one you want in your corner. Highly recommend!

You're in the perfect position to take your time. It will happen, trust me." And it did! We just love the house he found for us. It was through a private listing, and we would never have found it, if not for Matt.  He is a WINNER!  We will be happy in this home for years to come.

This is way overdue!  We have been busy with our new country lifestyle Matt helped us acquire, just exactly how we pictured.  Dear Matt, you are just wonderful. There is never an obstacle that cannot be overcome, there is a solution to any issue, there is another way (there is another house).  Matt is a problem solver. Tammy was the natural choice for us, as a purchaser agent representative.  We worked with Tammy Bernhardt previously in the sale of another home almost 2 years ago in 2018. For the sale of our home in Basehor back in 2018, we went with Tammy Berhardt after interviewing and receiving presentations from Tammy & Matt Jones, as well as, two other Realtor teams from other companies.  One of the teams was even a former colleague with whom I worked--so he and his team probably had an advantage. But after all three Realtor Teams made their presentation on valuation, process, staging, timeline, their availability, and so much more. Tammy Bernhardt and Matt Jones were a clear choice.  They sold our house in the first weekend showing at full asking price. We were on market just 2 or 3 days.  Tammy made my wife comfortable with the process (especially the 100 percent hands on staging, using some of her own staging pieces to compliment ours) and she became a real friend to us. My wife was extremely anxious about selling our home, doing this without me, but with Tammy at the helm, my wife was at ease. I had already started work half way across the country. Today coming back in less than two years and buying another house. Tammy Bernhardt was a natural choice--she is like family. We will not work with any other team because we have just grown to appreciate everything Tammy and Keller Williams has done for us in both home sale in 2018 and home purchase in 2019. Tammy Bernhardt is not just the best, in the business--she made us feel like family.

We've worked with Tammy Bernhardt over the past several years as both a buyer and seller. comment:
Since we had previously dealt with Tammy before, she did such a terrific job for us the first time it was a no-brainer to select her again.  She worked very hard for us in this difficult transaction that we had this time. Should we ever need another realtor she will be our first choice.

We just can't say enough of how hard Tammy worked to get this transaction done. Between Tammy and her assistant Matt, they worked tirelessly to assist us with getting this transaction complete. Even with the difficulties in Tammy's personal life event, she continued doing everything she could to take care of us and to ensure everything went as smoothly as possible.  And both times that we've dealt with Tammy we always felt like we were her top priority.  

Matt, Tammy assistant, was the only other person we were required to deal with in this transaction. Matt was also extremely courteous, professional, and would not have any problem inviting both them to dinner at any time.  They truly made us feel like part of their family.

Tammy Bernhardt was refereed to me by a friend, and I am forever grateful I gave her a call. With this being my first home purchase, I had so many questions, concerns, and uncertainties. Tammy put me at ease immediately. Her knowledge of the housing market in Kansas City area was unbelievable. She walked me through the entire process from start to finish with patience, support, and a genuine authenticity that is so hard to find. I could feel her passion for wanting to find me the right home the second I met her. She is simply the best. Thank you so much, Tammy!
N/A

We could not have asked for a better realtor than Tammy Bernhardt. This was our first time buying a home and she explained everything to us and was very patient. She was always available via text whenever we needed anything, which was super helpful since we both work all day and had random questions pop up from time to time. Tammy is very trustworthy and truly cared about us finding a GOOD home, not just A home. We really appreciate everything she has done and would definitely work with her again/recommend to our friends and family!

comment: N/A

My husband and I needed a knowledgable realtor who could accommodate our tight schedule as we were relocating to Kansas City. As I researched possible realtors, Matt’s name came up often as someone who was involved in numerous sales and who had excellent reviews. He has certainly lived up to those reviews. We found Matt to be very personable and yet highly professional. We appreciated his experience and the way he pointed out possible problems with houses as well as potential for resale. We felt completely confident in his negotiating skills, and he was always quick to answer questions and follow through on whatever paperwork or information we needed. We went through the whole process of buying a house in the Kansas City area with Matt, right up until the closing day, and then the house we were selling in Oklahoma (the state we were moving from) fell through at the last minute because the people buying our buyers’ house lost their funding. So we weren’t able to purchase the house here. Matt handled it with calm professionalism and helped keep us informed on the housing market here. Once our house in Oklahoma did finally sell, he patiently took us through the shopping process again. And I have to say that we had a specific set of wants and needs in the home we were looking for, so we weren’t easy clients. Through it all, he’s been great. I highly recommend him. He excels in taking care of his clients.
Very knowledgeable and professional. Communicates well and gives honest feedback.

Matt was a lucky find for us, and he was amazing through the entire process. My fiancé and I fell in love with a house we saw online, and on a whim, we asked so see it. Matt took the role as our realtor after we requested a showing through the app. 
Matt is extremely knowledgeable on all counts, and easily answered any questions we had (I had a lot). He also took the time to help us out after the sale by helping us schedule some additional services. 
Matt is very kind, listens, and goes well out of his way to help you get what you need done. I highly suggest you take advantage of his expertise!!

Top 10 things I like about Matt Kincaid, best realtor ever!

We worked with Matt in purchasing our first house here in the USA (Overland Park, Kansas).  Being new in the country, it was difficult for us to understand and go through the process of acquiring a new house.   After booking an appointment through Realtor.com, his response came right away and he set an appointment with me and my family at our convenience.  I instantly knew that he would be able to help us and attend to our needs.  He patiently explained the process of buying a house in detail and answered all of our questions thoroughly.  Despite our unique situation, he made it easy for us to find the right house.  I have listed the top 10 reasons why I think Matt is the best realtor in town.  If you are planning to purchase a house, I extremely recommend that you talk to Matt Kincaid first, you won’t regret it.
 
1. Years and years of experience.
2. Lots of connections (e.g. mortgage broker)
3. He understands the local housing market
4. Answers my calls all the time
5. Upbeat Personality
6. Honest
7. Problem Solver
8. Great Recommendations
9. Patient
10. Technical knowledge (architecture and design)

Matt was very helpful and friendly. He was always available to show me houses and help negotiate a fair price!

Wow!  What an incredible home buying experience!  We are moving from out of state and Matt took the time to utilize the limited time we had in finding the perfect house with us.  His expertise, knowledge & professionalism made all the difference.

Matt did a great job as our realtor. He never pressured us into purchasing a home that we did not seem interested in. He was very honest and up front with showings and did not disclose any information. He was always prompt when setting up showings. He negotiated into the contract a fridge and had the sellers pay almost the majority of the closing cost. He recommended an inspector that helped us save on closing costs. He then sealed the deal by purchasing us a very nice house warming gift.

No tag line or quote can really summarize the experience we had with Matt Kincaid and Re/Max!  Outstanding!!  In today's market with thousands of realtors, and hundreds of internet based real estate websites Matt delivered and exceeded our expectations.  He is definitely not just your stick your sign in the yard agent. Within a very short timeframe, we sold, bought, and finished building our new home.  Matt made the process extremely easy, and did everything he could to take care of us on both the buying and selling experience. It didnt matter if it was 7am or 9pm at night, he was always available to answer his phone or show a house.  He was not pushy in trying to get us to just buy   any house,   it was a matter of finding the right home for our family.  If there was something he did or didn't like he told us!  This is what the home buying or selling process should be like!  Thank you Matt!
Matt was excellent. His communication was excellent. He got us a great home at a great price!

Shelly was absolutely wonderful.  She was available anytime for us and was always able to answer any questions we had.  The thing I appreciated the most was that when we did our initial walk through for our punch list not only was Shelly there but so was Matt. They were even pointing out things to the builder that needed to be fixed that we didn't see.

Matt was great to work with. I do not have an easy schedule to work with, but Matt made everything possible and as seamless as it could possibly be. Matt has a lot of expertise and knows the area very well. He was able to answer just about every question I had the moment I asked. I highly recommend!

Working with Matt was a delight. He stood out from the crowd of realtors in the KC area by being organized, prepared, and responsive when we began our search. He was patient and realistic with us throughout the rest of the process - and thanks to his guidance, we ended up in a great home. We would absolutely recommend working with Matt.
Matt was outstanding. He got my condo sold much faster than I expected and at a higher dollar amount that I anticipated. Would definitely use him again.

As our realtor, Raul listened to our wants and was a very accommodating to our schedule.  he a knowledgeable guide on our journey to finding our new home.  He never was negative about a house we looked at.  He never tried to urge us into a home that we did not quite feel was right for us.  Overall, working with Raul as our agent was a blessing.
Very happy with the service Raul provides. Very experienced, understanding, professional man. I do recommend!

The reason I gave Raul a rating of 5 across the board. During the sale of the house Raul was always responsive, talking about good recommendations when needed. Raul always had our best interest at heart during the process.  Raul worked extremely hard in selling the house. I would recommend Raul to anybody that is looking for a house or selling a house.  Raul will always be on his clients side through the whole process.

Rubio Guevara lo recomendamos.  es una persona muy responsable, servicial. comprendió nuestra necesidad y nos ayudó a buscar nuestro hogar de acuerdo a nuestra nesecidades. Nos sentimos como en familia en cuanto a su servicio y comprensión a mi familia.

We decided to sell our house in Topeka four month ago after renting the house for the last 5 years. Terrible experience in Topeka renting this property. It cost us a lot of money every time someone moved out.   Our kids went to college there, college and law school.   I called my old friend Raul we did a walk through and he said boy if you like to get top price you need to do a, b, c and d.  Ok ok sounds good I will do so.  A moth later I called Raul back and I said I am ready. Well, Raul said one more thing let’s trim the trees away from the house. Ok
He went to do his work two and half weeks later house sold.  Wow and he sold the house for 30k more than what I was asking for it amazing. 
Now, paper work, making a offer, inspections and closing day. 
We leave in Wichita and Raul took care of everything via emails. My wife Dr Lopez said wow best experience ever. This was closing number 22 for us because of rentals, kids house and personal house.  This one best experience ever. Raul from me and my wife. Muchas Gracias.  God bless you and your family 
Take care
Friend.

Raul made this process so easy for us and always had our best interest in mind. We are so glad we chose him to be our realtor and would do it again in a heart beat!

We have known Raul for approximately 10 years. He helped negotiate the purchase of our home as well as the sale of our first investment property. His help was essential in both transactions. Raul's attention to detail and prompt responsiveness was absolutely crucial and responsible for our success.

Raul was a second choice as our agent in the beginning. He contacted me directly and wishing a few seconds instructed me on the process and what to look for before he even talked about us potential choosing him. He placed our interests at the front of the conversation instead of the normal sales pitch we received from other agents. That was when he became our number one choice for our realtor. Raul contacted me on a daily basis to gather all the information and took initiative to go out of he way and find the best prices in contrast to services for our home inspections and insurance selections. He gave us multiple unbiased choices for all of our home buying services and explained in detail what to look for and how to keep our best interest in the front of all conversations. Working with other realtors Raul stood out as a knowledgeable and genuinely caring person instead of a realtor looking to make commission. I will definitely be using his services once we decide to move again and friends and family looking to buy will definitely be referred to Raul. What an amazing experience!!!

Working with Raul Rubio Guevara was a great experience! Raul went far and beyond to make our home buying experience as smooth as possible and always kept us in the loop of what was happening. Raul always took the time to answer our questions and was very patient with us when there would be a few bumps on the road. Our overall experience was a very pleasant one and I would definitely recommend him to my friends and family.

Raul was excellent!! Before actually deciding to call him we were working with another real estate agent for a while. It was our first time actually working with a real estate agent . So I assumed that it was ok for my former agent to keep cancelling my appointments to view homes and when when we finally decided to put an offer on a house we would have to meet with her 2 days after and with our busy schedule it was very hard so we missed on some houses. Finally I decided to look for someone else. Therefore contacted Raul on a late Saturday and he was able to meet with us on Monday and late time too! I was amaze that we were able to write an offer that same day since we had met late to view houses we didn't finish around almost 9:30 pm but that didn't bother him. Good thing we did since there was another offer turned in that day. Raul did an excellent job in explaining the whole process. Thanks to his hard work we where able to get our dream home.  Thank you Raul!

I had tried a realtor I knew in passing from church. However, I did not feel listened to, and was encouraged to take a mortgage, although I was adamant about being debt free, and paying cash for a fixer upper. I was told what I was looking for gets snatched up by local buyers sight unseen, and that wasn't the best route for me.  I continued searching online and finding properties in my budget, but the original realtor I spoke with never assisted me. At first I felt hopeless about finding a house, then I realized, I should talk with another realtor before giving up. I responded to an inquiry on a property on realtor.com and promptly received a call from Cathy Gedeon.  I told Cathy my budget, and about three houses I wanted to view. She treated this sale for $80K with as much attention as I would expect were I purchasing an $8 Million dollar home.  I was so grateful she actually listened to me, through it all. Every concern I had she promptly answered or got the answer back to me.

Cathy worked really well with us!! She was kind, knowledgeable, patient with us, and understood our needs.  She looked out for us through the entire process.  We were first time home buyers so we knew nothing about the whole buying process.  Upon viewing the house she pointed out things that we needed to be aware of and communicated with the seller’s agent to be sure things that needed repaired got repaired.  She double checked that repairs were made, and got all the receipts emailed to her, and then sent them to us. She even "re"-requested, and double checked  one particular repair, making sure it was fixed right the second time.  She stayed in regular contact with us, making us aware of each step, answering our questions. We never felt “lost” in the process. I honestly cannot brag on Cathy enough!  Even through this whole Covid-19 pandemic she figured out how to be safe and keep the recommended distance and safety measures while still giving us our final walk through.  And although she could not come in with us on closing day because of the Covid-19 situation, she waited in the parking lot for us to come out!  She was so sweet. She gave us a nice congrats card on the new house with a generous gift card to Kroger. So sweet of her! 
I felt like she *truly* had our best interest at heart! She seemed to truly care about us and our new home, and making sure we were pleased and happy! 
My husband and I are so thankful that we discovered her on realtor.com!!!!
display_name: Nicky & Bobby Adamov, Mount Sterling, KY

comment: My wife and I consider Cathy Gedeon nothing short of a blessing. From day one, we knew she was the perfect realtor for us... personable, knowledgeable, attentive, trustworthy and dedicated. She walked us through the buying process step by step, always keeping us abreast of changing information. She took the time to get to know us personally and didn’t waste our time on homes we weren’t interested in. She treated us with respect and never made us feel like a bother. She was refreshingly pleasant, hardworking and readily available (a stark difference from the realtor we had years prior with our first home purchase). My wife and I often had conflicting work schedules but she always made herself available to us. We are forever grateful to Century 21 and their dedication in ensuring unsurpassed client satisfaction. Now, my wife and I are opening a new chapter of life, in our dream home, and are blessed to consider Cathy a dear friend.
She was an amazing help in every way I would recommend her to anybody and will go back to her if I need too
Great to work with.

comment: Jamie Gardner did an excellent job selling our home.  His up to date knowledge of the market, professionalism, and communication were second to none.  He made the selling process as seamless and stress free as possible.

Jamie was absolutely amazing to work with. My husband and I connected with him in early Spring, just to start the conversation about buying a house. We ended up purchasing late summer, moving in early fall (all of 2016). As first-time home buyers, we were unsure of how everything worked, what questions to ask, where to look, where not to look and everything in between. Jamie took the time to educate us, walk us through the process and take us on the journey of finding our first home. He was patient when we were excited and wanted to see all the houses out there, allowing us to find what we did and didn't like (even though he knew which way we'd lean!). He helped guide us towards the houses he knew we'd love, and steered us away from those he knew were just not right for us.  When we finally found the one, we all knew. When it came time for the craziness of everything that happens after the accepted-offer, Jamie was excellent when it came to communicating, educating and keeping us sane! The process of purchasing our first home was an excellent one and it was definitely due to Jamie's passion for his profession, his care for his clients and his willingness to go above and beyond to help people find the perfect place to call home. I would absolutely recommend Jamie for anyone who is even just thinking about buying a home – we couldn't have asked for a better partner.

We were on a hurry to find a new home and found several of interest. Sherry took us to all three and added pro and con comments about each. We made a decision and made an offer that was rejected. We waited and the seller came back a 2nd time with a counter really close to our original. Sherry helped line up inspections and treatments to help us make sure we were making a sound investment. Working with Sherry was a pleasure.
Sherry helped us all the way through this sales transaction, and kept us informed of any snafus that occurred along the way.  She will be assisting us with future sales transactions we have coming.

Sherry is the BEST!  She is very professional, very caring, very attentive, everything you'd ever want or need in a realtor.
She of course also sold my house fast! Wouldn't have anyone else if I was to ever need another realtor! Thank you Sherry! Your the best!
Sherry, was real easy to work with, she always took my calls and would always help in anyway that she could. I would recommend Sherry to anyone looking for a home

We had the best realtor Sherry Walkins she’s very liable,  honest, trust worthy, patient, knowledgeable, experienced, professional, always with a smile on her face. She sold her home September 2022 , we bought our new home February 2023. The process was smooth easy with Sherry Walkins by our side! 
If you’re looking to buy or sale a home, look no farther, Sherry Walkins is the best realtor that is known, Give Sherry a call she will be glad to answer any questions that may arise. Thank you very much for everything you have done for us. We love our home.

She literally made a nightmare into a dream come true and we could not have sold our house without her; she's GREAT and we recommend Sherry for and to everyone!

You can't go wrong if you choose Sherry for your realtor; whether it's selling, buying, or like us, both with Sherry! :)

I can't say enough about how wonderful Sherry is. She's knowledgeable, approachable, flexible, hardworking and compassionate! I would recommend Sherry hands down to anyone in the market for a home (buying or selling.)

We used to live in an area where homes are very expensive and agents work VERY hard because they make a lot of money! When we came to Ky. we thought it would be the same. We buy and sell houses for a living. And in 8 years we have used 4 different agents and talked to more than 50! We have NEVER been happy with any of them!!! Our expectations are very high because of the agent we had in Washington. But just talking to Sue Ann over the phone we knew things would be different! She was exactly what we had been looking for. We will continue to buy and sell houses, but we won't have to look any further for a good agent to help us! Sue Ann is the very very best!! Believe me, we have experienced them all! Some promise to do good and then they never even show up!!! And you still have to pay them $5000 to do nothing!!! Don't use anyone else but Sue Ann! I am not being paid to say this and I never knew her personally before our home buying experience. She is just outstanding and deserves the praise for her hard work!
Sue is so sweet and helpful when it came to selling my house. She’s very knowledgeable and is a great agent. She really knows what she’s doing!

I received calls from Sue Ann as late as 10 PM when necessary.  We were very happy with the painless execution of the sale.  We would recommend Sue Ann to anyone.

Amazing! Never stopped working to get it sold, literally went above and beyond. Always kept in touch and kept me up to date on everything. Best realtor experience I've ever had and I would HIGHLY recommend her to anyone!!

over the years i have sold many properties and i can say without a doubt that sue ann stevens is the best agent i have ever encountered and she is even a better person who really cares about her work and the people she is working for. 
sue ann stevens is absolutely the BEST. i would HIGHLY recommend her if you are looking to buy or sell a house in her area.

We met our agent, Sue Ann Stevens, by randomly calling her about a house that we wanted to know more about, she was very knowledgeable and personable. She helped us through every process and we are so thankful for her! She is an amazing realtor! 

She showed us many houses and never complained. She was always willing to reschedule our appointments if we were busy, and she was always friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable about all the houses we went to look at. We are so happy with the house we bought, thanks to Mrs. Sue Ann Stevens.

Sue Ann Stevens did a great job being very flexible to our needs. We live in Illinois and we're looking for a vacation property. Sue Ann found the place we ended up purchasing I just a few weeks.  She got us the information we needed so that we could make an informed decision then went the extra mile to assist us in moving the process along. We found here to be courteous and very kind.  All she did made us feel like long time friends not just a client.  Thanks to her again for all she did.
Excellent real estate agent.  Sold out house in 1 week!

We were so grateful for Sue Ann's help and expertise during the process of buying our first home. She was knowledgeable, helpful, and attentive to all of our needs and concerns. She was always professional, but she also treated us as friends, in that it was obvious that she really cared about our family. It was a pleasure working with her.
Did a great job!

Sue Ann Stevens is fantastic!  She really worked with us on what we wanted and needed and even helped with things we didn't realize we needed to look into!  She put up with us calling and texting her for updates and handle our impatience very professionally.  I would definitely use Sue Ann again in the future and I recommend her all the time to friends!

Mark was a pro when I hired him to sell a rental unit. He priced it perfectly and ended up with 6 offers at the end of the week. He handled notifying the tenants that he would need to show it on Thursday and Friday. By Monday we were already in contract. His advice was spot on and he clearly had my   best interests in mind. n nDuring the inspection period there was a new issue with the property that came up and Mark didn't miss a beat on helping negotiate through it and even called the contractors to help schedule repairs. I will continue to use Mark for all my needs in the Louisville area.

Tracey sold me that house, and we used her previously to sale another home back in October of last year. We live out of state so we needed someone who was reliable and had good judgment. Tracey help me find a contractor to help with repairs and get it ready to sale, she talked me through the process. It was priced well. In both instances, we had offers within days of them hitting the market. Tracey is the best realtor EVER!! Thank you Tracey!!

We first worked with Tracey in 2012 when she represented us when we purchased our home. We were so impressed, we asked her to represent us when we decided to retire, sell and move out of state. Two weeks after we signed on with her, we got a great offer and we were on our way.  Tracey worked with us and kept us informed every step of the way. She is personable, professsional, and we highly recommend her. Tracey knows the area, she knows the market, and she will do her best for you.

Jennifer Morgan helped sell our old home and find our new home.  She was knowledgeable and always quick to respond.  In the process of selling our home she gave valuable tips to sell our house. We truly appreciate her and the job she did!

Jennifer Morgan made selling our home so easy. She took the time to really understand our situation and guided us through the process with great integrity.  We faced several hiccups along the way with our property and she always had our best interest in mind and happily guided us to our closing day!
This is the third property I have sold with Jennifer Morgan and I recommend her to everyone I know. She is such a joy to work with and I would never consider using anyone else!!

Jennifer provides prompt and accurate responses to our questions even when they are outside of traditional business hours.
She provided advice and guidance that allowed us to make our decisions with confidence.

There are a lot of details and things to consider throughout the buying/selling process.  Jennifer provided the information we needed, quickly and accurately, to allow us to complete each step along the way with confidence and without delay.

Jennifer is a positive, competent and professional representative of the Semonin company.

Overall experience with Jennifer was very professional but also fun to work with. Would recommend her to anyone.

Words cannot describe the excellent experience my fiance and I had with Jennifer. I can't thank her enough for everything she has done for us. I would absolutely recommend her to anyone in the Louisville area!

Could not be more pleased. Jennifer is simply the best. She knows how to get your property sold quickly, efficiently, and for top dollar. She helps manage expectations every step of the way. She is an elite realtor who knows how to get the job done. Fantastic.

Jennifer was amazing to work with! Her professionalism, attention to detail and willingness to go above and beyond exceeded our expectations. She made the purchase of our first home as easy and painless less as possible or. I will use her on any future purchases and can't stop recommending her to all of our friends and family!

We would highly recommend Jennifer to anyone buying or selling a home.
We love her! She's the best!!

Jennifer Morgan was enjoyable to work with during my 1st time home buying process.  I found her to be efficient, accomodating, and professional. Jennifer Morgan made the sale of our Louisville home as painless as possible!  She is readily available, easy to talk to, and genuinely interested in what she can do to help.  I definitely recommend Jennifer if you are selling your home.  We had multiple contracts in less than a week!
