comment: Jennifer was wonderful!
she always supplied the information I wanted in a timely manner, very dependable and hard worker enjoyed working with jennifer

We recently sold and purchased a home with Jennifer Morgan as our realtor. She was recommend by someone else and we gave her a shot. I'm so glad we were introduce to her because she helped make the entire experience so much better. Jennifer is a very professional and high energy realtor. She knows the Louisville area and surrounding areas very well and was so helpful. We were very impressed and would definitely use her again and recommend her to anyone looking for a good realtor.

Jennifer Morgan was so great to work with. She was friendly and made us feel very confident in her abilities. She always responded to our needs in a very quick manner. Jennifer clearly knows the area and what to expect for selling a house. We were very pleased with our final price on selling our home and how quickly we were able to sell it. She was also a huge help in helping us to find our lot and builder we are using to build our next house. We couldn't have done it with out her! We highly recommend you trust Jennifer with selling or buying your next home.

Jennifer was great to work with, was very supportive and able to give her insight/advice based on her experience in real estate. The pictures of the house were great and a true asset in the sale of our property. She was easy to reach at all times/days.

All aspects of working with Jennifer were amazing!!! We appreciated her tirelessly working to find the perfect home for our family. She is funny, kind, and patient. Jennifer Morgan is absolutely wonderful! Her witty and relaxed demeanor made our home buying experience so enjoyable. She patiently showed us countless homes, always taking time to talk with us about our needs/wants in a home. She was professional and had a great eye for details. 

You can't go wrong choosing Jennifer Morgan as your realtor!
Jennifer is extremely knowledgeable and very efficient

Jennifer stood out immediately to us because she listened and her approach was very professional and all about business. We would recommend and have recommended Jennifer because she makes everything simple. Selling and buying a house is about as a stressful as it gets and she takes the load and runs with it. Jennifer understands the market and understands her clients needs and limitations which is why we ALWAYS recommend her to anyone selling and buying a house. She also made it fun, her energy and enthusiasm is infectious.
Thank You Jennifer for everything you did for us you're the best!

I don't have anything bad to say about Jennifer Morgan at all. She was very professional very reliable very knowledgeable and overall a wonderful fit for our buying and selling experience. I would highly recommend her to my friends and family and think that she went above and beyond the call of duty to help us with our sale. We appreciate her efforts and would never use anyone else if we bought or sold a house in the future.

Jennifer Morgan is simply the best any issue you may have she will get you an answer no matter what she made my first time home buying experience a breeze I would have zero hesitation about referring her to my friends or family

She was so helpful. Would use her again if we were looking for a home.

Awesome

Lovely person
Jennifer is a complete professional and she was a pleasure to work with. She is definitely committed to exceptional service and I would enthusiastically recommend her.

I've had the privilege of working with Jennifer Morgan previously with the sell of my house.  She is very professional in all aspects of the buying and selling process.  I will defiantly recommend and use Jennifer in the future.
I would recommend, and have recommended, Jennifer to others. She is very friendly and personable! She also listens and considers YOUR needs.

Jennifer as been said through the survey did an excellent job selling the property for the bank. She was always on the spot with suggestions on price as well as reductions. The deal was closed and that was the end of that. 

Jennifer is a delight to work with.
display_name: Floyd B. Smith River City Bank

comment: I absolutely loved working with Jennifer to sell my home. Having been inexperienced with selling a home before, we were very nervous and unsure how to handle the entire process. Jennifer was so amazing at guiding us through the process and made it so easy for us to trust her to explain to us each part of it. She was always reachable, always willing to answer questions, and always seemed very professional and experienced. It's also interesting how you notice things when you are going through certain life changes. For instance, when it came time for us to look for a new house for ourselves, we spent several hours looking at listings online. I would notice things in the listing pictures that did not make the house look very appealing and that I felt like my amazing realtor, Jennifer, would have prevented us from making those types of mistakes. Jennifer's tips and advice were so helpful and we were able to get our house sold in just over two weeks, which was far quicker than we expected based on it only being a two bedroom. We would hands down recommend her to everyone we know!!

Jennifer always does an excellent job of keeping you informed of what is going on in the process. She clearly explains what to expect next throughout the process.  Another aspect I like, she is available whether through email, phone or text, quick to respond with accurate information and always answered my questions. She is very friendly and professional.  From start to finish I couldn't be happier with Jennifer.

Jennifer Morgan is professional, polite, and organized. She knows real
Estate and she's a real people-person. I'd never use anyone else to sell my house.

Jennifer was extremely patient, positive, and upbeat even when my wife and I weren't.  There was a small market for us having a large family, a single income especially with us wanting land and a house big enough for our 6 kids and within our price range.    After missing out on a couple houses, due to some bad luck, Jennifer worked even harder to help us find a place that was perfect for us.  Jennifer was not just our realtor during this process but also a coach, a problem solver, an encourager, a shoulder to lean on, a listening ear and end the end a dear friend.

Devin is THE BEST hands down! She was very knowledgeable, professional and responsive throughout the entire process of selling my house. She was excellent at communicating with me and encouraging this first time home seller. She works extremely hard for her clients and treats them with utmost respect. I would HIGHLY recommend her for any real estate needs and will definitely call on her again should the need arise.

Devin is by far the most patient and helpful person. She helped,  added he suggestions and made sure we were happy. Never pressured us or rush in in any way. I'm sure we were annoying at times. From distant, day long trips looking or arranging us to see future homes with other associates. Devin always delivered! Dealing with roads curvy enough to make a child nauseous, we always had a good time with Devin!I can't say thank you enough.For anyone in the market to sell or purchase, Devin is the girl to get you on your way.

She is the best one!! She is amazing person to work with she makes sure she answers all your questions that you have no matter what it is!!! She is like a really good friend if you need her, she is there!! I couldn’t ask for anyone better. I would recommend her to anyone who wants to buy a home!!!!
Devin is a fantastic real estate agent. She is very knowledgeable in every aspect. She goes above and beyond for her clients!
Devin brought us multiple offers on our home before she was even able to get it advertised. She’s absolutely amazing!
Devin is a go getter & dedicated at getting the job done!
Devin is very knowledgeable in the field. Would recommend to everyone. Doesn’t mind to answer questions or offer help anytime needed. Very professional!!
Very friendly and helps in anyway she can!

Devin went out of her way to help with my house hunting adventure.  I am moving from out of state and she helped make my visit perfect.  We had 2 full days and saw everything I was expecting.  She has knowledge of the area and the builders.  Highly recommend.
Devin is the best realtor in the state! She will work with and for you, to help you find the perfect home!
She is awesome, if I could give 10 stars I would, don’t look anywhere else if you want a realtor that knows what she’s doing and gets it done.
Devin went above and beyond for our family to find us a home that fits our needs. I highly recommend.

When you are looking to purchase a home you are already stressed out, Devin was able to help alleviate that stress with her knowledge of the area and the process in general, She is a very easy person to communicate with and she kept us updated without having to inquire.

I highly recommend Devin.

Devin is an excellent real estate agent. She is incredibly knowledgeable about all aspects of her work and makes all home buying processes much easier! Devin maintained her optimism when helping me do everything I needed. She moved quickly when we did and now we are super excited about our new steps moving forward. Devin is above and beyond what you can hope for in an agent! I highly recommend her!

Devin was PHENOMENAL! We lived 3 1/2 hours away, so us driving up to see houses was extremely difficult with my husband’s work schedule. But every time we sent her a house we were interested in, she was on it! She really paid attention to our likes and dislikes & would inform us if the house was worth the drive or not. She has no clue how helpful that was to us. We couldn’t have picked a better realtor. We are so thankful for her and all of her devotion in finding us the PERFECT home!
Devin is very personal, attentive (quick to respond to any messages) kind and pleasant! Highly recommend her with out a doubt!! She went above and beyond since I live out of state.

Devin made the home buying and selling process extremely simple and easy for us. She was eagerly wiling to show us houses whenever we asked several hours away at no hassle. She is very knowledgeable and made us feel comfortable throughout the entire process. If I ever may need to seek and buy again I will 100% be using Devin.

Devin is THE BEST hands down! She was very knowledgeable and professional throughout the process of selling my house AND was very patient and encouraging of this first time home seller. She was always very responsive to any questions I had and was excellent at communicating with me throughout the process. She works really hard for her clients and treats them with utmost respect. I would HIGHLY recommend her for any real estate needs and will definitely call on her again should the need arise.
Bought my first home with Devin a couple years ago and I’m excited to be using her again as we sell our home!

Devin was AMAZING through the entire process of shopping for a house, the offer, and close! She always got back to us as quickly as possible when we had any questions or concerns. This was our first home purchase and we were lucky to have someone like her because of how smooth and easy she made it. She even hired someone to help clean the house before we moved in! She is absolutely incredible and I am so happy we chose her to help us buy our home.
Devin was there for me throughout the whole process from start to finish while selling my house. Cannot recommend her enough.

Devin is such a wonderful agent! She responded to all of our messages promptly, answered all of our questions with care, got us in for showings quickly, and helped us every step of the way. She even gave us a very personalized closing gift which meant so much to my wife. You can tell she really cares about her clients and what they want and need. If you are looking for a down to earth, knowledgeable, caring agent, Devin is who you need!

She made the process extremely easy on us (we lived 3 1/2 hours away at the time of looking to buy) and made sure all of our wants in a home were checked off! Once we found “the one,” she made the buying process a BREEZE! ❤️ Highly recommend her. You’ll never find a sweeter soul.

Devin is the most amazing realtor to ever work with, she went above and beyond any expectations in assisting me to sale and buy. From being outbid and just searching all over she never got tired of me and always said Bobby, We Got This!!!

She doesn’t just try to sell a house, she helps find you a home. If you’re ever in the market, reach out to Devin, you won’t be disappointed!
We absolutely loved Devin. She bent over backwards to make sure we were happy with our new home. I would absolutely recommend her to anyone.

Me and my wife were 100% satisfied with Devin. She ever had a repair done on the house that was not her responsibility at all but she felt bad because the seller didn’t do it like he was supposed too. She did everything she could to make sure that we were happy with our new house.

Devin is a sweetheart and is on the ball anytime we had any questions at any hour she answered them she was thorough with everything that had to happen she had our house sold overnight we appreciate you Devin you are the best 💞 I give Devin 10 Stars

Devin is by far the most patient and helpful person. She helped,  added he suggestions and made sure we were happy. Never pressured us or rush in in any way. I'm sure we were annoying at times. Dealing with roads curvy enough to make a child nauseous, we always had a good time with Devin!
I can't say thank you enough.
For anyone in the market to sell or purchase, Devin is the girl to get you on your way.
Devin is by far the best. Hands down.  SO patient with us.  Ready to help whenever we called or needed her.  Just all in all. A wonderful experience!!!
She got ‘em and my family in a home within a month and no down payment! She is such a sweet loving woman! She has such a bubbly and outgoing personality! Amazing work!❤️

Devin went above and beyond and got it sold in ample time.  We had a few hurdles, but she wasn’t afraid to get her hands dirty!  She is very responsive and professional. 100% recommend Devin for all your real estate needs!

I have waited till the perfect time to write this review. DEVIN has absolutely made my year! She pushed harder than any person I know along with my mortgage company just to make my dreams come true! She went above and beyond and made sure all my babies could be together in our new home for christmas. This is the first of many Christmas in our new home. Thank you Devin for being you. You strive to make each customer feel special, you accommodate and look for things about each one of us to make each sale their very own. I woukd 10/10 recommend her to anyone!!!!
Devin was great to work with while searching for my home. Every question that I had she answered very quick, even late at night took my phone calls. Would highly recommend Devin to anyone.
Devin was a great realtor!!  Easy to work with , and a great person
I highly recommend working with Devin! She’s so knowledgeable, friendly, and communicative!

Throughout our buying and selling journey, Devin has been incredibly patient, responsive, and supportive every step of the way. She went above and beyond for our family—during showings, she would even play with our two-year-old so we could truly focus on the home. Her knowledge of both real estate and Madison County is unmatched, and it made all the difference for us. We’re so grateful for Devin’s guidance, care, and expertise over the past three months!

Devyn is amazing! So patient with me and my first time home buying experience. Always there to address my questions and concerns day and night and walk me through the process step by step without expressing any kind of frustration or aggravation and so friendly and easy to chat with! 10/10 recommend!

I was recommended to Devin by the best loan officer in the business Kyle Best.  Devin is Joanie-on-the-spot on everything!!  We looked at multiple houses on many days and she was always there ready to help us find our dream home and answered soooo many questions we had as a first time home buyer.  We saw some great houses and some that only looked great online and she never got discouraged after we turned many houses down almost immediately.  She kept us motivated to keep looking and after 1 failed offer and many houses we finally found the one!  The entire process from start to finish took slightly over a month.

Best realtor in the business!!  Definitely in the area lol! Thank you Devin!  We are forever grateful for your time and advice.

We had considered selling our property before, but the market and timeframe just never seemed to line up.  When our friends that owned the property next door listed and sold over ONE weekend (plus had others already asking about our property), it seemed too good to be true.  We just had to meet this realtor that we had heard so much about.  A couple weeks later, Bob Sophiea had our property sold as well, and we couldn't have been more pleased with our experience!

Bob was both the listing and the selling agent for the unique property that is now our “forever heart home”. He captured our interest with his breathtaking advertising of this property.  After viewing the video and pictures of this stunning gem, there was no way we could not “see it in person”! The house is a 150 year old, 5000 square foot, brick historic home. It’s nestled into the edge of a major horse farm and the views from almost every window are picturesque. Bob showed us the house on a Monday evening and we made an offer the very next morning.

We were skeptical at first, thinking that Bob could not possibly protect both our interest and the sellers. Oh my, we were wrong. He went over and above any expectations of an agent.  We truly feel that we would not own this beautiful home if we had used any other agent to represent us.  This home was also the seller’s heart home. Bob worked seamlessly with both us and the seller to make this the most amazing house buying experience. We would highly recommend Bob Sophiea to family and friends. If we ever needed to purchase another home, we would only work with Bob Sophiea as our agent. However, we will not need to think about purchasing another home.  Bob found the right home for us, the first time around.

Bob has an aggressive personality. That sold me. I wanted a realtor who worked for me not someone who would have an open house and wait for a buyer. I say all of this and you can think it is BS. But he sold my house in 24hrs and got 5k over asking. 24hrs sold meant I didn't have weeks of showings and weekends of open houses. I have a wife, two kids, and a dog. That meant a lot. I interviewed 3 realtors and all but one told me I wouldn't get asking price.  Then I recommended him to my friend and he sold his house too. So good luck with your realtor selection process and selling your house.

We tried to sell our home with other realtors, even tried selling it by ourselves.  Then Bob came in, told us he would sell our house in a week. We didn't believe him. And it turned out he was wrong. HE SOLD IT IN 24 HOURS! He was wonderful through the whole process and was always available. Couldn't be more pleased with our experience!

From beginning to end at closing table Bob Sophiea is 100% professional. He sold a rather hard to sell old two story for me in record time. He has sold several historic homes in my small town of Paris, KY.  I had previously marketed the property with no luck. Bob came in and got the job done leaving me to just drive to closing! I would recommend him whole heartedly 110%. Do not hesitate because he may not be "local" to your area. He makes himself available and studies to learn about your property. Bob Sophiea is who you need to call if you wish to see a sold sign in your yard. I could not be more pleased.

Bob was continuously helpful and knowledgeable. He was always available to discuss options and provided very clear and precise information. I would highly recommend asking Bob to be our realtor again.
Bob was great! Stuck to his plan and made sure he kept us in the loop throughout the process

comment: He was everything I could ask and then some i reference him every time I hear people talking about real estate

Bob Sophiea did a STELLAR job quickly finding buyers interested in our home, and negotiated top dollar for the sale of our home.  We were able to sell our home within a week of meeting with Bob, and sold it for $10,000 over our planned listing price!  

Bob is not only professional, he is very down to earth and was a pleasure to work with while making such big decisions in our life.  He's a wonderful listener and makes understanding your needs and goals a top priority.  He's super knowledgeable about the market, and is very helpful in giving advice on improvements to consider that add value to your home before listing.  Best of all he's only a phone call away when you need anything or have any questions!

I can't say enough good things about his team either!  Blake, Debbie and Taylor were  spectacular.  They were there to help us every step of the way!  They made the entire process as hassle and stress free as possible.

Bob and his team did a specular job with our sale.  They generated excitement before it was listed, produced a great video that was viewed over 4500 times and got us $10k more than we had originally projected.  
They understand the importance of an on-line marketing campaigning and how it will sell your house faster and yield more profit.  I did my research before choosing a listing agent, and did not find anyone within the Lexington area that markets this way.  They are, with out a doubt, the most progressive marketing agency in the area.

Bob and his entire staff were fantastic during the sale of our home

My wife and I had been considering a move for over a year. As we were very particular with respect to our needs, we did not find a single listing we wanted to make our home. Then it happened. In a market where desirable houses sell fast, we found our new home. Bob Sophiea was the listing agent. His service was outstanding. We had no prior knowledge of Bob Sophiea. or New Home Collective, but the marketing strategy that Bob employed resulted in 21 legitimate offers in the 2 days the house was on the market. We found this so impressive that we chose Bob Sophiea and New Home Collective to market our old house. Bob, and his team, sold it 8 days later for $10,000 over our asking price.
That being said, the reason to hire Bob Sophiea and New Home Collective is the vast connections they have. We were given access to independent contractors for every aspect of moving. We were very pleased with the people Bob Sophiea recommended.  Hire Bob Sophiea and New Home Collective.

I met Rhonda Speaker through a friend. I had no intention of stepping out of my realtor group and using someone else. Rhonda asked me if I minded if she sent me a few things so I could see the availability in the market. She did just that for over a year....she slowly built a relationship of trust. She was never a nuisance, only helpful. When I decided to get information about possibly selling my home of 20 plus years.....I called her!  She has been knowledgeable... consistent... helpful.....understanding....very much a professional. She also listened to what I wanted to do and made a plan. There were no hassles at all, and I work 60 plus hours. She made it very comfortable and easy to do business with her. This was an extremely emotional move and she gave me space for that. Her authenticity, integrity, knowledge in her field, won me over. She was easy to be transparent with, about the sale. Her word was impeccable....when she said she was going to do something she did it! Buying a house is easy, buying a home takes communication and fact-finding.My house sold in 2 days and the closing happened within a few weeks. WOW! She went then another step and help me to find a temporary place for 18 months. I have already ask her to help me with my final move, my last home!!  I trust and respect her work ethic and her character. I will refer her to anyone looking for a residence, as she has earned me as a client and a friend for life. I am a business owner of 30 years plus, and this type of service does not exist in this microwave world! I appreciate and Thank you Rhonda Speaker for not giving up on me! Thanks to you,  I had a great experience!!!!

Best Regards, 
Pamela Bishop
Looking to sell,buy,or both Rhonda Speaker is who you want on you team. She will be there every step of the way and will see that all your needs are taken care of 100%.

Rhonda was amazing during the 7 months after our initial meeting until I came down to look at houses. Here is what makes Rhonda special:
1. Rhonda was very well prepared.
2. Excellent communication skills. 
3. Not pushy or trying to sell me just any house. 
4. Very personable. 
5. When I had a question or was looking for feedback Rhonda was on it right away. 
6. Rhonda kept me in the loop when my bid was accepted and repairs had to be made with me back in Illinois. She sent me all the repair receipts as to what was accomplished. 
7. When my internet account was canceled two days before my close I was to have overnighted documents. Rhonda assured me things like this happen occasionally. I overnighted and Rhonda was so good at easing my stress level during this hectic last few days as I did not attend close. 
8. I would highly recommend Rhonda to any new or seasoned home buyer or seller. She has all the attributes I was looking for and made the process a positive one.

Our experience with Rhonda was very pleasant and professional.  Rhonda answered
questions promptly and handled all of my 
requests in a timely fashion. Your company should value Rhonda highly as she is a real asset for you.

Rhonda was most helpful in scheduling inspections for me as I was an out of state buyer. Her help was instrumental in our having a pleasant and productive experience at Semonin Realty. Rhond' s professionalism was quite a comfort for an absent buyer.
WONDERFUL JOB!!

She worked very hard to help us find the right house. Always available to show us different houses. She was very smart in showing us just what we were looking for. She gave us very good advice on different properties. Always positive and never negative about what we were looking for. She gave us her honest opinion about different things. I would recommend her to everyone who is looking for a new place to live. For a great friend and realtor ask for Rhonda Speaker.

Rhonda helped us locate a nice property as an investment and she worked hard to help us from contract through closing and beyond.  She is friendly and thorough.  We are very satisfied with all she did for us.
Rhonda did a great job for me and I would recommend her to my family and friends.

Rhonda was very professional, she was available whenever i needed, and always willing to do whatever necessary, she was pleasant to be around, and to talk with. I would highly recommend Rhonda to anyone seeking to purchase a home!

Due to illness, we moved out of the area and left Rhonda Speaker with the sale of our property.  she not only arranged for the sale of the property, but also the closing by using the internet.  She always kept us up to date on everything and was very helpful.
   I feel that she is very honest and trustworthy.  I highly recommend her.
Met Rhonda at one of her open houses.  She was quickly in tune with our needs time constraints. She was very pleasant to deal with and we would use her again.
We found Rhonda to be very knowledgeable, professional, and patient. Also,  she consistently went beyond the call of duty in providing timely assistance with a variety of issues.

Kelly came recommended from a family friend.  We had previously used her to find a home a few years back and decided to use her to sell our home in walker when we were in need of a larger home.  She was very responsive with texts and calls and was easy to get in contact with.  She came and photographed our home 2 days after contacting her and brought the paperwork to intent to sell at the same time.  She explained everything thoroughly and had our home on the market the very next day.  We had 4 showings on the first day it was listed and a full price offer the very next day.  She was in contact with us and the potential buyer often through every phase of the process ensuring everything went smoothly w the inspection, financing, and closing process.  She personally came to the closing and congratulated us as well.  Kelly went above and beyond to make sure we had a fast, stress free experience.  She also helped us at the same time find another home that was perfect for our growing family.  We went through 3 contracts before we finally got a home that worked for us.  She was hardworking and dedicated and wasnt deterred by the issues we had with the first 2 homes.  Always available and responsive to every question and problem I had.  I would highly recommend her and her agency to anyone buying or selling.  We our very happy with the results that we got.  Thanks again Kelly Cox.

I truly enjoy working with Joann and Kelly on all my real estate needs. They really pay attention to my needs, my wants, and most importantly my budget.  I will continue to use them because they are more than just realtors, they are my friends. They have your best interest in hand and get you the best deal for your property whether you’re buying or selling. Very professional & caring!  Thank you ladies.

Cathie was great to work with in the sale of our property.  Very knowledgeable and experienced in the real estate business, current market, the process and procedures.  She is very responsive and great with negotiations.  We enjoyed working with her.

Cathie has it going on. She is knowledgeable about the real estate business/market. Cathie is professional while being understanding and compassionate. With a great sense of humor, she gets the job done.

This experience of buying a new home was the best one I have ever had.  Cathie cares so much about her clients.  She is always available to answer questions.  Cathie showed us as many properties as we wanted to see.  She always told us that “you will find the right one when you walk inside the house and it will just feel right!” Boy, was she right! Her knowledge about the real estate market and all of the information associated with buying a new house is remarkable! We are so happy that she worked so hard with us in helping us find our forever home! Thank you to Cathie and EZ Realty!
Wonderful lady works hard

Cathie is absolutely fantastic to work with! She is always warm, personable as well as knowledgable and always professional. She moved quickly to get the offer in and as we were intially buying from out of state- she went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable about the house and area.
We could not ask for better and will always use her.
Cathie was very knowledgeable about the seller's market in the area of my property. She guided me through every step of the process and helped me negotiate issues with the buyer's realtor.

Cathie helped us sell our home and purchase a new one. She was very professional, and gave us a lot of great advice throughout the process. She was extremely easy to work with. She definitely made my husband and I more lax.

My overall rating for Ken is a 5+.  He always goes above and beyond as an agent.  Selling a home is an emotional task and he has a calming character.  He always responds quickly and is eager to work out any issues even if he has to get his hands a little dirty.  Agents like Ken are hard to come by so if you have the opportunity, don't pass him up.
Transaction between K2 Realty and the Golden Group at ReMax.. Everything went smooth as silk...  Recommend... A++

A great experience.  Maria and her team did an excellent job and went out of their way to help us through the home selling and buying process.  The home selling process can sometimes appear chaotic to the novice.  Maria and her team provided us with professional services from our first contact to list our home all the way through closing.  Thank You.
Maria was incredible!  She was extremely patient with us and always looked out for our best interest!  We could not have found our perfect house without her!

Darren James is more than a realtor, he genuinely cares about the needs and desires of his clients. I have specifics that I want in a home and he deeply respects that. He's not pushy or bossy. He always has so much concern and compassion. He is "THE BEST IN THE BUSINESS. Let Darren James help you Buy or Sell your home today, you will be glad you did. I sure am glad.
Professional, ethical with client first mentality!  10+

It was an absolute amazing experience working with Ms. Karamales!  She went out of the way to focus on us and our needs and she has an incredible knowledge of the area.  She is easily the best agent I have ever worked with!
Terri was absolutely wonderful to work with. She's very professional and knowledgeable. Very kind as well. Anytime we had questions or concerns she was very helpful. Definitely do recommend.

**Outstanding Review for Terri Levesque**

I recently had the pleasure of working with Terri Levesque as my real estate agent, and I cannot recommend her highly enough! From our very first meeting, Terri impressed me with her extensive knowledge of the market and her genuine passion for helping clients find their perfect home.

Terri took the time to understand my needs and preferences, guiding me through the entire process with patience and professionalism. Her attention to detail was evident at every step, from researching properties that fit my criteria to negotiating the best possible deal. I felt supported and informed throughout, thanks to her clear communication and timely updates.

What truly sets Terri apart is her unwavering dedication to her clients. She was always available to answer my questions and provide guidance, making what could have been a stressful experience feel seamless and enjoyable. Her insights and advice were invaluable, and I always felt like I was in capable hands.

Thanks to Terri's expertise, I found my dream home in record time, and I couldn't be happier! If you're looking for a knowledgeable, reliable, and truly caring real estate agent, look no further than Terri Levesque. She is a true gem in the industry, and I am so grateful for her exceptional service. Thank you, Terri, for making my home-buying experience a fantastic one!

I had an exceptional experience working with Terri. She was flexible, hardworking, and incredibly helpful throughout the entire process. Despite the challenge of purchasing a home sight unseen, she made me feel confident every step of the way. Her dedication and attention to detail were remarkable, and she took the time to ensure all my questions and concerns were addressed, even with the distance between us.

What truly sets Terri apart is her flexibility. She worked around my schedule, accommodated my requests, and went above and beyond to make sure I found the perfect home. Her professionalism, coupled with a genuine desire to help, made what could have been a stressful process incredibly smooth.

If you’re looking for a realtor who is reliable, dedicated, and a pleasure to work with, I highly recommend Terri. She exceeded all my expectations, and I couldn’t be happier with my new home!

Terri is the absolute best! She is understanding, knowledgeable, kind, and an industry expert in her field! You will not be disappointed with her service! She is a flexible as you need her to be to fit your schedule. She has a calling to do what she does everyday! Thank you Terri!

Terry was so professional and easy to work with in this overwhelming process. She answered all of our questions, requests, and concerns. We made the best decision to work with her and will continue to use her in the future. 💕

Terri first gave us directions on what we needed to update to get the house ready for the market. Once she listed it she kept me informed of all steps which allowed my type A personality to not go insane. She knows the market and got the house sold in less that two months.
Not only did she sell our property but she sold out our project there.  We've worked with Terri for multiple deals and she is our go to in Northern Louisiana

Ms. Levesque, was outstanding.  I am truly blessed to have found her to be my realtor.  Very professional and prompt on all actions.  When I decided on a house, she was unable to reach and get a call back from the builders realtor.  She tracked down the builder information and called him directly.  She had the builder meet us at the property and we worked directly with the builder to close the deal.  She ensured we both (seller and buyer) understood what should take place during the process.  I greatly appreciate her willingness to go above and beyond her call of duty, to ensure I found a home I am happy with.  If you are looking for an agent you can trust, that has your interest at heart, Ms. Levesque is what you are looking for.  Thank you, Terri, for all of your hard work.

Terri is not just a real estate agent to me she is a wonderful friend who goes beyond her job description she’s amazing at what she does, very professional, and her dedication to her clients is admirable.  Thank you so much in getting the highest price we could get for our home. We love you.

I am incredibly grateful to Terri, our remarkable realtor turned dear friend. Terri not only demonstrated exceptional professionalism but also fostered a deep and meaningful friendship throughout the process. She understood that our house at 9 Fairway held a special place in our hearts, and she approached the sale with sensitivity and empathy. Terri's expertise, practical advice, and strategic approach ensured a smooth and successful sale, while always recognizing the emotional significance of our home. Beyond her professional capabilities, it was Terri's ability to connect with us on a personal level that truly set her apart. Her genuine care and understanding transformed the transaction into a journey of friendship and support. Terri, your professionalism and friendship have left an indelible mark on our lives. Thank you for recognizing the value of our home and guiding us through the process with such care and compassion. I recommend her to anyone, and she is forever our go to realtor!!! Thanks Terri!

Terri always communicated with me and had my back during the whole process.  She will grind for her clients and is the best real-estate agent I have ever worked with.  I don’t write many reviews but, Terri did me so solid I had to make sure other know.  Thanks for being so professional and making the process so easy!

Then again in 2022, I called Terri to sell my home!  She took care of me as always!  Terri has a beautiful personality and such energy and drive, w a lot of patience.  She’s my go-to professional real estate agent!

This was my second time having Terri as my selling agent. She truly provides the best service when it comes to real-estate.  talked me through the entire process while patiently giving sound advice. We had a minor hiccup with our first offer, she lead the way correcting the issue and getting another buyer within the next week. I would recommend her to anyone buying, selling or interested.

Terri was a phenomenal agent to work with. She's a true professional who worked hard to meet my needs and find me the perfect house. She was there through every step of the home buying process and whenever I had questions. I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for an agent.

“I was very pleased with her services, she went above and beyond to make sure that my needs were meet and I was completely satisfied. She had no problem guiding me through the total process. Ms. Levesque was great throughout the entire home buying process!  Always ready to go when you need her and connected with many resources and service providers that could help you on your journey. I look forward to working with her again in the future!

Terri saved me!  I was lost in 'FSBO (For Sale By Owner) land'.  Terri made life so easy for me - took on every obstacle without flinching.  Always professional - always personable - always a joy to talk with and deal with.  Terri understood my needs (more so than I even did) and went above and beyond to fulfill them at ever turn.  I can't say enough good about this lady.  Very very very much one of my favorite people!

Working with Terri was the best experience as a first time homebuyer! I did not have to worry about anything but having the funds and finding the house for me. Even a month after moving in, Terri still checks up on me and my house!

I can't say enough about how FANTASTIC this lady is.  She helped expedite the sale of my house - took on everything that had to be done - all I had to do was deposit my proceeds check once it was all done!  This was my first time selling a home - Terri made it such a positive experience.  

Terri, I can't thank you enough for everything you did - ROCKSTAR!
Terry Leveque is the most genuine person you can meet   Professional. Sweet and dedicated to the process of selling your home thank you forever you will be m realtor.

Could have not chosen  a better person to represent our side.  She is very knowledgeable and definitely goes above and beyond.  She started out as our realtor when we bought the home in 2020 but became a lifelong friend (family).

She definitely knows what she is doing.  Went above and beyond to meet our needs.  She advertised and knew what the market was doing abd made sure we got the best deal on selling our home.  If we ever move back to Louisiana,  she will definitely be our go to person.
Ms. Terri made it happen. Through all the obstacles we had to overcome, she did absolutely everything she could to sell our house for us. So thankful for her.

Terri Levesque is the very definition of professionalism. From the first day we met to discuss listing my home, she was right by my side providing all the information I needed every step of the way. She exudes patience, kindness, diligence, and a thorough knowledge of the real estate market. These qualities make Terri Levesque the PERFECT choice for anyone looking to buy or sell a home.

From start to finish, Terri was great at finding me my first house. She was able to get me a highly sought after house through great negotiating. A pleasure to be around, and extremely professional, I recommend her to anyone in the Shreveport / Bossier area.

I emailed Terri at 6PM on a Monday night & she responded to my initial email within an hour. She called me the next morning to get the ball rolling & I was approved & under contract for my home in 8 DAYS!!! She was incredibly kind, extremely knowledgeable about the market, & extraordinarily patient with me as a first time homebuyer. Buying a home can be so intimidating and she eased my concern at every step - going over every detail with me. If you are looking for a home - Terri is the realtor you should work with. She went above and beyond, exceeding all my expectations. 100/10 HIGHLY recommend.

Terri was an amazing realtor. She was on top of everything from the beginning and made the whole process painless. She made sure I was happy every step of the way! I would definitely recommend her to anyone looking to buy or sell their house in the Shreveport area.

Sean Gerowin along with Jason Riggs represented us as a seller. They tried to manipulate us into making choices that disregarded our specified wishes, choosing their own interest's (selling at all costs) over ours. They badgered us via text, email and over the phone if they didn't like a decision we made. They bullied us and tried to pit myself, the co-sellers AND the buyer against each other and drive a wedge between us and our lawyer by giving misleading and conflicting accounts to each of us. He refused to act on our EXPLICIT wishes or take our decisions as final. Without our consent they contacted our lawyer and ran up HUNDREDS OF DOLLARS in lawyers fees even after we had specifically and repeatedly asked them not to contact him. They never apologized for any of that nor offered to cover the lawyer fees that he took the liberty to incur. They frequently presented even the most benign decisions with arbitrary time limits that they alone created (i.e. "You have 24 hours to..."). Yes, the house sold but I felt completely demoralized by the end of the process. I considered filing a complaint with the realtor's association, but I'd rather just erase the experience from my mind and move on with my life. Thanks guys, let me know if you'd like me to forward my attorney's bill to you.

Jason helped me navigate the home-buying process with ease and professionalism throughout the hottest seller's market! And it took a lot of time (a lot!), patience and rejected offers to finally land the perfect place. I can't recommend him high enough as he was there with great advice at every single step. 
Oh and he had helped me sell a property previously in super smooth process as well. 
100% recommended!

Jason is top notch. He has an encyclopedic knowledge of New Orleans buildings, a keen understanding of the market, and always listened to me and my wife when we did or didn't like something (he put US first, as opposed to his hope to make a sale, get a commission, etc). He's friendly and warm BUT also knows how to play hard ball when it comes to negotiating. Without Jason we would not have our house that we love with pretty much everything we got. HIRE. HIM!

Jason worked with me to sell my property at 2323 Iberville St New Orleans. I was not living in the USA and was concerned about making sure that all aspects of the lead up to the sale and the sale itself was taken care of properly. It was a complicated business as early on while trying to sell the property contamination was identified on the site and I had to have that cleaned up before I could close the sale. Jason liaised with the firm doing the remediation and was very thorough in communicating with me to make sure that everything went smoothly. I found Jason to be very professional, courteous and friendly and was happy to offer his opinion when asked.
My experience with selling this property was very smooth and easy particularly in light of how complicated and bogged down it could have been. I would recommend Jason to anyone wanting to sell in the New Orleans area.

Jason was our realtor for the sale of our house in Gentilly. He was knowledgeable, helped price the home fairly and for the best possible outcome. We ended up getting 4 offers above asking price and Jason answered questions when we had them about the pros/cons of each offer. The listing looked great, and the broker tour was very successful. I highly recommend working with Jason. He was friendly and quick to respond to any questions. I can't recommend him enough.

Jason was not only knowledgeable and experienced in everything that came our way with the sale of our home, but he also had an impressive skill for translating that specialized industry knowledge into layperson language we could understand. We valued his dual professional and personal perspectives as a seasoned realtor and homebuyer. In all of the complications inherent in home-selling, he was responsive and supportive every step of the way. We were located in a particularly hard-to-price, ambiguous area of the city with few comparable sold homes, and Jason priced the home perfectly to get us top dollar and a quick sale. He was a staunch but fair advocate for us throughout the process!

I worked with Jason for over two years, first as my agent on our rental property, and later when we decided to sell. He's a great guy. Unlike some realtors I've dealt with he is a straight shooter, and has his clients best interest in mind. Also, super knowledgeable about the New Orleans market and nuances of specific neighborhoods, and the value of historic homes.

Highly recommended!

Beverly was spot-on during every step of the home buying process for us -- a process that we had not faced for 36 years. We were rusty but she quickly got a feel for what we were looking for and zeroed in on homes to show us. She made every minute of our scouting trips to the Cape from the Boston area worthwhile and helped us ask all the right questions. We also learned how home care on the Cape (septic systems, no disposals, self trash disposal) would be differnt from our Boston lifestyle. She pointed out Sandwich amenities (places to eat, shop, entertainment, library). When we decided on a house in Sandwich, Beverly, a long-time local, who knows everyone, was able to give us reliable, detailed info on our neighborhood, services... well pretty much everything. At every step she kept us on track with paperwork. We are so pleased that Beverly was on our home-buying team.

Choosing a knowledgeable, professional, and reliable realtor is a daunting task, especially on Cape Cod where it seems selling real estate is everyone’s second career. After several interviews of realtors to sell our home, we met Beverly and knew she was the one. We are grateful for having the good fortune of working with Beverly Comeau on two separate occasions, selling our home and buying land for our future home. She exemplifies everything a buyer or seller could hope for in a realtor, and we give her our highest recommendation.

We have known Bev for over 10 years she came highly recommended and did not disappoint.  We used her for two house purchases and she is excellent.  Returns calls and gets every detail completed.  She gives great advice and is fun to work with

Beverly is my absolute hero. I was moving cross country and told her I had to sell my condo ASAP. She suggested I just concentrate on my move and she would sell my condo after I left, which ended up saving me a whole lot of stress and time, and it was very thoughtful of her. I left everything in her capable hands and she made the whole process so easy for me! She stayed in close touch, handled any issues that came up, looked after my condo, and was so supportive every step of the way. I let her know my priority was selling as fast as possible - and that is what she did. The sales price she calculated was perfect and I had offers right away. She really worked her magic. She did all of this during the COVID-19 outbreak, by the way, to give you an idea of how hard she works. She really goes to bat for her clients and goes above and beyond. And to top it off, she is such a pleasant and warm person, and I really enjoyed working with her and I am beyond glad I chose her as my agent. Beverly is spectacular and is highly recommended by so many people because you simply can't do better.

I would highly recommend Tara.  Working with Tara and her partner Susan has been a terrific experience.  Tara really knows the market and dialed into what we were looking for very quickly.   She is super responsive and insightful And respectful of our time and constraints.  .  She isn’t afraid to give her honest opinion but doesn’t push her point of view.  Feels like having a true partner in the search.   When we hit snags in the final walk through she helped us navigate and had our backs.  Her partner Susan has been invaluable in helping us understand the community, navigating what we need to know about schools and local resources.   They don’t disappear after the closing - they really care about where we are landing and helping us feel welcome in our new community.  They both go above and beyond and we felt like we were one big team through the whole process.  Can’t recommend them highly enough.

Tara is the best! Because of her, we were able to buy our dream home! She was able to find this house for us and put it on our radar as soon as it was going on the market. She knows everything about Hingham and was able to provide expertise throughout the whole process. She was responsive and kept us in the loop every step of the way. When it came time to negotiate (and her knowing how bad we did not want to lose this house against the other offers) she provided guidance and exact reasons on what we should offer and why to ensure we would have a great opportunity to close the deal. I would highly recommend working with Tara for buying or selling any house on the south shore.

Tara's superior knowledge, ability, and hard work resulted in receiving multiple offers, within a few days of listing, and the house sold above asking price. She did extensive research to price the house correctly and her talent at staging truly showed the house at its best.

We found Tara to be very dedicated, approachable, warm, caring and a joy to work with through the entire process. She gave a great amount of time to take care of every detail. We plan to turn to her for all of our future real estate needs. She is simply excellent!

We had an exceptional experience with Tara.  Over the past years, she has helped us buy two homes and sell one.  She knows every aspect of the market and is the best real estate agent we could have asked for.  Her knowledge and expertise in negotiations is what sets her apart.  Tara was always there when we needed her and never made us feel rushed.  She is a no-pressure type of agent, which allowed us to find the right home at our own pace and feel comfortable throughout the entire process.  I would highly recommend Tara!!

My wife and I knew we wanted to work with Tara before we started our house search, based on the experience of two of our daughters who relied on her for the purchase and sales of their homes a few years ago. Based on their experiences we felt confident that we would have a strong and collaborative relationship, and we were not disappointed. From start to finish, Tara went above and beyond the call of duty, helping us navigate a potentially stressful process. If you want a skilled and professional realtor, look no further.

She also got us the price we had asked for. Not only did our home sell, Marianne helped us buy our new home that we are in now.  She got the price down for us in this home. With the help of Marianne you should be out of your old home and in your new home very soon.  Good luck!

Choosing Corinne Fitzgerald as our realtor was a "no brainer" as we already knew of her expertise in the real estate business.  
     Corinne was a "go-getter" from the start of our house selling process. She advertised for us in the newspaper, a magazine, mail out cards, online, etc.  We were impressed with how Corinne set up open house times for interested individuals and included light food and even warm cider during chilly days.
     An important priority for Corinne was to keep in contact with us through every step of the way. No piece of information was too small for us not to know. 
Corinne gave us excellent advice and we followed it, and as it turned out, she was always "spot on." Corinne is creative and clearly knows what she's doing.  
There were times when I thought Corinne was doing much more than I thought was needed to sell our house.  Corinne was emphatic when she explained that she will do  what is necessary to sell our house. She's very smart.

She was extremely respectful of the current residents and was able to convey my feedback about them to prospective buyers of this 4-family rental unit.
Corrine did everything that anyone could expect before during and after the sale.  We would recommend her to any and all.  The best!

Corinne and I worked well together to sell my home expeditiously.

She is confident and knowledgeable about the entire process of Real Estate transactions, the Market Area, and Buyer and Seller needs.

A pleasure to work with.

Corinne Fitzgerald was very positive and understanding throughout this process. Corinne  and her team at the office were able to help us understand each step along the way. She also lent us her moving truck to assist in the move. Thank you so much we have already started recommending you.

Because Corinne Fitzgerald had sold a house for me in the past, I knew that she was extremely knowledgeable about real estate in Western MA and beyond. She has a professional demeanor, while also being upbeat and energetic. She is prompt and thorough in her response to our requests. And she was patient with the range of houses we wanted to see. Negotiations is another area where Corinne shines. We were always confident in our dealings with her.

Corinne was present at every inspection. She has been here for many years, and has a keen eye for the issues of older New England homes. 

I've always admired Corinne's involvement with professional organizations, and the politics and policies of real estate and how they impact our area. We knew we were in good hands at all times.
She taught me a lot.

Corinne gave the best, most realistic presentation with a real plan moving forward.

Largely due to Corinne's pricing and marketing strategy the house sold in one day and closed in less than thirty days. Outstanding!

I was very impressed with every aspect of the sale.

Corinne did an outstanding job from start to finish and would highly recommend Fitzgerald Real Estate to anyone selling a house.

I felt very comfortable working with Corinne. I gained a lot of respect for the sales process, her knowledge of and attention to the many details that I would otherwise been unaware of. In spite of a disappointing outcome financially, I found the overall experience enlightening and appreciate Corinne's guidance. I think it took a lot of patience on her part to help me see my initial expectations were unrealistic given the current market.
Corinne is very professional and well organized. Very pleased with our experience working with her.

Corrinne was recommended through my mother. Corrine is known in the community as an amazing realtor and that she really knows the area well.

Corinne stayed on top of everything that needed to get done and made sure to keep us in the loop at every step.

This is our second time working with Corinne Fitzgerald and Fitzgerald Real Estate for a home search and purchase. Corinne is an expert and patient guide. Purchasing a home is a big deal and twice now she has helped us find just the right match, even taking time to show the homes when our extended family (and support system) were available to join us. This time the purchase process was complicated and lengthy, and we were so thankful to have Corinne guiding us through the process. Without her we might have lost our mind along the way! She is very accessible and responsive, and her team is equally great to work with. We didn't even consider working with any one else, and can't recommend her highly enough. In fact we've just referred a close friend.

After living in my home for nearly 30 years, it was a tough decision to sell. But once I made the decision, it was easy to decide who I wanted as my real estate agent: Corinne Fitzgerald.

She had sold my mother's home several years before, and I knew Corinne professionally from my work for a local newspaper. Her reputation is stellar, and I knew she would handle the emotions of this sale as she did with my mother's home: with respect, patience, professionalism, compassion and kindness.

Corinne knows the market, so she priced the home appropriately, presented it accurately and had an offer in less than a week. She advised me throughout the whole process, was accessible and communicative. Knowing she was advocating for me, I knew there was no need to worry.

And she attended the closing with me, which was much appreciated.

She handled everything that came up and made sure I was satisfied each step of the way. I would describe her performance as my realtor as "flawless."

Corrine clearly understood my goal with this property. We wanted a cash sale  and the seller took slightly more than our initial offer. I was very happy. Actually Corrine was more happy and surprised than I! Haha it was a great wxperi nice and I absolutely trusted Corrine to get it done and she did. Efficiently. Hopefully someday the house is done and ready to be lived in! If I have it my way I’ll never move again but if I had to my first call would be to Corrine without question.
Always available to answer questions and address concerns.  Listened to our thoughts and understood what was important to us.

When we began considering selling our home, our letter carrier told us that Corrine Fitzgerald had sold his house, and he had been pleased.

After meeting with Corrine the first time, we felt that she knew what she was doing, and throughout the process she was always open to what we wanted, also. We never felt negative pressure from Corrine.

Corrine always made herself as available as she could to answer any questions we had and made sure we had the information we needed to make decisions. She was always polite and friendly and made sure to ask how we were doing throughout the process. Corrine's knowledge of the local market and her many years working with the businesses and people in Franklin County were a great asset.

We have already recommended Corrine and Fitzgerald Real Estate to several families!

I trusted my attorney's judgement who highly recommended Fitzgerald Real Estate. 

Corinne Fitzgerald was very professional during the process of selling my house, especially in helping me with my needs and meeting the very busy schedule of showing the house to interested buyers.

Corinne Fitzgerald was in constant communication with me either by text, email, or by phone for the really important information. With her screening of interested buyers I was able to sell above the asking price and close all in 20 days.

I had an important and some minor last minute issues with the house, Corinne jumped in and took care of everything including some hands on work requested by the buyer.

Corinne was amazing. She always exceeded our expectations and we trusted that she always had our best interests at heart.

Corinne had several members of her office come tour the house so they would have first hand knowledge of features. No other agent has ever done that before and it was such a small thing but made a huge difference for us.

We felt that Corinne had a critical understanding of both the uniqueness of our property, and the digital (internet, social media) buyer behavior of the marketplace.  She put together an excellent marketing plan that worked out well for all of us.

Corrine Fitzgerald did an outstanding job of guiding me through the entire process of listing, showing and ultimately selling my home. She was sensitive to personal circumstances that developed during the listing time period. She has, and continues to work hard to find a new property that is suitable to my needs.
N/A

Clearly every customer is important to Corinne.  Service was outstanding.  She is reliable, punctual, honest, hardworking and fun to partner with on a project that can be, honestly, frustrating at times.  I give Corinne the highest possible rating.

Corinne put in an unbelievable amount of her own time and effort to help me to coordinate with local contractors, plumbers, handymen, electricians, inspectors, etc. to fix up my property.  She never complained and kept me feeling positive.  Corinne was a God-send!

Fantastic experience.  Super firm and a wonderful individual!!

comment:

My husband and I would highly recommend Fitzgerald real estate!

More importantly, she pointed out other properties I should see before making a final decision to make an offer. After I made my offer and it was accepted, Corinne got me through the closing process fast, which was critical to my situation. Corinne went above and beyond to make sure everything worked out for us. This is the second time using her services and have recommended her to friends and family because of her expertise in the real estate field, attention to detail and making the buying/selling experience positive.

comment: My situation was a bit tricky due to my lack of finances and my needs due to both physical and emotional considerations. Our experience with Corinne Fitzgerald and Fitzgerald Real Estate was outstanding.  We had a challenging and complex property to sell and Corinne developed an excellent, successful, approach to marketing it.  Her day-to-day performance was professional and timely.  Her management of offers, negotiation, inspections, contracts, escrows, and closing were fantastic.  Her, and her office's, handling of digital marketing efforts had great reach and were ultimately successful.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend her and her office to others!

I have used Corinne Fitzgerald for multiple transactions on several homes and one commercial property. Her sign was very unique and classic  - it didn't scream out like a used car dealer. I researched her and saw how active she was in the field with the Chamber, the county and state - I liked that - it meant her knowledge of the area would be excellent. Moving from to Franklin Co from outside the state I really wanted someone who could share historical insight on neighborhoods and life in the area - Corinne blocked off time anytime I needed her. Her energy, honesty and depth of knowledge really won me over. I talked with other realtors by phone and email and they never came close to the warm, friendly I got from her. I really enjoyed working with Corinne.  I had worked with her when selling a property a number of years ago, and she was my first choice when I needed a realtor again.  Corinne is very friendly and she really helps walk you through the steps of buying and selling a property.  She has a lot of experience and I trusted her advice.

Awesome agent, would highly recommend !!

Tory has a strong network and a well-coordinated closing team (Team Tory) that made the entire process hassle and stress-free.  In addition, Tory also introduced many useful local contacts to us for home maintenance after closing as we start to settle into our new home.  We highly recommend Tory to any potential buyers!
Tory is the best, most attentive, responsive realtor.  She is always professional, always on time and does everything with a smile on her face.  I would and have recommended her to everyone I know.
Tory was amazing to work with.  She answered all our questions and knew the area very well.  We feel very confident that we have found the right house.

We are so grateful to have been connected with Tory for our home purchase. From the moment we met, she was patient, kind, professional, and overall enthusiastic to help us find our next home. We weren't worried about a single step in the process. Compared to our first home purchase, working with Tory was a dream. While we hope to stay put in our new home for a long time, without hesitation I would ask Tory to help us sell/buy our next home. You are in wonderful hands and should have full confidence working with Tory!

We had a wonderful experience working with Tory Keith and Board and Park in the purchase of our Natick home this spring. We ended up serendipitously learning about a house that was For Sale By Owner, a situation new to us that made us somewhat uneasy. Tory provided expert guidance, knowledgeably answering every question, giving sage advice about how to handle our offer, and calmly reassuring us as we moved through each step toward closing. Her long history in Natick and comprehensive knowledge of the market played a significant role in the success of this process for us. Being the only realtor involved in this transaction definitely created more work for Tory, but she handled all the details in a timely and detail-oriented manner. She also provided invaluable recommendations for vendors and resources to access as we settled into our new home. We recommend Tory without reservation!
We loved working with Tory. She is professional and very experienced person. We would recommend to take her advice during your house hunting journey. It helped us a lot with finding our dream house.
