We could not have been happier with our experience as a whole, and it was Tory who made it all possible.  She went above and beyond in so many areas of this transaction and her responsiveness in our communications was always informative, knowledgeable, friendly and most importantly quick.
I would highly recommend Tory as well as Board and Park to anyone who asks!
Working with Tory was a pleasure, she was very professional,very knowledgeable and very responsive to my needs. I would definitely recommend her services to friends and family.

Tory was great! As first time home buyers, we had no idea what to expect. Tory answered every question we had throughout the process and made us feel comfortable when we were out of our comfort zone. Our expectations were set accordingly and when we needed her most (during a holiday week no less) she was there taking care of business for us. We will look her way should we ever need help in the future.
It was a pleasure working with MaryBeth.
It was a pleasure working with MaryBeth in the sale of our house.

Marybeth is a consummate professional. Oftentimes, before I thought of something, had a question or needed an answer, she was already on it. She was very responsive, always available, a quick study and incredibly sharp. She guided us through the process with clarity and confidence and wound up saving us a considerable amount of money at settlement because of her insight and knowledge. That was totally unexpected, but another great example of the kind of value that MaryBeth adds. Glad to have her sitting on our side of the table throughout the process and at the closing. I wholeheartedly recommend MaryBeth if you want the best. Seriously, probably the best agent I have worked with buying and selling properties in several different states over the last 20 years.

From helping us dealing with difficult tenants and trying to find them a new place, to finding contractors to prepare our house for sale, and finding the perfect buyer; Marybeth was right next to us every step of the sale process guiding us with all her knowledge and expertise.  It is truly a pleasure to work with Marybeth – we’ve found that she keeps his client’s best interests in sharp focus and you can always trust that she is on top of every detail, big and small, which brings great peace of mind in any real estate transaction.

MaryBeth has been my realtor for 17 years.  Recently I sold a property that I bought with her as my realtor 17 years ago. If it weren't for her skill and expertise, I don't think the property would have sold as quickly. It was a complex situation and MaryBeth had complex solutions.  She is savvy, knowledgable, and trustworthy. I plan to keep in touch with MaryBeth because she has become a friend. I cannot recommend her more highly. I wish I could give 100 stars!
Marybeth was kind, communicative, and very knowledgeable. She was excellent to work with and we truly appreciate all of her support!

Mary Beth was terrific through the entire process, including lining up for me all of the appropriate and necessary referrals to the best mortgage lenders, inspectors, how to arrange HOA payments, and the best bagel and delis in the area

Mary Beth was highly knowledgable about the market and helped us sell our house at a time when the market had slowed. She was with us every step of the way and answered all our questions, big and small. Thank you Mary Beth!
Very knowledgeable and most dedicated real estate agent. Selling house with her was a breeze. Great sales and communication skills in addition to being a super person!

Marybeth has proved herself to be very knowledgeable and wise with all aspects related to negotiating and contracts. She has very good insight into potential issues and provides excellent advice all round.

MaryBeth was amazing from start to finish.  She coordinated everything so that it was very easy for me, which included mortgage lender, title company, termite, appraiser and much much.  She also was negotiating every detail with the seller to make sure I got the best deal possible.  She took very good care of me and my family and I really appreciate all of her help.

I met MaryBeth back in November and through the winter we saw many properties. MaryBeth is always direct and gives great insight. It can be very stressful experience, MaryBeth guided me to the home that I I wanted. When I got there she negotiated everything we went to settlement everything was perfect. I would highly recommend MaryBeth anybody looking to buy or sell a home.
display_name: MaryBeth is fantastic a great professional and I had a great experience

comment:
Dear Mary Beth, I am so thankful to have you as an agent. The sale process was quicker than I expected. I am happy to finally have that house sold. I appreciate the time you spent on it. I really appreciate all your help and support for unexpected requests.

Best regards, 
Masood Ali

MaryBeth is the best! When Andrew and I started looking for a home, we wanted an agent who was energetic, knowledgeable and personable. We connected instantly with her. She did not stop, she was always on the lookout, sending new listings our way until we found our family home. 

Searching for the perfect house is not easy, but MaryBeth took time to meet with us and understand what we were looking for. She stayed in frequent communication with us and quickly set up appointments to look at properties until we found the perfect home. She negotiated with the listing agent and had our best interest in mind during the whole process. The sale moved at a very fast pace, we closed within 30 days and MaryBeth took care of all the details. She lined up the inspection, prepared documents and coordinated with the lender to ensure a smooth process. She was so gracious through the whole process and her countless efforts will forever be appreciated.

We were apprehensive about how much we can get for our townhouse but we went with Bob Lucido who obviously knew the area very well and assured us that he could get us top dollar for it. We went with the suggested updates to the home and although that part was a pain, we were able to reach our goal. We were very pleased and he and his team always gave good advice. For more information, click here:
https://themamatravels.wordpress.com/2021/07/09/buying-and-selling-your-home-the-2021-edition/

Bob and his team has now sold 2 homes for me and he was able to sell them quick because they go the extra mile to make your home look great , draw in many potential buyers and get you the most value. In my neighborhood i sometimes see other realtors who's for sale sign stays up much longer. I stay with the winning team.

Bob Lucido and his team sold my home in Ellicott City, MD in 2017. The professionalism and skill of the Bob Lucido Team brought the result I was looking for. They were wonderful to work with and stayed on top of the process every single day. I would never use anyone else!!

Along with the ability to write reviews on line in the internet era there are bad reviews that go along with good, this is one of them. I would never recommend Geri Anderson or the Bob Lucido Realty Group. We entered into an Agreement with the Bob Lucido Group represented by Gerri Anderson on May 25, 2017. We lowered the price to $650K when they took the listing. After stating   with their marketing campaign we will sell your home in 30 days  , they then again asked that we lower our home sale price to $619,900. It was always about lowering the price and flip the house so they absorb their quick $30K commission. When we received an offer to purchase our home for $619K we requested Ms Anderson to provide us with an estimate of net proceeds. Ms. Anderson forward to us in email a net proceeds sheet of $21,278. Based on her net proceeds statement, we agreed to enter into the contract to sell our property for the $619,000.  Approximately one hour prior to settlement we received a call from one of their agents, Wendy Shapiro stating we needed to bring our check book to closing and write a check for $91.30 to close the sale. The buyer had asked if they could move in within 30 days. We jumped through hoops to accommodate and had movers in to move us out the day before settlement. We were now out of our home. Since we had already signed the Contract of Sale, we had no legal choice but to proceed to settlement and pay the $91.30 in spite of the fact that we had just been informed by the Bo Lucido Group that our net proceeds would be $21,278. As a   Real Estate Professional   The Bob Lucido Group had an obligation to correctly advise us in all aspects of the sale of our home from listing up to and including the settlement of our home. This would include an accurate estimate of our net proceeds of the sale when we received the offer. They clearly breached this obligation.
The Bob Lucido team helped me buy and sell a home in 2016.  Overall, it was a great experience.  Thank you all for you experience and support.  I highly recommend this team!

To tackle the enormous project of getting a 7000 sq ft house ready for market after 20 years and begin the process of downsizing, we signed on with Bob Lucido and his team approximately a year before we wanted to list our home. Bob and his designer, Amanda, walked us through our home helping us decide what absolutely had to be updated and prioritizing the more optional changes. The plan put together by Amanda included paint and carpet selections, photos, and lists. It was an invaluable tool to work from throughout that year as we checked off all the boxes. When we were ready to list, home stager Andrea came through for the final tweaking before photography. The brochure of our home was absolutely stunning and the For Sale sign went into the ground.     nBecause of the unique nature of our home with its attached in-law suite/guesthouse, we knew it might take some time to match with a buyer. During the 5 months of listing, showings were steady and plentiful. Bob contacted us every week without fail to keep us updated and in the loop with all that was being done to market our home. When there were questions or issues along the way, the Bob Lucido Team was very responsive and helpful.   nThen came the happy news that we had two offers to choose from!  With the Sold sign now posted, we turned our attention to packing and reserved the Bob Lucido truck for a   pre-move   of boxes before we had movers come for the furniture. We used Bob's recommendations of Perry Moving and Storage, and Maid in Maryland for a thorough detailed house cleaning before settlement. We were extremely pleased with the results from both of those companies. Tracy Lucido capably guided us through the final phase, including inspection, leading up to settlement.  nFrom start to finish, Bob Lucido and his extremely professional team proved invaluable as partners in navigating this life-changing milestone. The resources provided were first-class. We highly recommend them without reservation.

Bob Lucido and his team know the market well and are honest and trustworthy, which is important when dealing with sales. Had we followed his advice on the pricing and on the changes needed to sell our home, then we would have sold the home months sooner than we did. As soon as we followed his recommendations, our home sold.  We sincerely appreciated all the help that Bob and his team provided. They were extremely professional at all times.

She is top notch and always there when we need her. She is definitely a pro!

Jeannette is the best realtor!! She explains everything to you, is very knowledgeable on the procedures and processes of purchasing a home. She communicates with you every step of the way. Would highly recommend to family and friends!

Whether you are, buying your first house or your 2nd, need help with finding an apartment or selling a mansion. She is the utmost professional with an infectious laugh that cant help but make you smile.

Jeannette went above and beyond in helping us to make the decision to sell our home and then getting it sold as fast as possible, she really listened to us and our situation and did everything she could to make it as simple as possible. We appreciate everything Jeannette did for us and highly recommend her to everyone we know! She is  one of a kind and truly passionate about what she does. If we decide to move back to MD - we will for sure be contacting Jeannette! Thank you so much!!
As always Jeannette was excellent!

Jeannette was awesome. She worked really hard to help me find the perfect house for my needs. Will definitely recommend her to others.
Jeannette recently sold my house for me. I wouldn't use any other realtor.  She had my house sold, and found the perfect house for me, in a manner of weeks. She is truly a miracle worker!

I have a very busy schedule and couldn't be very hands on with the process of selling my home and buying my new home. So it was very important I work with an agent I have the utmost trust for because I know she will get the job done for me. That is why I always work with Jeanette.

Jeanette is a one of a kind. So down to earth. So knowledgeable. So professional. I feel like she is part of my family. She takes the time to gather all of my needs and sentiments. An agent to be proud of for sure!!

Jeannette is extremely versatile in very nervous and constantly changing situations of same day sales and purchases.
She was my agent for two same day sale/purchases in my life and was able to work very successfully to settlement with all parties satisfied in both cases!!!!

Having Jeannette Campbell as my realtor was one of the best decision I made towards my home buying. She has an excellent forsight and energy that gives a postive feedback on the expected outcome. Jeannette is knowledgable and highly professional while searching and finanilizing the home purchase. I recommend her for anyone looking for a home to buy, especially first time home buyers.
Jeannette was so helpful with purchasing my first home. She is passionate about her job and very knowledgeable. Would definitely recommend to friends and family. Great experience

The sale of the property at 3201 Grace Road went well.  Jeannette Campbell was very helpful in staging the house and it showed very well.  I would recommend Jeannette Campbell to anyone that is selling or thinking of selling their house.  She was very easy to reach by phone even if she was very busy,  She took the time to talk to us.
She handled everything perfectly
She is the best . I know I was a difficult person and she handled everything perfect.

Jeannette is the consumate professional and one you want on your side when selling your house. She works tirelessly for her clients, sharing insights into the everchanging world of the real estate market. She made a stressful time thoroughly enjoyable!

Monti was fantastic.  Not only did he know the area well, but he also knew all of the county officials and regulators that were relevant to the sale of a property.  While there weren't any significant "hiccups" during the sale process, I had total confidence that he could deal with anything that arose.  He personally managed and dealt with the few minor issues that needed attention and we had 3 over-asking offers within 48 hours of listing.  Truly a delight as a realtor and as a person.  I can't recommend him too highly.

First of all, I would like to tell you how Monti went above and beyond his duties/responsibilities as my realtor. There were a couple of things that really impressed me that Monti took care himself. First, as the result of the house inspection, for safety reasons the buyer requested to have CSST wiring installed in the house. Monti actually did the wiring himself and arranged for a professional Electrician to have it inspected. Secondly, he took care of all necessary septic inspection requirements from the scheduling to the actual payment for the work. To top things off he was there when the inspection took place and he actually covered the tanks when it was done. One other thing I forgot to mention was the buyer wanted a reverse osmosis system installed in the kitchen. So Monti used his contacts to find a professional installer that charged a fair price and completed the job in a reasonable time to make our settlement date. 
I didn't need to get involved in any of these processes at all. In other words, Monti made the entire house selling experience easy and extremely hassle-free for us. It was a pleasure working with him and would have absolutely no problem recommending Monti to anyone.

Carol Proctor is absolutely amazing! When looking for real estate, you realize the importance of working with someone you trust. When we became interested in a property in Ocean City, Maryland, we were very fortunate to have friends who had worked with Carol Proctor twelve years ago. They highly recommended Carol, an award-winning Associate Broker at Berkshire Hathaway.
Carol is a skilled professional who is very familiar with the area since she has lived there for more than twenty years. We were just casually looking online when we noticed a particular listing in Ocean City. If it wasn’t for Carol’s knowledge of the local home sale climate, we would not have acted with any type of urgency. 
We were thinking of waiting until the following week to drive from Pennsylvania to look at the property—Carol suggested that we look at it the very next day. On Sunday, Carol showed us the property and worked with us so that we were able to submit an offer the same day. (We found out the next day (Monday) that our offer had been accepted though other people had shown interest in the property and ours was not the only offer.) Had we not had the advantage of Carol’s experience, we may not have submitted an offer early or attractive enough to close the deal. Carol’s knowledge of the Ocean City area also means that she has had a chance to experience many types of situations over the years. She has been a wealth of information when we have asked for referrals for contractors, local information, etc. Since another question often came up, we have been delighted with Carol’s accessibility both by phone and by text. Shirley is a top notch agent who is very knowledgeable about the whole process of buying or selling property. She knows the local codes and regulations that we were unaware of that saved us a lot of taxes and fees. She is a great communicator always keeping us informed during the whole process from listing to sale. Shirley is very professional and knowledgeable, yet works with you in a friendly laid back atmosphere. Highly recommend her services. Thanks Shirley!

Shirley is simply amazing!  She goes above and beyond for her clients.  I was lucky enough to have Shirley sell two of my homes in the past year.   She was able to guide me thorough the process while we managed the sale of my homes simultaneously.  She’s not only a great realtor, but she’s a great person too.  I can’t thank her enough for all of her help.

Shirley Bayer is everything you would want/need in a real estate agent. It’s truly hard to describe how awesome she is to work with. About 7 months ago my husband and I were unsure if we wanted to list our home, if we wanted to buy a house right away or even possibly build. We were all over the place and decided to halt our journey. Shirley was involved at this point and even though she understood that we weren’t sure what we wanted, she still spent the time showing us properties and coming out to our current home for a market analysis just for us to see where we were at. Fast forward to about March of 2022. We contacted Shirley again who instantly picked up where we left off with no hesitation. By this time she knew what my husband and I were looking for as a family. She took us to look at a home and I (in my mind) loved it. However, I was clearly just excited at the thought of buying another home and wasn’t thinking about what our initial wants and needs were as a family. Shirley kindly reminded us of what our goals were and what we truly wanted in a home. She’s not afraid to keep you in check as a buyer and really does look out for your best interest in the long run. Needless to say we passed on that residence because she was totally right and I was just blinded by the excitement.  Again, I was all over the place. So my husband and I went to a builder. This is not a slight at the builder, but Shirley showed up to every meeting and went above and beyond when it came to reading through the contract and pointing out important flaws. I mean she spent hours upon hours reading the contract. Even when she was studying on her own for further education real estate classes. She never fully discouraged our choice to want to build, but again she kept us in check as far as what was important and a smart decision financially for my family. Again, we decided to go in a different direction. So this is the second time that Shirley stuck with us, and kept us on a straight path even when it meant that she wasn’t necessarily getting a deal out of it. Finally we found a home that we loved. Within 9 days we put an offer in on our new home, put our house on the market AND sold our current home. As we all know the market is crazy these days, and there was another offer on our new home. Shirley worked her magic and was able to essentially “sell” our family to the current home owner and that was their ultimate reasoning for choosing our offer. When it comes down to it, Shirley is not afraid to negotiate and go after things to benefit you as a buyer or seller. She is attentive, timely and just overall wonderful in getting the job done. She helped us sell our home and purchase our forever home. We as s family are just so thankful for her. Apologies for the long testimony, but I think it’s important for people to see how she has been there for my family over the course of our home buying and selling journey. And I know some people may say “well that’s their job”, but no. Not everyone is great at their job the way she is. Do yourselves a favor and work with Shirley Bayer.
Shirley was the best ever to deal with..she made sure everything was handle quick and made the process less stressful. Would highly recommend Shirley!

A friend referred us to Deb and Jon Meek as we were initiating our search for our new home in Maine. Once we did find our dream home, she was quick to initiate the offer and to work with the Realtor representing the sellers. It was clear to us that, after 17 years in the business in the Portland area, Deb knew all of the players. With her recommendations, we made an offer on the home which ended up NOT being the highest bid but was accepted by the sellers nonetheless. We came to find out that there was another offer for significantly more but the sellers accepted our offer and actually accepted our offer at a lower price than we had offered. With an escalation clause in place, they easily could have bumped our offer much higher. I can't help but think this accommodation was made based on some of the tips and tricks that Deb suggested. We just closed this past Friday and are elated. During this whole process, Jon was in constant contact and acted as a liaison between us and Deb - guiding us through multiple steps in the process. As a benefit, Deb also has an extensive list of contractors that she works with and will be referring to us. All in all, it was a grade A experience working with the TruBrit team. We could not sing their praises any higher. We highly recommend them as your next Real Estate team. Cheers!

We recently had the pleasure of collaborating with Susan, a remarkable realtor who represented the buyers of one of our newly constructed homes. Susan's contributions to the process were invaluable, and her professionalism and communication skills truly stood out.

From the moment Susan became involved in the transaction, her communication was nothing short of exemplary. She seamlessly bridged the gap between our construction company and the buyers she represented. Her proactive approach and open lines of communication kept us informed at every crucial juncture of the sale. Whether it was coordinating inspections, addressing buyer inquiries, or sharing updates on the transaction's progress, Susan's timely and thorough communication kept all parties on the same page and ensured a smooth process.

Susan's expertise in the real estate market was evident in her ability to guide her buyers through the purchase of our Buffum Home. She recognized and effectively conveyed the unique qualities and craftsmanship of our newly built property. Her understanding of new construction and her knack for highlighting features played a role in helping her clients see the true of the home as well.

Furthermore, Susan's negotiation skills were instrumental in securing a successful deal for both her buyers and our construction company. Her ability to navigate the intricacies of real estate negotiations ensured that the transaction proceeded efficiently, benefiting all parties involved.

Working with Susan was not just professionally rewarding but also enjoyable on a personal level. Her friendly and approachable demeanor made her a pleasure to collaborate with. She handled any challenges that arose during the process with grace and professionalism, maintaining a positive atmosphere throughout.

In conclusion, we highly recommend Susan to anyone seeking a dedicated and skilled realtor. While she represented the buyers in this transaction, her contributions positively impacted our experience as the builders of Buffum Homes. Susan's exceptional communication, market knowledge, negotiation prowess, and pleasant disposition make her a standout professional in the real estate industry. We are grateful for the opportunity to work with her and look forward to future collaborations. Thank you, Susan, for enhancing our Buffum Homes experience and for being a true asset to the real estate community.

Working with Chris and Kay from True Colors Real Estate was an outstanding experience, and we can't recommend them enough. This was our second time using them, and we will absolutely be back for our next property.
​Kay is a powerhouse of knowledge. She gave us fantastic, actionable advice on everything from market trends to local laws, which was invaluable for us as landlords looking to attract great tenants. She's proactive and a master at spotting and solving problems before they become a headache.
​Chris is the ultimate client champion. He fought for us every step of the way, especially when we were dealing with some difficult sellers. He's the kind of agent who truly goes the extra mile to make sure everything gets done right.
​On top of their incredible expertise, they add so much fun to the process. Seriously, Chris's banana bread is legendary—it's so good it's a reason to buy a house with them all on its own! And don't forget Cindy the unicorn—she's a magical addition that makes everything feel a little more special.

Chris and Kay are an absolute joy to work with! They’re friendly, funny, and incredibly responsive. As a first-time seller, I really appreciated how they guided me through each step, making the process feel much less overwhelming.

Chris’s organization and attention to detail were especially impressive—he even helped me line up and schedule appointments for home updates, which made everything so much easier. Thanks to their expertise, my home sold in just one day and we closed within a month!

Fun fact: Chris was also my agent when I purchased this home, so it felt full circle to work with him and Kay again. If you’re looking to buy or sell, I can’t recommend Chris and Kay highly enough.

Chris & Kay were such a 5-star team. Their combined real estate experience and passion for Minneapolis made them an obvious choice. They are incredibly friendly, have a wealth of knowledge, and made this entire process so pleasant. Moving 1200 miles away was high stress and they made it worth it, every step of the way. Highly, highly, highly recommend this team.

We met Matt at an open house, and he just seemed so easy, welcoming and generous from the outset.  We had a lot of time on our hands so we began looking more than a year before we made our offer. He listened to our unique desires and worked hard to find that diamond in the rough.  What I especially appreciate about him is that he was generous with his time and he never, not once, made us feel that we were a nuisance. If he was thinking it (because we truly were extremely high maintenance), he never showed it once.  I am the type of person who loves the search.  I find it very enjoyable to do a house-hunting trip seeing 6 houses at a time. And Matt delivered.  We must have seen a hundred homes with him, and that really helped us understand what was available and what we could get for our budget.   When it came to making an offer, he gave us great advice that allowed us to win one with multiple offers.  I remember messaging him into the wee hours of the night, and he would reply back within minutes.  I could feel that he was truly invested in us, that he wanted what was best for us, and that he would do everything he could to get us the very best.  Thank you, Matt!  For your sake, I hope you don't have any more clients as high-maintenance as we were.  And for those out there looking for an agent, Matt is your guy.

Matt helped our family buy our first home in Minneapolis. When my wife and I started looking for a house we didn't know where to start and so I just reached out to Matt knowing he had some experience. I now think it might have been the one of the best decisions I've ever made. From the very get-go, he was responsive, courteous, and knowledgeable. We expected to be overwhelmed by the process but Matt made things simple and easy to understand. In addition, he helped us to secure financing and found us a bunch of free money that made buying a home (a home we actually wanted, not just one we could afford) a possibility. He walked us through every step of the process, from helping us make a competitive offer, to advice regarding the inspection, to the socially-distanced closing, he always made sure we knew what was coming next and ensured we were prepared. He even made buying a house during a pandemic feel safe and easy. Simply put, it was an excellent experience and I would recommend you do yourself a HUGE favor and let Matt help you out. I promise you won't regret it!

Matt was an incredible asset for my wife and I as first-time home buyers. Ours was a more complicated search, as we transitioned back to the US after living in Asia. Matt made sure I understood every step of the process and made me feel I was his only client. His communication skills are excellent and his friendly easygoing demeanor worked well for me. I would 100 percent reccemend him to anyone buying or selling your home. He sold mine in 18 hours at full ask.
Matt is a Realtor you will want to work with. He has great advice, lots of knowledge about the real estate business, and cares about your sale (or purchase) from beginning to closing.

Upon hearing of our transfer to the metro, we were working with a really tight timeline and considered renting. Matt reassured us that there would be a home for us out there. Matt was great! On the ball and very knowledgeable about his job. He went above and beyond to get us in our first house. He made every aspect of house buying simple and easy.

I would absolutely use John Quinn and his team again.    John is always available and always professional.  John worked really hard on selling my home.  He came to Saturday and Sunday showings, for example.  His team is very nimble and responsive, he has a team set up that immediately addresses any concerns or questions.  Any texts are immediately responded to by his team and any contractual documents are immediately updated and forwarded to the client's email.  When my house had a list of repairs asked for by the potential buyer that was over a dozen items long, John knew a handyman who could do all the repairs quickly and at a reasonable price, which greatly expedited the resolution of the buyer concerns and the eventual sale.  Another great thing about John is he saw the potential of the house rather than dismissing any flaws that may hinder selling it.  When there was a botched interior paint job for example, he didn't reject the viability of selling the house but still saw the potential for the sale.  He will try to make sure his clients feel hopeful about the future.. John also tried to make sure to get the optimal amount of money for me, the client, and aggressively worked for my interests. John works hard, is quick, is transparent in all interactions, is firm in making sure his client gets a good deal, and is highly regarded as a scrupulous and ethical agent.  The proof is in the pudding, in that the proof is he got my house sold, even during an environment of high fed reserve interest rates.  I would give him 5 out of 5 stars in all rating categories and would recommend him to friends and family selling homes.  I actually googled John and found he was the number one agent in our city and that's why I asked him to sell my house.  If he wasn't the agent I really don't think the house would have sold, I really do believe that.

My experience with the John Quinn Home Selling team was exceptional. The process was seamless and John and his team did an excellent job from start to finish. Adam is very professional and knowledgeable. He was very helpful in helping us find our new home. He is the best!

Adam is extremely professional.  Because he is so knowledgeable about the market, he was able to advise us on home value and pricing.  He is backed by an amazing team of real estate pros which made the sale of our home as simple as a real estate transaction can be.  The team marketed our home very aggressively.  I would not hesitate to recommend Adam and the All-Star team if you're buying or selling a home.  They will take care of you and make you feel like you're part of the family.

Adam and his team were beyond impressive. Not only was he highly knowledgeable of the market and homes in the area, but he was also personable and approachable. My family and I always felt heard and taken care of. Adam made it his mission to find us our   perfect   first home and he did just that. He was readily available and promptly replied to communication. He was understanding during the anxiety of buying our first home and still took the time to carefully answer dozens of our questions. He made the offer and purchase process seamless. The whole experience was exciting and for the most part stress-free thanks to the work of Adam and his team. I recommend Adam without hesitation! He is the absolute best! You will not find a more caring, compassionate, and knowledgeable realtor than Adam Watkins.

I have worked with Adam Watkins for 8 years now. He has sold homes for me as well as helped me purchase investment properties and my current primary home. The service that you receive from him is outstanding. He has tremendous knowledge of the market and every aspect of the real estate process. You will not be disappointed in using him or his team. Adam Watkins and The All Star Team is truly that, an All Star!!

Adam has a privilege not many realtors in our area have. He has an abundance of people, a team helping him make your experience with the Allstar team a great one! He and his staff were quick to help and answer any questions, helped with scheduling appraisals and inspections while we planned our move it was nice to have them do everything for the sell of our home.  Their services are top notch and you won't find anything like them in the real estate market.

Adam is by far the best realtor in our area. Purchasing our home could have easily been a stressful event; however, with Adam's help we were able to put in an offer and close on our house without any struggles or worries. Not only is he an amazing buying agent, but Adam's also an excellent listing agent. We've also worked with Adam to sell our house. His team worked diligently on getting my house ready for listing. He and his team's marketing efforts set them apart from any other listing agency in the area. Not only is Adam acutely aware of the market, giving us realistic expectations of what our house would sell for, but he and his team do everything possible to publicize our house. The pictures are beautiful (including a video tour), and the yard sign grabs people's attention. Adam's insights on what to do to get my house ready for listing helped me make sure my house was in top shape. I definitely recommend Adam and his team for anyone interested in purchasing or selling in the Hattiesburg area!

Charlie went above and beyond for us! She helped us both sell our home and buy a new one, and she was an incredible mediator throughout the entire process. Charlie navigated communication smoothly between us and our buyers, as well as with the sellers of our new home. What could have been an extremely stressful experience was made so much more manageable thanks to her support. She was always available, responsive, and ready to answer any questions we had. We’re so grateful for her dedication and professionalism!
Excellent agent. Will use again. Highly recommend her services.

We had a very disappointing experience with Sandra West as our listing agent. Communication was extremely poor — she often took one to two weeks to respond to questions, and sometimes did not respond at all. Our condo sat on the market for over a year without meaningful interest. After hiring a new realtor, we learned that Sandra had failed to market the property to a key buyer group (short-term rental investors), which shocked other professionals who reviewed her approach. In the end, we wasted a tremendous amount of time and opportunity under her representation. I would not recommend her services.

We had a very disappointing experience with Sandra West as our listing agent. Communication was extremely poor — she often took one to two weeks to respond to questions, and sometimes did not respond at all. Our condo sat on the market for over a year without meaningful interest. After hiring a new realtor, we learned that Sandra had failed to market the property to a key buyer group (short-term rental investors), which shocked other professionals who reviewed her approach. In the end, we wasted a tremendous amount of time and opportunity under her representation. I would not recommend her services.
Tammy is on it! Montana’s Best 🙏🏻

Tory is fantastic! She was more than willing to explain everything to us as first time home buyers and was incredibly patient with us. She was always honest and looked out for our best interest. If you are looking for a real estate agent who will treat you well and guide you through the confusing process, Tory is definitely the best!!!
He made selling my home super easy. He did everything he said he would and was on top of everything!!!

Moving to a completely new area you must have someone who is willing to answer what might seem like simple mundane questions. Burke did a great job of taking us through every step of the process and really went the extra mile when it became necessary to go out of the box to figure out how we would get Wi Fi no matter what. If he can't do it ...He knows who can. Those connections are invaluable. We are so happy in our new home! Thanks!!

Burke and his wife Katie were some of the best people we have met. They were there for us every step of the way. They really made us feel like family and made us feel welcome here to Great Falls. I would 100% refer anyone and everyone to them. We by far had the best experience possible.

We have been so pleased with Burke Tyree as our realtor.  He teams up with his wonderful wife Katie to provide and above and beyond experience for us as the sellers.  Burke has sold 3-4 of our properties in the Flathead and in Helena this year and has always been so honest and straightforward.  Burke has maximized our sale price and has worked well with his buying clients to work out a fair price for both parties.  We HIGHLY recommend Burke Tyree if you are looking to buy or sell property in the FLATHEAD, GREAT FALLS or Helena MT areas.
Very friendly and easy to work with! Made herself available and quickly got back to us on any questions.

We have had the pleasure of working with Shelby Williams several times over the years.  She is very professional, reachable and willing to listen to client's concerns and/or thoughts regarding pricing and marketing.  Shelby's planning and organization from listing to closing is a strong attribute of hers.  She is very easy to work with and makes the entire process go much smoother.   We have never felt like our business was too small for her to "get her done" and "sell it!"
Thank you Shelby Williams, for all you have done for us with this recent sale and other listings over the years.
Ed and Kathy Aders

comment: Shelby is always there for us and makes the process smooth and easy. She's the best.
Shelby is amazing! We would highly recommend her.

Shelby was extremely helpful in pricing and selling our house and working as dual agent on our new house.  She was very responsive to text messages, even a couple after 9 PM.  We are very satisfied with her dedication and attention to details.

Shelby Williams was fun, friendly and knowledgeable.  She was VERY prompt in responding to all our questions and concerns.

Shelby was so easy to work with, we had enough confidence in her judgement to buy our home sight unseen, except of course for all the videos and pictures she sent us!

Shelby is a sweetheart, she made us feel as if we were her favorite clients!

Thank You Shelby for helping us WIN our home!

Shelby Williams is an excellent communicator, she has a great sense of humor and is transparent along the process. We decided to try to purchase a home during a very competive market in 2020/2021 and we ended up feeling like we still got an excellent deal due to her negotation skills and knowledge of the process. As first time home buyers, Shelby was extremely patient with our lack of knowledge and ample questions. She has the perfect balance of professionalism and humor and the only thing we wish is that we wouldn't have found the perfect house so we could spend more time with her!  We feel like we have a gained a life long friend and would highly reccomend her to anyone even considering her!

I reached out to Shelby mentioning I might want to start looking at properties, and she quickly got back to me with a list of properties in my area and budget and recommended a couple. She was very honest and helpful when considering properties, and she knew about a property coming onto market through one of her colleagues at Century 21 that ended up being an awesome find and was the perfect house for me! She was available to help with every question I had and made sure I was completely satisfied with every answer she provided. Couldn't have had a more fun and easy experience, 10/10 go see Shelby!

Had to work your tail off at times, but you got it done.  Thanks a ton, Shelby!

Shelby is truly a top notch professional in real estate. She is kind, honest, fair and fun! She is highly organized and was always led a few steps ahead. It's easy to tell that she knows the area of Billings well and is an expert at buying and selling a home. One of the biggest things about Shelby that stands out are her connections within the community to local contractors and other home professionals. You can easily tell that everyone WANTS to work with her which I think says a lot about her professionalism, character, and demeanor.
We love you Shelby and everything she has done for us, she is nothing short of absolutely amazing! Extremely knowledgeable in the industry she works in and won’t stop until your satisfied.
I will recommend Shelby to everyone. She was knowledgeable and paid attention to all details. She was easy to communicate with and answered all questions immediately.

Shelby was very consistently professional and pleasant!  She provided weekly updates, and information.  She is a genuinely kind and thoughtful person and a hard worker.  We definitely would recommend her!

Shelby Williams handled the buying process flawlessly. She was there to answer any questions and very thorough in searching for the perfect property for us. I would recommend Shelby to anyone in the market for buying or selling a house!

Shelby was there when I needed her, which was very important to me, since I live 1650 miles away and was not able to get things done on my mom's property by myself.  She was instrumental in getting contractors to work on the property, hired someone to mow the lawn, had a dumpster delivered/provided for me when I was able to come up to Billings to get the house cleared out, and kept me abreast of any problems.  She was my eyes and ears, and she was darn good at it.  She made it very easy for me to sell my mom's house, and I very much appreciated it.  I would gladly work with her again.
I feel I have gained a good friend in Shelby, not someone doing a job and I as a customer.

So happy with our experience with Century 21 and appreciative of all the hard work! Couldn't believe how fast the house sold. 

Shelby was excellent and we will recommend her to anyone we know buying or selling a home! She went above and beyond making the whole process smooth and easy.

We had the pleasure of meeting Shelby Williams by a simple phone call on a property listed by Century 21. She could sense we were on a bit of a time frame. Our questions were always answered and she was always one step ahead. She has a great sense of humor and everyone who met her, our friends and family, thought she was great. I will recommend Shelby to anyone looking for a great Realtor. We would and will use her as our Realtor again. 
Sincerely.
Jerry and Debi
Shelby was always helpful and got the job done in a timely manor.

I recommend Shelby as a realtor because she was so fun to work with, very patient, very kind, and trustworthy. You don't see that in a realtor now days. I think she was the best in Billings!! We had great help from Pete to get our house sold.  His work on early pictures and additional requested photos kept our buyers interested.  Also, he was really in touch with me during our closing process. Highly recommend him to sell your home.

Shawna want beyond expectations and hung in with us even after purchase to make sure seller completed agreed upon action items. Our was complicated but Shawna got us through it. I wish our realtor in VA was as great as Shawna!
Shawna is an amazing realtor, listens well, very in tune with the market, well connected and has endless enthusiasm.  Best realtor that I have worked with in over a dozen real estate transactions.

Shawna was  awesome!!!! We were very impressed with how she was always available and always got right back to us with information. Buying a house is a stressful time and Shawna made the process run very smooth. I can't say enough about the job she did for us and we very highly recommend her!!!

Shawna did a great job selling our house in a timely manner and for a price that above what we expected.  She was very knowledgeable of the current market.  She handled all of the large and small details flawlessly.  We will definitely use her for our next real estate transaction.

Shawna sold our house in under a week! She was patient and answered all our *many* questions, as this was our first time selling a house! We couldn't be more pleased and highly recommend her to anyone looking to sell or buy a home!

Shawna is an amazing realtor. She took time to understand what we were looking for and was able to add houses for us to look at even at the last minute.  Shawna always responded promptly to our emails and text messages, answered all our questions and made sure we understood every step of the process. We could not speak more highly of her and will recommend her to all our friends and family who might be in the market! Thank you for everything, Shawna!

I have worked with Tammara for several years and she has facilitated 3 real estate transactions with me.  I have found her to be very helpful, knowledgable, patient and informed.  Her heap with our 1031 exchange was invaluable.  

I enjoy her attitude and her commitment to serving my needs.  

Thank You Tamarra

We would highly recommend Tamara. She helped coordinate a simultaneous sale of one house and purchase of another to relocate. Tamara was always very professional and responsive throughout the entire process. We always felt like we were her 1st priority, despite knowing she had multiple other clients.

A perfect real estate Broker. I had been trying to get a realtor or other real estate help in Missoula Montana and I couldn't get a call back. I was ready to buy a house right then and there and for some reason, no one would talk to me. I had money, and excellent credit, was very clear on what I wanted and yet... nothing. Then I went to Great Falls and talked to Polly and her partner Abby Williams and we were all set with excellent caring people who wanted to help us find the right quality home. We knew what we wanted and when the right house came onto the market a month or so later Polly and Abby were right there with me and we put in an offer so so fast. TheY were both awesome!!

Poly and Abby are amazing, we ran into several roadblocks trying to get approved but they stuck with us and made sure we got into the house we wanted, we wanted to give up but they found other options , because of them we were able make our dream come true, even after closing, after they got their commission they have been there for us to help with problems that have came up, they have even taken money out of their own pocket to fix things that they were not obligated to do, I don't of any other realtors that would do this, did I say they are amazing, well I just said it again.

Polly and her team of realtors helped us sell our home and purchase our dream home!   They were very professional from the start to finish and continue making sure our every needs are met!  We highly recommend Polly and her team, Abby and Maryann,  for your home buying or selling needs.

This was the shortest and  most important relationship of my life! After a lot of online viewing and discussions on what I needed/ wanted, we did 1 day of showings.3 houses.Then ,it was like Miracle on 34th Street! April listened ,looked ,and walked me into a house I didn't know existed but needed!
Process wasn't perfect but close( yes I am over it) and I am happy and content with a house that works well and fits MY needs.Blessed, greatful,and thankful for her and her peeps.
Good work team April!

April McDonald was an absolute dream to work with! She found us our perfect home incredibly fast and kept communication clear and consistent every step of the way. She was always available — even after hours — and made us feel like we were her top priority. Beyond her professionalism, April genuinely cared about us, and it felt like a real friendship was forming throughout the process. She was a strong advocate for our needs and helped us get exactly what we wanted and even more than we hoped for. We couldn’t be happier and highly recommend April to anyone looking for a dedicated, personable, and effective realtor!

Working with Ruby was the best experience we had buying our first home. No matter the challenge, she always finds a way to get things done. She’s the best realtor we could’ve asked for, and we’ll definitely work with her for future purchases.

As a first-time homebuyer, I couldn’t have asked for a better realtor than Lauren Torino. From day one, she was knowledgeable, patient, and incredibly supportive throughout the entire process. Being active duty military, there were times I was unavailable due to my schedule—but Lauren completely understood and stepped in to handle things on my behalf without hesitation.

She filled in every gap, stayed on top of deadlines, and always had my best interest in mind. Lauren worked through unexpected challenges with calm professionalism and made sure I got the best deal possible. She explained every step clearly and never made me feel rushed or overwhelmed.

Her commitment, work ethic, and genuine care for her clients truly set her apart. I’m grateful to have had her in my corner, and I would absolutely recommend her to anyone looking to buy a home—especially fellow service members. Thank you, Lauren, for making this milestone such a positive experience!
Kaitlin and April were extremely flexible and helpful throughout the home buying process. Best out there, would recommend to close friends and relatives.

We had an amazing experience with April McDonald. The whole process of looking for a house and finally finding the one, was so fun it felt like we were with a friend. She definitely care about every single detail and make sure that you feel happy and sure that you were  making the correct decision.  I will definitely recommend her 100%.
April was very responsive and very easy to work with and talk to. We recommend!
Ruby and the rest of the team were exceptionally helpful in finding our new home and with every step of the process on the way.

April McDonald is incredible. Her and her team, to include Kaitlin Kennedy, outdid themselves with helping me as an army soldier, and first-time buyer.

April was recommended by a realtor friend of mine, Ealon Ostegaard, and right from the start she established a relationship of trust. She effectively discussed my hopes and dreams over the phone, and turned them into a reality. Instead of trying to sell me a house quickly, she was forthcoming about their flaws and told me straight up what to expect, critical when neccessary, and offering praise when there was a prize at stake. 

Her respect for the army and her ability to instantly respond at ridiculous times of the day consistently, as well as her comprehensive reviews of both neighborhoods and houses through videos made it easy for me to decide on a place without even being in the state. She is always motivated and excited to work with clients, and if I wasn't happy, she wasn't happy. On at least 3 occassions I really liked a place that she sent me a video for and just before I put down an offer, I decided it just wasn't the right place for me (close to a busy neighborhood, police report concerning, a flip that was overpriced). 

This was no problem at all for April. She tailored the houses that she sent me to my specific taste, which I wasn't even sure about at the start, but developed as I saw more places. Even after finding me some new construction that is ideal for my commute to both an army and civilian hospital I work at, she found me an even cheaper-priced option in the same neighborhood that provides me with .5 acres of land and in an area where I can sleep at night safely. She did this instead if convincing me to buy the pricier option that she could get commission on. She helps with everything, to include advice on house maintanence and help setting up utilities, which was huge as a first-time buyer.

April treats you like a celebrity and genuinely reaches out to check on both her client's progress with house hunting, and also life accomplishments that are unrelated. On the day of closing she embraced me like a long lost friend and offered a graduation smiley face balloon as well as a 100$ gift card for home decor. Wow! You would be lucky to have her as your realtor.

April was wonderful to work with! We needed to move quickly due to family circumstances, and from the minute we contacted April she was on it! She quickly started sending us homes to look at, and once we found one we liked, kindly squeezed us into her busy schedule so we could look at it, which I'm so thankful for because other buyers were hot on our heels looking at the property, too and I don't think we would have secured our home if we didn't look at it when we did. As first time home buyers, we were nervous about all of the contracts to sign and new things to learn, but April was very patient and answered all of our many questions, and linked us to the right people to contact when we needed more information. She helped negotiate some extras for our new home, and checked in with us along the way. We are settling into our new home and couldn't be happier. So thankful to April and her team!

April was incredible to work with and made the entire home-buying process feel smooth and manageable. She took the time to understand our family’s needs and walked us through all our options with patience and clarity. Her knowledge of the local market and neighborhoods was invaluable, and she always had thoughtful advice to help guide our decisions.

What really stood out was how much she genuinely cared. April went above and beyond to make sure we felt supported every step of the way. Thanks to her, we found the perfect home in a great area, and we couldn’t be happier. If you’re looking for a realtor who is knowledgeable, dedicated, and truly invested in your experience, we highly recommend April.

Matt, Brittany, Kaitlin, Sharon and all the staff at Welcome Home agency were excellent in handling the sale of my property in Fayetteville, which also was more complicated than others because it was handled by yours truly from Europe. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.

The buying process was scary, but with Christie and her amazing contacts and knowledge it made the process for us very simple. They were able to meet every need and want and was able to narrow down the choices to what our wish list was and help us through the entire process with any questions we had. I would definitely recommend Christie from the welcome home team. They made the process very very easy and simple for us.

If you're looking for a dedicated and exceptional realtor, look no further than April! From the moment we started our home search, she went above and beyond to ensure we found the perfect house in an ideal location.

April's professionalism and expertise were evident from our very first meeting. She took the time to understand our needs and preferences, always ready with valuable insights and suggestions. Her extensive knowledge of the local market made our search much more manageable and enjoyable.

What truly sets April apart is her unwavering support. No matter the time of day, she was always available to answer our questions, provide updates, or simply offer encouragement during the ups and downs of the buying process. Her dedication made us feel valued and confident every step of the way.

Thanks to April, we now have a beautiful home that fits all our requirements. We genuinely appreciate her patience, commitment, and hard work. If you're in the market for a home, you cannot go wrong with April as your realtor! Highly recommended!

April and her team are hands down the best! We are so thankful to have been referred to them through a friend in Florida. She is very good at her job, she made everything so easy to navigate, any concerns we had she immediately fixed for us or helped us with a solution. She is easy to talk to and makes buying a house a breeze. Thank you April!
Maddie was incredibly helpful, professional and a pleasure to work with. She remained patient and helpful while we dealt with issues from our lender, we would definitely work with her again.

April worked strenuously with us as we navigated an overseas move back from our duty station in Germany. She was courteous, understanding and very in depth with providing all necessary information to make purchasing our home a smooth process!

April was extremely helpful throughout the home buying process! My family was new to North Carolina and leaned on her for support and guidance. She is very personable and shared concern for our family at all times-from making sure we had breaks and food while searching for homes to treating our littles with toys. She is knowledgeable and professional. She is an excellent communicator. I always felt in the loop and on track with everything. I really appreciate all of her help and feel like she is officially part of our family!
Maddie is essentially the Marvel superhero of Real Estate Professionals. Stop looking for anyone else, she will exceed all your expectations.

Has the chance to both buy and sell a property with them. By far one of the best experiences I could have. Excellent communication and great knowledge of the market. Thanks Kye, Mrs. Lindsey and everyone that help us.

April was by far the best realtor I have ever worked with. She was friendly, professional and very knowledgeable. We weren’t from the area, but it felt as if though we didn’t have to worry about anything because April took care of everything. We gave her a list of wants and needs, gave us many options, and then got us into the house we wanted, not the house she thinks we should have been in - which makes a huge difference in a realtor. If you want someone who’s responsive and will make the home buying experience as smooth as can be, then April is your gal!

When we started searching for our home in NC we wanted to meet a very specific set of criteria to make sure it was everything that we wanted. April and Kaitlin from the Welcome Home Team were incredibly helpful and patient along the way! Once we found the home we wanted the process was so smooth and so fast that we even got to close earlier than expected. Highly recommend them to anyone looking for a professional team to help get you through what can be a stressful time if you don’t have the right people to help you through the process!

The Welcome Home Team made my home-buying experience the way it should be - simple, special, and fun! April was awesome! She answered any questions and concerns I had and even provided information I otherwise wouldn’t have known had she not told me. Who knew, YouTube and Google can’t always give you all the answers you need! If you’re looking for a home and need subject matter experts (SMEs) to point you in the right direction, then this team is what you need! 10 out of 10 recommend!

I cannot begin to express the overwhelming gratitude I have for my realtor, April.  A true angel.  This young lady worked at my pace, didn't pressure me and met me where I was on this journey called life and house hunting. With her kindness, honesty and care I was able to obtain my dream of home ownership. I am wishing April and family continued blessings and prosperity as she walks in her calling to help others. Lisa Walker Davis

I’m not quite someone to leave reviews good or bad. Which I probably should do more often, especially the good ones! But my experience with April and Kaitlin has been wonderful! Being a first time homebuyer, it can be super stressful. You wonder if they are being truthful,  you spend hours watching videos trying to understand it all. They were able to answer any and every question I had. They explained it so well too! They were always on top of everything and communicated what was happening at every step. April went above and beyond helping us! This has been the most stress free and smooth process I have ever experienced. Personally it was more stressful buying my car than this! 

I will 100% recommend April and Kaitlyn’s team. For the future I will always go through them. And the best part is if I buy in another state or something where they cant help me, I can trust their judgment and they can help recommend me someone I’ll be in good hands with! I will forever be grateful for this wonderful experience!! 😊

My husband and I had an incredible experience working with April McDonald during our home buying process. From the very beginning, she demonstrated a deep knowledge of the market and guided us through every step with patience and expertise. April was always available to answer my questions, literally no matter how small, and made the entire experience stress-free and enjoyable.

What stood out most was she genuinely thoughtful and her commitment to ensuring we found the perfect home. She went above and beyond, negotiating on my behalf and keeping me informed at every turn. If you’re looking for a professional, trustworthy, and dedicated realtor, I cannot recommend April enough.

Thank you, April for making this such a positive and seamless experience! With much love from the Kennard's

This was our 3rd home purchase. April listened, got to know us, not just as clients but friends. She is amazing! Her knowledge and expertise in real estate is top notch. April and the Welcome Home Team handle everything. When you have a question, she’s there with an answer. If you are looking to buy a home, April is your person. She will always be our person!

-April saved us! We were working with another agent for over two years and put in seven different offers that were never accepted. I called April to see if she could help, and after two days of looking at houses, she was able to get us under contract! I couldn't be more thankful. -Matt is also great if you need to sell your house. He listens to you, understands your goal, and will help you get the most for your home. -Once the closing process takes over, Kaitlin is the one you want in your corner. She answered so many of my questions and was always willing to talk to me on the phone vs a text message (huge deal for me). My husband and I could not be happier with this power team!
This was an outstanding experience. Christie my agent was amazing. The closing team, single source and Kaitlin made every thing run smoothly. They were so attentive. Definitely recommend

They an amazing team, we worked with April directly and she was able to help us with every question that we had in the process of finding our forever home.
