The team makes you feel so comfortable and secure throughout the process. There is complete transparency! Laura Reagan and Tiffany Maesek were the agents I worked with in finding a home and closing. These ladies were simply phenomenal! Laura worked around my schedule to help me look at homes, when she knew exactly what I was looking for she did all the work! She worked diligently to find my family and I our forever home and we are forever grateful! Tiffany closed our loan and her communication and courtesy is well above the bar! I’m so happy and blessed that I found The Welcome Home Team! They were God sent!

I can't say enough about the Welcome Home Team of KW.  I'm currently living in NH and was looking for a Retirement home in the Fayetteville area. They took the time to get to know me, asked about my needs, wants and retirement goals, then sent me listings that matched those needs. I drove down for a few days and looked at a number of homes in Fayetteville and the surrounding area.  Brian and Laura were fantastic!  They went above and beyond to make sure all of my questions were answered.  Once I settled on a house, the rest of the process was done remotely.  Brian, Laura, and their support team kept me updated throughout the entire process, checking in weekly to make sure I didn't have any questions or concerns, even doing a ZOOM final walkthrough to ensure I was happy with all of the needed repairs prior to closing.  I would highly recommend The Welcome Home Team to anyone considering buying or selling a home in the greater Fayetteville area.

I can't thank the Welcome Home Team enough! As first time home buyers, sometimes the amount of information we had to consider felt overwhelming but they took so much off our plates and were available to answer questions every step of the way. Specifically, Laura Reagan was the best agent I could have imagined working with. We never felt pressured to make a decision we weren't ready for and truly felt she had our best interests in mind. Once we were ready to offer she was our biggest advocate and helped us negotiate to get the best deal we could. While under contract, Susan Stinchfield and Sharon Hedgepeth were both so extremely helpful and helped manage everything even when there were a few bumps in the road toward the end. I would say if you are going to use a different title company than the one automatically offered, I would make sure everyone is on the same page from the start as far as which attorney will be doing the closing. This was the only hiccup but the closing team was on top of communicating with all parties on our behalf and probably shielded us from a lot of the last-minute scrambling that I'm sure must have happened behind the scenes. Overall, this team took a lot of stress out of the process and we are so grateful!

Michelle Crockett was an amazing realtor she showed me houses with my wants and I was able to find a house I loved in just a few days!  Sharron made the paperwork process quick and easy.  I only went to the office twice everything was done through Docu. sign and email it was awesome!!

We sold our home in Raeford in August 2020 using the Welcome Home team. Lindsey, Gloria and Brittany (and the rest of their team) were phenomenal. We listed in July and had closed on it by August 14th. This was no easy task. We had renters in it for years prior and had not physically been in the home for years as my husband and I are both posted overseas in different countries. They managed everything, kept in constant contact with updates and handled closing on our behalf with a Power of Attorney so we didn't need to fly back to the US for that. they previously sold another house for us years ago and as always, it was a successful experience. We would certainly recommend them.

My team of sale persons were highly knowledgeable in all areas of the business, which made experience stress free.  I was totally confident in their ability to take care of interest. They are a team of consummate professionals.  I'll definitely use them for all my real estate needs.

Our experience was, hands-down, the best homebuying experience you could ask for. From the top down to the bottom, the whole team worked around the clock to make sure that all of our wants and needs were taken care of. Any time there was a glitch, these guys were already on top of it before I could even say anything. If you are buying a home in the area, this team is the best I can recommend!

I am a first  time home buyer. I had a very specific type of home I wanted. Working with Keller Williams, and their welcome home team was able to find the specific type of home I was looking for. They worked diligently to ensure my move in date wasn’t prolonged any further when the lender dropped the ball. I strongly recommend contacting Keller Williams, if you have specific needs or wants in a home they will work tirelessly to find the home of your dreams.
They are the best.  Call them, you won't regret it!!!

The welcome Home Team has been amazing to work with. I purchased a home with their guidance and expertise. They were quick to respond to all of my questions and were very knowledgeable. They made buying a home easy and less stressful. After looking at many homes they found the perfect home for my family that checked off all of the boxes. It has been a great experience to work with The Home Team and I would recommend them to anyone.

The Welcome Home Team was amazing in the sale of our home. We had an initial offer within 4 days on market, we closed within 60 days' time on the market after screening several offers. They worked with us every step of the way and made sure we understood all aspects of the transaction. They helped us navigate remote closing quickly and efficiently. I can't recommend them enough, a huge shout out to Lindsey and Tiffany who were absolutely a pleasure to work with.

We got an offer on our home 3 days after it was officially put on the market and closed a couple weeks later. Everyone we worked with was so professional and helpful, anytime we had a question they were quick to respond to email and text with an answer. Oscar, Lindsey and Tiffany were amazing!

The entire team went above and beyond to help us. They were always available to answer questions and help us navigate the sale of our home. They were knowledgeable on the market and pricing. They did not have tunnel vision on just the sale of the home for their cut. They really listened to our needs/timing and exceeded our expectations.

Lori Taylor, our agent, is a phenomenal agent. She ensured we found the home we wanted and was a delight to work with. Her expertise helped my family find exactly what our family wanted and needed in our home. Lori was there when we needed her, answered all our phone calls, texts, and emails in a timely manner. She is personable, professional and made it all about our family...not the bottom line of making money. Thank you Lori!!
Beth Helguera, our transaction coordinator, is also phenomenal. She went above and beyond to ensure our family was in our home in a timely manner to so that we were able to get our packed uhaul truck unloaded and turned in time. Also, in that, we didn't have to cancel/reschedule all of our installation appointments scheduled for the next day.  Her diligence helped our family to get into our new home the same night we closed on our house. Thank you Beth!
You were both Blessings to our family.

My experience working with the Welcome Home Team (Keller Williams) was not a positive one. I had not worked with them before but the reviews I read about them seemed to mostly be positive and they had a pretty high success rate for selling, so I chose them. The initial conversation with the realtor, Lindsey McDonald was very positive and uplifting and gave me a sense that my home would be her focus. Unfortunately, that is pretty much where the positivity ends. I experienced a great deal of miscommunication or no communication. One of the biggest issues I had was the team was ONLY available during 9-5 M-F, this is a big problem for me as I’m sure is the case with most folks I work during those hours. Buyers tend to want to look at homes when they are no working and we experienced several issues with access to lock boxes, miscommunication on schedules which for the first 6 weeks the home was on the market inhibited buyers from being able to see the home. I was supposed to be contacted at least once weekly to discuss strategy, status etc., this was a problem as I didn’t always receive these calls and when I did was given bad or incomplete information. When I shared concerns about this, I was assured it would be taken care of and I would be a priority – there was no change and it actually got worse! One of the benefits of paying a realtor to sell your home is to gain their expertise and assistance through the paperwork. I didn’t get expertise, in most cases I was directing them without any guidance, for that I felt I could have sold the home myself. When we did finally get an offer, they were not skilled in being able to negotiate with an unfamiliar buyer agent. Even the owner, Brian, contacted me during this process and he didn’t even have accurate information when contacting me. They were unsuccessful during the negotiating process and I was the only one who made concessions, compromises etc, which ended up costing me more in the end. The only good thing I will say about this team is that Tiffany Masek, their Closing Coordinator was the most responsive, she did follow up on issues, even though they may have been out of her lane. Unfortunately, she was unable to perform any of the negotiations or work through any issues due to her role. I have sold several homes in the past and I can honestly say, this was the worst experience I have encountered. We were finally able to close on the home, with delays of course, an experience I am thankful to put behind me.

Lauren was the main point of contact in helping us find our forever home. She was amazing to work with. While she showed us homes we found, Brian came out to meet and greet us as well. He provided us with knowledge about the homes with how they were built and structured. This team is amazing and would definitely do business with them again if the need ever arises.

I highly recommend the Welcome Home Team. Brian, Sarah, and Maddie were extremely helpful throughout the entire process of buying a new home. The team was extremely supportive and accommodating for me throughout my PCS to Fort Bragg. I found it very helpful how Brian and Maddie were able to work with me even though I was several states and oceans away at parts of my home-buying experience. They were able to take the things that I wanted in a home and give me a very good list of options. On the 2 days that I was actually able to spend time in the area looking at houses we went on great home showings in many different areas to give me a better sense of what would best fit me. Maddie talked me through the whole process of buying a home and was able to answer my questions in ways that were very easy to understand the somewhat overwhelming process. Once I decided on a home that I liked Brian was very good at advising me on making my offer and subsequent counteroffers. 
Once the seller and I had agreed on a final price and conditions, Sara walked me through everything that I would need to do from that moment until final closing. It felt very easy for me to schedule a home inspection and prepare myself to move into my new home. She kept me up to date on everything as it happened and what I should expect next. Once the results of my inspection came in, Brian called me to go through everything and had a very honest conversation with me about the different aspects of the house that came up in the report. 
Finally, we did the final walk through before closing. Maddie and I took a look at everything that we agreed upon the seller fixing from the Home inspection. I felt so comfortable with signing at the closing because I had such a great team from the Welcome Home Team that gave me all the information that I could need to make informed decisions and ultimately find my new home in Fayetteville. 
Throughout my entire home buying experience I felt well informed and in the best position to make the right choices that are a big deal in any new home buyer’s life. I never once felt like I was just another customer, which has unfortunately been a problem that a lot of my friends have felt in their own experiences. If you’re looking for a more personable home buying process through your realtor then this is the business to go through. If I was to do it all over again, I would still pick up the phone and call the Welcome Home Team to find my next house.

Brian contacted me shortly after I started looking through the Dave Ramsey ELP site. He was professional, punctual, and easy to work with. Any questions we had during the house searching process and up to the point of sale, he was right there. I recommend working with him and the Welcome Home team.

I can’t begin to say enough about our experience with Brian, Sara and Mandy.  They would go above and beyond for us at any given time.  They were professional, compassionate and most of all patient with us when it came to purchasing this property.  I would highly recommend this team to anyone out there looking to either buy or sell a property.  

They are an AMAZING team of realtors!!!

Thank you again guys for everything!!!

I am very grateful for the entire team at KW! I have had bad luck in the past and was very hesitant about an agency that would really work for me and with me. They have a member each step of the process that really is an expert in that area from the agent, to the listing and marketing team and all the way to the end of closing the team has really been there to answer any and all questions. They were available text, email or phone call, making it easier to pass information. I live out of state which I thought would be so much more stressful and it was not at all. They called for repairs and lawn care per my guidance (and the companies where not outrageous in price). Made the entire experience a lot less stressful (I stress over everything). I could not have had a better team of people to represent me and my family. Thank you all so much.
display_name: KW Team are wonderful to work with

comment:
The KW Welcome Home Team are Rockstars!!  My experience with the Welcome Home Team was nothing short of amazing! I came to them after having a less than desirable experience with another realtor and they exceeded my expectations!  They made me feel as if I was their ONE and ONLY customer and kept me informed.  I did not have to chase them for information and they delivered what they promised!! I appreciated the Friday check ins from Sara to make sure I didn't have any questions.
Many thanks to Michele Crockett and Sara Summers for all of your hard work and to Brian for leading a superb team.  Will definitely refer others to your team and come back when we out-grow our space!!

I have had nothing but an amazing experience with the Welcome Home Team. My husband & I were first time home buyers and knew absolutely nothing about this process when we first started. Thankfully we got extremely lucky with Nick Eiberger & Sara Summers. These two worked wonderfully with keeping us in the loop, being extremely honest, and the maintained the best attitude through it all. I would highly recommend everyone to Nick Eiberger. He absolutely went above and beyond, we will never go to anyone else for any buying need! Thanks a bunch you guys, we are so thankful for all of you!

Working with the Welcome Home team of KW, and in particular, Sara Summers and Michelle Crockett made our home-buying experience incredibly easy and surprisingly fast! Because of their expertise, connections, and can-do attitudes, we were able to close and move into our beautiful home much sooner than we had hoped. Our agent Michelle got us a showing immediately, and after seeing the home ourselves, we knew there would be offers pouring in. Fortunately, Michelle was confident and we are so glad for following her advice because our offer was accepted as highest and best! Sara Summers quickly took over from there to ensure we knew what to expect each step of the way and kept all the parts moving along flawlessly. She was such a pleasure to work with and incredibly professional. When there appeared to be a small hiccup in the timeline at one point, Sara immediately went out of her way to make it right (even after business hours!) and got our contract back on track. She even hooked us up with an amazingly thorough home inspector called John, owner of Silk Inspections, who came out a couple of extra times after the initial inspection to ensure some work that was needed on the house was done right. To this day, I don't know how Sara was able to accomplish so much in such little time. Sara Summers is a woman you want in your corner!! I highly recommend the Welcome Home Team of KW, and would work with them in the future without hesitation!

Sara Summers and Michelle Crockett went above and beyond for us to get the house of our dreams! Michelle made sure we had the best offer to get the house just a day after we viewed it! Sara moved mountains and went above and beyond to ensure we could close before the holiday weekend and move in before my parents arrived. She was constantly on the phone with the inspector and the people fixing the house to ensure everything was done right and on time. She did not hesitate to make additional phone calls if other parties fell behind schedule. Without her extra effort we would not have been able to move in before the holiday weekend and be ready to host my family. I highly recommend the Welcome Home Team to anyone looking to buy a house. Their expertise and work ethic are second to none and made the home buying experience very easy.

Absolutely a first rate experience for us.  After almost 10 years of renting it, we made the decision that we needed to sell our house.  Lindsey and the whole team made it an easy and relaxing experience.  They kept us totally informed throughout the process, and made great recommendations as far as simple repairs to make, listing price, and strategy.  All their homework paid off for us, as the house was only on the market for three days before we had a contract.  I would absolutely recommend the team to anyone needing to buy or sell a house in the area.  They were truly top-notch!

Nick with the welcome home team truly goes above and beyond to make the process of buying a house as easy and stress free as possible. It didn’t matter what time we texted or called he responded. He would meet to discuss details about the house and how everything was going and truly made us feel like we were a priority. If anyone is considering buying a house in the Fayettville and surrounding areas I promise you wanna use the welcome home team.

I won’t work with any other Real Estate company!! The Welcome Home Team of KW have been amazing! They answered all our questions, were very patient, knew what they were talking about, and following their advice paid off. They were not pushy. They offered their advice but made sure we knew that the final decisions were ours. The entire team was helpful. I never walked away from a conversation confused or upset. They were encouraging the entire way. Simply amazing!

I can’t say enough about working with the Welcome Home Team. We were nervous to finally sell our house, especially because we were living out of state. The process was quick, easy, and stress free. I felt well informed during the process and was very happy with how they negotiated for us. I would highly recommend using them!

This team was extremely professional from start to finish.  I couldn't ask for a better group to work with.  Sabrina Bailey and Sara Summers worked hard to ensure the process went smoothly.  I would highly recommend them to anyone wanting to buy or sell a home.
Michelle is such an excellent realtor , she does everything she can to make the process easy... we just love her !!!!!

Extremely happy!!! We live 2500 miles away and they made us feel like we were right there with constant excellent communication. Thank you for everything we could not have sold the house without you!!!!

I had the BEST experience with Brian and staff from The Welcome Home team. They are very professional, knowledgeable & pay attention to detail. I could not have asked for a better experience. I HIGHLY recommend!!!

I really can not say enough great things about the Welcome Home Team at Keller Williams. If you are looking to sell and/or purchase a home, these are the people you want working for you and with you. They have walked me through each and every step. Sara, Amy, Lindsay and Michele are amazing!!!!!!!!! Thank you ladies.

We had the pleasure of working with several members of the team and everyone was absolutely amazing! This was our first time buying a home and were very nervous about taking this big step. Brian O'Connell was so nice and put us with one of his realtors Sabrina Bailey and she is AMAZING! We saw so many houses and she really listened to everything we wanted and needed for our home. She really goes above and beyond to figure how to get you the best possible deal! Once we got our deal accepted on the house we fell in love with we had the pleasure of working with Sara Summers for all of our paperwork everything was so smooth I am so thankful for all their hardwork.

I absolutely couldn’t have asked for a better team to work with! My family worked with Michele as our realtor but behind the scenes there were so many people we can’t begin to thank for all of their help and being so patient with all of our questions as first time buyers! We will never use anyone else!

After doing some research, interviewing some agents, and reading reviews (like this one) my wife and I settled on The Welcome Home Team. My company asked me to relocate to the Fayetteville area, and not being locals, it made it that much more important that we find an agent that knew the local area   well so we don't wind up somewhere we didn't really want to be. From the very first phone call Brian was a consummate professional. He listened to my wife and I's concerns, offered advice before we agreed to work with him, and was responsive to follow-on emails. Ultimately we worked with Sabrina Bailey, and even though she is one of the team's newer agents, you'd never know it. She agreed to show us homes at the last minute after two other offers fell through because of egregious stuff found on the home inspection. Sabrina and The Welcome Home team talked us off the ledge a couple times and were very patient when answering our plethora of questions. I intend to ardently recommend them to any other colleagues that may need to find an agent. To call them competent falls short and fails to capture just how professional and wonderful The Welcome Home team is. If you're in need of a realtor that knows their stuff, has a crack shot support team, and will be uber responsive to you which will ultimately make an already stressful process much less so, do yourself a favor and please reach out to The Welcome Home team.

This is our second home purchase and Laura went above and beyond! She took care of every detail and helped with all of the particulars. We were shopping from out of state and she knew exactly what homes would fit our style and dreams! When we made an offer she was solid and confident with negotiating with the sellers, inspectors and contractors to get the house ready for us!! I cannot recommend her highly enough!

Laura was the ultimate professional throughout the entire house search.
Through her inquiries of my needs and conversation with me she knew what I was seeking to find.   She was helpful, informative, but never pushy.   She helped me through the entire purchase process.
Laura helped us buy, and then later sell our daughter’s condo in Greenville.   She was great to work with and attentive to every detail and question throughout each process!

Laura was the best possible agent ever.  Being long distant sellers we needed someone on the ground to handle maintenance and upkeep problems in order to get the house sold.  We could not have asked for a better "partner" to get the house sold.

From listing to closing was about 1 month.  Everything was handled professionally and with care and helpfulness.

The bottom line is if you need an agent in the Greenville are, Laura is the one.

Laura is simply the best realtor in the area! She is extremely knowledgeable about the area, attuned to her clients’ needs and interests, and has great experience with negotiating the market. She helped us navigate the home-buying process with her professional-but-sweet approach and displayed such a willingness to help out any way she could. We can’t recommend Laura enough, and a bonus, our young kids love her too!

Laura’s attention to detail, Pitt County market expertise, and diligence is so valuable and has made all the difference in all three transactions we’ve executed with her. She is communicative and genuinely cares about her clients and their homes. Her network of contacts was also extremely helpful in escrow, maintenance of our homes, and beyond. We are so grateful to Laura for going above and beyond for our family!

Laura Skinner was our primary realtor. Initially we worked with Laura and Katie Holloman (owner of Haystack Reality), but Laura did most of the work with us after that. Laura seemed to understand everything we needed to do and when she was not 100% sure she discussed the issue in question with her colleagues at Haystack. I appreciated that when Laura was unsure she did not guess what to do and instead did the appropriate research. Laura also volunteered useful information such as charities and removal companies as well as helping us with a check list for moving. Whenever we had a question, Laura responded quickly even on the weekend. Laura always presented an honestly friendly demeanor.  Our experience was that Laura Skinner was knowledgable, responsive, and friendly.
Laura's knowledge and familiarity of the market and the local area made my search and eventual purchase an all around positive experience.
Laura was a true professional if she didn’t know the answer to my questions she would find out and get back to me

We really lucked out when Haystack Realty was recommended as a realty company that would be helpful in selling my parents' 1930s era home.  Laura was quick to recognize the many positives about the house but also honest in assessing the drawbacks that might give a buyer pause.  She made recommendations for some easy things to address before putting the house on the market and was knowledgeable about the types of buyers who might be interested in the home and how to cater to those individuals.  The open house she hosted resulted in a remarkable number of visitors and within only a couple of days we had an offer that more than met our requirements.  There were a few hiccups during the contract process, but Laura provided excellent guidance and ultimately was able to secure the deal we wanted.  I would definitely recommend Laura and Haystack Realty to others, particularly folks who are looking to sell or buy an older home.

Laura and her partner Katie provided accurate guidance before putting our house on the market, regarding timing, asking price and how to prepare the house for showing.  They skillfully marketed the house using high quality photography and other advertising and staged the empty house to show it off effectively.  The sum of this preparation was multiple offers submitted during its first weekend on the market including one very favorable offer which we accepted.  During the time before closing the buyers tried to strong-arm a better deal and Laura helped us navigate the tough negotiations to reach a settlement we were very happy with.  Throughout the entire process Laura was helpful, knowledgeable, flexible, and very friendly.  It was a pleasure working with her.

Mrs. Skinner was an amazing realtor who was was an absolute pleasure to work with! She made the whole process so smooth and stress-free (as much as she could), always keeping me informed and going the extra mile to make sure everything was just right. Her knowledge, experience, and dedication truly set her apart. She genuinely cared about finding the best fit for me and treated me like family. I couldn’t be happier and would recommend her to anyone looking for a fantastic realtor!
She was encouraging when things were not seeming to move.  She would return my calls and my text.
Laura was so great! She was so helpful every step of the way and went above and beyond to help us!

She was able to find me exactly the home that was right for me and worked diligently to get the deal closed. Exceptional knowledge of the local market and had lots of connections for local inspectors and tradesmen to help even after purchase. Sometimes it felt like she knew what I was looking for even better than I did. When obstacles came up with title attorneys, bank mortgage assessors, and work to be done she found a solution and handled it all with ease and punctuality. The home buying process would have been very difficult if not for her work getting the deal sorted and ironing out the wrinkles. Without hesitation would recommend her for buying or selling a home it was a great experience.

Laura is extremely knowledgeable, coordinated, and resourceful! She guided us through an unforeseen realty issue, contracted out all the inspection findings that needed addressing, and she was able to close the deal without delay!

Laura's knowledge of the market and presentation of our home was such an asset.  She was available and anticipatory in answering our questions and handling issues that arose. She kept us informed about the activity with our home and her marketing plan.We highly recommend her services and Haystack Realty. It was a pleasure to work with her from our first encounter to the closing of our home. Give her the opportunity to help you and you’ll be impressed!

Laura was not only professional, but also patient, kind and very thorough. She was with us every single step of the way and she exceeded all of our expectations in our home journey. We are so grateful for Laura and have not only walked away from this home selling and buying experience with our dream property, but a new friend in Laura. Thank you Laura!
Laura is the best she is greatest Realtor ever! She is always on top of everything all the way through. Couldn’t have had a better person to be there working for us.

Laura was a pleasure to work with and very helpful to me in both selling my home and purchasing my current home. She was very patient with me throughout both the selling and buying process, and was a valuable source of knowledge and support. I highly recommend Laura for your buying or selling needs!

Laura Skinner made our first home buying experience a wonderful one! She was patient, professional, and a joy to work with. Her expertise is unmatched, and her numerous contacts and acquaintances in the real estate business made our home buying experience a breeze. We will be calling her again!

Look no further than Laura Skinner for your real estate needs. When I moved from out of state one year ago, I doubted whether I could end up in a house that checked all the boxes within my price range. Laura navigated a tricky seller's market and made this dream home a reality. It's clear that she is highly respected in the real estate business and knows North Carolina better than anyone. She will help you land an amazing deal on your next home. I'm grateful for Laura's service and friendship, and one year later am still recommending her to everyone. Laura has done so much for me, and I can't thank her enough! I can't imagine going with any other agent.
Laura did a great job in aiding me thru the process of purchasing the Farmville property. I couldn't ask for more.

We had an extremely difficult closing due to no fault of Laura’s and she handled it with such grace and professionalism. She kept us updated and we never felt like we were going through it alone. I’d recommend Laura to anyone in a heartbeat!

I had a great experience with Mrs. Skinner. With this being my first home purchase, I did not know what to expect with this whole process. She took the time to explain what to expect and provided professional advice that ultimately allowed me to close on my first house. I am so appreciative and thankful to have had her for the whole process.

Kelly Ward is an excellent agent. The consummate professional, she went way above and beyond to ensure that the house sold and was a great source of insight and advice along the way. We wouldn’t hesitate to call on Kelly again and give her our highest recommendation.
Kelly is professional plus compassionate. She goes above and beyond her duties. I recommend Kelly as your real estate agent, she won’t disappoint you.

We listed our home with Kelly and she organized an open house on a Saturday. By Sunday  we had multiple offers and were very pleased with her ability to market our property.  I would highly recommend Kelly to friends and family!
Kelly was amazing! She helped me find my home even after I almost gave up, and I couldn’t be more grateful!
I couldn’t be more pleased with her professionalism. My house was sold quickly and the process went smoothly. I recommend using Kelly as your real estate agent. She will give you 110%.

Kelly overcame every single challenge with absolute grace and class if you are looking for agent that will be there for you Kelly is the way to go!!!!!  I would highly recommend her to anyone.  She walked us through everything from start to finish and is now prepping our old home to sell.  I cannot say enough great things about her!
Kelly was there for everything and  I think she is the greatest realtor ever a friend recommend Kelly. Best decision ever to pick her

Kelly has knowledge of the area that is incredibly valuable.  She is friendly, professional, and responsive.  With our first home buying experience, the agent made us feel like we were just money to be made.  In contrast, this time around, I felt Kelly actually wanted to help us score our dream home at a good price and was willing to put in the work to make it happen.  She genuinely cares about her clients and wants them to be happy.  Thanks again, Kelly!

I couldn't have been more pleased to have Kelly Ward as my real estate agent.  She helped me through every step of the process and went above and beyond what was necessary to find my house. Thank you for all your hard work!

We have purchased 14 homes over the past 35 years and I can emphatically state that Kelly Ward is the finest real estate agent we have ever worked with. Her responsiveness, knowledge of the local area, and willingness to go the extra mile to get the job done is truly exemplary. My wife and I felt like we were in good hands from the moment we meet her. An outstanding professional that we hope to continue to work with in the future!

I cannot say enough good things about Kelly, my husband and I were first time home buyers and she really took the time to keep us well-informed and up to date on the entire process. Her prompt responses to my phone calls and emails made the entire process easy and enjoyable. I would highly recommend Kelly to anyone and everyone!
We have worked with a  lot of realtors over the years. We found Cheryl to be the best of all that we have worked with. She is extremely responsive and caring about your needs.

Cheryl is an outstanding agent and communicator, quickly responding to our questions, providing professional suggestions and always ready to help through our buying process. We will Absolutely call on her to list our home when we have it ready!
Thank you, Cheryl!

This is the second time that we have worked with Cheryl and it could not have been any easier.  Always willing to help with anything we needed.  I think she would show up at the house to move in the boxes with us.  If you need a realtor please call her, you won't be disappointed.

Michelle was ALWAYS there when we needed her. Always positive, straight-up honest, and very knowledgeable! She went above and beyond our expectations. We wouldn't be here, at home, without you. You made it fun!
'While GOD has you in his hands, we'll keep you in our hearts'.  
Thank you so much, Michelle!

We bought our first house with Thomas, and he made it an empowering and great experience! He was able to accommodate our difficult schedule (having only two weekends in a row to look at houses), and we wound up with the perfect house for us. He helped us figure out the important issues to look at in houses, and saved us tens of thousands of dollars in the final offer we put down in our home. Lovely and professional, we highly recommend Thomas to anyone!
Debi is amazing! She sold our home and helped us through the process of buying another. She worked long and hard to find our perfect home.  I would highly recommend!

From our first conversation, I felt honesty and professionalism from Mrs. Edwards. Our sale had many moving parts. My family trusts my instincts and thanx to Debi , I was correct. We felt She had our back throughout the process. Debi went above and beyond in numerous instances. 
I felt grateful that throughout the process She was available!!
Answered any Call, Email, or text same day. We are definitely
going to ask for help on the next sale....Her company is well represented by her knowledge and helpful manner...Bravo!!

Debi was professional and communicative throughout the entire process.  She is very knowledgeable about the area and walked us through different scenarios based on current comps.  The preparation for showing and the sale of the property went flawlessly.  All her doing.  She was fabulous!
Debi was thorough, professional and great to work with. Sold our condo the first day listed!
Best agent ever!! Always kept me informed of what was going on.

As the executor of the estate of a family member, I had the task of selling their home.  Debi made the process pain-free and simple.  If an issue arose, she had a solution and everything worked with the best possible scenario that I could ever have imagined.  I would highly recommend Debi to assist you with  purchase or sell of any property.
So patient and always keeps you informed.

Debi was amazing to work with! She was wonderful with communicating with us throughout the process and guiding us through the unknown world of real estate (first time home buyer)! She helped calm my nerves and makes the process as stress free as possible! And now…we have our dream home!!!!!

I had a great experience with Debi. I was in search of my first home in New Bern and she helped me find it! I couldn't be more happy in my new home and it's all thanks to her! I would recommend her to anyone!

Debi was excellent to work with. She worked hard to find us the perfect house for our unique situation. She is very knowledgeable of the area and the whole house buying/selling process which took some of the stress out of the process for us. She always responded quickly to any of our questions or concerns, and we sure did have a lot of them. She is also kind and very easy to talk to. I would highly recommend Debi for any real estate needs!

Debbie is absolutely wonderful to work with. It’s like having a friend on the “inside” that is working for you. She really care about her clients as well as the community and neighborhood she lives in. She was very attentive and made the process of buying a home smooth.

I can't say enough good things about Debi.  It was almost as if she knew what we were looking for before we told her.  She was very helpful with us throughout the process of buying a home.  I would recommend her to anyone looking for their next home!!

We purchased a second home with the help from Debi. Debi Edwards was able to make the complicated process very streamlined and easy, handling all of the communication on our behalf, researching and organizing the tremendous amount of paperwork. If you're looking for a realtor who is always incredibly cheerful and positive, keeps a calm demeanor yet is firm with all parties involved and is always a step in front of the process, this is your realtor. Even after the sale was complete Debi continues to assist with small questions we have from the seller and surrounding area. Debi will make your home needs her own, remaining highly professional while fitting in as family! You can't find anyone better. Her resources and highly skilled contacts are an asset in and of themselves. She knows personally someone for everything. Take it from a very busy husband and wife entrepreneur team with kids, if you're buying or selling stop looking and contact Debi Edwards.

Debi is amazing! She listened carefully to our preferences and scheduled viewings based on our likes and dislikes. We appreciated Debi's low-key style. When we viewed properties, she gave us time to privately explore and talk without pressure. Debi genuinely wanted to get us into a property that would meet our needs. When we were ready to make an offer on a property, she was a skillful yet realistic negotiator. 

We would like to thank Debi for all of the work she did in getting our property to close for us. Early morning texting, late night phone calls and emails; always positive and always cheerful. She was a terrific realtor to have representing us! I highly recommend her for all your real estate needs.
Debi was amazing to work with. She kept me updated daily and when we found a house we loved, she jumped right on it for us and made it happen. She went above and beyond! Would definitely recommend!

Debi is wonderful she made the whole house hunting and process of purchasing a breeze! She is prompt and always on top of new listing. She very honest and trustworthy as well! she is highly recommended

Debi communicated effectively with us from beginning to end.  It is apparent that she is very knowledgeable about the real estate market and her expertise shines.  I would recommend Debi to all of my family and friends who are searching for a realtor!

My husband and I were looking to purchase a new home in New Bern NC area.  We are currently living in CT and knew that we would need someone who would help us navigate the process from a distance.  A local CT realtor recommended Debi to us.  She was patient with helping us find exactly what we were looking for.  At first we had a very specific target area we were looking in.  But after the market did not work out for us in that area, Debi kept looking for us, while were were navigating from CT.  She found us what is now our new home at a time when we were not able to make the trip down there to see the property in a timely manner.  We trusted her enough to make an offer on the place sight unseen.  She helped us make an offer that was sure to be competitive in the tight market. Our offer was finally accepted and she helped navigate us through a remote closing.  Debi has gone above an beyond to even make sure the AC/heat were properly set until we can personally get down to our new home.  

You will not be disappointed with the level of service and market knowledge that Debi provides.

She is very knowledgeable of her job and an outstanding lady to work with to sell your house . Debi came over and gave us some suggestions to get our house ready to sell . She handled everything from this point forward. The house sold in two days of being on the market. Debi made this process of selling our home seem so easy. I’m very grateful to have had her as my realtor.

Hi Debi Edwards is really good and a great asset to the hunt for your house. We started with Meg Underwood for the couple of  weeks but the holidays were coming up fast and she had family plans. So she turned us on to Debi Edwards and she took over without missing a beat. I was leary at first because Meg was so good but ends up Debi was just as good she had several houses for my sister to look at every time but every time as soon as the homes hit the market they were gone. This didn’t faze her we put in several offers but than Thanksgiving hit and she didn’t take time off and believes that’s why we got the house because all the contractors that were hoarding up all the houses did and we scored. I believe it was because of dedication to the job. I would recommend their team to anyone so 5 stars to them in my book.

Debi is so awesome! She went above and beyond to help me find and secure the perfect home for myself and my family. After months of searching, when I wanted to give up, Debi never did and she wouldnt let me give up either. Even when my original mode of financing fell thru, Debi put me on to her trusted mortgage company and they were able to get the deal done. Signed, sealed, and delivered, Debi and her team came thru for me! Choosing Debi to help you find the perfect home is definitely the best choice to make, hands down!

Simply the best to work with and we would highly recommend choosing Debi Edwards to anyone who has a need to sell or purchase a home or lot.  She was very helpful from the beginning to the end of our purchasing experience.

Debi was the most helpful realtor in every way. She would always find out answers to any question I would have . Debi always had a positive attitude with a happy demeanor to her. She kept me calm when I was getting frustrated. Debi is definitely the realtor I would recommend to all.
Debi is extremely attentive, communicative, and knowledgeable.  Helpful in all areas.  I would use her again and again if I could!  Highly recommended.

It was our first time working with Jason, and we were blown away!  His attention to us was so focused that it felt like we were his only clients.  After a short time of listening to us and talking with us, he understood exactly what kind of property we were looking for.  His response time in answering our texts was incredible.  He fiercely, yet politely, negotiated on our behalf.  After we were under contract, he met us at the property and let us in whenever we asked.  When there were unforeseen delays in the closing process, Jason stayed on top of all parties involved.  Jason's our guy for any further listing or buying!
display_name: Tom and Christy Jaski, Wilmington, NC

comment: Jason was amazing. He guided us through the home buying process, made recommendations and made sure our offer was competitive. Once we bought the home, he was able to make recommendations on contractors to update our property. He is a great real estate agent that will go above and beyond for you! Highly recommend.
Tammy and Jason were true professionals which is why we hired them.  Sold the house in 24hrs at full listing and helped make the closing flawless.  Highly recommend!

Jason was referred to us by the realtor selling our townhouse in Raleigh as we were relocating to Wilmington. Over a period of two weeks Jason found us the perfect home, in a perfect location and at the perfect price. He knew every location in Wilmington we were interested in and helped us finalize the deal. Having bought and sold over 20 houses in our lifetime, some with realtors and some without, we can say without a doubt Jason was the best by far. We were so pleased with Jason that we have now engaged him to sell our house again because we have found the perfect beach condo in Carolina Beach. We are confident that Jason will assist us in a quick sale and at a favorable price. We highly recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell.  Bill Schiller and Judy Cook

We bought a house from Jason and he was so helpful. We live out of state and were not able to go and look at the house. He took a narrated video for us which let us see the while house. Everything went very smoothly. He helped us get an inspection, recommended an exterminator and set up everything with the lawyers. He made the buying of the house from afar so easy. Jason was available for all our questions. I highly recommend him if you need to buy or sell a house!

We had a pretty unique situation selling our house, and Jason did a great job handling it. We found him to be forthcoming with advice that was helpful in staging and geting the house prepared. He was realistic about his assessment of the market and was clear on what we should expect. We found him very knowledgeable throughout the transaction.

Jason Bell was easy to work with and deal with.  Jason got us over our asking price, and we were quite pleased working with him.  He took care of many of the "1000 paper cuts" that happen when selling a house, and made the entire process easy-peasy.
Jason's extensive knowledge and professionalism made our real estate experience positive and productive. Jason has on-the-ground insights on the market, trends, and strategies to assist clients.
Jason was courteous and professional. He always returned call/texts immediately. My home sold and closed in weeks!

We have worked with Jason twice now, first when we purchased our house and now seven years later when we sold it. Jason was able to adapt a selling strategy that worked for the pandemic and got us multiple offers the first day. His attention to detail, communication skills and knowledge of the local market set him way above the competition. Even when we were not working with Jason directly, he was always a phone call away for a suggestion/recommendation.

My husband and I worked with Jason Bell to buy our home seven years ago and then again in June to sell that home.  Jason has been great to work with both times!  He is very knowledgeable, fair, personable, and communicative!  We’ve kept in touch with him over the years and always been very helpful with a recommendation for a household job and checked in to see how we’re doing.  Both in purchasing our home in 2013 and selling it in 2020 was a very smooth transaction and low-stress.  If you are in need of a realtor, call Jason Bell!

Jason was a great asset in helping us buy our home. He was patient and got back to us quickly when we reached out with questions. He helped us find a home that fit our specific needs in our price range. Thanks Jason for being such a great realtor and helping us through the process!

Our experience with Jason Bell was flawless.  He is a true professional.  Each home we viewed, he would point out things we had not even noticed.  That is a real help.  He knows the area so well.  He has the expertise you want in your realtor.

Jason aided in my locating, and purchasing a new residence during what has to be one of the most stressed periods of the real estate market here in North Carolina, brought about excess demand and declining inventory.
I found him to be knowledgeable and exceedingly pleasant to work with.
The entire process was as stress less as it could have been.

We worked with two other realtors that were not working out for us so we got referred to Jason and he helped us not only find a home but close early. From start to finish it was less than 31 days. He truly made the impossible, possible. He’s a wonderful person to work with and I would strongly refer him to everyone looking to buy or sell their home!
Great to work with.  Made excellent suggestions for getting house ready to list and made the process very easy as we progressed through the selling process.

We can totally endorse the positive reviews here for Jason. We recently closed on a home we sold and from the first exploratory meeting to the last closing event Jason was in control and guided us through the whole transaction with excellent professionalism and efficiency. Not to mention he was instrumental in getting us a price for the house that was above our expectations. Can't speak highly enough of him. If you are looking for a Realtor, look no further. Jason is the man.
N/A

Jason and his entire team worked very professionally through the entire process. We looked at quite a few homes and put in 3 unsuccessful bids before finding the right one for us. Jason kept our spirits up during the down times and did a great job even After closing with some details that he wasn't obligated to pursue but he did it just to help.

We are also grateful to Taylor as she showed us around some homes we wanted to see on short notice. A great realtor in her own right.

Jason is a true professional through and through. Its obvious he is in it to delivery the best. We had a few hiccups along the way and Jason never skipped a beat. Also a wealth of knowledge for who to call in various situation. This is what a real estate agent is supposed to be. Excellent service.
N/A

Jason Bell seems to read my mind when we started discussions about selling my property.  He has the customer’s interest at heart and goes beyond his own time, with dedication and focus - Jason also has good contacts whenever  I needed advice.  All-in-one, Jason exceeded all my expectations, that were set pretty high!  I highly recommend  his professional services if you plan to optimize everything.

Referral to me from a personal friend in the profession. Met and exceeded all of my needs and requests. Will absolutely continue to conduct business with Jason Bell and Associates. Absolutely professional.

Jason is a warm and friendly people-person who easily navigated our family's different personalities while identifying objections and continuosly customizing our house hunt to meet everyone's needs. Everyone in the family wanted something different and we all got it! nJason's support staff was friendly and professional. Their communication was great throughout the entire process of selling and purchasing.

Jason was so helpful every step of the way. The search process felt overwhelming when we were looking on our own, but once we connected with Jason, he was able to pinpoint homes that were perfect for our goals. He was very consistent and responsive all throughout, even during the contract phase. So much of the paperwork was out of my league, but Jason was patient and helpful the whole time. We are really thankful for his involvement in finding our home and will definitely call him again next time!

Jason Bell is tenacious. He finds out what you want and need and doesn't stop until he locates it. For our first place in Kure Beach, we had thought that the negotiation was over as the seller did not want to come down in price. So we walked away. But Jason didn't. He kept after them, and eventually, to my surprise, got the house for us. And he provided help to locate financing, a handy man, painter, etc. After a while it became clear that the lack of a garage and and the stairs got in the way of our enjoyment. Jason got on the case and helped us during a long and arduous negotiation with a seller. It eventually fell through, but not because of Jason. And after that, he found us the perfect home. We got it at a price that we didn't think would be accepted. We've been there for several years and love it. I would highly recommend Jason to anyone looking for a home in the Wilmington area. He's the best.

Megan made our process so easy and smooth. She always there when we need her, she made sure everything went well and check on us. 
She contacted us after a month or 2 that we got our home. Just to check on us and our new home. 
Highly recommend her for her excellent work!

From the moment I met Megan, I knew I was in good hands. Buying a home can be incredibly stressful, but Megan transformed the experience into something genuinely fun.

What sets Megan apart from other realtor is her commitment to taking our time in buying a home. There was never a hint of pressure, no rushed showings, and no feeling that I was being pushed towards a decision. She understands that finding the right home is personal. Every question I had, no matter how small or how many times I asked, was answered with patience and clarity.

Megan is incredibly friendly! She made me feel comfortable from the first showing, and it was clear that they genuinely cared about finding me a home I would love. She was meticulous in showing me the properties, pointing out both the pros and cons, and ensuring I had a complete understanding of each house.

Throughout the entire home buying process, Megan was a constant advocate. She was always looking out for my best interests, negotiating skillfully, and working tirelessly to secure the best possible deal. I felt confident that she was on my side, and that she committed to ensuring I was happy with every aspect of the transaction.

If you're looking for a realtor who is patient, thorough, and genuinely cares about their clients, I HIGHLY recommend Megan! She made the home buying process a positive and memorable experience, and I couldn't be happier with my new home!

We met Megan through my son, who she helped buy a wonderful townhouse. She did such a great job with him that we used her to sell our Myers Park condo. She was always available, she handled all questions offered up by potential buyers, provided a professional marketing video and photo layout and our condo sold in 6 days!

Morgan was awesome, she went out of the way to do what ever she could during the sale and afterwards. We loved working with her and would highly recommend Megan….she’s a real sweetheart!! Art & Cherri Moeller

Megan was amazing to work with. We knew upon first meeting her that she had our best interest at heart. The first time we bought a home, we had an absentee realtor who did not do half the things Megan did for us. She goes above and beyond for her clients and we really appreciated everything she did for us. I would recommend Megan to anyone looking to purchase a home and we will use her if we ever need to sell!

Megan is a knowledgeable realtor when it comes to  the realty business. She does extensive research on property values, as well as, appraisal values.  Through her expertise, we avoided paying too much on a home in Mint Hill that was overpriced and would have under appraised.   Megan goes above and beyond to show you a home. We saw homes in Charlotte, Matthews, Mint Hill, Gastonia!  She never complained. No matter where it was or what time we wanted to see it, she was there for us. She also was the listing agent for our home and got us under contract in three days!  She is the 3P’s; Patient, Personal and Professional!  Megan is simply “The Best”!

Megan met and exceed all our expectations throughout the home buying process. She went above and beyond to help us find houses that met our needs and, eventually, close on one that we absolutely love. What we appreciated most about Megan was her candidness and honesty. She never looked out for her own interest and was 100% committed to serving us--her clients. Her willingness to connect us with her expansive network was an unexpected bonus during the search, closing, and ownership process. While Megan is extremely educated as a real estate professional, unlike most agents, she is also not afraid to get her hands dirty and get into attics and crawl spaces to make sure homes don't come with "hidden surprises." If you're looking for an agent who is personable, caring, savvy, intelligent, and full of hustle and energy, Megan will be a great fit for you. She's the best! - Rainer & Sam

Let me start by saying that 5 stars is not nearly enough to rate Megan’s service as a realtor! I purchased my condo in Charlotte from Boston. From the very beginning, Megan was super responsive, checking in on me, and answering questions I had as a first-time homebuyer and arranging all the showings via facetime. This being my first experience buying a home, Megan made sure I felt comfortable with the process every step of the way and answering questions I did not even know I had! She went above and beyond throughout the entire process and put my best interests at the forefront of every home we looked at and every decision I had to make.  I never once felt pressured to make a decision or move on a home that wasn’t a good fit. In this crazy market she strategized and came up with alternate plans to help me better position myself as a buyer! When we found the right place but hit some bumps in the process, Megan fiercely advocated for me and did everything in her power to ensure that we were able to close on time! You definitely want Megan on your team when things don’t go as planned! She is a creative thinker who gets things done! Above and beyond does not adequately express what she did to ensure that everything continued to move forward with the purchase of my condo.  During the entire process Megan made me feel like I was her number one priority and her only customer!

Megan was a wonderful real estate agent! She was personable, knowledgeable, and quick to respond to any questions we had. My fiancé and I were first time homebuyers and she made us very comfortable with the process and had great recommendations to use for both a lender and home inspector. I would recommend her to anyone looking to purchase or sell a home.

Megan helped me find a home very quick.  Whenever I needed to talk to Megan she was available and would always respond to my texts and emails in a timely manner.  I am a first time home buyer so I was lost at many steps along the way, but Megan helped me through each of the steps masterfully.  She went above and beyond her realtor duties by reaching out to people for which I had questions and making useful suggestions for loan companies, lawyers, offers, inspectors, and many other things.  She was very friendly throughout the whole process and a joy to work with.

Megan! Was the best of the best!  She educated me on 
The financial side first which I thought was very useful
She was very patient with me when looking at 
Homes! I couldn’t ask for best!

The hunt for your next home starts with Megan Votruba. She is a relentless go-getter who will work diligently to help you identify the home you want, then patiently guide you through the process.

She is honest, reliable, resourceful and knowledgeable. She will stop at nothing to help you land the home your heart desires and will navigate you EVERY step of the way.

My favorite part of working with Megan is her communication style. She is an effective communicator and an exceptional negotiator. 

She is by far, a cut above the rest!

Jeff Lott was/is the best. Very up front and personal. He went out of his way to help us through the buyers process and even though the sale has been finalized he is still there helping us, like getting us in touch with all of the utility services and more. When ever we had to call to get an answer for a question he was right there.
I would highly recommend Jeff Lott.

Jeff Lott was the best, he was immediately there to answer any our questions wants or needs. Very straight forward individual who actually goed above and beyond his duties as a real estate agent. We highly recommend Jeff.

Jeff Lott is a very professional, friendly, knowledgeable realtor who works very hard (and fast!) for his clients. He was our realtor on the sale of our NC condo and the experience was extremely pleasant and stress-free. Jeff answered all of our questions and provided daily updates throughout the process. Jeff even helped us locate workers for needed repairs!

My husband and I have owned property in Brunswick Plantation for many years. Due to various circumstances, we never moved there and ended up in Arizona. We tried to sell the property two different times to no avail. A couple of months ago, we received a card from Jeff Lott and decided to try this one more time. We agreed on a reasonable price and within a short time Jeff had an an offer for our property. The timing was right and we were happy to proceed with the sale. Jeff has been an absolute pleasure to work with, a great personality, sales experience and competence. Thank you to Jeff for taking care of us. It has been a pleasure, and I would gladly recommend him for anyone needing a great realtor.

My husband and I have owned property in Brunswick Plantation for many years. Due to various circumstances, we never moved there and ended up in Arizona. We tried to sell the property two different times to no avail. A couple of months ago, we received a card from Jeff Lott and decided to try this one more time. We agreed on a reasonable price and within a short time Jeff had an an offer for our property. The timing was right and we were happy to proceed with the sale. Jeff has been an absolute pleasure to work with, a great personality, sales experience and competence. Thank you to Jeff for taking care of us. It has been a pleasure, and I would gladly recommend him for anyone needing a great realtor.

We were seeking to sell our condo and initially sought out Jeff as he lived on the complex. After the initial meet we stopped looking. He managed to help us get the carpeting replaced throughout, painting and patching completed, replace an exterior ceiling fan within 2 weeks, and sold within 50 days of our getting to meet him. Even our dog loved him.   Could not have asked for better service.
Jeff did a good job selling my property. He was attentive to my needs and communication was clear and abundant.

A few years ago we decided to sell our property, we gave a few local realtors contracts however once the contracts were signed we became frustrated at their lack of performance especially when we tried to get status updates.
We were contacted by Jeff; after our conversation regarding the status of the market and options we were convinced that we finally had the right guy.
During the process Jeff was incredibly organized and always kept us up to date. He also assisted us with working with a great legal team.
The bottom line:  We sold our property in a few weeks and are very pleased with the complete process.  If you are looking for a realtor that does a fantastic job.
 Whether you are selling or purchasing real estate Jeff is your go to man.
Jeff was very helpful, informed, knowledgeable and made the entire process as smooth as possible. I would highly recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell in the area
Jeff was great to work with and always responsive and did his best to get the job done
Jeff was responsive to our needs and was instrumental in helping us sell our property.

We truly can’t say enough amazing things about Karen. Not only is she a close friend, but working with her to sell our home was one of the best decisions we’ve ever made. From start to finish, she went above and beyond in every possible way — from her deep market knowledge and sharp negotiation skills to her kindness, patience, and constant communication.

She treated our home sale like it was her own, guiding us through every step with confidence and care. She staged and marketed the house beautifully, helped us make smart decisions, and ultimately got us a fantastic result. We never felt stressed or unsure because we knew we were in the best hands.

If you’re looking for someone who is not only insanely good at what they do but also genuinely cares about their clients, Karen is it. We couldn’t recommend her more highly!

Karen Kimrey's expertise in Real Estate was obvious from our initial meeting with her. Buying a home can be overwhelming and Karen made the process so much easier. She was always there for us through text, email and telephone. Being from out of state we especially appreciated her knowledge of the market. She met and exceeded our expectations. We would highly recommend her to anyone looking to buy or sell a home. She is a true Real Estate professional.

Karen Kimrey with Triad's Finest Real Estate was an excellent realtor.  Her knowledge, professionalism, and resources were incredibly helpful with our home sale process.  She was very responsive to all my inquiries, and efficiently solved every issue that arose.  I always felt like I had an insightful advocate on my team.

As a professional real estate investor, I have delt with 15-20 different agents over the years. I can promise without hesitation Karen is the best!  I have found most agents more or less just go through the process. Not Karen, she goes above and beyond in every aspect. I have used her both on the buyer and seller side and she is amazing. 
For my search I had extremely particular criteria and she more than delivered. I found the EXACT property I wanted and she was able to negotiate an incredible deal. As I was making this purchase as an investment it was very complicated. This particular property had sat on the market for obvious reasons and had lots of question marks. An extremely detailed home inspection and repair list with estimates needed to be done. She works with an extremely knowledgeable but realistic home inspector. On the seller side she found a photographer to take absolutely incredible photos, got a designer to come help me decorate and make use of every possible space.  She definitely takes a team approach! One of her most impressive moments is when she changed from super realtor to donning work clothes to help with a landscaping issue. I got several full price offers within two weeks. I was elated!
I couldn't be happier with the exceptional service provided by Karen Kimrey throughout my home selling and buying journey. From the moment I reached out to her, she demonstrated a remarkable level of responsiveness, professionalism, and knowledge that truly set her apart.
I wholeheartedly recommend Karen to anyone in need of a dedicated, knowledgeable, and dependable real estate professional.

Karen was phenomenal. After several false starts with other realtors Karen responded promptly. We felt strongly that she was our advocate and was very knowledgeable. We are new to the area and she provided guidance and referrals. So happy to have found Karen and her team. We would and will recommend Karen. Very grateful and happy we found the prefect home for us.

After being the buyer or seller of 12 properties in our time involving realtors this lady and her team have proven to be the absolute best we have ever been involved with. She had the offer after being listed 4 days on our home! Do yourself a favor whether buying or selling property and don't consider using anyone else for your real estate needs! Jim & Myra Smith

Karen was great to work with from beginning to end. She was professional, had great knowledge of the market conditions. She was clear, concise and direct in all her communications and was really easy to work with. During a very stressful time, she responded quickly if we had any questions or concerns and provided resources and guidance for any issues we had or references we needed. I would recommend her to anyone looking for a great realtor.

We have relocated to the Greensboro area and Karen has made us feel right at home. Not only did she help us find our dream home, Karen personally went with us to pick out our interior options. We didn’t feel like we were ever just another number. Karen genuinely cared about the outcome. We have already recommended her to anyone that will listen. You cannot go wrong.

Karen is simply exceptional. She helped us navigate our first home buying experience 3 years ago and we quickly learned we loved her style so calling her again was an absolute no-brainer this time around. We put an offer on our new home and walked through the door with keys in our hands in a matter of 4 weeks! We refer every home-browsing friend to her knowing they’ll be well taken care of. Thanks for being honest, effective, consistent, and most importantly, a fast friend. We appreciate you immensely!

We would heartily recommend Karen! She was extremely knowledgeable and professional, and at the same time very personable.
She inspired confidence through each step of the listing and sales process and was fun to work with. She smoothed out the few bumps we encountered with her thorough knowledge of the process.
Job well done!

My Wife and I are greatly appreciated with Karen’s help during and after the sale process of our home. 
She had a great market analysis which made it easier to finalize the sale price of our home. She got all the documentation ready within days, sometimes in hours which made things move faster. Additionally her guidance about the sale process was fantastic.
In just one weekend showing our house was sold. Karen is such a wonderful person and very experienced in real estate business.

Like a nice glass of aged cognac, Phong's service is always exceptional and something truly special. Every transaction, consistently smooth from start to finish. And like cognac, you just know that you will never wake up with a headache the next morning, doesn't matter how many time you have used his service, the experience is always expeditious, amazing and predictable.

Cheers.

I have an excellent team that I am so thankful for. This must be the dozens transaction I have done with Phong and each time it has its own obstacle that we must overcome. With Phong on my team, I have confident that whatever come, we will handle it effectively and swiftly.
How many agent that you know, can juggle a sale and purchase for a client in a single-day? Not many can say they have accomplish such an achievement, but Phong did exactly that for me today. Today, we completed a closing for a house which Phong had listed for me and we will again meet at the settlement table to seal the deal on a purchase of a duplex which I will be adding to my investment portfolio.
 
It is amazing what we can accomplish together as a team and with today’s technology. Phong is an extraordinary agent that I am so glad to have in my circle as a business partner, a friend and advisor. He is family to me.

Phong Lam was referred over to us a few months ago by one of our good friends who had used Phong for many of his transactions before. Our friends told us if we wanted to sell quickly and if we want an agent who will work to our best interest in mind, they told us that Phong can get the job done. After our first encounter with Phong, we knew exactly what our friends were talking about! We wished we would have known Phong sooner! Phong returned our phone calls as soon as he was able to, unlike another agent that we had used before. We called multiple times to one of our previous agents before Phong and then we'll get a call back after 3 days later with that agent. It's unbelievable! Phong never left us hanging. He's always staying on top of his game and always provide us with updates throughout our entire transaction. Unfortunately, we didn't know Phong sooner, otherwise we could have used him to purchase our new home too, but we were already under contract with the new home with another agent. Phong was amazing with his listing techniques! Laid out everything upfront for us and we know exactly how much we will get if certain offers come in. Phong advised us on a range that he thinks we can get from his analysis of the market & provided us with his marketing strategies, and we were originally thinking that we needed to list it at a much lower price than what Phong suggested! Glad that we listened to him. Phong got us a bunch of showings for both of our properties and got multiple offers for both of them! Whatever Phong did with his negotiation, he was able to drive both of our properties with over-asking offers for them! We got both properties under-contract in under 3 days of being on the market! That is just unbelievable!!!! Our 1st primary property sold a couple of months ago and now is our 2nd property that he sold as well for TOP DOLLARS! He is very friendly, polite, knowledgeable and always available whenever we call or text him. Phong is definitely a great asset to Century 21! We are very thankful that Phong was referred to us as he has gone above & beyond any agents that we have ever met! And we have dealt with many agents in the past, but we have now found a keeper! We will definitely refer Phong to many of our other friends and relatives! Keep up the good work!

Scott is an absolutely great realtor! He was very responsive to any questions and concerns I had, ensuring the sales process was a breeze. Scott and his team are simply the best! Not only is he knowledgeable and professional but truly cares for his clients as well. He made a typically stressful process, painless. Scott came highly recommended and now I see why. Thank you Scott and team!

If you are trying to sell your home, work with Scott. He is knowledgable, extremely responsive and most of all - honest and reliable. Scott was an absolute pleasure to work with! He was always available to answer questions and had so much patience throughout the entire process. He was easy to work with, friendly and truly cared about our needs. I would definitely recommend him, he went above and beyond for us.

I could not have been more pleased with Scott and his team and the results they delivered. I reached out to Scott when the pandemic was in full swing, needing a house that was big enough to fit our growing family. From the initial consultation, the videographer, organizing showings, negotiations, closing etc, Scott and his team were incredibly responsive, professional and informative.

Our situation wasn’t unheard of, but it wasn’t easy either. With three young kids we had to sell our house and sign on a new house in the span of a few hours- and they did just that. 

For the property we sold, we had offers literally within hours of the first showing- above asking price. For the property we purchased- we got fair market value for a home that will last forever. 

Hopefully I’ll never move again and this is my forever home, but to anyone out there looking for a realtor, look no further. 

Scott, Jaquie and Team- THANK YOU 

Nick, Nikky and the kids

I cannot thank Scott and his team enough for their support and guidance through our home buying process. Scott clearly had great knowledge of the areas and market, and was always accessible and offering us great advice which made the whole process run smooth. I would highly recommend working with Scott!

Scott, and his colleague, Jacquie, were an absolute dream! As first time home buyers, my husband and I needed a lot of help (1) finding our dream home and (2) navigating the home buying process. Scott and Jacquie made this process so easy. They were both extremely responsive to all of our questions, were patient with us while we were searching for our first home (we never felt rushed or pressured to make any type of decision - Scott and Jacquie wanted us to feel our house was perfect for us before submitting an offer), were extremely knowledgeable in the home buying process and were a fantastic guide on topics ranging from mortgage shopping to home improvements. On top of their wealth of knowledge and professionalism, both Scott and Jacquie are very warm and friendly individuals who earnestly wanted their clients to be happy in their home buying experience. 

My husband and I are so thankful we chose to work with Scott and Jacquie and we cannot stress enough how much we highly recommend them.

Scott and his team were awesome and were able to get us to a new home with everything we wanted.
