He was on point with prices, very responsive, was in constant communication with us and very professional during the entire process.  I would highly recommend Scott and his team to guide you in your next home.

Before we started the home buying process, we heard how difficult and exhausting it could be. But Scott and his team definitely made our experience as painless as possible. Scott was very knowledgeable and was great with guiding us through the process. He was incredibly responsive whenever we needed him. I highly recommend using Scott as your realtor!

I would recommend Scott to anyone! This was the first time we were selling a home so we didn’t even know where to begin. Scott made the entire process very easy for us. He was there to answer any questions for us and always offered us help. He is very honest and professional!

Scott help me in every step, very professional and he made the purchase of my house very easy.
thank you Scott for everything.

We interviewed several realtors before we decided to put our home up for sale.   After meeting with Scott we both knew that he was going to be our realtor. He put together a professional video that highlighted the unique aspects of our house and really made it shine. We received numerous showing requests the first day it was listed. We had a full price offer within 2 weeks.   Scott is by far the best in the business. We are sure the experience would not have been as smooth and successful with another agent.  We highly recommend Scott and would definitely use him again in the future.
You did an excellent professional job from home hunting to our successful closing. We will surely consult with you on anything on real estate. Thank you Scott.

Scott is an excellent Realtor.  His knowledge of New Jersey shore towns

Scott was truly a pleasure to work with. He priced our home right from the start, and gave us great advice throughout the process. An offer to purchase our home came just 9 days after listing! Scott then found us a temporary rental since our new home won’t be ready until early summer. Scott went above and beyond! He earned our trust and we recommend Scott to anyone in the market to buy or sell a home.

Scott was such an awesome guy to work with. Hands down the best choice for us when it came to choosing our realtor. He stayed in touch, communicated with us often, and was always quick to respond to any questions we ever had. He took countless hours out of his week to accommodate our terrible work schedules when showing us houses, and he did a really good job handling my indecisive personality. He was professional yet light hearted, which took a lot of the stress out and made our experience fun. I would highly recommend Scott. I sit here writing this review happy as can be because I’m absolutely in love with the house he made our home.

Scott was a pleasure to work with from start to finish.  He is a true professional with just the right personal touch.  It's true -- home is where the heart is. Scott knows this and will treat you like family.  Don't hesitate to list or search for your home with Scott Zielinski.

Scott plays the realstate game on legendary mode! He’s an extremely hard worker, very responsive, has great network connections, and extremely knowledgeable.

Don’t waste your time with anyone else especially anyone who does this part-time. Using Scott will make your experience the best it can possibly be 100% guaranteed!

I would absolutely recommend Scott for finding your home!

 If you're looking to buy or sell in the Albuquerque or surrounding areas and enjoy working with good people that go above and beyond give this agent a try, you will not regret it!

Being from out of state and looking to sell my property remotely was a bit daunting, I felt very nervous not being there in person. She did the research and put it on the market. We got an offer that was lower than what I wanted and she was quick to advise me not to accept and to counter.  Poof the offer went away and good thing because she was able to bring a buyer who paid full asking!  I was so excited I offered to increase her commission. She professionally declined and said there is no need!  Wow. just wow!  In addition she made sure to keep me abreast of the closing status right through the holidays.  I could not have asked for a better experience! Thank you Danielle!!!

comment: Karina was beyond helpful during the process and never left me in the dark. She made a lasting impression on me when she first sold me my property and I was more than happy that she accepted my plea to sell it for me 5 years later. I seriously cannot thank her enough for all the assistance she provided and how easy she made everything for me, especially being overseas!! She was passionate about meeting my needs and always pulled through. I trusted her every advice and she never failed me, she always worked above and beyond for my best interests. I was so worried about being overseas and having to do handle everything, but Karina made everything so simple, so easy, and there was never a question that she was not able answer, or a concern she was not able relieve. I will definitely be reaching out to her again when I return and decide to purchase another property. THANK YOU KARINA!!
In our experience Karina was very dedicated and responsive throughout the entire process.

Karina is a 10 star agent!!! Her knowledge, expertise and interpersonal skills make her an unstoppable agent that will ALWAYS put her clients needs at the forefront. Her candor is a breath of fresh air in an industry where many will over promise and under deliver. We have had the pleasure of working with Karina in multiple transactions. (1) selling of our first home (2) purchase/build of a custom home (3) purchase of a resale. EVERYTIME she has delivered A+ service we couldn’t see ourselves working with another agent.
She was extremely helpful, worked around the clock to ensure I got exactly what I wanted, and offered her expertise at key phases in the home buying process.

I will gladly and confidently recommend Karina to anyone looking to buy/sell a house. We are a military family and had gotten orders to move to Fort Bliss on short notice. She found us a home despite the pandemic and not being there in person, went through all the stages of the process from getting us preapproved to home inspection to closing. I am grateful we've got to work with her. She was available to answer every question, address every doubt, and calm our fears. She helped us tour the house via video chat and negotiate some fixes with owners before we moved in. Her level of professionalism and efficiency is unparalleled. I highly recommend her services.

Karina was an excellent agent.  She is a knowledgeable and professional who will be with you from looking to closing and beyond. With the COVID-19 crisis Karina was always in contact and answered any question that came up.  I am pleased we got to work with her and Would do it again without a doubt.  She is the best.

Karina was AWESOME! This was our first time buying a house, so we had a lot of questions. Karina was helpful and patient, and she responded quickly to our texts and emails. She paid attention to our wishlist and found a lot of options for us to look at. She worked closely with the loan officer and the sellers to ensure that we moved in on time even though our closing date kept being pushed back waiting for the VA appraisal. We are so grateful for everything Karina did for us! She helped us find out dream home!
Karina was great. She explained everything to me and my wife about the home buying process. She worked hard to find us our dream home with a good deal. She took care of us,  thank you.

Working with Ms.Ochoa was an amazing experience for my family and I. She worked with us before, during, and after the move. Ms.Ochoa also helped us during her off time to find the perfect home. Once we moved in our new home, Ms.Ochoa worked very hard on negotiating small repairs on the home and also checked on us from time to time. Very professional! If we ever purchase another home in the El Paso area, we will definitely give Ms.Ochoa a call. We definitely recommend her!

Exceptional service and was able to solve every problem that came up with the house. Very patient with a high strung seller (myself). Excellent with negotiations and making sure my best interests were in mind.

Mrs. Karina Ochoa was very knowledgeable about today's market, she kept us informed every step of the way during the process of selling our home. I recommend her to everyone  selling or buying a home. She made the process simple. She is an AWESOME realtor. Love her.

Karina was such an amazing help from the start, when I first contacted her to when I closed. After living in our first house for 20 years, we put it on the market. We first listed it with a big firm in El Paso, but after almost 12 months it had not sold. We then terminated the contract with that firm, and signed with Kristen. 2 months later we had a contract and the house sold. She held two open houses, and went the extra mile to make sure the house looked great, even it was not her job to do so. You see, we were not living in the house at the time of sale, as we had already moved up north to Colorado. Kristen were extremely helpful with essentially turning on the utilities, and other things, that she felt that would make the house present in the best way. She is extremely helpful, and will help above and beyond what is required of her, and if we ever have an opportunity to list with her again we would do so.
Thank you Kristen.

Erling Brabaek

When we started our investment journey the "original" plan was to find a property, flip it and sell. Well. We found the house, and we started the flip but then, I FELL IN LOVE. I know, it was my first flip but the house we ended up purchasing was right across the street and a few houses down from my late grandfather's home right in front of the mountain. I had flown in from Florida to oversee the flip with Isabel who helped me coordinate everything from the contractors to finding the local spots you find good deals. Once I told her I can't sell this house she went into overdrive brainstorming and I'm happy to say we landed on Airbnb and everything is going great! We started looking mid 2023, bought the home in March 2024 and 8 weeks later launched The Beachy Bungalow. Isabel is a driving force behind making my dream of keeping this home a reality.  Not only is she the most Awesome REALTOR I know but, also the BEST Airbnb Manager. Thank you Isabel for everything. 10/10!!! AMAZING!!

comment: Isabel was extremely knowledgeable which made it easy for me to rely fully and trust that she was going to get me the best house for my kids and I. She gets things DONE! forever my realtor.
If you're buying, Isabel chacon is definitely the realtor to go to. She made the process of purchasing my first home go smoothly.

Después de entrevistar a cuatro o cinco agentes inmobiliarios, sin exito ya que decian “es un caso muy didicil”. Tube la fortuna Que Isabel tomara mi llamada, Isabel Chacón dijo algo que me conmovió. “Tengo 17 años de experiencia, sé lo difícil que es tratar con una familia que está lidiando con el dolor y los desacuerdos, no se preocupe, puedo vender la casa”, no tuvo dudas sobre sus palabras. Ya habíamos intentado venderla antes sin suerte. Isabel pudo tratar con cada uno de nosotros, diferentes caracteres y personalidades. En resumen, todos estábamos contentos con la venta y con Isabel. Por otro lado, seguro que se esforzó mucho para hacer el mejor trato posible. Isabel respondió a nuestras llamadas y devolvió la llamada o el mensaje de texto con prontitud. Nos dio opiniones constructivas y respuestas concisas. La mejor agente inmobiliaria de todos los tiempos ❤️

BEST ON LAKE TAHOE. Don't work with anyone else. Got us 10% more when we sold and 10% less when we bought. Thanks, Craig!

Working with Craig was a great experience. Craig’s professionalism, knowledge of the marketplace, and overall experience brought real and immeasurable value to the sale of our home.

I highly recommend Craig for any real estate needs.
Competent and professional!
Craig was awesome it assisting us in selling our property. Craig is extremely knowledgeable and great to work with. We highly recommend Craig.

Our experience with Craig Zager was very positive.  He listed, sold, and closed our property in only 2 months.  He works hard to make the deal happen.  We are very pleased with the outcome and would recommend him unconditionally.

Craig and his team were great and provided a seamless experience during the home buying process.  They handled everything from inspection and surveyors to repairs needed.  I would absolutely recommend Craig!
Craig gave me excellent council on marketing our house and did a great job of negotiating the sale.

Craig's knowledge of the Tahoe market is excellent, and he knows all aspects of selling a home giving what I considered to be excellent advice through the process.  

As someone who teaches courses on negotiation, I noted that he did make a few missteps on that aspect, but later in our work together our approach became more collaborative with my making suggestions and his using his market knowledge as to how to incorporate those into a strategy.  Craig is in high demand and does not always respond promptly to communications (i.e. calls--he may do better with texts which I don't like), but the very competent associates in the Zager Group are better able to respond promptly.  

Overall, my experience in working with Craig and his group was excellent, and I would utilize his services and those of his group again.
Exceptional service, second to none.

Chris and christie are dynamic duo!!!!..we could not have asked for better agents. The amount of knowledge and experience they posses made our home buying process a great learning experience. We will use them again if possible and would reccomend them to anyone looking for a home espeacially 1st time buyers. And btw they are super nice people!

Christopher was awesome! Every concern  answered, every question all answered immediately! Everytime I called about something he immediately answered or promptly returned my phone call. Before any document was sent for review/signature he would call and assure me that he and his wife Christi had scrutinized the document for errors or anything that would not be in our best interest as well as completely explain what the document was pertaining to. They always came dressed professionally and acted accordingly as well. Folks you can tell that the Pipers' love their job and care about pleasing the clients! They made me feel as though we were old friends rather then clients; you can't go wrong here!

Chris & Christi Piper are very professional. They go way beyond to make sure their client/clients are up to date with the process of buying or selling a home. They stay in contact with any changes that are going on. If you call them with a question if they don't know the answer they will get the answer & get back to you asap. I will recommend Chris & Christi Piper to friends or neighbors that are selling or looking to buy a house. They are great . We had a terrific experience with both of them.

Christopher far exceeded my expectations for a real estate agent. I had never bought/owned a home before, and he educated me about the process, explaining and answering questions thoroughly. He was easily accessible by call, text, email, or in person—whatever worked best for me.  nTo get me started, Chris narrowed my search. I never wasted time looking at listings that did not apply to me. He took the time to get to know me and my needs in a home. When listings became available, we were both notified, so when I called to inquire, he knew the exact details of the property and shared with me any extra information he had. He has high standards for the cleanliness and safety of homes, and he did not rest until he got me a QUALITY home that he would feel comfortable living in himself. nWhen it came to making offers on properties, Chris made himself available so it could be written ASAP. He treated me like family and truly cared about the outcome. He was just as concerned and focused as I was so that I didn't miss any opportunities. He shared the outcomes of offers I made ASAP so I was never waiting in anticipation longer than necessary.  nWhen it came to determining a fair price, Chris was never pushy for me to make certain decisions or offer a certain amount. He shared the facts and left the rest up to me. What really impressed me was his research on the property values in my home's area over time, so he had an idea of what was fair value—similar to appraiser research. Tony Clifford and Kristian Deakin are amazing. I wanted to sell a property in Las Vegas. I was locked down in Mongolia and the other seller was locked down in Ireland, which required translations, notary publics, and many complicated processes, while embassies were closed due to COVID-19. Buying your first home can be daunting. I bought mine in the middle of a pandemic while I was living in the UK.

I found Tony on Reddit while I was asking some general questions about high rises in Vegas. He answered all of my questions and went to each of the properties I wanted to view with so we could live stream the viewing while I was still in the UK.

It took a couple of weeks to find a really good property and put in an offer. There was much less paperwork than I had expected and what little there was, I was able to sign online.

Tony produced a lot of statistics and comparisons to help me decide what to offer - more than I was able to get myself via Zillow and Redfin. He was also able to negotiate good terms for seller finance since I didn't have a credit history in the US.

Where we needed third party companies to become involved, for example, for inspections, Tony had good contacts and organised everything. I did my own research on each of his recommendations and they were all competitively priced and had good reviews. We ended up using his recommended inspection company and their service was also top notch.

Even after it was clear the sale was going to close, Tony did everything he could to make the escrow and move-in experiences as smooth as possible. He checked over the title paperwork, picked up on something I might have missed and got it corrected on a Sunday evening. By Tuesday, I had the keys, some cool snaps to remember the day and was ready to spend my first night in my new home!

I would recommend Tony and Kristian to anyone looking to buy or sell property in Vegas. They just made the whole process so easy and were there and on top of everything when I couldn't be. When I come to sell my condo or buy another one, I will definitely work with them again.

Wendy was our first and last interview, we knew right away we'd be in great hands. Our initial plan was to pick homes during the week and drive out for the weekend to see them. We brainstormed with Wendy and knew our best bet was to have her Facetime open houses with her Ipad while we viewed them from LA. This was our winning formula. A house came on the market on Friday, Wendy took the tour for us on Saturday and our offer was accepted on Monday. The work wasn't done there. She helped us with everything that came after as well, home inspections, putting pressure on the lender when they seemed to drag their feet and so on. comment: Working with the Nelson Group was fantastic! We bought our house in Las Vegas while living in Maryland, and Jena and Dave made it much easier than we were expecting. They were extremely knowledgable on the area, really took the time to understand what we were looking for and our priorities, and they weren't afraid to give us an honest assessment of each house we looked at. And, with the Nelson Group, you really get the full package! Not only did they help us find the perfect house for our family, but they also helped us with finding local contractors to make the house completely move-in ready before we even get out there. We feel like we gained not only great realtors, but also new friends. Highly recommend contacting the Nelson Group if you're looking for a house in Las Vegas.

From the moment we met Jena and David, they were extremely professional yet friendly and approachable. They had done their research and presented realistic expectations for the sell of house. They were hands on for the entire sale, hired quality professionals to market our house and made the entire process low-stress. We got full asking price within 24 hours of our open house, closed on time and we didn't have to really do a thing other than keep the house clean! I highly recommend them for a efficient, professional and low-stress selling process.

Jena helped us buy and sell our home, and made the process of it all very easy. She’s very helpful and went beyond what we were expecting of her. She was very accommodating and always answered our concerns in a timely manner. She’s an amazing agent, very professional and knowledgeable. We’re so glad she was the one we trusted for these life changing events.

David and Jena are amazing agents that help and explain every aspect of the buying process. Even after all of the paperwork is done they continue to check in to see if I need help with anything. As a first time home buyer they made something that could be very confusing and overwhelming, a simple and super low stress experience. Highly recommend this team.

Jena and Dave were fantastic! Home selling/buying is inherently complicated and stressful, but they made the entire process of selling our home simple and stress free. I could not recommend them more for any and all of your realty needs. You can absolutely trust their experience, their knowledge, and their advice! I would without a doubt call them again if I ever move back to the Vegas area.

Jena was very professional and easy to work with. She came to all meetings prepared with knowledge of the area market and helped ease our stress about selling. Jena answered all the questions we had and provided background information when answering questions, which demonstrated her knowledge on the topic. Jena helped us sell our house quickly and for above our asking price. She helped make it a very smooth and painless process. We would completely go to Jena again for help buying/selling a house in the future.
My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed working with Jena. She was very knowledgeable and helpful. It was always easy to get ahold of her and have any questions answered. We highly recommend her.

Great experience selling our house.  Provided an attractive and high quality on-line listing.  Jena had a good understanding of the market that allowed us to get on contract quickly and professionally handled some curve balls from the buyer.

At a time when the housing market in Las Vegas was less predictable, Jena and her partner were easy to contact and proactive in helping me understand how to get the best deal selling my home quickly. I'd recommend Jena to anyone looking to buy or sell in the Vegas area!
Jena did great getting us a house in this challenging market.  I would recommend Jena to anyone that was looking to either buy or sell a home in the Las Vegas area!

Jena and her team made us feel like they truly cared about our well-being. They made themselves available to us whenever we needed, even at times that were less convenient for them. They gave advice not based on buying the most expensive house and possibly earning a bigger commission, but on what was really the best value and potential investment for us. And they took time during the inspection and walkthrough to point out helpful things to know about the home's equipment and maintenance.

Jena and David took a team approach to making sure that the home was advertised and marketed efficiently and HONESTLY.  They kept me well informed and were quick to respond to phone calls, emails, and texts. There negotiation skills were based on their knowledge of the market as well as what was invested in the property.  I did not have to worry about a thing as they were always there to help.

Jena  Nelson is a true PROFESSIONAL. She provided an incredible service to me. Her commitment and guidance was admirable.  With difficult and demanding customer like me, she never lost her patience and desire to assist.  The master key that opened the door to her powerful delivery was her honest connection with me. She never pressured me, gave me all the time I needed while knowing that I may never be able to make a decision. This positive and understanding attitude generated my utmost trust in her.  
Jena's knowledge and expertise became apparent each time   she responded to my questions; sometimes I repeated the questions and she always answered clearly without annoyance. 
 One thing that Jena did that seemed out of the box was that she took me to different buildings to show me what else was there besides my focus of interest.  We even walked around the neighborhood.  That was awesome and unexpected.  
What can I say about a person who worked relentlessly even while she got sick from the flu?  Being ill did not stop her.  As the days of the closing approached, she delivered a superb job with her resourcefulness, research, and communication with the management of 
Trump International.  She did all that while being ill.  Her tenacity and ability to deliver such quality work and support is admirable.  I can only express my heartfelt appreciation for Jenna’s dependability.

My whole experience with Jena as a realtor was phenomenal.  Jena loves what she does and it is apparent thru her quality work. Words fall short, so I will borrow from Shakespeare "I cannot other answer make, but thanks, and thanks." She has been wonderful. Thank you.

Jena and Dave are awesome!  They made selling my house a breeze.  Also, the advice they provided throughout the process was honest and I felt it was always in my best interest.  Overall, it was a great experience!

I bought a house with the Sharon Q Team in 2022 during a crazy market and was able to purchase a home in the exact area I was looking in, for only asking price! Sharon helped us see the potential and design for renovating aspects of the home to make it perfect. Carolena and the Whole team were soooo responsive and available for any questions and to be sure we closed early! Amazing experience
Sharon and her team, especially Carolena, have been an absolute pleasure to work with. They are extremely knowledgeable, attentive and professional. I cannot recommend them enough.

I am disappointed with this realty office. After the initial meeting with the realtor, I heard very little from the office, my texts and calls went unanswered and I felt like I had no clue what was going on. The For Sale sign was constantly falling over,  a sale pending sign was never put on my house, let alone a sold sign. I felt like a number, that they made a sale and were getting paid and had no interest in communicating with me.

Sharon and Brittany were both wonderful to work with. They made sure to stay in the budget range that we gave and were quick to answer any question, emails, texts we sent to them. We were first time homeowners and they both took the time to answer any and all questions that we had without sounding annoyed or making us feel like our questions were not valid. I would recommend Sharon or Brittany to anyone looking for a home, they make the process fun and stress-free! Thank you both for all you did for us!
Great !
Stuck to the facts. Strictly business. Silent performer.

Sharon and her team sold our home in 3 days. From start to finish, the process was easy. I would highly recommend Sharon and her team. 
Thank you

A little back ground for understanding. As a nurse for 30 years I believe that we are all morally and ethically bound to adhere to peoples rights. My colleagues often on 12 - 16 hr shifts slept over as my home was 10 minutes away from work.Please understand how difficult emotionally it was to sell my home.  First and foremost I would like to thank Sharon and her wonderful team for answering all my endless questions. Sharon is coaching a winning team.  Without delay the office staff is ready to answer any questions I had with respect, kindness and empathy. Not only was Brad understanding as I posed repeated questions, he spoke fairly and honestly. His answers at his finger tips he fully reviewed any concerns I had. Sharon was readily available with reassurance and knowledge for any given question (including ones that were for attorneys) I would truly recommend Sharon Quataert realty to anyone of my family ,friends or colleagues. With many thanks for all you have done to make every step of the way much easier. Sharon God bless you and your team and again thank you, Sincerely, Theresa Kaufman

I was referred to Brittany Quataert by my daughter, whom she helped to buy a house in July 2021. Every interaction with Brittany was professional, supportive, and positive. She made great referrals for working with mortgage professionals, was incredibly responsive, and was patient and an excellent handholder in the last few stressful days before closing. I recommend 10/10!
Danielle was an amazing realtor.  She showed me all of the houses I wanted to see and answered all of my questions.  I would recommend her to friends and family

Sharon sold me the house I just sold 19 years ago. I was so happy to work with her again. Her knowledge of the market is outstanding and she's so accommodating. She hooked me up with people that she's worked with over the years to help me with the move and they were great. I would highly recommend Sharon and her team. Both Sharon and Carolena took great care of me through the whole process. I couldn't be happier with the results!

Brittany was our agent and she was phenomenal. She was always there on time, quick responses to texts/emails. She was patient through the whole process. We had a positive experience with Sharon Quataert's agency.
Absolutely the best!!  Tony Franklin and the team stayed on constant contact during the entire buying process.  Being a first time home buyer, I couldn't have had a better experience!!

My wife and I worked with Sharon and Brittney. Both were easy to work with ,friendly, courteous and professional. they listened to my concerns allayed fears and addressed all concerns with knowledge and confidence. they worked closely with me and answered all questions, small or large. i am very pleased with this organization. Carolina, the executive assistant, also kept us "in the loop" as far as the the next steps. All in all, a wonderful team.

The realtor I worked with was Tony and he was absolutely amazing. I would highly recommend!

I have worked with other realtors in the past who were condescending and pushy and aggressive, and Tony was the exact opposite. He was knowledgeable and patient and worked with me to make sure I found the perfect house. He never made me feel rushed or silly for asking questions. He was always responsive when I called or texted, and he made the process so smooth for me that it really helped to reduce that home-buying anxiety. 

Thank you, Tony!!

In this sellers market it took a very committed agent to find the right home for us. We found the right agent who was a real go-getter at SharonQ. Tony Franklin was very professional and available at a moments notice. Tony did not give up till he found the home we wanted. He was there at the beginning right up till closing. Tony didn't only find us a home but oversaw the whole process till closing. He was on our side the whole way. I can't thank SharonQ Reality and Tony enough.  They did it ALL. Thank You.

Sharon did a great job at selling our lakefront home.  She was very responsive to our questions.  We had a multiple offer situation and she balanced it masterfully.  I would highly recommend her to anyone in need of a realtor.

Sharon & Tony are the best. We purchased our new home virtually from Alabama. I am a disabled vet and wanted badly to return home to Rochester. We went through THREE other agents before finding Sharon and Tony. Their communication was top knotch every step of the way. We closed on time even though the pandemic changed all of the norms. I highly recommend them for VA home loan purchases.

I could tell from the very first meeting with Sharon and her team they were very experienced and professional. Look no farther, this is the realtor you want. You won’t be disappointed. The things you don’t know, they do know and tell you about. We made much more on the sale of our home then we ever imagined.

Sharon helped us sell Olympia and purchase 113 Northampton Circle.  Her service was excellent!  Sharon and her team were always available when needed and efficient every step of the way.  I can’t imagine going with anyone else 💜👍😊Highly recommend

I first learned of Sharon from my GF who used Sharon's Agency to sell three of her properties and the purchase of a new townhouse. I was quite favorably impressed with her agency, so when I needed a real estate agent I turned to Sharon Quataert Agency. My purchase went rather quickly. I found a house I wanted and Sharon made the offer with recommendations. My offer was accepted immediately and Sharon's agency kept me abreast of all the transactions and going-ons that I needed to know. Her colleague Carolena kept me constantly updated.
I would whole heartedly recommend the Sharon Quataert Agency to anyone.
Sharon is a pro where others fall short! Her 35 years of experience really shines. Don’t hesitate to trust her in getting it done! Thank you Sharon 😎

comment:
We worked with Brad to purchase this property.  It was a challenging property situation.  I had lots of questions and concerns and Brad answered them patiently and promptly every time.  There were all sorts of challenges inherent with this property.  

Here is the big thing, the property was cheap and his commission was tiny, however, that didn't make a difference.  He treated me like his most important client.  It is easy to get premium service when you buying a mansion.  To get premium service and attention when you are buying a fixer-upper or a teardown is unprecedented.  I strongly recommend that you contract with Brad.
The Sharron Quataert Realty is dedicated to Serve their Clients with the outmost Professionalism . I wouldn't use any other Company in Rochester Area.
1st Class excellent
The entire team from Sharron office are amazing. i could not   be happier with the service they provide.
Great.  Top level professional.
First rate professionals.  They priced the property on the money. Sold quickly.
Everyone was wonderful and helpful. Very cooperative. Helped me to find a great home. Thank you!

Let me just start off by saying Sharon and her team are top notch. Everything about having her represent you is something that I really was impressed with. From her lovely office space on ridge road. Her representatives went way out of there way handling my constant questions.  Trust me when I say when you got Sharon on your side with her staff of Carolena, and Maryann you will be in good hands. Thank you all so much for you expertise and for selling my home so FAST

I had the pleasure of working with Real Estate Agent MaryAnne Miller from Sharon Quataert Realty. They couldn't have made this whole process any easier! MaryAnne's experience and knowledge helped me find a home that I love more than words can describe. Right from the start she took the time to learn what I wanted and every house we looked at she had answers to any questions I had. She even gave me information about homes that I would never have considered due to being a first time home buyer! I couldn't be any more satisfied with my experience!! Thank you MaryAnne for going above and beyond for me and thank you Sharon Quataert Realty for being the BEST in Rochester, NY!!!
Sharon and her team were absolutely fantastic. I highly recommend her.

Working with Sharon & Brittany Quataert was a very pleasant experience, It has been 20 years since I last bought a house and the market place is so much different now than it was back then. The fact they have stayed current with newer technology in their field as well as the ease of accessibility to everyone on their team took what could have been a very difficult and stressful time into a calm and peaceful experience.
Quick sale on a house the week after Christmas, good communication and very knowledgeable.

As a first time home buyer, we were alittle overwhelmed by everything we needed to accomplish. Dannielle was there helping however she could along the way. Would definitely recommend her to anyone looking for a new home!

We were connected to Danielle through mutual contacts and she was just great to work with. As first time home buyers, she was very helpful and provided great information to help us through. She really worked with us to schedule convenient times to visit the homes in a timely matter.   She was very knowledgeable and helpful during the house tours and pointed out some very important things at the houses, both good and bad.  When we found one we loved, she jumped right on the offer and helped us negotiate the appropriate market price for the area.  Everything was done electronically, so it was completed quickly and conveniently.  She was very responsive through all of the communication from submitting and offer, to the home inspection and final walk-through.   All in all, Danielle was very professional and easy to work with.  She was very honest with us and helped us to make a complicated process simple and easy.  I highly recommend her services.

Dannielle made the process of being a first time home buyer easy and exciting. She was always available to answer my questions and was able to schedule house showings quickly (within hours!). She was honest and helped coordinate with many of the other people involved in the process of closing on a home- lawyer, lending company, homeowner insurance agent, etc.  nwould absolutely recommend her as your agent for buying/selling properties to make the process run as smoothly as possible.
It was a nPleasure working with Danielle.  She did a great job on estimating the house  valve. And was always available for concerns.

Jillian was amazing to work with for the sale of our home.  She was incredibly knowledgeable and hardworking  and her vast network of professional contacts were very helpful in the process as well.  Jillian was always available to answer questions.  She went WAY above and beyond the call of duty to get the job done and we are so glad we got the chance to work with her!  We highly recommend her and would hire in a heartbeat!

Words cannot describe how grateful we are for Jillian Breck. We were first-time homebuyers who just applied for a mortgage on a whim. We weren't in a rush to buy at all. One day I submitted an inquiry for a property on Truila and 10mins later Jillian reached out to me. She understood that we were just exploring options at that point and was willing to assist at our own pace. We only viewed 3 houses before we found our home! 

Jillian was diligent, knowledgeable and personable. The list goes on. As I mentioned to her, she made us feel like we were her only clients during the process. Even when she was out of the office, she made sure that we were still taken care of and on track with our closing timeline. There were never any guessing games. 

Next to picking the right house, selecting the realtor is the most important thing. I will forever recommend Jillian and look forward to working with her for future purchases.

Jillian was amazing to work with!  She helped us find our dream home and was so patient with us during the whole process.  Jillian also has a wide array of professional contacts, from roofers and inspectors to painters and lenders.  Her help and guidance during this process was monumental.  She was also did an incredible job selling our home quickly and for much more than we expected.  I would recommend her to anyone looking for a top notch agent!

Jillian was our realtor as we started our home search in the Albany NY area and she is the best realtor we have ever had. She really cares about her clients and was always responsive to our questions. Jillian helped us find our forever home and we are so grateful to have worked with her.

Regina was so helpful throughout the buying process! She was very knowledgeable and was able to provide several resources to help with the process. She always responded to questions quickly and was a positive person to work with, despite some set backs! I would recommend her to anyone buying or selling a home!
Worked with Brett when looking for a home. Brett is an awesome realtor who goes the extra mile for you. He’s a straight shooter and tells it how it is. Would 100% recommend. It’s been a pleasure.

Brett is an exceptional realtor, and a great person to work with! He has great knowledge of the local market and is well networked with the area realtors. Brett always made himself available and always insured us that he had our best interest in mind. Very veteran friendly! As a fellow service member, Brett brings a relentless determination that you will not find in your everyday realtor! We would not work with anyone else but him in the WNY area!

Buying our first home felt like an overwhelming process—especially in such a competitive market—but working with Brett made all the difference. From the very beginning, he was incredibly thorough, precise, and always communicative. He helped us understand every step, answered our questions clearly (no matter how small), and stayed on top of every detail so that nothing slipped through the cracks.

What really stood out was his ability to guide us through the chaos with confidence and strategy. In a market where homes were flying off the shelves, he kept us grounded and focused. He never rushed us, but he was always ready to move quickly when the right opportunity came along.

Thanks to his expertise and persistence, we were able to find a home we truly love—and we couldn't be more grateful. If you're looking for someone who’s sharp, professional, and genuinely invested in your success, we highly recommend Brett.

Brett was extremely kind and helpful throughout the entire process. He explained everything to us and made sure we understood everything. When it came to communication, he went above and beyond to make sure we were constantly updated during our home buying experience. I couldn't imagine the process going any smoother and it certainly would have been worse without having Brett.

Brett was amazing. His communication was on point, he kept up us up to date on the home buying process as well as any changes that were happening during the buying process. 10/10 I would use Brett again for any future home purchases!

Brett’s the man. As a veteran he was extremely knowledgeable on all of my benefits and the process of using a va home loan. He also saved me 1000s of dollars on closing cost by utilizing his veteran friendly lawyers inspectors and insurance agents who offered vet discounts. Brett’s always there when you need him and he’s extremely transparent though our the entire process

As first time homebuyers the task seemed daunting at first. Brett and his team were patient with all our questions and kept us well informed along the way. We couldn’t have asked for anyone more knowledgeable with the VA home loan buying process. Thanks Brett for making the process smooth sailing!

Brett was awesome to work with. He is extremely knowledgeable and has a passion for what he does. Brett has made our first home buying experience enjoyable and easy. We look forward to working with him in the future!

Brett has been an excellent help in the homebuying process from beginning to end. His expertise was instrumental in closing on our home in a very short amount of time. He is immensely passionate about helping veterans, I would highly recommend him to anybody. Brett was readily available at all stages of the process and answered any questions we had. He is knowledgeable and took initiative to ensure we had all the information and knew the next steps.

My wife and I had the pleasure of working with Brett. He was well informed on the market, which was vital to our success. Whenever we had questions or requests, he was always quick to respond and find time for us.

Brett was an absolute pleasure to work with. He recently assisted in both the purchase of our new home, and the sale of our own home. His expertise in market strategy led to multiple offers exceeding our expectations. Brett made himself available at all reasonable hours of the day and night. On the few occasions he wasn't available, he followed up within an hour or first thing the next morning.  He kept us in the loop the entire home buying/selling journey, and also kept the attorneys on task when needed. As a Veteran, Brett exudes confidence , integrity, and professionalism with every interaction and advocates for your benefit at every opportunity. He will not force a sale or purchase for his benefit, but listens intently to understand your wants/needs.  He will even reign you in, if needed, from making a purchase you may come to regret by remaining impartial.  I cannot recommend him enough.

Brett handled the deal of our house expeditiously. Without his direct involvement we may never have sealed the deal on a wonderful new home. He was always responsive and tackled any concerns we had with the seller quickly. Thank you Brett!

Brett made selling our house super easy and successful! He uses professional home photographer so that way the listing photos show the true beauty of a home. He gave solid advice on listing strategy and ideal list price and anticipated sale price. Brett truly cares about the clients and we would highly recommend him to both veteran and non veteran buyers or sellers.

Got my first home helped by Brett. I like working with him. He always arrived on time when we go see the properties. I like his work ethic, professionalism, patience, flexibility and helpful. I will definitely work him again if I happen to buy another property.
Brett is very professional and truly has your best interest in mind with providing you the best options for your preferences and budget. Would 10/10 rwcommend to friends and family.
Brett was very helpful in purchasing a new home.  He was always available and very helpful throughout the process

Brett was terrific to work with. He was readily available and worked around my schedule. The house I ended up closing on originally had 8 offers with 4 being pretty similar. Brett presented to the seller and their realtor in person with my offer. Because of this my offer was the one accepted. I really appreciate his efforts and would highly recommend.

The home buying experience can be tough to navigate. We are very thankful we got to work with Brett. He showed us tips and tricks to using the VA loan and he was always very responsive. We appreciate his assistance in getting the home of our dreams. Thanks Brett, keep doing what you do. 

-Dan & Jessie

Cheers!

Highly professional! I live out of the area and he made my experience super easy! He is a family man and cares about his clients. He goes the extra mile to make sure his clients are satisfied. Ryan is the best realtor I have been with. I was looking for 6 months and went through 3 other realtors and every time i put in an offer another one was accepted.
Here is what happened

1. I went to go to this home at exactly 9am right when it opened.
2. Ryan put in an offer at 10am and called the agent letting him know allowing him only till 1pm to accept
3. at 1pm he got a call saying their were multiple offers and to submit highest and best by 8pm
4. Ryan called me and we resubmitted 
5. Ryan then calls other agent. The other agent said why would they accept a VA loan over others they have 20 other showings CONFIRMED by 130pm and why would they accept it.
6. Ryan called and told him that there will be other VA loans with not many clients willing to pay their own closing and the sellers plus their own home warranty.
7. I get a call from Ryan that they wanted me to sign something saying if it didn't appraise i'd pay out of pocket I said no
8 get another call (all this in 30 to 45 min) saying that they would do a 3 way call and let us know, I said i would pull out my contract if they wanted to wait as I knew what they were doing.
9. at 330pm while I was at the doctors with my son that they accepted the offer.
10. I was stoked. I love this house everything I needed without a basement. 
NO OTHER AGENT DID THIS MUCH! Ryan did such an amazing job and didn't stop until it was done. He put me first when we put in the contract and he made me feel like i was his only client! He walked me through everything until the very end. When I moved in he gave me a microwave as a closing gift since the owners took the one they had! such a caring realtor. I seriously couldn't of asked for a better agent or a better home! I am so happy! THANK YOU RYAN!!!!!!!!!

My family and I were moving from out of state and Ryan helped from start to finish of our search for a home. Not only was he readily available to answer questions but after closing prior to us moving up to the area he went above the norm and stopped by the house to ensure that there were no issues(i.e. water pipes freezing, etc) being in the colder winter months.

I am a Real Estate Investor so I am buying and selling properties all the time. I need a realtor who knows the market and can find me properties that need to be rehabbed and are below market value. Ryan goes over the top in every category. Because of his skills I have two properties under contract right now. Thanks Ryan.

Ryan is the best!  Ryan worked with me for several months to locate the perfect house for me.  He also found me a lender who was able to work with me in securing a loan. Ryan was very professional yet personal.   He led me through the process step by step.  He listed the house and I had an offer within 24 hours.  Everything went smoothly and closing was within 30 days. nI highly recommend Ryan to anyone looking to seek or buy a home.  You won't be disappointed.
He was so patient and would set up showings so quickly. Our first home buying experience was so smooth thanks to him.
Ryan was amazing to work with! He was always there for us and made sure we always knew what was going on. I would recommend him to all my friends and family!

I was lucky enough to be referred to Krissi from an out-of-state family member (who is also a successful agent). I needed someone credible, trustworthy and highly competent. Krissi is all that and more!! 

The thought of selling our first home seemed daunting and quite a convoluted process. I'll admit I was nervous our house wouldn't be "good enough" - although meeting with Krissi and being introduced to her team really did alleviate all of my concerns. 

From our first sit-down, it was clear that Krissi is prepared, put-together, and has a fantastic company behind her. When it came time for listing photos, we followed her thoughtful recommendations and I was truly blown away at how sparkling and sharp our home looked. We showed our house through their easy to use app and got an offer quickly (during the slow season for home selling!). Once under contract, Krissi and the EV team kept the ball rolling and we were able to close with no stress whatsoever. 

If you're someone who desires an agent with a high attention to detail, a caring and kind attitude, as well as a knack for getting things done no matter what happens, Krissi should be your realtor too. We are beyond grateful and wish everything in the home selling/buying process could be this easy!

Krissi is by far the best agent we’ve ever used. She really sees the big picture of what her clients needs are. Going above and beyond is an understatement. Krissi’s knowledge base is beyond compare and her negotiating skills are out of this world! 
We will never use anyone else for our housing needs. We absolutely love her!

My fiancé and I recently bought our first home and we couldn't have done it without Krissi. She was always very transparent and realistic about the process and gave great advice. And she managed to slide in at the last minute and get us our house! Can't say enough good things about Krissi, 10/10 recommend!

I recently worked with Krissi Romanini to sell my home in Lakewood and I couldn't be happier with the outcome. Krissi is an outstanding real estate agent who truly went above and beyond to ensure that the process was smooth and stress-free. She was incredibly personable and took the time to listen to my concerns and needs, which made me feel heard and understood.

Krissi was always available to answer my questions and offer guidance throughout the selling process. She listened to my goals and timeline and offered an execution plan based on it. With all the details arranged up front, Krissi moved quickly to sell the house and close the deal in less than one month.

What impressed me most about Krissi was her attention to detail and her ability to anticipate issues that might arise during the process. She provided me with complete listing advice on how to price the property and her strategy to sell it was spot on. Krissi also went above and beyond by helping me with the final things for closing the house as I moved out of state. She gave me comfort that the close would go smoothly!

Overall, I am extremely satisfied with everything Krissi did. She is an exceptional real estate agent and I would give her six stars out of five if I could. I would highly recommend Krissi to anyone looking to sell their home. Thanks again, Krissi, for all your hard work and dedication!

I'm a first-time home buyer. Didn't really know where to start until I spoke with her. Totally made the process so much easier on me and very helpful . Would totally use her again and recommend her to anybody looking into buying a home.

Debi responds quickly and goes above and beyond to assist you during the entire process.

I have bought and sold more than 50 homes with investment properties and career moves. I have worked with many relators in several states. From start to finish, Catalina was incredibly organized, proactive, and on top of every detail in the process. Her strategic advice and negotiation skills made all the difference in locking down this deal. If you’re looking for a realtor who truly understands the market, fights for her clients, and ensures a smooth transaction, I highly recommend Catalina.

I’ll definitely be working with her again for future deals!

Suzanne is the absolute best! My husband and I bought our first house together a month ago. Suzanne helped us throughout the entire process. She was always honest, encouraging, and patient with us. I never felt rushed or felt underpressure to just pick out a house. We toured many houses and she told us to not get discouraged and that the right house is out there for us we just haven't seen it yet. She answered all my questions and she made sure I understood the different steps of buying a home. Also, she made sure we got everything we wanted and needed. I highly recommend her!

Suzzanne was so great for us.   She was always at the forefront of helping us with things that needed yo be done and she is a wealth of information.  She also knows a lot of resources that are quality people who can help with tasks that are often required to buy and sell a home.  She has a great 'can do' attitude also.  We appreciated her help very much!

I can’t say enough good things about Suzzanne. We moved from out of state so the home buying experience should’ve been stressful- and it was- but having Suzzanne in my corner was the best decision ever made. She was incredibly knowledgeable on builders, structural issues, schools, and just continued to impress me every step of the way. Any time I had bank issues she would calm me down and after the lender nightmares we suffered I have no doubt that if we had chosen a different realtor we wouldn’t be in our dream home. She fought hard for us to get the house we wanted. She’s responsive, extremely dedicated, hard working, genuinely cared about our family’s needs, and an all around amazing person. Highly recommend!

We had the best buying experience with Suzzanne.  We didn’t know anything about the area and Suzzanne listened to what was important to us in a community and found our home that we love so much.   Suzzanne was such a joy to work with!

Melanie is such an amazing person and resource! We moved from out of state so it was critical we had someone with lots of local knowledge to help us land in a great spot. She exceeded our expectations by far and we'll definitely use her again on our next purchase/sale.

We loved all of her local knowledge, how much she cares. She was very candid and honest throughout the viewings. The team was very responsive and excellent at communicating! She helped us get a winning offer in a hot market! Whenever we went to an open house, the agents all recognized her name!

Ilyse Ball  is confident in her suggestions and not afraid to push the envelope. She has the ability to make her clients feel calm and confident during the process, which was helpful to us as we fretted over negotiations of repairs and such. Furthermore, as a neighbor, I knew that there was no one better to speak of the location and the neighborhood. Thank you Ilyse!

Ilyse Ball was our agent when we bought our house in 2015 and when we sold it in 2020. Ilyse's advice saved us money when we bought the house, and her advice made us a great deal of money when we sold the house. Ilyse's direction along the way of selling our home - from staging to marketing to navigating interested buyers to the inspection process to the negotiations with the eventual buyers - was invaluable. She is accessible, friendly and extremely knowledgeable about the Portland market. She's even helped me with questions weeks after the close of our sale, in a timely and helpful fashion, as always. Ilyse is an outstanding agent, and I would recommend her to anyone.

comment: Ilyse's knowledge and finesse of a real estate transaction is nothing short of amazing. If you need a guide and advocate on your sale or purchase, and trust me; you do, look no further than Ilyse Ball. You will be happy with the results.

Ilyse said she was a good negotiator and we believed her.  Turns out, she didn't lie.

I would have liked to sell the house faster and for more money but I have confidence that what we did get for the house was top dollar.
Ilyse is a great communicator; knowledgable and thoughtful. We always know she has our interests in the forefront. We have bought two houses and sold one with her. No regrets!

Ilyse went above and beyond to help sell this house. She was creative in strategizing and efficient and kept me up to date every step of the way.

Ilyse was so great to work with. This was an unusual property and situation and she handled it so well. She really was a life saver! It was so great to know that this was in her hands.

We were referred to Ilyse Ball by a good friend after having a bad experience with a previous broker. After working with Ilyse we will never work with another broker again. She goes above and beyond for her clients. Her professionalism and negotiating skills are incomparable. She kept us calm and focused during stressful situations. I trust her completely and I know that she always has our best interest at heart.

If you want a real estate agent with invaluable advice, realistic goals, and a great eye for design - look no further!

Ilyse was down-to-earth, honest, and professional from the start.  We knew that our house needed work before we put it up for sale.  What we didn't know was that the market was hot and we needed to hurry up to get the most out of our sale!  From the moment we met Ilyse, it felt like she was rooting for us.  Without hesitation, she was on board and offering input.

Most of all, she helped us focus on the important details and lessened all of our worries along the way.  When we completed the updates she recommended we were able to list and sell the house at price higher than expected.

Ilyse was great at communicating with us through the sales process, especially considering we were moving out of state.  We were in the loop at every turn and the information was communicated in a way that made us feel in charge.

Ilyse, you are awesome!

Selling a house and moving out of state are stressful times of life. We had to sell our house due to a move for work and had a newborn at home, which made it all the more stressful.  On top of all of this, we had never sold a home and had no idea what we were doing. With everything going on during this massive life transition, we honestly just wanted the house sold so that we could move on. Ilyse Ball was exactly the realtor we needed for two reasons: 1. she was adept at managing the emotional aspects of the house selling process and 2. she is a competent professional in knowing what needs to happen to get a house sold.   

First, Ilyse was adept at working with her very overstressed clients (us) in a way that kept things moving forward. She was patient with us at every step, gently but firmly making suggestions while still respecting our decisions when we might not have agreed on something. She was understanding and reassuring when it was needed and stepped up with assertiveness when that was needed as well....she was able to keep that balance throughout the whole process. 

Second, Ilyse knew what needed to get done to get the house sold at every stage. This included the bigger things like house painting, staging, and negotiations, but also the smaller things, like how and when to reach out to other realtors and potential buyers to give our house the best chance with every tour (or to learn from tour feedback).  When it came to accepting the offer and negotiating the sale, Ilyse was in her element. Overall, it felt great to let go of control and let Ilyse do her job, knowing we were in good hands. 

I personally can say that Ilyse made everything we were going through a little less stressful, and for that we are grateful!

Ilyse has the sang froid of long real estate experience, whichever way it's going to go, it's going to go her way, as demonstrated by her sale of our primary home in 2018 and also now by her sale of our rental.

I am particularly impressed with Ilyse's savvy and deft negotiating skills after the disclosure phase of the sale.

Ilyse is a diligent hands on agent, she's there for every detail, large or small, and brings you into the process so you can make the best decisions.

I appreciate Ilyse's  fervent optimism in the outcome of our sale once we listed it with her.
Ilyse is great to work with. She is passionate about what she does and it shows. We got $40K over asking the first weekend and closed on time. Thanks Irealty.

Both, I felt wanted us to do a lot or work to sell the home while Ilyse only had us do what we really needed to which helped take a lot of pressure off which helped me immensely as I have a full time job and a household to run!  

Thanks Ilyse, you made it as easy as selling a home can be.

Excellent communication,  always accessible and quick to respond.  l Felt like I was her only client.  excellent feedback and guidance throughout the process.  I would heartily recommend her to others.  We were out of town sellers, so communication was very important.

Ilyse was instrumental in the successful and quick sale of our home. The home went on the market on a Thursday, with an open house three days later. We had three over asking offers the day after the open house. We closed a month after the home went on the market. The home sold in November; not the most active portion of the calendar due to holidays. 
Ilyse lives in the neighborhood and has great insight to the area, and has a good heart.

We chose Ilyse Ball as our realtor because we observed her interactions with prospective buyers at an open house in our neighborhood. We were very appreciative of Ilyse’s advice and expertise in marketing and preparing our house to show its best. Her handling of several offers shortly after the open house facilitated a final sale substantially higher than our asking price. Ilyse is friendly, open, accessible, and professional. We thoroughly enjoyed working with her.

We had a back up to a cash offer, and that party kept nipping at the offer on the table, so we were able to close in 3 weeks!!!

From start to finish, Ilyse was the consummate real estate professional.  She is extremely talented staging the property, collecting data on selling trends in the neighborhood, following up on leads, and communicating offers (and offering advice when asked) all while remaining cheerful and upbeat (even when it seemed interest in our condo had stalled).  We sure had our fair share of ups and downs, and blocks from the HOA, but Ilyse kept her eyes on the objective - the sale. I would recommend her in a heartbeat to anyone buying or selling a home; she is da BOMB!

She is professional, a good listener, and takes time to discuss parts of the transaction at length.  She is very time-efficient, which is important in synthesizing large amounts of information. She had solutions to our questions and strategies for addressing the difficult things that came up throughout the purchase of our new home. She is soooo good at what she does, and I wouldn't consider ever using a different agent.  We love our new house and location!  Would highly recommend her to anyone!

I have a great story about how I found my realtor. I am a nurse in an emergency room and a patient rolled in on a stretcher who was struck by another vehicle who was going through a red light and who's car was totaled. The woman on the stretcher  was small framed blonde haired and adorable. We introduced ourselves to each other and I took good care of her while she was in the emergency room.  In our conversation I learned that she had been an ER nurse also. She had changed careers after a long  successful career as a nurse. She told me that she had been a realtor for the past decade. She told me how exciting her job was and how much she enjoyed it. What she didn't know was that I was planning on selling my house. I did tell her of my plans at the end of her visit and she did give me her card.    n     About a month later I contacted her. She came to my house with statistics and comps for my neighborhood and great suggestions on how to sell my house. She was so persuasive and convincing with out being aggressive or pushy. I knew I had to have her represent me. I knew if there was a house I wanted that she was the one who could get it for me.  I hired her as my realtor. I knew it was a recipe for success. In this crazy sellers market, I really needed someone on their toes and always available. She was exactly that. She never  tried to mislead me or steer me in any direction. She listened to exactly what I said and did everything she could to get me exactly what I wanted. n    When we got into a bidding war with multiple offers,  she advised me exactly what to do. She won this house for me.  She was so knowledgeable and so strategic during this transaction that I feel like only she could have got me this house. I am now the proud owner of my dream house and even more than what I was asking for. This lady knows how to hustle  and works tirelessly to get the job done. She is meticulous, quick and flawless.  She is the perfect mix of professionalism and personality.

Lorraine was absolutely amazing!  She truly made our first time home buying experience an enjoyable one. She is very kind hearted and is really there to help you find the perfect home; she did everything she could to get us ours. I would recommend her to anyone a thousand times over.

Our home sold quickly to highly qualified buyers.  Seamless transaction.  Superb experience!

We always knew what was going on without having to chase our agents for information. Both were in constant communication to let us know where the market was going and what we could expect. Ginny would even share uplifting quotes or stories from their team meetings just to ensure our spirits stayed high!

Once we prepped the house and completed the paperwork, our home went on the market. The work Ginny and Connor put in was an instant success. Our open house brought in many families and within a few days, it sold! I credit this to their knowledge of the market, the amazing photos and write up of our home and the extraordinary effort by the entire team at Phipps Realty. Incredibly, thanks to Ginny, we also came to an agreement on the property of our dreams that same week!

Looking back at our experience it was a miracle the way everything came together. None of this would have been possible without the team at Phipps Realty, especially Connor and Ginny. Selling and buying a home can be a stressful experience. Having the right people supporting you makes all the difference in how this experience unfolds. We would not change anything! My family will be forever grateful to both Ginny and Connor. We give them the highest recommendation possible. If you are looking to sell or buy, go with Phipps Realty, you will not be disappointed!

Lori Lincoln was top notch in every aspect of our dealings as she helped us sell a parent's home. My name is Thoai, Vietnamese.  Brenda is very friendly and knowledge.  She help me sell my home fast even in winter time.  Also, she help to put the right price on the market for my home.

Brenda was great to work with while selecting a new home!  I was an out of state buyer and often Brenda would have to go to the properties without me.
