Brenda is awesome!  Very knowledgeable and is very easy to work with.   She always goes above and beyond to make sure clients are happy.  Brenda sold my home quickly for over the asking price and was excellent in communicating with me every step of the way.  She also worked as my buyers agent and knew exactly what I wanted.  I would highly recommend her to anyone looking to buy or sell.

Brenda knows her market and my house sold quickly. She has the patience and knowledge to make things seamless and easy. She was always available for any questions or problems that tend to pop up. They were handled and communicated in very short time. Her advice and guidance was most appreciated.

It was a great pleasure to work with Brenda. Her professionalism, real estate market knowledge and years of experience greatly contributed to swiftly completing the contract. She was very easy to communicate, responsive and overall pleasure to work with. She will be my realtor in future real estate transactions.

Brenda is extremely knowledgeable about the market and was right on target on selling my home
She knew i could get what i wanted and i ended up with more then i expected.. she knew i would sell my home quickly  and it was sold in a week..
The best agent i have worked with and i have sold 3 different home with 3 different agents..

I think the biggest thing I liked about Brenda was she wasn’t pushy or aggressive towards a sale. I had multiple limiting factors working against me (divorce, single dad, VA loan, little money to work with, etc.) and somehow after using another agent and looking at around 100 houses during COVID, that I found the perfect fit. Moreover her relaxed vibe I found to be a lot more comforting than people I’ve worked with in the past. I would highly recommend her to anyone in this area.

SHE WAS AMAZING! She was SO strategic! She is SUPER NICE, DOWN TO EARTH! She is very communicative and funny too. I made the best decision choosing her as my real estate agent. If I were to buy a house again - she HAS to be my agent! WOOOOOOOO!!! I LOVE BRENDA AS MY REAL ESTATE AGENT PROFESSIONAL. SHE TAKES CARE OF HER CLIENTS!

Excellent realtor for the second time. First time around we bought a house, this time we sold with Brenda. Lovely person inside and out as well. Would recommend each time. Best of all- she knows what she’s doing.

Brenda has been working with me for more than a year, selling my previous home (in record time, 3 hours!) and tirelessly helping me find our new home.  She is very knowledgeable, helpful, kind, hard working. Determined to make sure you find exactly what you are looking for, there was never a time when I felt rushed, pushed or uncomfortable in any way.  I would recommend her to anyone in the market for new real estate.  Brenda, I am extremely grateful to have met you and I thank you from the bottom of my heart for everything!!

Brenda is  an outstanding real estate agent. He specialty is water front homes located on or near Lake Congamond in Southwick Ma. She is an aggressive but not pushy agent who sold my home in a little more then 60 days. We had multi offers which she help me sort out in order to choose the  best one for both the buyer and the seller. I could not be happier with Brenda's professional why of representing my property. I would use her again if the opportunity presented itself.
It was a pleasure working with Brenda to get into our dream home. She was very attentive and personable from day one and we couldn't be more happy with our experience with her and the outcome!

Maria has a reputation for being very professional and a pleasure to work with. She understands the Real Estate market, and works tirelessly for her clients and is very honest!  You won't find a more conscientious, hardworking, proficient, and delightful real estate agent! I highly recommend Maria.

Pete and the team truly helped me shift focus from a standard multifamily home property to a more balanced investment opportunity aligned with my long term goals in mind. Throughout the touring and viewing process, Pete kept me grounded, level headed, and helped me remove the emotion from the process of purchasing, allowing me to focus on my actual wants and needs.

I cannot thank everyone at Spectrum enough for making this stressful process as simple as possible. Between my hectic and often traveling work schedule, my personal life, and all the other odds, we made it out with what I can say was the best property we looked at!

We have had the pleasure of working with Michelle for both the purchase and sale of our condo, and we couldn't be more impressed with the experience. From start to finish, Michelle has always gone above and beyond to ensure everything went smoothly and seamlessly.

When we first bought our condo, Michelle was incredibly attentive and knowledgeable, helping us navigate the process with ease. Her deep understanding of the market and attention to detail made us feel confident in our decision as a first time buyer, and we were able to find the perfect place in no time.

Fast forward a few years, and when it came time to sell, we immediately called Michelle. Once again, she has been outstanding. Her guidance regarding pricing, marketing, and negotiating ensured our condo sold quickly and for a better than expected price. She is always available to answer all sorts of questions, provide advice, and keep us informed at every stage of the process.
What truly sets Michelle apart is her empathy and nurturing personality. Whether buying or selling, we felt fully supported and in great hands. If you're looking for a realtor who truly goes the extra mile, we highly recommend Michelle—she is truly exceptional!

We had a great experience with Michelle! She was super knowledgeable about the area and really cares about her clients.  She was available for any questions we might have and talked through pricing and what she thought would be best to get the house moved.

Upon first reaching out to Michelle with a piece of property we were interested in, she provided a market analysis so as to know how the property was priced. She showed us the property and listened to our vision of what we planned to do once purchased. She provided names of everyone needed for inspections and contacted them on our behalf which was a tremendous help since we had so much else going on with our daily life. Because this was vacant land upon which we planned to build, she suggested a little longer due diligence time to make sure we covered everything that needed to be addressed before building; however, she kept ball rolling and was in constant contact keeping us abreast with the progress of each inspection. Therefore, because of her efforts and knowledge, everything was done in a timely manner and we were able to close on the property sooner than anticipated. She even provided names of a few potential builders for us to contact once we selected a plan and was ready to move forward. Michelle is so knowledgeable of the area market and makes you feel as you’re her only client when you know she’s working with many at the same time. She’s very professional, helpful and guides you through the entire process. She was always available for a quick phone call or text when we had a question or concern about anything. We feel we’ve made a lifelong friend with Michelle and would highly recommend her to anyone needing anything real estate related!

Michelle is one of the best agents I have ever worked with.  She has been beside me the entire process and has always been the voice of reason.  I bought my first home from her 15 years ago and utilized her for my home sale and new purchase.  She is by far one of the best agents in the region and I would say probably the State of North Carolina.

Michelle went above and beyond for not only me as the seller but the buyer’s agent, inspectors, contractors, and attorneys to make the process of selling/buying real estate in Charlotte, NC. It’s a crazy market but she was flexible, available, professional, knowledgeable and kind to everyone. No better agent than Michelle!!

We have used Michelle as our real estate agent since 2011 and she lives up to the motto, “If it’s important to you, it’s important to me.” From start to finish she really embodies that, but what’s more, she is extremely knowledgeable and very efficient throughout the whole transaction. She is honest, hardworking, and doesn’t shy away from doing whatever footwork is required to sell and/or buy your next home. She’s one of those people who quickly becomes a trusted friend and truly that’s what she has become after our first experience. We just love Michelle and would never use anybody else!!!

I am a first time home buyer and I was in a time crunch to purchase. I work 6-7 days a week and the current market is not forgiving. Michelle was so accommodating to my schedule and would video call me so I could view the home. She remained neutral while also being able to adequately describe the home. Michelle understood my wants vs needs and after writing a few contracts that weren't accepted, she suggested we change our tactic and the very next contract was accepted! With the help of Michelle and my lender, I was able to close in 14 days. Michelle made sure I understood every step of the process and made my first home buying experience seamless and effortless! Thank you Michelle!
Michelle is amazing, I have worked with Michelle for years and she always provide A++ service

Michelle helped us sell our parents' home in the Matthews area of Charlotte. We are out of town and the house needed new carpet and paint and we did not know any contractors in the area. Michelle was very responsive to our needs and she also had great recommendations for contractors. She even met with several contractors at the house! We painted and carpeted the house, listed and sold it in record time. In addition, Michelle helped us price the house to get the most for it in today's market. She told us what it should sell for and she was spot on. Highly recommend Michelle!
Michelle was great to work with in finding a new home for me. She is professional and kept my best interest and needs a top priority. It was a pleasure working with her and I highly recommend her.

Working with Michelle turned an extremely stressful situation into a positive one. We found our dream house. As a veteran, we immediately connected with Michelle. Michelle was able to provide her expertise that resulted in an offer accepted and utilizing a VA home loan. Highly recommend and a great experience working with Michelle!

We're first time buyers and we started house-hunting with great excitement and high hopes that we would quickly find a house that would suit our needs within the budget that we had. However, Martha kept pushing us forward. "Don't give up!" "This is normal, we just need to keep looking!" "This will all be worth it in the end!"  She kept encouraging us and kept her lines open for communication. She would call and check on us and recommend new houses. A+ performance. I would recommend her and chose her again for any future purchases.

This land was in Silverleaf section of the villages.  When Silverleaf was first created, this parcel was water front but through the years, the creek that fed this peninsula dried up. Still, it was water view.

We hit the jackpot with Lacy Turner in our corner for our real estate needs. She was professional, knowledgeable, and detail oriented. My husband and I came over on Memorial Day to look at homes in and around the Tyler area. Knowing it was a holiday we did not know if anyone would be able to assist us. When we called on a particular house that was listed with Keller Williams, Lacy Turner showed up and showed us the home. We really liked that home but did not move fast enough and someone made an offer the next morning. That did not deter Lacy as she began pulling up more homes and I returned the following weekend and we looked at several and decided to make an offer on the one that we just bought .
Lacy worked hard, diligently looking for the things we needed in the home and the things that we wanted also. I have been able to call her and I get immediate response, she has worked extremely well with the listing agency and she is a true professional at what she does . Lacy jumped through hoops to help us get the necessary paperwork in order to turn all of our utilities on. 
I believe she has us in the perfect home and we look forward to many good years in the Tyler Texas area. Lacy is not only A first class Realtor,  but she is also becoming a friend.

Lacy gave her absolute best in helping us to buy a home in Tyler and we would strongly recommend her to you. Here are some of our reasons:  
Perhaps highest on the list is that she was extremely proactive in looking out for us. By this I mean  we felt that at all times she gave our interests priority.  
 We felt that we were not "just another client"-  but that we really mattered.  Lacy does not leave you waiting for responses or wondering where she is. Rather she is seriously making things happen on your behalf.  For example- if we called or texted with an issue- her response was almost immediate.
We started working with Lacy to find a home in Tyler  in April 2022. This was a time of a very active housing market in Tyler- with a shortage of homes and high prices. Lacy was able to show us homes at very  short notice to fit in with our schedule- there was never a sense of "maybe....sometime."  Rather, we got to view houses to fit our schedule. We appreciated her thoughts on particular homes and her ability to bounce ideas with us.
After around 6 viewings we decided on a particular home in late April. Lacy partnered with our lender 
in processing all documents for the sale. This was so very helpful.
In our particular situation, there were technical problems on the seller's side that were totally beyond our control. This resulted in a serious delay in closing.  In the the midst of this Lacy did everything in her power to move things along. She amazed us with her enthusiasm to make things happen. What an encouragement this was to us! 
We will just say in closing that Lacy is just really pleasant to work with. She is respectful and kind at all times and... she is really fun to be around! I know that hardly sounds "professional" from our end- but the reality is that we all need that human touch to share a good laugh somewhere in the process of buying a house.
We are delighted to recommend Lacy to you as your realtor.
Yours
Tim and Trena Clark
Tyler TX. 
July 2022
Lacy was professional, quick, and always available. She handled everything that came up smoothly, and showed to be knowledgeable in each step. Thanks, Lacy!

comment: Brent helped us sell our home and get our forever home. He was able to get us great value and top dollar for our place and was able to help us to close both properties at the same time which was huge for us!

Brent is a "get the job done and done well" kind of guy.  He is very engaged with his clients and communicates well.  He was able to help us sell our condo in 2 weeks where our previous realtor was unable to sell it in 2mo.  He knows his business and is willing to put in the work to get a house sold and a new one purchased with his clients best interests in mind.  He was very patient with us as we tried to determine what we really wanted in our next property and was able to provide a number of resources for repair/updating needs.

Brent represented us in the sale of our home and we couldn’t be happier! Due to his experience, he was able to sell our house for more than the asking price.  We had six offers before the open house; needless to say, we went with the best offer.  Thanks to Brent’s professionalism and ability to follow through on everything he said he would do, we were able to sell our home quickly and start a new chapter in our lives.

Brent helped my wife and I sell our first condo in Lakeside. We had a general idea of how the process works, but it was great to have someone who is so educated on everything walk through the process with us. Brent had a very thorough plan laid out for us and delivered in all aspects. We had a bit of a deadline to get our home sold as we were already paying rent in a new city, and Brent was able to get our place in and out of escrow without issue in no time at all. I would absolutely recommend him to anyone who is looking to buy or sale, especially if it's your first transaction and you're looking for someone to help guide you through the process.

Brent Boltz was hired as my agent in March of 2018. With Brent, we setup a game plan for getting my home ready to sell. We decided on the best time for us to list it, how to stage prep and stage our home and what date we were shooting for a closing date. Brent went out of his way in helping us get our home ready to sell. He had great ideas on what belongings of ours should stay in the home and which needed to be cleared out. After our staging was completed, Brent brought in a professional photographer/ videographer to take pics and video. The video came out amazing! I hardly recognized my own home. Not only were pictures and video taken, but a 3D walk through was put together, as well as over head video taken from a drone. On  the day of open house, Brent had a taco cart out font to meet all the perspective buyers and looky-loos. They as well as the neighbors enjoyed the food. I was told by the neighbors that we probably had 75 people or more attend the open house. In the following days we received multiple offers. The offers were all above our asking price. I can't say enough good things about Brent Boltz. He's smart, very sharp and understands the real estate business. He stayed in constant contact with us during the whole process. He is an honest agent and an honorable man. I highly recommend Brent to anybody that is even considering selling or buying a home.

Working with Brent Boltz has exceeded all of our expectations! He came in with a can-do attitude and energetic work ethic that maintained even after closing. Initially, Brent presented a very methodical and effective strategic plan for selling our home. He then enforced that plan with a sense of urgency and kept us updated along the way. Brent was thoroughly knowledgeable and knows the ins and outs of the real estate market. He was very personable and charismatic allowing for effective communication. Impressive initiative that is second to none!  n nI will definitely contact Brent again for all my real estate needs and not go to any one else. Brent is your realtor if you're looking to buy or sell. I am recommending him to all of our friends and family.  n nThank you for all the hard work Brent! We look forward to working with you in the future!

Brent was AWESOME! Brent did everything he could to get me the best possible deal on buying my first home and I felt he was definitely on my side throughout the entire process! He was extremely knowledgable and made buying my first home a lot easier than I ever expected! I will be recommending Brent to every person I know! He is a true professional! top notch!

I first met Brent when he responded to a zillow inquiry on a property.  The property did not work out and we started a work relationship that lasted many months until I found the home I wanted.  I really lucked out meeting Brent, especially since another realtor contacted me a week late.  His knowledge on the process is bar none.  But what really impressed me was the strategy his stated, then executed, to accommodate my situation of buying, moving, then selling my old place.  I needed it to work that way for an easy transition and it worked exactly as he planned and the stress of moving was greatly reduced and I got the buy and sell price I wanted.  If it all sounds too good to be true... well, you will just have to give him a call to find out ;)

Erica is the realtor you want on your team, she was patient and knowledgable as she helped us search for our new home and sell the home we were living in. If we saw a home we were interested in, Erica was quick to set up a showing and always had a flexible schedule to meet us. Not only did she listen to the feedback we gave about houses but she got to know our family and what we needed in a home, she was also proactive about showing us listings we may not have seen. Erica and her team were able to help us sell our home in 3 days, she had amazing photos taken and even set us up with a home stager! Having Erica on our team was the best decision we made during our home buying process, we still hear from her on a regular basis and she has become not just our realtor but our friend. We don't plan on moving anytime soon, but when we do Erica will be our first call.

I remember wanting to see a house last minute of course but she accommodated my request and DELIVERED!!! Thank You!!

Erica was very helpful in helping me through the buying process.  She was always available to answer any questions.  She helped me with taking care of any repairs that were needed as well as any issues that arose.  I would definitely use Erica again.

I highly recommend Perla for all real estates needs, she is knowledgeable, friendly, extremely professional and will help you navigate the buying/selling process smoothly all the way thru.
I promise that at the end of this journey, you will not only have bought or sold your house, but also gained a really good friend!

Very Professional, Knew the market, Sold my home amazingly fast, Melanie was very kind and patient with me and helped guide me.  I appreciated her positive, cheerful attitude,

This was our first time buying a home and we were very intimated by all of the rumors of the home market in Utah before we started working with Melanie. She made buying a home feel doable and gave us a lot of confidence in this experience and in the future. We ran into some problems with the seller of our property, but Melanie tackled all of the frustrating parts of the transaction without adding anything to our plate. We felt like we had a true professional on our side that sincerely had our best interest at heart. While it was always our opinion that mattered most to her, Melanie did give us excellent advice on home buying that only an expert would know. I would highly recommend Melanie to anybody looking to buy, or sell a home!
Big thank you and A+++ across the board.. Paul has strong local market knowledge, excellent communication, and very effective negotiation skills. We will be doing business again very soon!!
Unprofessional.  We asked a business question and he insulted  our agent.  He is childish.  I would never list with him

We have used Tammy twice for purchasing and once for selling a home. She was very knowledgeable about the homes on the market and their neighborhoods. She went to bat for us multiple times and made sure we got what we needed. We would use Tammy again for sure.

Tammy Warmsley provided exceptional service from start to finish.

We could not of asked for a better experience.  Thank you so much!
One of the best real estate agents in the world. If you want the best service give her a call!

We Love Her
She works hard to please us and did. She has always been pleasant. She was patient with us when looking.

comment: She was great to work with.

We have purchased 2 homes and sold 1 home with Tammy.  She is an amazing agent.  She is very responsive, intuitive and really knows her market.  I would highly recommend anyone looking for an agent to give Tammy a try.

The Yeatman Group was a pleasure to work with!  This was our first time building a home and they made the experience fun and as stress free as possible!  Even after being in the house already for almost a year, I still see and hear from Kyle and his team, checking in on how we are doing!  A great team to work with! - JE
The Yeatman Group understands the new home market in central Virginia.  They are energetic, knowledgeable and will work with the buyers and the builders to make the process as smooth as possible.
Outstanding group to work with!  It took Kyle and Lauren only 9 days to sell our home.  We highly recommend them.

Caitlin Yeatman & TYG were fabulous in helping us purchase our home.  Caitlin and her team were always attentive and continue to reach out to us.  They anticipated all our needs and everything ran smoothly in our deal.

We had a great experience with TYG! Lauren, Kyle and Ashley all played a role in supporting the sale of my home; they were organized and very responsive, and we had a signed contract in 1.5 weeks! Thanks, TYG!

The Yeatman Group is wonderful! Kyle and Matt sold our home in less than 3 weeks! They really listened to what we wanted in our new home. Their knowledgeable team ensured that while building we were informed every step of the way. Ryan took time to going through the interior and exterior selection process to make sure we could easily make decisions on everything we wanted! This is an awesome team!

Say Yes! To the Yeatman Group!!! They are the best! I closed on my 1st home in May 2016! My Realtor Lauren Renschler worked with me from the moment Tyler Yeatman gave her my phone number. She worked days and nights to find me the perfect home. Also, Tyler Yeatman was my loan officer, I can't explain how helpful and knowledgeable he is! He made the home buying process so smooth and easy! With both Lauren and Tyler by my side buying my 1st home was a breeze with zero issues! I can't thank them and the Yeatman Group enough for being there for me!!!  I highly recommend the Yeatman Group!

Jeremy helped me buy my first home and I couldn't have asked for a better experience.  We looked at SO MANY  houses and he was there every step of the way to give me helpful, thoughtful feedback and to point out things I never would have caught on my own. In the end, I was able to buy a house that exceeded my expectations in this crazy market and with a very small budget. So grateful to Jeremy's help - I couldn't have gotten here without him!

After 15 years as a full-time real estate investor, I have worked with dozens of Realtors, and Zach Fauver has consistently stood out as the best. He is diligent, responsive, and attentive. His marketing and presentation skills are second to none, and more importantly, he can navigate the challenges that frequently arise in a real estate transaction with a level of skill and finesse that I have yet to see in any other Realtor. Whether you are a fellow investor or looking to purchase or sell a home, you will be lucky to have the best Realtor in Richmond if you work with Zach Fauver.

Wow, Where do I start? The Fauver Group are a blessing to me, my wife, and my business. 11 transactions later ( including my personal home) and I couldn't be happier with Zach & Franklin. They haven't only been partners but friends. These guys will negotiate and use everything in there abilities to get the results their clients need. Never fear the Fauver Group is here for all your home buy/sell needs.

BEST AGENT, Hands down! You will not regret doing business with this wonderful lady! I have bought a home and sold a home with her and I will never use another realtor. She goes the extra mile for her clients!

We couldn't be happier with Fawn as our agent. Not only is she professional and on top of every little detail in our real estate investment transactions, but she is always friendly and considerate throughout the process. As   out of town investors   her substantial knowledge of the region and her seemingly limitless array of contacts have literally saved us thousands of dollars, as well as many sleepless nights.
Nora did a great job working with a difficult buyers agent and got me above list price! I would definitely recommend her to anyone that is in the market to buy or sell.

Terri is an excellent agent, who will get the job done. We worked very well together. Terri is knowledgeable, and she has the energy and skills needed to represent you, and advise you. Selling your home is an arduous process as is, but Terri can make it palatable. Thank you Terri for everything.

Grant was extremely knowledgeable about the current market in areas within and around Roanoke. He was patient and helpful showing properties and was able to answer or find answers to all of my questions in a timely manner. Overall, Grant was great to work with! I would highly recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell a property.

Grant was very patient with us as we worked through what we wanted to do, and whether we even wanted to buy a house. I’ve seen other real estate agents lose patience and just want to get a sale done as quickly as possible. Grant took his time to get to know us and what we wanted, and made sure to listen to us, while also taking time to give us some good advice. 

There was never a time when Grant was not available and ready to talk. When we finally found the house we really wanted, Grant did everything he could to make sure the deal went through. 

I would definitely recommend Grant Snyder without reservation.

I listed a house for sale in Fairlawn, VA.  Within an hour of me listing it FSBO, I received a call from Riley.  He was so forthcoming and candid that I decided to give him a chance to list it with EXPRealty.  Little did I know what I was signing up for.  Not only did he handle all the usual things (open house, showings, etc.) but he was my advocate the whole time.  I felt like I could trust him.  He communicated promptly, candidly and clearly with me, always gave me the good the bad and the bottom line.  His attention to detail - impeccable.  His connections with a contractor allowed the repairs to happen in a timely manner and on budget.  I would go thru him again if I needed to buy/sell another house.  Thank you Riley!

After working as an investor for 22 years, I am still at awe at how poorly and lack of integrity was portrayed by this realtor while representing the seller in a transaction where I was the buyer. After several correspondences between  him and my agent, he confirmed the seller accepted our offer and to proceed to send the final offer just amending date details we were asked to adjust and we agreed. As we had finalized the offer details and were about to send it back, my agent gets a call from Patrick and says that they had decided to call the other agent, whose client’s offer was just under our offer, because it was so close to ours and asked if we would come up a some, because they were going to give the other clients a chance to come up some as well. We declined to change our offer that had already been told was accepted by word and were asked to resend amending the date. Long story short, the other offer was accepted,  as clearly they were  told where they needed to be to get the house. Just WOW!!

After working as an investor for 22 years, I am still at awe at how poorly and lack of integrity was portrayed by this realtor while representing the seller in a transaction where I was the buyer. Excellent agent.   Second time working with Monique she always has your back.   Highly recommend.

Monique was bar-none. For a multitude of reasons, this was not an easy listing and she filled the role of Realtor - as well as mediator between the sellers, negotiator with the buyers and perhaps even therapist. Monique went out of her way repeatedly and without request, to keep this listing alive and multiple times jumped in to assist in saving a sale that repeatedly threatened to tank. You will not find a more dedicated representative and there is simply not enough space here for me to cover everything she did for my sale.

Mr. Martin has been nothing short of a consummate professional. He has shown himself to be a conscientious, highly capable, and extremely effective agent. He's been personable and friendly, but (thankfully) lacks the abrasive, heavy handed, "hard-sell" quality that a lot of people in the sales field can adopt over time. As a first time seller, working with Mr. Martin has been a real breeze, and has made the entire process a lot less scary than it was initially. 10/10 Would definitely recommend.

Working with Jamie was a true pleasure.. She was terrific setting up the expectations  thru the process of selling...We did have some hiccups before closing and she was a ROCK Star guiding me thru them . I would strongly recommend having Jamie as your agent for buying or selling... Looking forward to using her as a buyer in the near future
Jamie was really helpful and patient in answering all my questions. She possesses that rare skill of being professional but also friendly in a casual way that put me at ease in working with her.

Jamie was absolutely wonderful! Over a couple years we looked at a LOT of homes, and placed several offers. She was always on time, communication was great and she definitely always had my best interest in mind.

I would recommend Jamie in a heartbeat to friends or family. She was patient with me as we looked at houses for a month. When I was ready to make an offer, she responded immediately. She’s also friendly and just a pleasant person to be around.

Jamie was wonderful. She was always available, always answered our un-timely text messages and emails readily. Her honesty and straigh-forwardness was appreciated very much. a wonderful agent very knowledgeable and curtious, pleasure to work with. Would use the services of Jamie and the group again .I will be recommending Jamie to all that I know who are looking to buy a house.

I would recommend Jamie to anyone.  She's quick, approachable, and knows her job well.

Thanks much Jamie

Jamie was always accessible by phone or email for any questions we may have had. Very attentive to our needs as first-time homebuyers. She made sure we understood information about every aspect of the buying process.
Jamie made the entire process of finding / buying a home simple. I would recommend her to anyone looking for a good real estate agent.

She was showing a house to others when we drove by to look at this same house. She made herself indispensable after we took her card and asked for her to set up for visits some houses we had seen online.

Jamie was very patient with me after some false starts by me on my financing capabilities.

He’s great at his job.

He’s always there when you need him.

The team at NJRE (especially Amanda, Carol and Tabitha) were extremely helpful in a recent condo sale. They went above and beyond to make what was a difficult process,  smooth. We would highly recommend them if you’re thinking of selling your property.

I wholeheartedly recommend Michelle as your broker.  We had a large home that I realized would be hard to move. Michelle definitely makes a highly favorable impression upon everyone she interacts with.  As an added plus she is a great person as well.

Terry was such a pleasure to work with! We felt comfortable and confident working with her throughout the whole search and buying process. And thanks to her close attention, hard work, and extensive knowledge of the market, we found our ideal place! We’d recommend and work with her again in a heartbeat.

Terry was friendly and very upbeat throughout the process of selling our house.  She worked well with the buyer and helped us navigate the process of negotiating.  She is very up to date on all the current requirements and the whole experience was very smooth.

Incredibly honest, hardworking, goes the extra mile, ethical, detail oriented, personable, has a deep understanding about the land, water, geology and the history as well as construction.  I have my dream property because of Terry.

Terry Davis was very knowledgeable, professional and caring for my needs. She communicated information and progress regularly and constantly checked in. I would highly recommend her for anyone who wants an agent that genuinely cares for their customers.

Terry Davis and Kelly did an awesome job with helping me sell my home. They broke everything down for me so I could understand what the process is and what was next. I met up with Terry at the Barnard Town Hall on a wintry New England day. Took my 4wd but couldn't quite make it up the hill due to icing. She was not at all concerned sliding backwards down the hill to get back out of there. She did good work representing the property through the photographs she used online, as well as her description. Don't think I could have put it any better. She has a gift. Very helpful and pleasant to deal with.

We could never give Terry enough praise for what she accomplished for us.  Of the five agencies we interviewed, Terry understood our property and our needs.  We were not in the area and she checked in with us regularly, reassuring that all was ok.  She is the best!
display_name: Susan and Domenic Sarcia  Wilson Wyoming

comment:
We had previously used Terry for another real estate transaction and we were 100% satisfied with her professionalism, honesty, and eagerness to sell and accommodate us as clients.  She certainly went over and above on the sale of our Pomfret house.

Terry was always very helpful and never too busy to answer questions or research data.

I think the above reveals our feelings.

It had been almost 50 years since we had bought an existing house and Zoe could not have made it easier.  She showed us every house we identified and found others that she thought we might like better.  However, of greater importance, she pointed out some features of some of the houses that would be potential problems that we had not recognized.  However, her assistance really began after we selected a house and she was there through the entire process, giving suggestions, helping us navigate through Vermont rules and regulations, establishing a timeline and making sure it was met.  I cannot recommend her highly enough!

It was truly a pleasure to work with Zoe.  We have said repeatedly that we would not be enjoying our new home if Zoe hadn't been so on top of the market and encouraging.  Zoe was very quick to respond, checked-in frequently, followed up on the details that a new buyer forgets about and overall made the process so much less worrisome.  She talked me off the proverbial cliff a few times!  Much thanks to her for helping to get us into our fantastic new home.  Highly recommended!

In my home search, Brad was very helpful and resourceful when it comes to making my decision to purchase the right house. He is a great realtor that gave a good solution for all my concerns in home selecting. After the purchase of my home, Brad still kept in touch to make sure everything was good with my home purchase. I am very happy with my home. Thanks Brad.

In an overwhelmingly stressful situation of buying a home, Brad made my experience very pleasant and easy to follow along. Brad is very personable and genuinely kind, all while providing a wealth of knowledge that made this a seamless process. All for which I am extremely grateful for!

Such a great realtor to work with! Brad Issler is very patient and not pushy at all. We were very particular with the kind of house we wanted. Brad did not want to put us in just any house. He was there to make sure the house was the right fit for our family.
He is very resourceful, if he doesn’t know answers, he will find the answers for us. He is the godfather to our new home! We are so happy we got to work with him!

Working with Brad on the purchase of our first home was such a great experience! His knowledge of homes is extensive from his experience in home inspection, which made our home tours extremely informative. He went above and beyond sharing insights, experience, and referrals. He was able to check in on the house for us between closing and our moving date as well, since there was about a month when we were having work done and weren't yet local. 100% recommend Brad if you're looking for a reliable agent in the Vancouver area!

comment: Jacob did everything he could to increase our visibility in the marketplace,   We sold our house during the winter and in the quiet town of Colton, we had plenty of people come through to make offers on our property.  He had a good idea on  a price that was fair for both sides and what would sell in the area.  Jacob’s friendly and easy going demeanor makes him an excellent choice as a Realtor and I will not hesitate to utilize his services next time we have the need.

Jacob T is an excellent real estate agent. He and his assistant Reagan are very diligent and work hard to find you the right house or to sell yours. I've used him on both sides with great service. Our last transaction was a difficult one and he hung in there with me! I highly recommend him!
Jacob Davis is a great agent to work with - he responds quickly to inquiry and works hard to make deals happen!

Patrick Cooper is a great agent to work with in the Spokane area, he is very knowledgeable in both land & home sales. We purchased a large property with him & he did a great job in representing us. He is very honest, easy to talk to, negotiates very well with other agents, and has great local insight into all areas of Spokane including Stevens County, Pend Oreille, and even North Idaho as he is dual licensed. It has been a great experience having him represent us & look forward to working again with him.

Linda is amazing! We accidentally passed through Goldendale and fell in love with it and randomly walked in to talk to Linda. She had a slew of viewings ready for us within days (we we going to the coast for a few days). She knows the area very well and is very familiar with well & septic testing. I would highly recommend Linda!

Linda Phelps] was amazing to work with!  Super knowledgeable, always available and  responsive to my concerns and questions with great patience.  Linda did not hesitate to traipse through mud and snow in the middle of winter to show my remote “off the grid” property to prospective buyers.  Linda made the process quick and easy for me from start to finish.
Linda was great to work with always available ; always on time , and very helpful in every way during the whole process!

We really enjoyed working with Linda for the sale of our property. She is very knowledgable and such a sweetheart. She is quick to let you know whats going on in the process and keeping you informed through the whole thing. She is awesome!!

Linda is professional and knowledgeable in the real estate sales market of Klickitat County. She guided me through the ups and downs of closing with a very successful outcome.
Thank you, Linda for all your hard work.

Linda Phelps is the very definition of an agent.  She knows the market, the rules, pays attention to the details and looks after her client's interests.  Linda has acted as our agent in three separate transactions and we have continued with her because she is the very best real estate agent in the area.  Thank you, Linda!

We were trying to sell our unique problem property by ourselves until I called a friend of mine ( who was a retired realtor) to see if she knew anyone that could help us, you see we had an older manufactured home that was a "second placement" on 20 acres with a small RV park. Not many financial companies to finance this.  Linda came to our home , took pics and left saying" let me run some numbers and look for a finance company.  Linda made a few calls and our home sold before we could blink an eye and it sold for more than what we were trying to sell for.  Linda took care of us all the way even when a problem popped up at closing she said " don't worry, I've got you" .  She was always on top of every detail. If I had more property to sell I would use Linda in a heartbeat!  If you want to be sure you are in safe, caring hands call Linda.

Linda has helped me with a very difficult situation with my property and has always been on top of everything! She is always professional and friendly at the same time! I have really appreciated all she has done!
great

Linda is fantastic, definitely 5 stars across the board!! She went out of her way to find us a new home, she was on it night and day. If I had a sudden question or needed to talk to her, she always answered her phone. She gets to know what your really looking for and she finds all available options, and will continue to until she finds the one thats right for you. She is awesome all the way around!
Linda is an amazing realtor that walks you through every step without feeling pushed. She is very punctual, courteous, and professional. She is highly recommended!

Linda was absolutely amazing!  Great energy, tons of experience, and got our house sold quickly for a great price.  We loved working with her - she was always responsive via text, call, or email. We would highly recommend her as an experienced agent and hardworking woman!

Linda is amazing!! She is always going 100 mph. Very professional, knowledgable and funny! She takes a stressful situation,  like buying a house can be, and turns it into a walk in the park. She works her tail off for her clients. If i had a question at 7:30 pm,  she responded almost immediately,  every time! We loved working with her!

It was a pleasure working with Trish Englund. After speaking with us for the first time, she understood what we were looking for and was active in helping us find, bid, and ultimately buying our home! Whether it be early morning or late at night, Trish was always quick to respond to our needs. She was always in contact with the selling agent, keeping us informed of any changes happening throughout the entire process. I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a home in this crazy Seattle market, she knows what she's doing!

Trish was a tireless advocate for me as a buyer.  She worked hard to make sure I got the best deal possible, and was patient with me as a first-time homebuyer who had little knowledge and no experience in real estate.  As a result I was able to get a great starter home in a competitive market.  Thank you Trish!

Trish is the best realtor I have ever worked with and I have had experience with a few in multiple states. She was a consummate professional, courteous, extremely knowledgeable, always accessible - even after hours! - and clearly worked hard to find us the right property. She was patient with us when we were not finding quite the right home, and then when we did find the perfect place she was able to effectively guide us and use her connections and resources to make sure we got the place on our first offer! In discussions with friends and colleagues they were all astounded that she not only found us a place like the one we ended up in, but that we actually were able to purchase it on our first offer. She always had the right advice and when it was time to move fast made sure it happened, even responding to texts as late as 8 or 9pm to make sure things got done perfectly the first time. 

Trish was someone that I felt was very approachable, that I could always speak honestly to, and always had my best interest in mind.

I would highly recommend Windermere and Trish Englund specifically to anyone looking for property in the Seattle area.

Trish was absolutely excellent in every facet of her work. She is a consummate professional who was always working hard to ensure that we got the best service and found the place of our dreams. She was always available, even after hours, and was able to answer questions quickly and accurately. We were able to get the perfect place for us and all of our friends and colleagues were astounded at how effective and efficient she was in acquiring the property, complaining that they had to spend much more time, effort, and have numerous offers rejected which was contrary to our experience with Trish. We highly commend her and have already recommended her to all our friend and colleagues and will continue to do so.

Everything went incredibly smoothly, efficiently, and effectively.

Absolutely stellar in all regards. Will highly recommend to anyone looking for property in the greater Seattle area.
Trish was professional, knowledgable and always available. Every bit of her advice was spot on. I would hire her again in a second.

Trish was immediately so personal, professional, and friendly that we were immediately drawn to working with her. She made us feel very comfortable and never pressured in anyway. Our time frame of house buying changed many times and she was always completely understanding and never made us feel like an inconvenience ever. 

Trish went above and beyond in many ways including delivering our earnest money check for us. She always made sure we knew exactly what was going on and met with us to sign papers at the end. She helped us through every step and make the whole process feel like a breeze. 

Trish was truly incredible and helped us in every aspect. Anytime we were fearful or confused she flawlessly helped us to feel better and understand what was going on. We can’t say enough great things about Janine! As a first-time homebuyer, we had a lot of questions, and she was incredibly patient, knowledgeable, and supportive throughout the entire process. She knew each area so well and even seemed to know many of the neighbors personally, which gave us a real sense of confidence and security in our decision. Since I only knew the main shopping area before, her insight was invaluable in helping us find the perfect home in a quieter part of Janesville that we absolutely love and feel safe in.

Not only did she help us find the perfect home, but she also provided excellent recommendations for our mortgage broker, a painter, and electrician, all of whom did fantastic work!! 

Beyond just being an amazing realtor, Janine truly felt like a new friend—she genuinely cared about us and our home-buying journey. She was just as excited as we were to see all the changes we’ve made since moving in, which meant so much to us.

Jessica made the home buying experience positive and enjoyable. She was always available to answer my questions. I would've been stressed out if it wasn't for her but she made the process easy! We love our home and couldn't recommend anyone more!

Julie is amazing.  This is my second time working with her in under 5 years.  I purchased my home from her and she was able to navigate some difficult sellers without too much fuss.

Recently, I called on Julie again to help me with anther real estate transaction.  This time to sell my home.  I’m so glad I did.  My home was under contract within a month of listing! A minor problem with the exterior of the home (fading paint on the siding) came up in the inspection.  Julie jumped through hoops to try and help me get the paint issue resolved.  She called around and did a lot of investigative work to get us closer to a solution.  She was able to track down the warranty folks.  Ultimately, we couldn’t make any use of the warranty, but I was so impressed that Julie did all this extra work.  I didn’t ask her to do it. She just mentioned it during one of our ‘update’ phone calls.  The buyers ended up walking away because we just didn’t have enough time to get all the answers on the paint.  But, Julie got us prepared for the next buyer.  And sure enough, the next buyer came along about a week after my house went back on the market. We proposed our solution to the new buyers, and we had no issues.

Real estate transactions have always been tough for me.  I am a very analytical person and real estate has a lot of emotions involved.  Fond memories of the home you are leaving and all the emotions from the other side, all the excitement and expectations is tough to process sometimes.  Julie helped keep me in check so many times.  A question or request would come in, and sometimes I would just take it out of context and get upset.  Julie had a magical way of getting me to calm down before making a stupid decision.  I am very grateful that she has that ability.

Julie will tell you straight, and that’s one of my favorite things about her. You might not like what she has to say (i.e, that your idea of a good price to list your home isn’t realistic, or your offer on a home is way too low, ect), but she will tell you to help you make an informed decision.  I appreciate that she isn’t afraid to give you her honest opinion. 

I HIGHLY recommend her to anyone that may be looking at a real estate transaction.  If you are looking to buy, or to sell, Julie and her team will be able to help you out.  Thank you, Julie!
